听见没？真正的朋友！
You hear me? A loyal friend.

如今也是我唯一的朋友
The last one I've got.

希望我别令你失望 不会的
I hope I'll serve you well. You will.

只要你别老是摆出这张阴沉的臭脸
And I'll make sure you don't look so fucking grim all the time.

跟我走 孩子们！去猎几头野猪回来！
Come on, boys, let's go kill some boar!

你不要命了吗？
Are you completely mad?

他瞧见我们了 没事 没事
He saw us. It's all right, it's all right.

没事 他瞧见我们了！
It's all right. He saw us!

我不是瞎子更不是聋子
I heard you the first time.

你这小鬼 挺能爬啊

How old are you, boy? 10.

好好想一想 我为爱情做了些什么
The things I do for love.

喝点水吧 孩子
You need to drink, child.

就没别的可吃吗？
Isn't there anything else?

多斯拉克人只有两样宝：
The Dothraki have two things in abundance:

草和骏马 可惜人不能吃草
Grass and horses. People can't live on grass.

在亚夏彼方的阴影之地 据说有一片鬼草原 鬼草的茎杆白得像白璃 夜里还会发光
In the Shadow Lands beyond Asshai, they say there are fields of ghost grass with stalks as pale as milk that glow in the night.

这种草会杀死其余的草
It murders all other grass.

多斯拉克人相信 有朝一日鬼草会占据全世界…那便是世界的末日
The Dothraki believe that one day it will cover everythingthat's the way the world will end.

我们离开潘托斯还不远 陛下
We're still not far from Pentos, your Grace.

Magister Illyrio has extended his hospitality.

在他那儿您会住得舒适
You'd be more comfortable there.

我不在乎他的款待或者舒适生活
I have no interest in hospitality or comfort.

莫尔蒙 你就这么亡命天涯
Well, Mormont, as brutish as this life is,

是怕回七国被砍头么？

据说是跟奴隶贩子做交易？

不 我是把抓到的盗猎者 卖给了奴隶贩子
Selling to one some poachers I caught on my land.

你尽管放心 在我治下
Under my reign, you won't be punished for such nonsense.

人们才不会因为这区区小事而受罚
You can rest assured of that.

舅舅 昨晚的相好这么漂亮啊
Betterlooking bitches than you're used to, Uncle.

我妈妈在找你
My mother's been looking for you.

我们今天就要回君临了
We ride for King's Landing today.

Before you go, you will call on Lord and Lady Stark and offer your sympathies.

我的慰问对他们有什么用？
What good will my sympathies do them?

一点用都没有 但这是应尽的礼数
None. But it is expected of you.

大家已经注意到你刻意缺席了

那小屁孩算什么东西

我可不想去听老女人哭哭啼啼

你敢再说一句 我就再赏你一耳光
One word and I'll hit you again.

但首先你给我去拜见史塔克公爵夫妇 我要你在他们面前跪下 说你感到非常遗憾 说你愿意为他们赴汤蹈火 最后还要献上你最虔诚的祝祷 你听懂了没有？
But first you will get to Lord and Lady Stark and you will fall on your knees in front of them and tell them how very sorry you are, that you are at their service, and that all your prayers are with them. Do you understand?

小少爷 王子是不会忘记您刚才的举动的
The prince will remember that, little lord.

哪天要是他忘了 你这条狗可要好好提醒他

你这话什么意思？ 学士说那孩子活下来的机会很大

我们能做的只是祈祷

我仍不相信你要独自行动

即便对你 这也太荒唐了

你的好奇心都哪去了？

The greatest structure ever built, the intrepid men of The Night's Watch, the wintry abode of the White Walkers.

别说你想去当黑衣弟兄啦
Tell me you're not thinking of taking the black.

然后打一辈子光棍？那怎么成 从多恩领到凯岩城 全国的妓女都会抗议的
And go celibate? The whores would go begging from Dorne to Casterly Rock.

放心 我不过是想爬上长城 对着世界的边缘洒泡尿罢了
No, I just want to stand on top of the wall and piss off the edge of the world.

别当着孩子们的面说这种粗话
The children don't need to hear your filth.

就算那孩子活下来 也成了跛子 甚至是个畸形怪胎

我宁可干脆利落地去死
Give me a good clean death any day.

活着起码充满各种可能

我真心希望那孩子活过来

没关系 你是主我是客

他真漂亮 是不是？

这大概是你现在最不想听的话了

大家都知道 大家都知道

但其中一个运行得太靠近太阳 受不住高热 就爆炸了

We already owe Lord Tywin three million gold.

再借个八万算什么？
What's another 80,000?

你说王室负债高达‘三百万’金币？
Are you telling me the crown is three million in debt?

目前王室负债总额超过六百万
I'm telling you the crown is six million in debt.

你怎么会让国库沦落到这般地步？
How could you let this happen?

财政大臣只管找钱
The Master of Coin finds the money.

花钱的是国王和首相
The King and The Hand spend it.

琼恩·艾林绝不会允许劳勃 把国家搞破产
I will not believe Jon Arryn allowed Robert to bankrupt the realm.

艾林大人固然精打细算 但恐怕国王陛下 不见得都听从睿智的谏言 我老哥最讨厌所谓的‘数铜板’
Lord Arryn gave wise and prudent advice, but I fear his Grace doesn't always listen. 'Counting coppers,' he calls it.

我明天就去跟陛下谈
I'll speak to him tomorrow.

这么铺张浪费的比赛 国家可负担不起
This tournament is an extravagance we cannot afford.

谈谈当然好 不过我们还是先着手订个计划吧
As you will. But still, we'd best make our plans.

在我跟劳勃交涉之前 统统搁下来
There will be no plans until I speak to Robert.

诸位大人 请原谅 我…
Forgive me, my Lords. I'm

我长途跋涉 实在是累了 史塔克大人
I had a long ride. You are The King's Hand,

您是国王的首相 为您效劳是我们职责所在
Lord Stark, we serve at your pleasure.

噢！ 忍着点 就快好了
Ow! Please, it's nearly healed.

这丑死了 伤疤是王者的证明 你打败了一只冰原狼 你是你父亲一样的勇士
It's ugly. A King should have scars you fought off a direwolf. You're a warrior like your father.

不 我跟他不一样 我没打败任何东西
I'm not like him. I didn't fight off anything.

他咬我 我只会尖叫
It bit me and all I did was scream.

这事两个史塔克妞都看见了
And the two Stark girls saw it, both of them.

这并非事实 事实是你杀了那野兽
That's not true. You killed the beast.

念着父辈的交情才饶了那两个丫头
You only spared the girl because of the love your father bears her father.

伊里斯·坦格利安在位时 你父亲不过是个反贼 叛徒
When Aerys Targaryen sat on the Iron Throne, your father was a rebel and a traitor.

有朝一日你也会坐上铁王座 到时候你怎么说 历史就怎么写
Someday you'll sit on the throne and the truth will be what you make it.

我非娶她不可吗？
Do I have to marry her?

她那么年轻貌美
She's very beautiful and young.

你若不喜欢她 只需在重大场合把她牵出来溜溜 等时机成熟 再跟她造几位小王子 小公主
If you don't like her, you only need to see her on formal occasions and when the time comes, to make little princes and princesses.

你想搞浓妆艳抹的妓女 就去搞浓妆艳抹的妓女
And if you'd rather fuck painted whores, you'll fuck painted whores.

你中意名门闺秀 就去找名门闺秀
And if you'd rather lie with noble virgins, so be it.

我的宝贝儿子 你是这世界的主人 世界将围绕你旋转
You are my darling boy and the world will be exactly as you want it to be.

但你要向那史塔克女孩献献殷勤
Do something nice for the Stark girl.

我不想 你不想 但你得这么做
I don't want to. No, but you will.

在王者之路上 小恩小惠会为你扫清许多障碍
The occasional kindness will spare you all sorts of trouble down the road.

太纵容那些北方佬了
We allow the Northerners too much power.

他们自以为能跟我们平起平坐
They consider themselves our equals.

那你想怎么处理呢？
How would you handle them?

我要把他们的赋税加倍 再命令他们交出一万名壮丁以组建王家军队
I'd double their taxes and command them to supply 10,000 men to the Royal Army.

凭什么每个领主都有权带兵？
Why should every lord command his own men?

这太原始了 跟山上的原住民有什么区别？
It's primitive, no better than the hill tribes.

我们应该建立一支忠于王室的常备军 由久经沙场的老兵训练 而不是临到头来征集一帮从没摸过刀枪的农民
We should have a standing army of men loyal to the crown, trained by experienced soldiers instead of a mob of peasants who've never held pikes in their lives.

如果北方人不愿纳税交人呢？
And if the Northerners rebel?

我要攻占临冬城 任命一位大忠臣来当北境守护 比如凯冯舅公
Seize Winterfell and install someone loyal to the realm as warden of the North. Uncle Kevan, maybe.

你觉得这一万北方精锐 到时候是为你而战还是支持自己的领主呢？
And these 10,000 Northern troops, would they fight for you or their lord?

当然是为我！我是他们的国王
For me. I'm their King.

可你是在侵略他们的家园 你还要他们同室操戈 我不是要求他们 是…
But you've just invaded their homeland, asked them to kill their brothers. I'm not asking.

一个外来人可以征服北境 却无法保住北境
The North cannot be heldnot by an outsider.

它过于辽阔 又桀骜不驯 当北境的冬天到来时 恐怕七神加在一起也无法挽救你和你的王家军队
It's too big and too wild. And when the winter comes, the Seven Gods together couldn't save you and your royal army.

真正的王者懂得何时蓄势
A good King knows when to save his strength...

何时克敌
And when to destroy his enemies.

你也同意史塔克是敌人？
The Starks are enemies?

那当然了 非我族类 其心必异
Everyone who isn't us is an enemy.

别敲了 小姐 赶紧吃东西
Enough of that, young lady. Eat your food.

我在练习 练什么
I'm practicing. Practicing for what?

练怎么杀王子 艾莉亚 你给我停下！
The Prince. Arya, stop!

他是个骗子 懦夫 他杀了我朋友
He's a liar and a coward and he killed my friend.

杀你朋友的是猎狗
The Hound killed your friend.

去！王子怎么吩咐 猎狗就怎么做
The Hound does whatever the Prince tells him to do.

你个骗子 如果你肯说实话
You're a liar, and if you told the truth

米凯就不会死了 够了！
Mycah would be alive. Enough!

怎么回事？
What's happening here?

艾莉亚太放肆了 没一点淑女样子
Arya would rather act like a beast than a lady.

回房去 我待会儿找你谈
Go to your room. We'll speak later.

给你 亲爱的
That's for you, love.

弥赛菈公主的玩具都是这位师傅做的
The same dollmaker makes all of Princess Myrcella's toys.

八岁起我就不玩娃娃了
I haven't played with dolls since I was eight.

我可以先告退吗? 可你的东西几乎都没吃
May I be excused? You've barely eaten a thing.

没事 你去吧
It's all right. Go on.

养闺女比打仗还难哪
War was easier than daughters.

这把剑是谁的？ 我的
Whose sword is that? Mine.

我认得铸剑人的记号 这是密肯打的
I know this maker's mark. This is Mikken's work.

你怎么弄到这把剑的？
Where did you get this?

小淑女是不该玩剑的
Little ladies shouldn't play with swords.

而且我不想变成淑女
And I don't want to be a lady.

你要它来做什么？
Now what do you want with this?

啊 它还有名字…
Oh, a blade with a name.

你想拿这缝衣针来对付谁？
And who were you hoping to skewer with Needle?

你知道剑道的第一课是什么？
Do you know the first thing about sword fighting?

用尖的那端去刺敌人
Stick 'em with the pointy end.

这的确是剑术的精髓
That's the essence of it.

我想好好学
I was trying to learn.

我要米凯陪我练
I asked Mycah to practice with me.

都是我的错 别这样 我亲爱的孩子
It was my fault. No, sweet girl.

不 不 屠夫小弟不是你害的
No no, you didn't kill the butcher's boy.

我恨他们！我恨死他们了！
I hate them! I hate all of them.

我恨猎狗 恨王后 恨国王 还有乔佛里和珊莎
The Hound, the Queen and the King and Joffrey and Sansa.

珊莎是被拖到国王和王后面前的…
Sansa was dragged before the King and Queen...

你希望她指证王子？
And asked to call the Prince a liar.

我还不是被拖去的！而且他本来就是个大骗子！
So was I! He is a liar.

嘘 宝贝 听我说
Shh, darling, listen to me.

珊莎跟乔佛里订过婚
Sansa will be married to Joffrey's someday.

她不能出卖未来的夫婿
She cannot betray him.

即便他有千般不对 她也得站在他那边
She must take his side even when he's wrong.

可你怎能让她嫁给这种人？
But how you can let her marry someone like that?

作为临冬城史塔克家族的一份子 你知道我们的族语
You're a Stark of Winterfell. You know our words.

你生于漫长的盛夏时节
You were born in the long summer.

还未经历其他季节
You've never known anything else.

现在冬天真的要来了
But now winter is truly coming.

在冬天 我们必须保卫彼此 相互温暖 共享力量 珊莎她再怎么说也是你姐姐
And in the winter, we must protect ourselves, look after one another. Sansa is your sister.

我并非有意吓你 然而我也不想骗你
I don't want to frighten you, but I won't lie to you either.

我们来到了一个危险的地方
We've come to a dangerous place.

我们不能自相残杀
We cannot fight a war amongst ourselves.

别拿剑刺你姐姐就好
Try not to stab your sister with it.

你想留着它 就得学会怎么用它
If you're going to own a sword, you'd better know how to use it.

别听它叫唤 乌鸦就会说谎
Don't listen to it. Crows are all liars.

我知道一个乌鸦的故事 我讨厌你那些故事
I know a story about a crow. I hete your stories.

我知道有个故事是讲讨厌听故事的小男孩
I know a story about a boy who hated stories.

我来说说“高个”邓肯爵士的故事吧
I could tell you about Ser Duncan the tall.

你最喜欢这个故事了
Those were always your favorites.

我最喜欢的才不是这个
Those weren't my favorites.

我喜欢的是那些吓人的
My favorites were the scary ones.

噢 我亲爱的孩子啊 你出生在夏季 哪里懂得真正的恐惧？
Oh, my sweet summer child. What do you know about fear?

当冬天来临 积雪百尺
Fear is for the winter, when the snows fall a hundred feet deep.

当长夜漫漫 终年不见天日 小孩生于黑夜 长于黑夜 死于黑夜
Fear is for the long night, when the Sun hides for years and children are born and live and die all in darkness.

当异鬼穿梭林间 那才是恐惧降临之时 小少爷
That is the time for fear, my little lord, when the White Walkers move through the woods.

几千年前 在一个长达一代人的长夜里
Thousands of years ago there came a night that lasted a generation.

城中的国王 和茅屋里的羊倌同样颤抖着被冻死
Kings froze to death in their castles, same as the Shepherds in their huts.

母亲们宁可闷死自己的孩子 也不愿见他们挨饿受冻 她们放声大哭 眼泪却冻结在脸颊上
And women smothered their babies rather than see them starve, and wept and felt the tears freeze on their cheeks.

你喜欢听的就是这种故事？
So is this the sort of story that you like?

在一片黑暗中 异鬼首度降临人间
In that darkness, the White Walkers came for the first time.

他们横扫城市和王国 骑着死马 带着大如猎狗的白蜘蛛四处狩猎…
They swept through cities and Kingdoms, riding their dead horses, hunting with their packs of pale spiders big as Hounds

你在给他说什么呢?
What are you telling him now?

说小少爷爱听的故事啊
Only what what the little lord telling wants to hear.

去用晚餐吧 我想和他独处一会儿
Get your supper. I want some time with him.

从前她跟我讲 天空之所以是蓝色的 全因我们住在蓝眼巨人马克比的眼睛里
One time she told me the sky is blue because we live inside the eye of a blueeyed giant named Macomber.

还是什么也不记得？
You still don't remember anything?

我见你爬过上千回了
I've seen you climb a thousand times.

在风中 在雨中… 上千回地爬
In the wind, in the rain a thousand times.

你从没失足 可我确实摔下来了
You never fall. I did though.

是真的 是不是？ 鲁温师傅说我的腿…
It's true, isn't it, what Maester Luwin says about my legs?

永远不要说这种话 我宁愿去死
Don't ever say that. I'd rather be dead.

由这道门进出的人比较少 夫人
Fewer eyes back here, my Lady.

我已经阔别都城九年了
It's nine years since I've set foot in the capital.

即便九年前也没几个人知道我是谁
And no one knew who I was the last time I came either.

欢迎来到君临 史塔克夫人 可否随我们走一趟？
Welcome to King's Landing, Lady Stark. Would you mind following us?

为什么？我们没犯什么事啊
I would. We've done nothing wrong.

我们奉命护送您进城

奉谁的命？这是… 请随我来 史塔克夫人
I don't know who's providing your instructions, but follow me, Lady Stark.

当我是暗巷里的婊子吗？ 你竟敢把我带到… 去去！
You take me for some backalley Sally you can drag into a pssst!

我没有不敬之意 尤其是对你

你竟敢把我带到这种地方！
How dare you bring me here!

你疯了不成？
Have you lost your mind?

没人会上这儿来找你 这不正是你所期望的吗？
No one will come looking for you here. Isn't that what you wanted?

安排在此地见面我表示歉意
I'm truly sorry about the locale.

你怎么知道我来了君临？

一位好朋友告诉我的
A dear friend told me.

史塔克夫人 瓦里斯伯爵
Lady Stark. Lord Varys.

阔别多年 今日相见真是令人欢欣鼓舞
To see you again after so many years is a blessing.

你怎会知道我来了？
How did you know I was coming?

我的职责便是打听消息啊 好夫人
Knowledge is my trade, my Lady.

我在想 您是否把那把匕首也带来啦？
Did you bring the dagger with you, by any chance?

我的小小鸟儿无处不在
My little birds are everywhere...

他们也给我传回来了
They whisper to me the strangest stories.

你知道匕首的主人是谁？
Do you know whose dagger this is?

毫无头绪
I must admit I do not.

哈哈 这真是历史性的一刻
Well well, this is an historic day.

我居然会知道 你不知道的事情
Something you don't know that I do.

放眼七大王国 这匕首只有一把
There's only one dagger like this in all of the Seven Kingdoms.

直到乔佛里王子命名日那天的比武大会为止
At least it was, until the tournament on Prince Joffrey's last Nameday.

我和所有有常识的人一样 赌詹姆爵士会赢得长枪比试

所以当百花骑士把他刺下马时
When the Knight of the Flowers unseated him,

葛兰 让他见识见识农民的本事
Grenn, show him what you farm boys are made of.

如果是真剑 你早没命了
If that were a real sword, you'd be dead.

咱们的雪诺大人可是长在城堡里 你们只配被他唾弃
Lord Snow here grew up in a castle spitting down on the likes of you.

你认为奈德·史塔克的野种 会跟你们一样流血吗？
Do you think Ned Stark's bastard bleeds like the rest of us?

好吧 雪诺大人 看来你是这帮饭桶里最结实的一个
Well, Lord Snow, it appears you're the least useless person here.

去把自己收拾干净
Go clean yourselves up.

我今天已经看够了

他有没有魅力不重要

那他进展如何呢 莫尔蒙司令？
And how's that going, commander Mormont?

有信鸦 带来奈德·史塔克儿子的消息
A raven came for Ned Stark's son.

我本想早点给你的
I meant to give you this earlier.

最近忘性太大
So forgetful these days.

今天早上有信鸦从临冬城飞来

或许您想与夫人分享吧？
Perhaps you'd like to share it with your wife?

我夫人人在临冬城 是吗？

是你 我看的就是你

这家店恰好是由我经营
I thought that she'd be safest in here.

你老婆在这里最安全
One of several such establishments I own.

嗯？你觉得很好笑是不是？

啊 这帮姓史塔克的… 爆脾气 死脑筋
Ah, the Starks quick tempers, slow minds.

小杂种 你打破了我的鼻子！
You broke my nose, bastard!

把你从长城上扔下去 要多久才会着地呢？

我怀疑他们能不能在野狼光顾前找到你的尸体
I wonder if they'd find you before the wolves did.

你看什么看 半人？
What're you looking at, half man?

你的脸很有特点

嗯 令人过目难忘
Hmm, very distinctive faces.

我们长什么样关你屁事？
And what do you care about our faces?

把这么几颗有特点的脑袋插在枪上 来装饰君临的城门挺不错
It's just I think they would look marvelous decorating spikes in King's Landing.

或许我该写信给我老姐 跟她分享这个点子
Perhaps I'll write my sister, the Queen, about it.

我们走着瞧 雪诺大人
We'll talk later, Lord Snow.

大家都知道这是个什么地方 但没人告诉我真相
Everybody knew what this place was and no one told me.

我父亲肯定知情 却仍然把我送来自生自灭

葛兰的父亲
Grenn's father left him too...

在他三岁那年就把他丢到了农场外面
Outside a farmhouse when he was three.

派普不过偷了一轮奶酪
Pyp was caught stealing a wheel of cheese.

她老妹当时三天没吃饭了
His little sister hadn't eaten in three days.

他不想失去右手的话 就得来长城充军
He was given a choice: His right hand or The Wall.

我这两天都在跟总司令聊他们的故事
I've been asking the lord commander about them.

他们恨我 因为我比他们优秀
They hate me because I'm better than they are.

你很幸运 因为他们都没机会 接受临冬城教头罗德利克爵士的训练
It's a lucky thing none of them were trained by a MasteratArms like your Ser Rodrik.

我甚至敢断言 来这里之前 他们都没握过真剑
I don't imagine any of them have ever held a real sword before they came here.

哪怕只是暗示王后的弟弟涉嫌谋害你儿子 便已构成叛国罪
The mere suggestion that the queen's brother tried to kill your boy would be considered treason.

我们有证据 我们有这把匕首
We have proof. We have the blade.

提利昂大人肯定会辩称匕首是被偷的
Which Lord Tyrion will say was stolen from him.

托你儿子那只狼的福 惟一能戳穿他的人被咬断了喉咙
The only man who could say otherwise has no throat, thanks to your boy's wolf.

培提尔答应协助我们调查真相
Petyr has promised to help us find the truth.

他就像我失散多年的弟弟 奈德
He's like a little brother to me, Ned.

他不会辜负我的信任
He would never betray my trust.

为着她的缘故 我会尽量不让你送命
I'll try to keep you alive, for her sake.

说来只有笨蛋才会这么做 但我就是没法拒绝你老婆的任何请求
A fool's task, admittedly, but I've never been able to refuse your wife anything.

你是一个真正的朋友
You're a true friend.

这话你可千万别告诉他人 免得我辛苦建立的名声毁于一旦
Don't tell anyone. I have a reputation to maintain.

你怎能如此愚蠢？ 冷静点
How could you be so stupid? Calm down.

他是个孩子 他才十岁
He's a child10 years old.

你当时想什么呢？ 想咱俩啊
What were you thinking? I was thinking of us.

况且你现在抱怨怕是太迟了吧
You're a bit late to start complaining about it now.

那男孩到底说了什么？ 什么也没说
What has the boy told them? Nothing.

他什么也不记得了
He's said nothing. He remembers nothing.

那你吵什么吵？
Then what are you raving about?

万一他想起来了呢？
What if it comes back to him?

如果他把当时的情景告诉他父亲… 我们就说他在发梦 在骗人
If he tells his father what he saw we'll say he was lying. We'll say he was dreaming.

我们怎么说都行
We'll say whatever we like.

还怕一个十岁孩子不成
I think we can outfox a 10yearold.

你有没有想过我丈夫？ 他么 必要时我跟他拼命
And my husband? I'll go to war with him if I have to.

歌手们说不定会写首歌
They can write a ballad about us:

《瑟曦的阴道之战》
'The War for Cersei's Cunt.'

如果他说出去 我就先宰了他
And if he does, I'll kill him.

再干掉奈德·史塔克 国王…把他们杀干净 直到天底下 只剩你和我
Him, Ned Stark, the kingthe whole bloody lot of them, until you and I are the only people left in this world.

我本想见见女儿们
I wish I could see the girls.

太冒险了 就看一眼…
It's too dangerous. Just for a moment.

等我们弄清敌人是谁再说吧
Until we know who our enemies are

肯定是他们干的 奈德 是兰尼斯特
I know they did it, Ned. The Lannisters.

我打骨子里知道是他们干的
In my bones, I know it.

小指头有一点说得对
Littlefinger's right.

没有证据 我什么也做不了
I can't do anything without proof.

等你找到了证据…
And if you find the proof?

我将晋见劳勃
Then I bring it to Robert...

并期望他仍保有往日的英明
And hope he's still the man I once knew.

路上当心 嗯？
You watch yourself on the road, huh?

你脾气不好
That temper of yours is a dangerous thing.

我脾气不好？诸神在上 是谁昨天差点错杀可怜的小指头？
My temper? Gods be good, you nearly killed poor Littlefinger yesterday.

啊 过了这么多年
Yes, it's been a long time.

但每一张脸我都记得
But I still remember every face.

你记得你杀的第一个人吗?
You remember your first?

记得 陛下
Of course, Your Grace.

没问过名字
Never learned the name.

一枪穿心
Lance through the heart.

我第一次杀人是在盛夏厅之战 对方是塔利家的小子
Mine was some Tarly boy at the Battle of Summerhall.

我的坐骑中箭 所以我徒步作战 蹚着泥浆蹒跚前进
My horse took an arrow so I was on foot, slogging through the mud.

这不开眼的名门之子 就这么直挺挺地朝我冲来 满以为可以凭借手中长剑 一举终结叛乱
He came running at me, this dumb highborn lad, thinking he could end the rebellion with single swing of his sword.

我用战锤把他撂下马来
I knocked him down with the hammer.

诸神在上 我当年可真壮！
Gods, I was strong then.

那一锤砸扁了他的胸甲
Caved in his breastplate.

大概把他每一根肋骨都打断了
Probably shattered every rib he had.

我踩在他身上 抡起锤子
Stood over him, hammer in the air.

就听他大喊：“等等！”
Right before I brought it down he shouted, 'wait!

唱歌的从来不说将死之人是怎么被吓得屎尿齐流
They never tell you how they all shit themselves.

歌谣里也不会把这些写进去
They don't put that part in the songs.

后来塔利家族和其他人一样 屈膝称臣
Now the Tarlys bend the knee like everyone else.

他应该和那些聪明的孩子一起 远远地躲在战场边缘 今天他才有资本嫌弃自己臭脾气的老婆 和忘本的孩子 每天夜里起来三遍 找把夜壶撒尿 倒酒！
He could have lingered on the edge of the battle with the smart boys and today his wife would be making him miserable, his sons would be ingrates, and he'd be waking three times in the night to piss into a bowl. Wine!

蓝赛尔 诸神在上 好个蠢名字
Lancel. Gods, what a stupid name.

哪个大舌头替你取的？太他妈蠢了！
Who named you? Some halfwit with a stutter?

酒壶空了 陛下 什么叫空了？
It's empty, Your Grace. What do you mean it's empty?

里面没有酒了 这就叫空了？
There's no more wine. Is that what empty means?

顺便把你堂哥给我叫进来
Tell your cousin to get in here.

身边净他妈是些兰尼斯特
Surrounded by Lannisters.

合上眼睛看见的还是他们的金发 和那自鸣得意的傲慢嘴脸
Every time I close my eyes I see their blond hair and their smug, satisfied faces.

干这活儿伤你自尊了吧？
It must wound your pride, huh?

好一副气宇轩昂的风采…
Standing out there like a glorified sentry.

詹姆·兰尼斯特 伟大的泰温之子…
Jaime Lannister, son of the mighty Tywin...

他的国王在里面吃喝拉撒玩女人 他却在外头看着一扇傻不拉叽的房门
Forced to mind the door while your King eats and drinks and shits and fucks.

我们在聊打仗的事
We're telling war stories.

除了老弱病残 你杀的第一个人是谁?
Who was your first kill, not counting old men?

是一名御林兄弟会的土匪
One of the outlaws in the Brotherhood.

那天我在场
I was there that day.

你才十六岁 是个侍从
You were only a squire, 16 years old.

而你用一招回旋剑结果了西蒙·托因
You killed Simon Toyne with a counter riposte.

我没见过那么漂亮的招式
Best move I ever saw.

托因是个好战士 可惜他体力不支
A good fighter, Toyne, but he lacked stamina.

没有 我一剑砍了他脑袋
I cut his head off, so no.

那伊里斯·坦格利安呢？
What about Aerys Targaryen?

被你背后捅刀的疯王有什么遗言？
What did the Mad King say when you stabbed him in the back?

他有没有骂你是叛徒？
Did he call you a traitor?

有没有求你饶命啊？
Did he plead for a reprieve?

他念叨着他念叨了一整天的话…
He said the same thing he'd been saying for hours...

如果没事了 陛下…
If that's all, Your Grace...

多斯拉克人的奴隶是买来的吗？
Do the Dothraki buy their slaves?

多斯拉克人没有金钱观念
The Dothraki don't believe in money.

大多数奴隶是当礼物送给他们的
Most of their slaves were given to them as gifts.

谁送的？ 作为城邦统治者 当马上民族来袭时 有两个选择：
From whom? If you rule a city and you see the horde approaching, you have two choices:

要么进贡 要么拼命
Pay tribute or fight.

答案显而易见
An easy choice for most.

当然 不是进贡就万事大吉
Of course, sometimes it's not enough.

有时卡奥们觉得献上的奴隶太少 令他蒙羞
Sometimes a Khal feels insulted by the number of slaves he's given.

或者男奴太弱 女奴太丑
He might think the men too weak or the women too ugly.

有时卡奥们认为麾下的骑马战士好久没开杀戒了 需要满足欲望
Sometimes a Khal decides his riders haven't had a good fight in months and need the practice.

叫他们全部停下
Tell them all to stop.

你要整个部落停下？
You want the entire horde to stop?

直到我下令为止
Until I command them otherwise.

你说话越来越像个公主了
You're learning to talk like a Queen.

你竟敢命令我？命令我？
You give commands to me? To me?

你竟敢对真龙之子颐指气使 我可是七国之君
You do not command the Dragon. I am Lord of the Seven Kingdoms.

蛮子和蛮子的小贱货没资格命令我 你听见了没有？
I don't take orders from savages or their sluts. Do you hear me?

您要他的命吗？卡莉熙
Do you want him dead khaleesi?

卡丽熙 拉卡洛问您是否要他死
Rakharo ask if you want him dead, Khaleesi.

割他一只耳朵才能让他听得进话
Maybe the ear will listen if it is removed from the head.

拉卡洛认为您应该割他一只耳朵给他一个教训
Rakharo say you should take ear,to teach respect.

别伤害他 请别伤害他
Please please, don't hurt him.

跟他说我不希望我哥哥受伤害
Tell him I don't want my brother harmed.

卡莉熙不愿他受到伤害
Khaleesi does not want him harmed.

莫尔蒙！把这些多斯拉克狗杀了！
Mormont! Kill these Dothraki dogs!

回去跟卡拉萨汇合吧 卡丽熙？
Shall we return to the Khalasar, Khaleesi?

我想在这陪你看第一眼
I wanted to be here when you saw it for the first time.

我破晓时就要走了 你要走？
I'm leaving this morning. You're leaving?

我是首席游骑兵
I'm the First Ranger.

近来有些令人不安的报告 什么样的报告?

我不愿相信的报告
The kind I don't want to believe.

我随你同去 我不会让你失望的
I'm ready. I won't let you down.

琼恩 你还不是游骑兵

可我比他们都强… 你不比任何人强！
But I'm better than everyBetter than no one!

想得到什么样的待遇 就得证明自己有什么样的本事

等我回来再谈
We'll speak when I return.

熊的蛋蛋 加上… 噢 别逗了
A bear's balls. Oh, you're joking?

加上它的脑子 肠子和心肺 用它身上的油煎熟了
And his brains and his guts, his lungs and his heart all fried in his own fat.

当你身处绝境长城之外 一个星期没饭吃的时候 你什么也不会给狼剩下
When you're a hundred miles North of The Wall and you ate your last meal a week ago, you leave nothing for the wolves.

熊的蛋蛋是个什么味道啊？
And how do a bear's balls taste?

你呢 大人？你吃过的最古怪的东西是啥？
And what about you, my Lord? What's the strangest thing you've eaten?

多恩娘们算吗？
Do Dornish girls count?

所以说 你周游七国 招揽摸包贼和盗马贼 介绍来这里当兵喽？
So you roam the Seven Kingdoms, collaring pickpockets and horse thieves and bringing them here as eager recruits?

他们也不全是罪犯啦
But it's not all of 'em's done bad things.

有时会遇上吃不饱饭的穷孩子
Some of 'em's just poor lads looking for steady feed.

有时会遇上渴望出人头地的贵族青年
Some of 'em's highborn lads looking for glory.

结果他们发现在这儿混口饭吃还比较靠谱 对吧？
They have a better chance finding feed than glory.

守夜人军团在你眼中就是个笑话 是不？
The Night's Watch is a joke to you, is it?

兰尼斯特 你是不是觉得我们
Is that what we are, Lannister?

是一支可笑的黑衣杂技团？
An army of jesters in black?

错 你们的人手不足以成团 而且除了这个尤伦 也没有谁特别搞笑
You don't have enough men to be an army and aside from Yoren here, none of you are particularly funny.

我希望你回到君临后 能把我们真实的故事讲给别人听
I hope we've provided you with some good stories to tell when you're back in King's Landing.

在你饮酒作乐 寻花问柳的时候 偶尔也能摸摸良心 在这里受训的孩子 将来有很多会葬身于长城之外
But something to think about while you're drinking your wine down there, enjoying your brothels half the boys you've seen training will die North of The Wall.

他们有的逃不过野人的斧头 有的是病死 还有的被严寒夺去性命
Might be a Wilding's axe that gets them, might be sickness, might just be the cold.

正因为他们的牺牲奉献 你们这帮脑满肠肥的陛下才能享受夏日午后的憩静
And they do it so plump little lords like you can enjoy their summer afternoons in peace and comfort.

你觉得我算脑满肠肥吗？
Do you think I'm plump?

听着 班杨…我能叫你班杨吗？

随便你
Call me what you like.

但我郑重声明我非常尊敬守夜人军团
I have great admiration for The Night's Watch.

尊敬身为首席游骑兵的你
I've great admiration for you as First Ranger.

知道吗 我哥哥曾告诉我 在“但是”之前所做的声明 全是狗屁
You know, my brother once told me that nothing someone says before the word 'but' really counts.

我不相信长城之外 有巨人 尸鬼或是什么异鬼
I don't believe that Giants and Ghouls and White Walkers are lurking beyond The Wall.

我认为我们和 野人的区别只在于 当长城拔地而起时 我们的祖先 碰巧住在正确的一边
I believe that the only difference between us and the Wildlings is that when The Wall went up, our ancestors happened to live on the right side of it.

野人和我们没什么差别
The Wildlings are no different from us.

可能更彪悍一些
A little rougher maybe.

但终究是血肉之躯
But they're made of meat and bone.

我知道怎么追踪 怎么杀死他们
I know how to track them and I know how to kill them.

搅得我辗转难眠的并非野人
It's not the Wildlings giving me sleepless nights.

你没有去过长城之北 就不要不懂装懂
You've never been North of The Wall, so don't tell me what's out there.

请保重 保暖 在都城好好享受 兄弟
Keep well, keep warm. Enjoy the capital, brother.

我觉得他喜欢上我了
I think he's starting to like me.

下隧道 穿到另一头去
Into the tunnel and out the other side.

他会在长城北边呆上一两个月
He'll be North of The Wall for a month or two.

他这么说 你要南下君临？
So you're heading down to King's Landing too.

对 后天启程
Aye, day after tomorrow.

这儿一半的人来自君临的地牢

不妨同路吧 你是个好伴儿

大人 我…我可是一贯风餐露宿的啊
I... I travel a bit on the grubby side, my Lord.

我们会住最好的城堡和旅店

没有人敢怠慢兰尼斯特家的人

喔 你这是做什么？
Oh, what are you doing?

卡丽熙 您上次来月事是什么时候?
When was last time you bleed, Khaleesi?

您有身孕了 卡丽熙
You change, Khaleesi.

这是圣马的祝福啊
It's a blessing from the great stallion.

对马上民族来说 弯刀是好东西 易于掌控
For a man on horseback, the curved blade is a good thing, easier to handle.

对付你的多斯拉克同胞很顺手
It's a good weapon for a Dothrakan.

但要对付穿全身板甲的人… 铁衣服 亚拉克弯刀穿不透甲胄
But a man in full plate steel dress.  the arakh won't get through the steel.

这时阔剑就派上用场了
That's where the broadsword has the advantage.

它是为了刺穿盔甲而设计的
Designed for piercing plate.

我们多斯拉克人不穿铁衣服
Dothraki don't wear steel dresses.

缓慢 没错 但也能保人性命

我父亲教会我如何战斗
My father taught me how to fight.

他说速度比力量重要

听说你父亲是著名的勇士

他是拔尔勃卡奥的血盟卫

他是个荣誉感极强的人 我却背叛了他…
A man of great honor and I betrayed him.

卡丽熙今晚想换换口味
The khaleesi wants to eat something different tonight. 

哪来的兔子
There are no rabbits.

那就搞几只鸭子 她爱吃鸭子

你在这里见过鸭子吗蠢女人? 没兔子、没鸭子

你到底长眼睛没？啊？

那就杀只狗吧 狗我见过不少

The Khaleesi have baby inside her.

是真的 她已经两个月没来月事了

肚子也鼓起来了

圣马的祝福啊
A blessing from the great stallion.

她实在不想再吃马肉了
She does not want to eat horse.

别担心 我会赶上来的
Don't worry. I'll catch you.

这么大的部落容易找

你别站死了

动起来才不容易被击中

你正相反 你动作太频繁
Except for you. You move too much.

有时候自己都能撞我剑上
I could just hold my sword out and let you do the work for me.

你经历过几个冬天 提利昂大人？
How many winters have you seen, Lord Tyrion?

据说我降生时的冬天持续了整整三年 伊蒙师傅
They say the winter of my birth was three years long, Maester Aemon.

这个夏天已经过了九年
This summer has lasted nine.

而学城的报告证明白昼已经渐渐缩短
But reports from the Citadel tell us the days grow shorter.

史塔克的族语终究是要应验的：
The Starks are always right eventually:

这次的冬季将十分漫长 随之降临的是黑暗的年代
This one will be long and dark things will come with it.

我们最近抓到了很多野人 他们正向南逃亡 数量逐月增加
We've been capturing Wildlings, more every month. They're fleeing south.

他们声称见到了走动的异鬼
The ones who flee say they've seen the White Walkers.

是啊 兰尼斯港的渔夫还经常看到美人鱼呢
Yes, and the fishermen of Lannisport say they see mermaids.

一位守夜人游骑兵坚称自己的同伴为异鬼所害
One of our own Rangers swore he saw them kill his companions.

奈德·史塔克砍他脑袋时
He swore it right up to the moment

他仍不改口
Ned Stark chopped his head off.

守夜人部队是唯一 能帮助王国阻挡 北方黑暗势力的屏障
The Night's Watch is the only thing standing between the realm and what lies beyond.

而它现在却是 由毛头小子和身心俱疲的老头子组成
And it has has become an army of undisciplined boys and tired old men.

我们的人数不到一千
There are less than a thousand of us now.

无力守卫长城沿线的堡垒
We can't man the other castles on The Wall.

无法保证巡逻任务的质量
We can't properly patrol the wilderness.

我们所拥有的资源 仅能勉强维持温饱 并武装自己 令姐 贵为当今王后
We've barely enough resources to keep our lads armed and fed. Your sister sits by the side the King.

请代我们向她请愿
Tell her we need help.

当凛冬降临时 若没有万全准备 天知道下场会多凄惨
When winter does come, gods help us all if we're not ready.

卓戈 卡奥 
多斯拉克部族首领

真有些舍不得你走 兰尼斯特
I'm sorry to see you leave, Lannister.

我跟这鬼天气似乎结下了梁子
It's either me or this cold.

它不肯让路 我只有乖乖滚蛋喽
And it doesn't appear to be going anywhere.

你南下途中会在临冬城稍事停留吗？
Will you stop at Winterfell on your way south?

诸神在上 君临和长城之间 可没几张羽毛床
Gods know there aren't many feather beds between here and King's Landing.

如果你见到我弟弟布兰 告诉他我很想他
If you see my brother Bran, tell him I miss him.

告诉他我一有机会就去看他
Tell him I'd visit if I could.

他的双腿没法复原了
He'll never walk again.

如果不幸做了瘸子 当个贵族家的瘸子总归要好些
If you're going to be a cripple, it's better to be a rich cripple.

从明天起你正午就必须到
Tomorrow you will be here at midday.

从明天起你得接住
Tomorrow you will catch it.

不对不对 小子
That is not the way, boy.

这不是双手挥的巨剑
This is not a greatsword that is needing two hands to swing it.

它太重了 它该多重就有多重 这才能锻炼你的肌肉
It's too heavy. It is heavy as it needs to be to make you strong.

你只能单手持剑
One hand is all that is needed.

但你的站姿错了
Now you are standing all wrong.

身体侧一点
Turn your body sideface.

你很瘦 这挺好
You are skinny. That is good.

目标缩小了
The target is smaller.

The grip must be delicate.

The steel must be part of your arm.

他懂得这些东西 听他的话 小子

这是杀手之舞
This is the Bravo's Dance...

行动敏捷 出其不意
It is swift and sudden.

当你刺中人体 水流外泄 人就会死
If you pierce them, the water leaks out and they die.

是嘛? 要是我成天守着这老太婆不见人 我早疯了

我不想去 我也不想

这孩子完全不记得那天的事情

他去世前一晚 还来我住的地方找我呢
I saw him in my chambers just the night before he passed.

艾林大人经常找我商量国事
Lord Jon often came to me for counsel.

我可是做了多年大学士
I have been Grand Maester for many years.

国王和首相都会来征求我的…
Kings and Hands have come to me for advice since

琼恩去世前那天晚上找你做什么? 
What did Jon want the night before he died?

噢 他来找我要一本书
Oh, he came inquiring after a book.

恐怕 您会觉得很无趣 大人
Oh, I fear it would be of little interest to you, My Lord.

没关系 我只想看看
No, I'd like to read it.

《七国主要贵族之世家谱系与历史》 内附关于许多爵爷 夫人 和他们子女的描述
'The Lineages and Histories of the Great H of the Seven Kingdoms, with descriptions of many high lords and noble ladies and their children.'

如我所言 大人 这是本无趣的书
As I said, My Lord, a ponderous read.

琼恩·艾林可曾告诉你他想在书中找什么? 
Did Jon Arryn tell you what he wanted with it?

他没说 大人 我也没冒昧多问
He did not, My Lord. And I did not presume to ask.

琼恩的死… 令人惋惜
Jon's death... Such a tragedy.

他病危时跟您说过什么吗? 
...Did he say anything to you during his final hours?

没什么要紧的话 大人
Nothing of import, My Lord.

有一句 他反复重复: 
Ohthere was one phrase he kept repeating:

我记得是'种性强韧'
'The seed is strong,' I think it was.

所谓人之将死 其言易乱 史塔克大人
Oh, the dying mind is a demented mind, Lord Stark.

人们往往过于看重遗言 其实遗言有时不比 初生儿的哭闹更有价值
For all the weight they're given, last words are usually as significant as first words.

你确信他是自然死亡? 
And you're quite certain he died of a natural illness?

不然会是什么呢? 
What else could it be?

这想法叫人不寒而栗
A disturbing thought.

不 不 不 我认为不可能

首相大人广受爱戴
The Hand was loved by all.

怎会有人…
What sort of man would dare

没关系 大人 为您服务是我的荣… 谢谢您
No trouble at all, My Lord. It's a great honor thank you.

请留步
I'll find my own way out.

西利欧说水舞者 可以用一根脚趾站好几个小时
Syrio says a water dancer can stand on one toe for hours.

跌下去可不好玩
It's a hard fall down these steps.

西利欧说每次受伤都是一个教训 而每个教训都会让我变强
Syrio says every hurt is a lesson and every lesson makes you better.

明天起我开始抓猫 猫? 
Tomorrow I'm going to be chasing cats. Cats?

他说每个剑客都应该研究猫
He says every swordsman should study cats.

它们静如影 轻如羽
They're quiet as shadows and as light as feathers.

练出好身手才可能捉住它们
You have to be quick to catch them.

He's right about that.

他得先恢复体力才成
Well, he needs to get his strength back first.

他一直想当御林铁卫
He wants to be a knight of the Kingsguard.

但有朝一日 他或能获得封地 或成为国王的重臣

培提尔大人 或许我不应该不信任你

这些南方骑士活像趾高气昂的公鸡

我忽然不想做了
But I couldn't do it.

我满脑子想的是 如果我让她怀上孩子 这孩子将来 岂不是又得叫雪诺? 
Because all I could think was what if I got her pregnant and she had a child, another bastard named Snow?

这对孩子不公平

你确实不知道那话儿该往哪儿放嘛

风有点冷 哼 关在屋子里 生着火 这还是夏天呢

过去多久了? 差不多十年了罢? 
How long has it been now? What, 10 years?

临冬城里是不是也天寒地冻啊?

不管仆人帮你生多少火 到头来仍感觉不到温暖? 
Were there days when you just couldn't get warm, never mind how many fires your servants built?

我自己生火 令人钦佩啊
I build my own fires. That's admirable.

告诉你小鬼 上个冬天 我在长城外边熬了整整六个月
I spent six months out there, beyond The Wall during the last winter.

那次任务原定只用两周
It was supposed to be a twoweek mission.

有人说曼斯·雷德计划突袭东海望
We heard a rumor Mance Rayder was planning to attack Eastwatch.

我们便外出去抓几个'舌头' 以侦察敌情
So we went out to look for some of his men capture them, gather some knowledge.

曼斯·雷德手下的野人都是硬汉
The Wildlings who fight for Mance Rayder are hard men.

你们永远别想跟他们相比
Harder than you'll ever be.

他们对自己的地盘了如指掌
They know their country better than we do.

他们知道暴风雪即将来临
They knew there was a storm coming in.

于是便躲进洞里 静待风雪过去
So they hid in their caves and waited for it to pass.

我们却在野外与暴风雪撞个正着
And we got caught in the open.

那咆哮的狂风 把百尺大树连根拔起 谁敢脱手套 掏那话儿出来尿尿 手指头就废了
Wind so strong it yanked 100foot trees straight from the ground, roots and all. If you took your gloves off to find your cock to have a piss, you lost a finger to the frost.

先死的是马
The horses died first.

我们既没东西喂它们吃 更没法为他们保暖
We didn't have enough to feed them, to keep them warm.

吃马肉没什么大不了的
Eating the horses was easy.

但等到后来兄弟们也开始倒下…
But later when we started to fall...

我们怎没想到带几个你这样的小鬼呢? 
We should have had a couple of boys like you along, shouldn't we?

白白胖胖的
Soft, fat boys like you.

足够应付十天半月咧 骨头还可以熬汤
We'd have lasted a fortnight on you and still had bones leftover for soup.

很快又会有新兵过来 到时候我会把你们交给总司令 让他为你们分配职业 别人会称你们作守夜人 但如果你们信以为真 就真是笨蛋
Soon we'll have new recruits and you lot will be passed along to the Lord Commander for assignment and they will call you men of The Night's Watch, but you'd be fools to believe it.

等冬天一来 你们就会像苍蝇一样
And come the winter you will die...

你大哥雷加是最后的真龙传人
Your brother Rhaegar was the Last Dragon.

韦赛里斯连条蛇的影子都不如
Viserys is less than the shadow of a snake.

可他毕竟是真正的国王
He is still the true king.

你希望你哥哥坐上铁王座? 
Do you want to see your brother sitting on the Iron Throne?

可老百姓们等着他啊
But the common people are waiting for him.

伊利里欧说他们忙着缝制真龙旗帜 祈祷韦赛里斯早日解放他们
Illyrio said they are sewing dragon banners and praying for his return.

老百姓祈祷的是风调雨顺 子女健康 以及永不结束的夏日
The common people pray for rain, health and a summer that never ends.

他们不关心王公贵族的权力游戏
They don't care what games the high lords play.

那你会为何事祈祷呢 乔拉爵士? 
What do you pray for, Ser Jorah?

我哥哥永远无法夺回七国
My brother will never take back the Seven Kingdoms.

就算我夫君给他军队 他也没有统御的能力
He couldn't lead an army even if my husband gave him one.

他永远无法带我们回家
He'll never take us home.

珊莎好孩子 这位是培提尔·贝里席伯爵 他… 我是你们家的故友
Sansa dear, this is Lord Baelish. He's known an old friend of the family.

跟你母亲相识多年
I've known your mother a long long time.

他们为什么管你叫小指头啊?  艾莉亚!
Why do they call you Littlefinger? Arya!

没礼貌! 啊 没关系没关系
Don't be rude! No, it's quite all right.

这是因为我小时候特别瘦小 家族封地又位于狭小的五指半岛的缘故 所以你瞧 这是个恰如其分的绰号
When I was a child I was very small and I come from a little spit of land called The Fingers, so you see, it's an exceedingly clever nickname.

老子在这儿坐了一整天了!
I've been sitting here for days!

还他妈不开始!  老子快憋不住尿了!
Start the damn joust before I piss myself!

外号'魔山'
They call him the Mountain.

他是猎狗的哥哥
The hound's older brother.

那他的对手是谁?  峡谷的修夫爵士
And his opponent? Ser Hugh of the Vale.

从前是琼恩·艾林的侍从
He was Jon Arryn's squire.

年轻人爬得很快哪
Lo how far he's come.

行了行了 别他妈瞎折腾!
Yes yes, enough of the bloody pomp.

和你期望的不太一样? 
Not what you were expecting?

没有人告诉过你猎狗和魔山两兄弟间
Has anyone ever told you the story of the Mountain and the Hound?

温馨感人的手足情谊吗? 
Lovely little tale of brotherly love.

猎狗小时候 大概六岁的时候吧
The Hound was just a pup, six years old maybe.

格雷果比他大几岁 壮得像头牛 已经'远近闻名'
Gregor a few years older already a big lad, already getting a bit of a reputation.

是啊 有的孩子 生性就挺残暴
Some lucky boys just born with a talent for violence.

某天晚上 格雷果发现弟弟 在火盆边玩玩具
One evening Gregor found his little brother playing with a toy by the fire

那是他的玩具 一个木雕骑士
Gregor's toy, a wooden knight.

他二话不说 拎起弟弟的后颈 将弟弟的半边脸就往炭堆里按
Gregor never said a word, he just grabbed his brother by the scruff of his neck and shoved his face into the burning coals.

他紧紧按住 任由弟弟惨叫不停 任由弟弟的脸庞被烧化
Held him there while the boy screamed, while his face melted.

没有几个人知道这个故事
There aren't very many people who know that story.

我不会说出去的 我保证
I won't tell anyone. I promise.

若是传到猎狗耳中
If the Hound so much as heard you mention it,

恐怕君临城内所有的骑士加在一起 也保护不了你
I'm afraid all the knights in King's Landing would not be able to save you.

陛下 王后陛下驾到
My Lord, her Grace the Queen.

陛下 你缺席了你的比武会
Your Grace. You're missing your tournament.

挂着我的名字而已 跟我毫无瓜葛
Putting my name on it doesn't make it mine.

我们…能否抛开在国王大道上发生的不幸 一场由狼引发的不幸
I thought we might put what happened on the Kingsroad behind us the ugliness with the wolves.

逼你宰了那野兽是有点过分
And forcing you to kill the beast was extreme.

可为了孩子 我们时不时得使出点过分的手段
Though sometimes we go to extremes where our children are concerned.

看来史塔克家就她喜欢这儿
She's the only Stark who does.

她像她母亲 不大像北方人
Favors her mother, not much of the North in her.

你究竟为何来这里?  我正想问你同样的问题
What are you doing here? I might ask the same of you.

你想达成什么目标? 
What is it you hope to accomplish?

国王召我来辅佐他 治理国家 在他另择贤能之前 这就是我的使命
The King called on me to serve him and the realm, and that's what I'll do until he tells me otherwise.

你改变不了他 你也帮不了他
You can't change him. You can't help him.

他会继续随心所欲 恣意妄为
He'll do what he wants, which is all he's ever done.

而你只能跟在他屁股后头 尽力收拾残局
You'll try your best to pick up the pieces.

职责所在 也只能如此
If that's my job, then so be it.

你只是个兵吗? 
You're just a soldier, aren't you?

只会领命办事? 
You take your orders and you carry on.

你老爸把你哥培养成领袖
I suppose it makes sense.

却把你训练成不动脑筋的走卒
Your older brother was trained to lead and you were trained to follow.

陛下 我所受的教育是时刻准备消灭敌人
I was also trained to kill my enemies, your Grace.

好心人 七神保佑你们!
Seven blessings to you, goodfolk!

小子! 面包 肉和啤酒 搞快点

噢 好主意 老爹 我正饿着哪
Ah, good idea, grandfather. I'm starving.

要不要先来首小曲儿…?

我宁可投井
I'd rather throw myself down a well.

哎哟 老爹 再往北走可没机会欣赏音乐了
Now now, grandfather, this may be your last chance if you're heading North.

因为北方人只懂狼嚎罢了!
The only music the Northerners know is the howling of wolves!

大人 真对不住 可咱们确实客满了
I'm sorry, My Lord. We're full up. Every room.

我的手下睡马厩就好
My men can sleep in the stable.

至于我嘛 我不需要多大的房间
As for myself, I don't require a large room.

大人 我们真是没办法
Truly, My Lord, we have nothing.

你们有没有办法…
Is there nothing I can do...

您可以将就我的房间
You can have my room.

到底还是有聪明人
Now there's a clever man.

吃的方面 应该没问题吧? 尤伦 跟我一起吃

好啊 大人 兰尼斯特大人!
Aye, My Lord. My Lord of Lannister!

我可否在您用餐时为您娱乐助兴?

让我唱一首歌颂令尊大人君临大捷的歌罢!
I can sing of your father's victory at King's Landing!

那我不反胃死才怪

好个意外的惊喜

爵士先生 您外衣上绣的可是赫伦堡的黑蝙蝠?

红色骏马纹章向来受到奔流城的礼遇

家父将裘诺斯·布雷肯伯爵视为 追随他最久也最忠心耿耿的封臣
My father counts Jonas Bracken amongst his oldest and most loyal bannermen.

我们家大人感激令尊的信任
Our lord is honored by his trust.

我羡慕令尊有这么多好朋友 史塔克夫人 但我不明白您这么做有何目的

佛雷家的双塔标志 我也很熟悉

爵士先生 您们家主人近来可好? 
How fares your lord, Ser?

夫人 瓦德大人他很好

他打算在九十岁命名日那天迎娶新夫人 希望有幸可以请到令尊大人
He has asked your father for the honor of his presence on his 90th Nameday.

到场增光
He plans to take another wife.

这个人 以客人的身份来到我家 却意图谋害 我的十岁儿子

以劳勃国王和诸位侍奉的贵族大人之名

辛苦了 姐妹们

去拿胸甲撑子快去啊!

怎么? 我是国王就不能打? 见鬼 我不过想打打人罢了!

天下谁人不知: 兰尼斯特有债必还
Everyone knows a Lannister always pays his debts.

And why would I do that? Why not?

去你妹妹那里 为着莫须有的罪名审判我

你自己说 史塔克夫人 你有几年没见着你妹妹了? 
Tell me, Lady Stark, when was the last time you saw your sister?

她从前只是有点神经兮兮 现在嘛...  你不如就地把我宰了

Am I starting to make sense?

我要是死了 你不就白跑一趟?

我没事 夫人

打过仗找个女人最来劲

她说好我就上
I'm willing if she is.

族语: 强取胜于苦耕
Words: We do not sow.

他们因为箭术 航海术 和无以伦比的床上技术而名扬天下
Famed for their skills at archery, navigation and lovemaking.

外加愚蠢的叛乱次数
And failed rebellions.

纹章: 雄鹿 宝冠雄鹿 现在劳勃是国王
Sigil: A stag a crowned stag now that Robert's King.

很好 族语: 怒火燎原
Good. Words: Ours is the fury.

统治家族: 拜拉席恩家族
Lords: The Baratheons.

族语: 兰尼斯特有债必还
Words: A Lannister always pays his debts.

这是民间的俗话 却非他们家的正式族语
A common saying, but not their official motto.

统治家族: 兰尼斯特家族
Lords: The Lannisters.

你还没答出他们的族语 我不知道
We're still on their words. I don't know them.

好好想想 你知道的
You do know them. Think.

这是马泰尔家族的族语 '正义之怒'
That's House Martell. 'Righteous in wrath.'

这是霍伍德家族的族语 '家族 责任 荣誉'
House Hornwood. 'Family, duty, honor.'

这是徒利家族的族语... 你母亲的家族
Those are Tully wordsyour mother's.

你要玩文字游戏吗?  家族 责任 荣誉...
Are we playing a game? Family, duty, honor...

我说的顺序对吗?  你明知这是对的
Is that the right order? You know it is.

为了保护这个家 你母亲才不得不离开临冬城
Your mother had to leave Winterfell to protect the family.

她都不要这个家了 怎么说得上是在保护它? 
How can she protect the family if she's not with her family?

你母亲守在你的病床前 守了三个多星期...  然后她就走了!
Your mother sat by your bed for three weeks while you slept and then she left!

你妈生你的时候 是我接的生
When you were born, I was the one who pulled you from your mother.

我亲手把你放进她怀里
I placed you in her arms.

我知道从那一刻起 直到她去世 她都会一直爱着你
From that moment until the moment she dies, she will love you.

原因我暂时不能说 但她很快就会回家的 你知道她在哪儿吗? 
I still can't tell you, but she will be home soon. Do you know where she is now?

那你怎能保证她很快就会回家...
Then how can you promise me she'll be home soon?

孩子啊 有时候刨根究底并不是好事
Sometimes I worry you're too smart for your own good.

我再也不能射箭了
I'll never shoot another arrow.

何以见得? 
And where is that written?

射箭得要脚上发力才行
You need legs to work a bow.

If the saddle Lord Tyrion designed actually works, you could learn to shoot a bow from horseback.

你看 他现在是谷地之主

天哪! 他眼睛就在眼眶外头晃荡!

I learned that I'll never win, not that way. That's their game, their rules.

我不会再找他们决斗了
I'm not going to fight them.

我要在自己的地盘 用自己的方式
I'm going to fuck them. That's what I know.

只有看清了自己 才能得到自己想要的东西
And only by admitting what we are can we get what we want.

您想要什么? 
And what do you want?

噢 一切 亲爱的
Oh, everything, my dear.

现在去洗干净 你两个今晚都要接客
Now wash yourselves. Both of you are working tonight.

知道么 你是个幸运的女孩
You're a very lucky girl. Do you know that?

在我故乡 我们对罪犯从不心慈手软
Where I come from, we don't show mercy to criminals.

在我故乡 你这路货色若是敢抢劫小少爷
Where I come from, if someone like you attacked a little lord?

会在退潮时被仰面栓在沙滩上 用木桩和铁链固定住四肢
At low tide we'd lay you on your back on the beach, your hands and feet chained to four stakes.

潮水会一点点地涨上来
The sea would come in closer and closer.

每分每秒 死神一寸一寸地逼近...
You'd see death creeping toward you a few inches at a time.

你的故乡是哪儿啊? 
Where is it you come from?

怎么? 你没听说过铁群岛? 
You've never heard of the Iron Islands?

相信我 你也没听说过我的故乡
Trust me, you've never heard where I'm from neither.

这里不是没开化的蛮夷之地
You're not living in the wilderness anymore.

在文明人的国度 你得学会用适当的称号来称呼陛下们
In civilized lands, you refer to your betters by their proper titles.

什么称号?  大人
And what's that? Lord.

这还不明显吗? 
What do you mean why?

我父亲是巴隆·葛雷乔伊 铁群岛的大王
My father is Balon Greyjoy, Lord of the Iron Islands.

那跟你有啥关系? 
What's that got to do with you?

你父亲是大王 所以你当自己也是大王? 
If your father's lord, how can you be lord too?

我会继承父亲的权位...  所以你现在还不是大王嘛
I will be lord after my father so you're not lord now?

你故意跟我作对 是不是? 
You having a go at me? Is that it?

我只是闹不明白你们南方人咋想的罢了
I just don't understand how you Southerners do things.

我不是南方人 你住在长城以南
I'm not a Southerner. You're from South of the wall.

对我来说你就是南方人
That makes you a Southerner to me.

你这放肆的小婊子
You're an impudent little wench, aren't you?

不明白啊 大人
Couldn't say, My Lord.

闹不明白'放肆'这个词是啥意思
Don't know what 'impunent' means.

放肆 就是粗鲁 没礼貌
Impudent. It means rude, disrespectful.

你想不想除掉镣铐? 
Do you want to lose that chain?

这位女士是我们的客人
The lady is our guest.

我以为她是我们的俘虏
I thought she was our prisoner.

怎么 这两者矛盾吗? 
Are the two mutually exclusive in your experience?

再发生这种事 我就不一定在场了
Chances are I won't be nearby the next time that happens.

我见过的混蛋多的是
I'm used to worse than him.

他这样的毛头小子要落在那帮混蛋手里 准教被一口吞下 还拿他的骨头剔牙
I'm used to men who could chew that boy up and pick their teeth with his bones.

你来此是要做什么?

我压根儿不想来这里
Didn't mean to come here.

我们打算一路逃往南方
Meant to get much further South than this.

As far South as South goes, before the long night comes.

他们没有消失 老头

其实我没跟她们说过话 说不来话

何况哪有酒贩子 喝自己的酒呢?

你们来时为法律所不容 盗猎 强奸 杀人 偷窃

I was singing for a high lord at Acorn Hall when he put his hand on my leg and he wanted to see my cock.

我把他推开 他竟然宣布 要以偷窃罪砍我的手
I pushed him away and he said he'd have my hands cut off for stealing their silver.

别告诉我什么叫公平
So don't tell me about fair.

我还以为你是为挨饿的老妹 偷了一轮奶酪才被抓的
I thought you were caught stealing a wheel of cheese for your starving sister?

谁会随便跟一群陌生人吐露 一个高高在上的陛下看上了他的命根子? 
You think I was gonna tell a bunch of strangers that a high lord tried to grab my cock?

能唱首歌吗 派普? 我想听歌
Could you sing me a song, Pyp? I'd like to hear a song.

你要伺候的老头可是堂堂守夜人军团总司令

You'll be with him day and night.

大小事务你都会知情 甚至能施加影响

I always wanted to be a Ranger.

I always wanted to be a Wizard.

他任命您为全境守护者?

先发制人! 趁今晚大家还在熟睡时

是不是守护者无关紧要 挟有国王才能号令全国

等劳勃一死 只怕对你我两人都为时已晚

您对'守护王国'的理解可真奇特

今晚你就坐船去龙石船

Your brother will get no help from them where he's going.

旧神在南方没有力量
The Old Gods have no power in the South.

那儿的鱼梁木早在很多年前就被砍伐一空
The weirwoods there were all cut down a long time ago.

没有眼睛 他们该如何去看呢? 
How can they watch when they have no eyes?

啊 他可真是个大块头
Well, there's a big man.

他要是没有巨人血统 我肯定就是女王了
He has giants' blood in him or I'm the Queen.

Giants and worse than giants.

I tried telling your brother, he's marching the wrong way.

他的军队应该去北方的 小子
All these swords, they should be going north, boy.

冷风已然吹起
The cold winds are rising.

他们被异鬼触碰过
They were touched by White Walkers.

所以才能返回长城
That's why they came back.

所以变成了蓝眼睛
That's why their eyes turned blue.

唯有火焰能够阻挡他们
Only fire will stop them.

Robb's brought the North with him.

而泰温公爵正带着另一支兰尼斯特军队从南方杀来

夫人 没想到会在这里见到您

她知道驯服的狼比死狼有用得多
She knows a tame wolf is more use to her than a dead one.

我要您为国家效力!
I want you to serve the realm!

If you give her the peace she needs and promise to carry her secret to your grave,

这是瓦德・佛雷的障眼法

他好歹是外公的封臣 为什么不肯支持我们?

继续说啊 别让我坏了你们的兴致

Bronn managed to keep Shagga from chopping off the dead man's cock, which was fortunate, but even still

What did your mother call you?

你那是什么口音?  外国口音

我想要你做什么? 
What do I want from you?

我要你和我一起住

I want you to pour my wine, laugh at my jokes, rub my legs when they're sore after a day's ride.

而且只要我们在一起 你就不许跟其他男人上床
I want you to take no other man to bed for as long as we're together.

And I want you to fuck me like it's my last night in this world which it may well be.

第三 你活上一千年也花不完的金子
And three: More gold than you can spend if you lived a thousand years.

你接受我的条件吗? 
Do you accept my proposal?

就让我们从世界末日那部分开始吧
Let's start with your last night in this world.

多斯... 多斯拉...  克... 牦牛...  踩着...  黑色的鹳鸟...
Doth...Dothrae...  ki...yak...  might trample...  a black stork...

没人能比他强壮
No one understands how strong he is.

他熬不过今晚 卡丽熙 他不能死
He will die tonight, Khaleesi. He can't.

他不可以死 我不会让他死...
He can't. I won't let him.

这个命令超出了公主您的能力所及
Even a Queen doesn't have that power.

我们得赶紧走 听说亚夏有个繁盛的大港...
We must go quickly. I've heard there's a good port in Asshai

我不要离开他 您丈夫救不活了 卡丽熙
I won't leave him. He's already gone, Khaleesi.

即便他死了 我为什么要逃走? 
Even if he dies, why would I run?

我是卡丽熙 我的... 我的儿子将会继任卡奥
I am Khaleesi and mymy son will be Khal after Drogo.

这不是崇尚血统的维斯特洛
This isn't Westeros where men honor blood.

在这里力量决定一切 卓戈死后 他们会自相残杀
Here they only honor strength. There will be fighting after Drogo dies.

胜者即为新的卡奥
Whoever wins that fight will be the new Khal.

而他一定不会养虎为患
He won't want any rivals.

您的孩子刚出生就会被夺走 拿去喂狗
Your boy will be plucked from your breast and given to the dogs.

伤口化脓了
The wound has festered.

我不许你伤害她
I don't want her hurt.

住手? 住手? 你不许我伤害她? 
No? No? You don't want her hurt?

是你让巫魔女害了我们的卡奥

讲话小心一点 她仍然是你的卡丽熙

除非吾血之血还能活下去
Only while blood of my blood lives.

在他死后 她就什么也不是了
When he dies, she is nothing.

我从来不是无名之辈 我是真龙传人
I have never been nothing. I am the blood of the dragon.

龙早就死绝了 卡丽熙
The dragons are all dead, Khaleesi.

我想今晚你得穿上盔甲了 爵士
I think you should wear your armor tonight, Ser.

您说得没错
I think you're right.

您又救了我一命
You've saved me once more.

换你救他一命了
And now you must save him.

已经没有任何医者可以救他
He's beyond the healer's skills.

我能做的 只是让他毫无痛苦的上路
All I can do is ease his path.

只要你救他 我就放你自由 我对天发誓
Save him and I will free you. I swear it.

你一定还知道其他的办法...
You must know a way...

但对某些人而言 死亡反而比较干脆
Some would say death is cleaner.

你要黄金? 多少都可以
You'll have goldwhatever you want.

这不是黄金的问题 这是血魔法

惟有死亡方能换取生命

不 不是您的死 卡丽熙
No. Not your death, Khaleesi.

可这是血魔法啊 这是禁忌

我是卡丽熙 我说不是就不是
I am your Khaleesi. I tell you what is forbidden.

夫人 您也得出去
You must go also, lady.

The dead will dance here tonight.

请为我把他带回来

痛吗 我的狮子?

去你的 女人 你没有痛觉么?

只是习惯了 你喝
Just used to it. Drink.

我们来玩个新游戏
Let's play a new game.

我知道一个布拉佛斯的匕首游戏...
There's a Braavosi knife game I could teach you

这游戏没有掉手指头的危险吧?

玩火 玩刀的都一边儿去

你什么拿手?

似乎是个无聊的游戏 才怪
This sounds like a boring game. It's not.

别撒谎 撒谎是瞒不过我的

我不想玩这个
I don't want to play this game.

你老爹打过你

我老娘打得更狠

没满十二岁你就开了杀戒 你的对手 你宰了他

她抡斧子砍我
She swung an axe at me.

去那边做什么?

到你了 神秘的东洋美女

I don't want to play.

你娘是个妓女
Your mother was a whore.

一个出身低微的女孩能做什么呢...

我们这位大人结过婚

结过婚?  你从哪听来的?

不 就今晚

也许我会哭哦 我猜这位小姐 和我的伤心事可比大人你多啊
Or maybe I will cry. I'm guessing the lady and I can tell more unpleasant stories than your Lordship.

那年我十六岁 我老哥詹姆和我骑马回来 只听一声尖叫 她朝路上跑来 衣服扯破了 后面跟了两个男人
I was 16. My brother Jaime and I were riding when we heard a scream. She ran out onto the road, clothes half torn off with two men on her heels.

詹姆几下就把他们赶跑了 我则用自己的斗蓬裹住她
Jaime scared away the men easily enough, while I wrapped her in my cloak.

那女孩惊慌失措 不敢一个人走路 詹姆又一心只想逮着强奸犯
She was too scared to send off on her own, so while Jaime hunted down the rapers

于是只能由我带她到附近的旅馆吃东西
I took her to the nearest inn and fed her.

是个车轮匠的遗孤
She was a wheelwright's orphan.

她很饿 我俩足足吃了三只烤鸡 又喝干一整壶酒
And she was hungry together we finished off three chickens and a flagon of wine.

现在看来不可思议 但当时的我不会喝酒
Impossible as it seems, there was a time when I was unaccustomed to wine.

我乱了性 忘了自己有多害怕女孩们 怕她们嘲笑我 怕她们看见我就扭过头去 怕她们夸奖我那高大英俊的老哥
I forgot how afraid I was around girls, how I was always waiting for them to laugh at me or look away embarrassed or ask me about my tall handsome brother.

我眼里只有泰莎
I forgot about everything but Tysha.

于是我跟她上了床
And somehow I found myself in her bed.

三只烤鸡啊 总不能白吃
For three chickens, I should hope so.

我的第一次 我他妈还没闹清楚就完事了...

但她对我很好
But she was good to me.

事后吻了我 还给我唱了一首歌

到隔天清晨 我已经爱上她了 便向她求婚
And by morning I was deep enough in love to ask for her hand.

讲几句谎话 塞几枚金币 再找个喝醉酒的修士 就这么成了... 一对小夫妻

两个星期后 那修士酒醒 便把事情禀报我老爸

你的婚姻到此结束

其实... 那女孩是个妓女

他认为让我体验男女之事的时刻到了

你说多少妓女值这个价?

你才会变回以前的模样  我的日和星
Then you shall return to me, my sun and stars.

我可以告诉你国王们的一切
Oh, I can tell you all there is to know about kings.

关于那些国王  你要知道的事情是...
The thing you need to understand about kings is...

过去的六十七年里  我所了解 真正了解的国王比任何人都多
For the past 67 years, I've known...  truly known more kings than any man alive.

他们个个难以捉摸  不过我知道该如何辅佐
They're complicated men, but I know how to serve them.

而且从未失去我的位子
And keep on serving them.

诸神播撒给我们的众多劣性当中
Of all the thousand thousand maladies the gods visit on us,

疯狂是最要命的
Madness is the worst.

他是个好人 非常有魅力
He was a good man, such a charmer.

眼见他在我面前日渐改变 迷失在血与火的迷梦之中
To watch him melt away before my eyes, consumed by dreams of fire and blood...

劳勃・拜拉席恩则是头截然不同的猛兽 是个厉害的人物  伟大的战士
Robert Baratheon was an entirely different animal...  powerful man, a great warrior...

但可惜的是  打江山容易 守江山难
But alas, winning a kingdom and ruling a kingdom are rather different things.

人家说老罩着面甲过日子的人 容易看不到身侧的敌人
They say that if a man goes through life with his battle visor down, he can often be blind to the enemies at his side.

而现在  我辅佐他儿子乔佛里国王 愿诸神保佑他国泰民安
Now I serve his son King Joffrey, may the gods bless his reign.

他是个能干的年轻人  好战心强
He is a capable young man... strong military mind.

而且严厉 不过对保护王国而言  严厉不算缺点
Stern...  but sternness in defense of the realm is no vice.

现在说他会成为怎样的国王  还为时尚早 但我能预料到  这位新国王必有丰功伟绩
It's far too soon to know what manner of king he will be, but I sense true greatness on the horizon for our new king.

你说  '关于国王  你要知道的事'
You said, 'The thing you need to understand about kings...'

你刚开始说的  算了
When you started, you... never mind.

我送你出去吧  亲爱的
Let me see you out, my dear.

没事  你坐着吧  好吧
It's all right. No need.  Yes yes.

想想看  你要是坐在上面会是什么样子
When you imagine yourself up there, how do you look?

王冠合适吗  多年以来对你嗤之以鼻的 老爷夫人们会不会虚情假意地向你卑躬屈膝
Does the crown fit? Do all the lords and ladies simper and bow, the ones who sneered at you for years?

没了脑袋  他们想卑躬屈膝也难
It's hard for them to simper and bow without heads.

野心勃勃  而道德沦丧
A man with great ambition and no morals...

我可不敢与你为敌
I wouldn't bet against you.

我的朋友  要是你坐上去了 又会怎么做呢
And what would you do, my friend, if you found yourself sitting up there?

我一定是城里为数不多的 对王座毫无兴趣的人
I must be one of the few men in this city who doesn't want to be king.

你一定是城里为数不多的 不算男人的男人
You must be one of the few men in the city who isn't a man.

积点口德吧
Oh, you can do better than that.

你被阉的时候 是既取卵又杀鸡吗
When they castrated you, did they take the pillar with the stones?

我一直都很好奇  是吗
I've always wondered.  Have you?

你还费心巴力地琢磨我下身是什么样子吗
Do you spend a lot of time wondering what's between my legs?

我估摸着就像女人一样  是条缝
I picture a gash like a woman's.

我真是受宠若惊啊  还劳烦您琢磨我下身
I am flattered, of course, to be pictured at all.

虽说过了这么多年  你肯定还是不习惯吧 来自异国他乡 为众人所鄙夷 无人不畏惧
Must be strange for you, even after all these years...  a man from another land, despised by most, feared by all...

我是这样的吗  承蒙您告知
Am I? That is good to know.

你有没有因为害怕我那条缝而夜不能寐呀
Do you lie awake at night fearing my gash?

但你挺了过来  在一任又一任的国王耳边 轻声低语
But you carry on, whispering in one king's ear and then the next.

我也钦佩您  贝里席大人
And I admire you, Lord Baelish.

出身卑微  攀附权势  最大的才能就是 结交有权有势的主子  以及女主
A grasper from a minor house with a major talent for befriending powerful men and women.

很实用的才能  我相信你也同意
A useful talent, I'm sure you'd agree.

所以呢  我们在这儿 彼此钦佩  互相尊重
So here we stand...  in mutual admiration and respect.

各位大人  可以开始了吗
My lords. Shall we begin?

你现在就叫阿利了  听到没
You're Arry now, hear me?

没人会盘问孤儿
No one asks an orphan too many questions

因为没人在乎
'cause nobody gives three shits.

路还长  和你作伴的都不是什么好东西
We have a long way to travel and in bad company.

这回我弄到二十个人 有大人  有小孩  全都送去长城
I have 20 this time, men and boys all bound for the Wall.

你父亲大人让我自己去牢里挑人 那儿可没啥贵族少爷之流
Your lord father gave me the pick of the dungeons and I didn't find no little lordlings down there.

这群人有一半连想都不想就会把你交给国王 以换取赦免
This lot, half of them would turn you over to the king quick as spit for a pardon.

而另一半也会这么做 不过会先强暴你再说
And the other half would do the same, except they'd rape you first.

所以你小心一点 要撒尿就自个儿到林子里撒
So keep to yourself...  and when you piss, do it in the woods alone.

你和这帮人待着  小子
You stay with this lot, boy.

别乱跑 不然你就跟他们仨锁在马车后面

看路  小矮子
Watch yourself, midget.

他竟然有一把剑
He's got a sword, this one.

你这种贱人要剑干嘛
What's a gutter rat like you doing with a sword?

说不定是哪家的小跟班

他才不是啥跟班  你瞧瞧
He ain't no squire. Look at him.

简直就一娘们儿

他以前把一个男孩活活踢死了

我把他揍倒在地  然后猛踢他老二 一直踢到他死为止
I knocked him down and I kicked him in the balls and I kept kicking him until he was dead.

我把他踢得稀烂
I kicked him all to pieces.

我杀过一个小胖子
I already killed one fat boy.

你刚才那是撒谎  但我是说真的

要知道  我打铁有十年了

我打铁的时候  铁会唱歌

我打你的时候  你会不会唱啊
Are you gonna sing when I hit you?

这是城里铁匠用精钢打的
This is castleforged steel.

你从哪儿偷的

别人送我的  无所谓了

多得是强奸犯, 小偷, 强盗, 杀人犯

那你呢  武器师傅的学徒

师傅不想要我了 就送我来这儿
But my master got sick of me, so here I am.

出发  你们这群婊子养的
Come on, you sorry sons of whores!

从这儿到长城要赶上千里路 而且凛冬将至
It's a thousand leagues from here to the Wall and winter is coming!

天天早餐都吃火腿 这到哪天才是头儿啊

起码给我倒杯啤酒吧
Bring me some beer at least.

昨晚骑马就这么累啊
Was your moonlight ride that tiring?

别害怕
Don't look so terrified.

要是我把每个半夜开溜的人都抓来砍头 那防守长城的就只剩鬼魂了
If we beheaded everyone that ran away for the night, only ghosts would guard the Wall.

好歹你没去鼹鼠村嫖妓
At least you weren't whoring in Mole's Town.

荣誉心驱使你离开 荣誉心也鞭策你回来

My friends brought me back.

他们杀害了我父亲

你有办法让他起死回生吗
And you're going to bring him back to life, are you?

这种怪事我们可不希望再有了
We've had enough of that sort of thing.

长城外的游骑兵回报 好些村落完全被遗弃
Beyond the Wall, the rangers are reporting whole villages abandoned.

他们在夜晚看见群山中的火光 从黄昏直烧到天亮
At night they see fires blazing in the mountains from dusk until dawn.

一个被抓的野人发誓说 许多部落齐聚到一处秘密要塞 他们目的为何  只有天上诸神知道
A captured wildling swears their tribes are uniting in some secret stronghold, to what ends the gods only know.

卡特・派克的手下发现了四具蓝眼死尸
Cotter Pyke's men discovered four blueeyed corpses.

他们比我们聪明  直接就烧掉了
Unlike us, they were wise enough to burn them.

你觉得你兄弟的战争 比我们这场战争更重要吗
Do you think your brother's war is more important than ours?

不  等哪天夜里  死人 还有更邪乎的家伙大举入侵 你觉得谁坐在铁王座上还有差别吗
No.  When dead men and worse come hunting for us in the night, do you think it matters who sits on the Iron Throne?

等我们明天越墙北进时 我希望你和你那头狼与我们同在
Because I want you and your wolf with us when we ride out beyond the Wall tomorrow.

我不会干坐在这儿等风雪来临
I'll not sit meekly by and wait for the snows.

I mean to find out what's happening.

I will command them myself.

所以呢  雪诺大人  我就问你一句

卓戈在夜晚的国度是用不着龙蛋的

不如卖掉  然后返回自由城邦 所换的财富够您一辈子享用不尽

这些蛋不是要我拿去卖的

你怕的就是这个

You swore to obey me.

打得确实漂亮 陛下

Ser Dontos the Red of House Hollard!

呃 没有 没有醉 陛下

学城来了只乌鸦 就在今早 陛下

说枢机会召开 分析研读了 七大王国所有学士的报告 继而宣布 这个长夏 终于结束了
The conclave has met,considered reports from Maesters all over the Seven Kingdoms, and declared this great summer done at last.

这辈子我记忆里最长的一个夏天啊
The longest summer in living memory.

百姓们都说 漫长的夏季意味着 一个更漫长的冬季, 一个广为流传的迷信而已
The peasants say,a long summer means an even longer winter. A common superstition.

我们的存粮足以应对持续五年的冬季
We have enough wheat for a fiveyear winter.

如果冬季来得更长的话 我们怕是要失去一些百姓了

难民纷纷逃离战争 都城要被他们淹没了 陛下
The city's drowning in refugees,Your Grace, fleeing the war.

我们没地方安置他们
We have nowhere to house them.

随着冬季来临 情况只会更糟

都城守备队不是听你差遣的么 史林特大人

而你这个臣子难道不是听我差遣么? 
And are you not a Lord at my command?

我的头衔和领地都是您的慷慨恩赐 陛下
I owe my title and lands to your generosity, Your Grace.

那么就干好你的本职 紧闭城门 别放一个农民进来
Then do your job.Shut the gates to the peasants.

他们该呆在田地里 而非涌进都城
They belong in the field,not our capital.

你比从前更迷人了 老姐

抱歉打断了大家 你们继续

你来这里干什么? 
What are you doing here?

啊 可真是一次无与伦比的精彩旅行
Ah, it's been a remarkable journey.

我在长城边上撒尿
I pissed off the edge of the Wall,

还在天牢里打盹
I slept in a sky cell,

跟高山部落并肩作战 这么多历险 这么多感激之情要表达啊
I fought with the hill tribes so many adventures, so much to be thankful for.

你来这里干什么? 这可是御前会议
What are you doing here? This is the small council.

是的 我知道 我相信作为国王之手 在御前会议总会受到欢迎的
Yes. well I, do believe, the Hand of the King, is welcome at all small council meetings.

我们的父亲才是国王之手
Our father is Hand of the King.

是的 但是他不在的时候呢…
Yes, but in his absence...

您父亲任命提利昂大人 在他作战时代行首相之职
Your father has named Lord Tyrion to serve as Hand in his stead while he fights.

我真想知道你是怎么连蒙带骗才让父亲这么决定的
I would like to know how you tricked father into this.

如果我有能力骗父亲
If I were capable of tricking father,

那么我现在已经君临全世界了
I'd be emperor of the world by now.

你这是自作自受
You brought this on yourself.

没错 你什么都没干 当你儿子要取奈德·史塔克项上人头的时候
Quite rightyou did nothing when your son called for Ned Stark's head.

现在整个北境都跳出来和我们作对了
Now the entire North has risen up against us.

我试过阻止, 是么? 可你失败了
I tried to stop it.Did you? You failed.

这场闹剧会困扰我们家族一整代人
That bit of theater will haunt our family for a generation.

罗柏·史塔克只是个小屁孩, 一个百战百胜的小屁孩
Robb Stark is a child.Who's won every battle he's fought.

你没意识到我们就要输掉这场战争了么? 
Do you understand we're losing the war?

关于战争你懂些什么?  什么都不懂
What do you know about warfare? Nothing.

我知道我们的敌人彼此间的憎恨 和对我们的憎恨不相上下
And I know that our enemies hate each other almost as much as they hate us.

Joffrey is King. Joffrey is King.

You are here to advise him.

我来这里也只是为了好好辅佐他

你爱你的孩子
You love your children.

还有你的脸蛋也算一个
That and your cheekbones.

而我们手上正好有两个, 只剩一个了

就一个了?  艾莉亚这小鬼头 她消失了

消失? 怎么消失? 伴着一股烟雾么?

我们本有三个史塔克可以拿来讨价还价的
We had three Starks to trade.

你却砍了一个家伙的脑袋 又让另一个跑掉了
You chopped one's head off and let another escape.

父亲要被气坏了
Father will be furious.

对你来说这感觉一定很陌生吧 成了那个令他失望的孩子

大人 愿旧神眷顾您的兄长 以及所有北境的子民
My Lord, may the Old Gods watch over your brother and all our northern sons.

我城堡的墙可抵挡不了寒冬
The walls of my Holdfast will not stand the winter.

石料最后一次上灰浆还是伊里斯国王在位的时候 而我担心这一辈的石匠 已经没了他们父辈的技艺了
The stones were last mortared in the time of King Aerys, and I'm afraid the masons today are not fit to carry their fathers' hammers.

在我还是个孩子的时候 我记得某年夏天 曾见过老石匠们在托伦方城建造一座新的塔楼
When I was a boy, I remember seeing them put up a new tower at Torrhen's Square in a summer.

当年人们干活就是干活
Men worked back then.

今天呢 我的城堡看起来就像是 毛头小子醉后用泥巴捏出来的
Today, my Holdfast looks like it was built by drunk children.

在夜里你能听见寒风从间隙呼啸吹过

到了下雨天 老天啊

我还不如干脆睡到瀑布下面去

'放了我儿子, 那么你将得到做梦也得不到的财富
'Release my son and you'll be rich beyond your dreams.

否则, 你的家族将会被连根拔起, 灰飞烟灭'

守夜人 '浪鸦'

我刚问你话呢
I asked you a question.

但是你态度太差 我选择不作答
You asked without manners and I chose not to answer.

我奉王家授权状 要拿你手下的某只阴沟鼠
I have a royal warrant for one of these gutter rats you're transporting.

问题在于
Well, the thing is...

这群阴沟鼠现在是咱守夜人的人了
These gutter rats belong to the Night's Watch.

国王和太后可管不到那么远
Now, that puts them beyond the reach of Kings and Queens.

这可真有趣 人们往往太过注重保护喉咙 结果忽视了来自下方的威胁
It's a funny thing people worry so much about their throats that they forget about what's down low.

这把刀子我早餐之前才刚刚磨过
Now I sharpened this blade before breakfast.

如果我愿意 用来刮蜘蛛屁股上的毛都行 或者 我可以用它割开你腿上的动脉
I could shave a spider's arse if I wanted to or I could nick this artery in your leg.

割了之后 这附近可没人知道 如何给动脉止血
And once it's nicked, there's no one around here who knows how to unnick it.

这东西咱们就替你保管了
We'll just keep that.

长城上总是需要好钢
Good steel is always needed on the Wall.

看起来你似乎得做个选择 要么死在这个远离家乡的十字路口 要么滚回城 告诉你的头儿 你没找到要找的东西
Seems you have a choice you can die here at this crossroads a long way from home, or you can go back to your city and tell your Masters you didn't find what you were looking for.

我们正在找一个叫詹德利的男孩
We're looking for a boy named Gendry.

他带着一顶牛头盔
He carries a bull's head helmet.

谁把他交上来 就能得到国王的赏赐
Anyone turning him over will earn the King's reward.

我们还会带着更多的人回来 到时候我要把你的脑袋和那男孩一起带走
We'll be back with more men and I'll be taking your head home along with that bastard boy.

你让我等了太久 还好你的朋友一直在陪我
You make me wait a long time, but your friend keeps me company.

我们刚刚在谈论您是何等英勇无敌 大败史塔克军
We were just speaking of your bravery in the victory against the Stark auxiliary forces.

那可是一场大战
It was quite a battle.

我听说您的脑袋受了重伤哟
I heard you suffered a terrible head wound.

那群北方人可真是令人生畏的战士
The northerners are such fearsome warriors.

我还给他讲了我们相遇的故事
And I tell him the story of how we meet.

关于您是如何在父亲的厨房里 找到这么个尤物的事 我差点就信了
To find so lovely a creature working in your father's kitchens it almost beggars belief.

奇事偶尔也会发生
Strange things do happen.

你该尝尝她的鱼肉'饼'儿
You should taste her fish pie.

我觉得瓦里斯大人不会喜欢吃鱼肉饼的
I don't think Lord Varys likes fish pie.

这您怎么知道?  我就是知道
How can you tell?  I can always tell.

瓦里斯大人也好 我也罢 都不喜欢被人提及自身的缺憾
Men like Lord Varys and I can't let our disadvantages get the best of us.

他肯老老实实帮我把鱼打来就多谢了
We'll make a fisherman of him yet.

我很高兴您的新朋友 能陪您一起来王都
I am glad your new friend was able to accompany you to the capital.

朋友可是生活中不可或缺的重要部分啊
Friends are such an important part of life.

不幸的是您父亲并不希望她来
Unfortunate that your father didn't want her to come.

不过大人您别担心
But rest easy, My Lord.

我可是非常擅长为好朋友 保守秘密
I am very good at keeping secrets for my good friends.

你在对待朋友时的谨慎 我早有耳闻
Your discretion is legendary...  where your friends are concerned.

您看我 明明您很想休息 但我却唠叨个不停
How unspeakable of me to go on and on when all you want to do is rest.

欢迎来到君临 亲爱的
Welcome to King's Landing, my dear.

这座城市因您的到来而蓬荜生辉
This city is made brighter by your presence.

我们还要出席一场御前会议 大人
We have a council meeting, My Lord.

我不喜欢被威胁
I don't like threats.

谁威胁您了?  我可不是奈德·史塔克
Who threatened you?  I'm not Ned Stark.

我了解这游戏的规则
I understand the way this game is played.

奈德·史塔克是个有荣誉心的人
Ned Stark was a man of honor.

再威胁我 我就把你扔进海里去
Threaten me again and I'll have you thrown into the sea.

那样您可能会对结果很失望哟
You might be disappointed in the results.

风暴来复往兮 大鱼吃掉小鱼 而我仍旧是那个弄潮儿
Storms come and go, the big fish eat the little fish, and I keep on paddling.

我们不该让太后久等
We shouldn't keep the queen waiting.

'从今以后 直到永远 我们都不再是你们国度的一部分 而是一个自由并且独立的北境王国'
'From this time until the end of time we are not part of your realm, but a free and independent kingdom of the North.'

阿尔顿·兰尼斯特
信使 瑟曦和詹姆的堂弟

他比他父亲更有胆 这点我承认
He has more spirit than his father, I'll give him that.

瑟曦·兰尼斯特
摄政太后

你的撕纸艺术愈发精湛呐
You've perfected the art of tearing up papers.

把他父亲的遗骨还回去吧 至少展示一下诚意
We can give him his father's bones back at least as a gesture of good faith.

你会把我们的回复带给史塔克吧 堂弟? 
You'll give the Starks our reply, cousin?

你在史塔克那里作客时 有没有见到我弟弟? 
Did you see my brother when you were the Starks' guest?

他们没能令他屈服 陛下
They have not broken his spirit, Your Grace.

如果你有机会和他说话 告诉他 他没被遗忘
If you speak with him, tell him he's not been forgotten.

我会的 陛下  路上小心 堂弟
I will, Your Grace.  Safe travels, cousin.

你可真是颇具政治手腕啊
You have a deft hand with diplomacy.

还有别的事吗?   今晨来了只信鸦 有关黑城堡的事务
If that's everything... Aa raven flew in this morning from Castle Black.

关于野人的麻烦? 
Trouble with the wildlings.

这就是为何叫他们'野人'
That's why they're called 'wildlings.'

这帮家伙最近不那么'野'了
Somewhat less wild these days.

似乎停止了自相残杀 并且开始追随这个 塞外之王
Seems they've stopped killing each other and started following this KingBeyondtheWall.

又一个国王? 现在有几个了? 五个? 
Another king?How many is that now, five?

总司令大人向我们索要更多的人手以防守长城
The Lord Commander asks that we send more men to man the Wall.

他大概忘记了我们正在打仗
Perhaps he's forgotten we're fighting a war.

我们没法给他任何人
We have no men to spare.

冷风已然吹起 复活的死人也随之而来
'The cold winds are rising and the dead rise with them.'

北方人十分迷信
The northerners are a superstitious people.

按总司令的说法 一个死人闯入了他房间 攻击了他
According to the Commander, one of these dead men attacked him in his chambers.

你该怎么样杀一个死人? 
How do you kill a dead man?

显然烧了他就行
Apparently you burn him.

你去了趟长城 回来之后 就开始相信古灵精怪了
One trip to the Wall and you come back believing in grumpkins and snarks.

我不知道自己相信的是什么 但事实就是 守夜人军队是挡在我们和 长城外那些未知威胁之间的唯一屏障
I don't know what I believe, but here's a fact for you the Night's Watch is the only thing that separates us from what lies beyond the Wall.

我非常有信心 勇敢的守夜人 会保护我们所有人
I have every confidence that the brave men of the Night's Watch will protect us all.

诸神希望我们能有点尊严 所以不希望我们死的时候放屁
'if the Gods wanted us to have dignity, they wouldn't make us fart when we died.'

临死的时候我就那么握着她的手
I was holding her hand when she left this world.

她放的屁如此之大 整个床都晃起来了
She farted so hard, the whole bed shook.

一个男人有这么多老婆实在是贪心啊
Seems a bit greedy for one man to have so many wives.

两三个还不够吗? 
Wouldn't two or three be enough for him?

我们正在讨论严肃的话题呢
We were having a serious discussion.

你看什么呢? 
Would you look at that?

没什么比女人走开的样子更吸引人了
Nothing like the sight of a woman walking away.

我更想看她们走来的样子
I prefer watching them come towards me.

那样也有看头
I'm sure that's nice, too.

嗯 有个叫做紫罗兰的挤奶女工 她家的农场紧挨着我家
Yeah, well, there was a milkmaid named Violet on the next farm over from where I grew up.

我们六岁大时就开始摔跤
We were wrestling together from the time we were six years old.

后来我们长大了 摔跤的内容…
And then we got older and the wrestling, uh...

当然是竭尽所能
Well, as many times as I could.

真希望我也是在农场长大的
I wish I grew up on a farm.

我们需要更多的土豆
We need more potatoes.

我要再削一份土豆泥
Get another sack from the sledge.

再来点芜菁吧
Get the turnips, too.

白灵 走开 去 去!
Ghost, away. Shoo, shoo!

他吓着你了吗  你不能碰我的
Did he frighten you? Youyou shouldn't touch me.

我只是想确认你有没有受伤
I just wanted to make sure you weren't hurt.

她是卡斯特的…女儿之一
She's one of Craster's...daughters.

你好 吉莉 你这是干嘛? 
Hello, Gilly.What are you doing?

山姆说你或许能帮上忙
Sam said you could help.

抱歉 山姆也知道我们不能
I'm sorry, but Sam knows we're not supposed

我们必须在走的时候带上她
Have to take her with us when we leave.

那真是  我知道这听起来有点疯狂
What would that I know it sounds a bit mad.

这不是听起来有点疯狂 而是根本不可能
No, it doesn't sound a bit mad,it's impossible.

总司令命令我们  我们发誓守护人民
The Lord Commander ordered us to We are sworn to protect.

山姆 我们不能带她走  求你了 大人 我求你
Sam, we can't take please, ser, please.

要跑的时候我绝不会拖后腿
I can still run if I have to.

这根本不可能  我马上要生孩子了
It's just not possible.  I'm going to have a baby.

你想让我们冒生命危险帮你 可又不告诉我们原因
You want us to risk our lives for you and you won't even tell us why?

你为什么要这样?   哪样? 问她问题? 
Why'd you do that?  Do what? Ask her a question?

你太残忍了  残忍!? 
You were cruel.  Cruel?

山姆 你就这么急着想丢掉一只手吗? 
Sam, are you in such a hurry to lose a hand?

我又没碰她  但你正想要偷她
I didn't touch her.  No, you just want to steal her.

你知道卡斯特为此会切掉你什么吗? 
What do you think Craster cuts off for that?

她是个人 不是山羊
She's a person,not a goat.

我们正在渐渐深入野人的领土
We're heading deeper and deeper into wildling territory.

我们不能带着一个女孩同行 莫尔蒙不会同意的
We can't take a girl with us.Mormont wouldn't have it.

即使他真的同意 我们该拿她怎么办? 
And even if he would,what would we do with her?

谁为她接生婴儿? 你吗? 
Who's going to deliver a baby, you?

怎么了? 我读过有关的书籍
What?I've read about it.

您无须目睹此事  他是吾血之血
You don't need to see this.  He is blood of my blood.

这是谁干的?   也许是波诺卡奥
Who did this?  Khal Pono, perhaps.

他们可不喜欢一个女人来统领卡拉萨
They don't like the idea of a woman leading a Khalasar.

等我找他们算完帐想必他们会更加讨厌
They will like it far less when I am done with them.

城堡是否仍和您记忆中一致呐 大人?
Is it as you remember,My Lord?

孩子的眼里 所有的东西都要大些
Everything looks bigger when you're a child.

我还记得在我小时候 我觉得父亲的船舱大得像座宫殿
I remember my father's cabin felt like a palace when I was little.

他们会在码头上等我
They'll be waiting for me on the docks.

今天对他们来说可是个大日子
This is a big day for them.

我离开之后他们便没什么值得兴奋的事
They haven't had much to get excited about since I left.

铁群岛是个严苛艰难之地
It's a hard place,the Iron Islands.

如此湿冷
It's cold and it's wet.

啊 我爱这湿冷
Oh, I love the cold and wet.

人们说艰苦的地方养育出坚毅的人

坚毅的人统治这个世界
And hard men rule the world.

兴许不久之后您就会成为国王
Then you'll be king before long.

笑的时候闭上嘴巴
Try smiling with your lips closed.

我父亲不信任你们铁民
My father doesn't trust you Iron islanders.

他说你们是掠夺者和强奸犯 不管你们拥有多少女人 你们永远不会满

别提你父亲了
Quit talking about your father.

他对我们的看法正确得很呐
But he's right about us.

Our wives from the Iron Islands,they're for breeding.

这无法使我们满足
That's not enough for us.

所以我们从那些抢来的女人里边 挑选'盐妾'
That's why we take salt wives the women we capture.

我可以同您一齐上岸
Take me with you when you go ashore.

让我成为您的盐妾  你该待在这船上
Make me your salt wife.  Your place is on this ship.

父亲会惩罚我
Father will punish me.

他会责骂我是个妓女
He'll call me a whore.

她连碰都没让我碰
I barely touched her.

而我付的买春钱却是寻常妓院的两倍 我得到了什么? 一直在哭!
Now, you charge twice as much as every other brothel and this is what I getcrying.

稍等片刻 我的朋友 稍等
One moment, my friend.A moment.

请务必接受我最诚挚的歉意
Please accept my sincerest apologies.

兰卡会伺候好您的
Aremca will take good care of you.

抱歉 大人  嘘 嘘
I'm sorry, My Lord.  Shh, shh.

她就是那个 金袍子 杀了她的孩子  啊 是的
She's the onethe Gold Cloaks, they killed her baby.  Ah, yes.

这事… 处理得太轻率了
That was...  poorly handled.

往往 那些权倾天下的贵胄 是最没仁慈之心的
Sometimes those with the most power have the least grace.

我总是情不自禁想起这事
I can't stop thinking about it.

她那可怜的孩子
That poor little baby.

你知道吗? 你让我想起另一个姑娘 我曾经在某个极乐之地 所得的尤物 美丽动人 就像你 而且 也聪明如你
You know, you remind me of another girl, a lovely thing I once acquired from a Lysene pleasure house beautiful, like yourself, and intelligent,like yourself.

但她并不快乐
But she wasn't happy.

我问她缘由 但我和她 并不像现在你我这般相处融洽
I asked her why,but we didn't have the kind of rapportthat you and I have.

是啊 真让人悲伤遗憾
Yes, it was quite sad.

从那些地方来的女孩总是昂贵 极其昂贵
Girls from the Lysene pleasure houses are expensive, extremely expensive.

而她没能为我带来任何收入
And this one wasn't making me any money.

我讨厌失败的投资
I hate bad investments.

我不知如何使她开心 也不知如何减轻我的损失
I had no idea how to make her happy, no idea how to mitigate my losses.

一位腰缠万贯的恩客 他给了我 极其可观的一笔钱 来让他好好调教一番这女孩
A very wealthy patron,he offered me a tremendousamount of money to let him transform this lovely, sad girl.

用那些大部分男人
To use her in ways that...

也从未见识过的方法
Would never occur to most men.

而此类方法 相信你并不陌生
And you know what occurs to most men.

我说不准最后他是否让她开心了起来 但我的损失可是切切实实地减轻了
I would not say he succeeded in making her happy, but my losses were definitely mitigated.

今晚休息吧 为梅玵的孩子哀悼

明天见
I'll see you tomorrow.

该死 小子!  抱歉 大人

这就是你的新侍从?

豪华的宴席 大人

算了吧 比这还微不足道的小事都能引发战争

我听说某天夜里 小指头的妓院遇到了不小的麻烦
I heard there was some trouble in Littlefinger's brothel the other night.

但必须完成  对 当然

都城守备队必须维持治安 只不过我没意识到维持治安还需要屠杀婴儿

上意难违  非常正确

尤其是太后之命
Especially the queen's orders.

我从未说过是太后下的命令

嗯 不过还有谁想要杀光劳勃国王的私生子呢?

她一直是个善妒之人
She's always been a jealous woman.

你比我更了解你姐姐

我不信那些污言秽语
I don't listen to filth.

那很好 不过你听过
That's good of you,but you have heard them.

我认为还是有人会信这套 认为劳勃的私生子比瑟曦的孩子更有资格继承铁王座

乔佛里是我的国王 其余的我都没兴趣

我感激你的忠诚

那家伙是叛徒

他想收买我的忠诚
He tried to buy my loyalty.

他压根不知道你已经被收买了

我不能接受被一个小恶魔质疑我的荣誉
I'll not have my honor questioned by an Imp!

我可不是在质疑你的荣誉 杰诺斯大人
I'm not questioning Your Honor, Lord Janos.

我认为你根本没有荣誉可言
I'm denying its existence.

如果你认为我会在这老老实实受你的羞辱 侏儒
If you think I'll stand here and take this from you, dwarf

侏儒? 你说小恶魔就已经很过分了 不要得寸进尺

而且 是的 你就要在这接受羞辱 除非你想被我的朋友们'羞辱'

在我父亲从战场回来以前 我都将代行首相之职
I intend to serve as Hand of the King until my father returns from the war.

而鉴于你背叛了上一任首相 哎 我实在对你在身旁不安心呐
And seeing as you betrayed the last Hand of the King, well, I just wouldn't feel safe with you lurking about.

你算老几 咱上头的朋友可不会允许你这样对我的!
What are you t my friends at court will not allow this!

太后已经答应我  是'摄政'太后
The queen herself has granted...  The queen regent.

而且你也够傻 竟然以为她是你朋友
And you're a fool to believe she is your friend.

那我们就听听乔佛里陛下是怎么说的吧
We shall hear what Joffrey has to say about this.

今晚就有条船启程去东海望
There's a ship leaving for EastwatchbytheSea tonight.

You want to be Hand of the King?You want to rule?

躺在一张长满野草的床上 在睡梦中被勒死之前将它们连根拔起 这就叫做统治
This is what ruling is lying on a bed of weeds, ripping them out by the root, one by one, before they strangle you in your sleep.

我不是国王 但我认为统治可比这复杂多了
I'm no king, but I think there's more to ruling than that.

我才不管你是怎么想的
I don't care what you think!

你从来就没认真过
You've never taken it seriously.

你没有 詹姆也没有
You haven't,Jaime hasn't.

结果重担全压我身上了
It's all fallen on me.

正如詹姆老压在你身上 就像史坦尼斯说的
As has Jaime repeatedly,according to Stannis Baratheon.

你从来都很可笑
You've always been funny...

但是没有哪个笑话比得上你人生第一个笑话 对吗? 
But none of your jokes will ever match the first one, will they?

你为了来到人世间而扯开我母亲的肚子 她因为失血过多而死
Back when you ripped my mother open on your way out of her and she bled to death?

她也是我母亲
She was my mother, too.

世间再没比这更可笑的事情了
There's no bigger joke in the world than that.

陛下  陛下
Your Grace.   Your Grace.

和你的海盗朋友谈妥了吗? 
How did you fare with your pirate?

萨拉多·桑恩将加入我们的舰队
Salladhor Saan will join our fleet

三十艘船 外加一批精兵强将
30 ships.His men know how to fight.

依我来看 海盗只应付得了散兵游勇
In my experience, pirates prefer fighting unarmed men.

眼下别无选择
It does seem the wiser choice.

这次不再是选择了
There won't be a choice this time.

萨拉多·桑恩是我的老朋友
Salladhor Saan is an old friend.

我俩认识有三十个年头了
I've known him 30 years.

我从没信任过他 但是只要给他钱 他就不会反悔
I've never trusted him, but once he gets the smell of gold, he never stops.

若他尽职 酬劳就是应得的
Well, if he does his job, he'll have his share.

光之王护佑着你 年轻的战士
The Lord of Light shines through you, young warrior.

你跟他说了些什么? 
What did you say to him?

我告诉他浴火是最圣洁的死亡
I told him death by fire is the purest death.

为什么?   因为事实就是如此
Why? Because it is true.

陛下 你很焦虑
You're troubled, my king.

对光之王而言 这些军队不过些玩具
These armies are toys for the Lord of Light.

那就让你的神烧了他们
Tell your lord to burn them, then.

我祈求他的指引并执行
I pray for his commands and I obey.

据斥候说 我弟弟有十万大军 他们本该效忠于我
My little brother has 100,000 men according to the scouts, men whose allegiance rightly belongs to me.

在实战中 十次里有九次都是 人数占优的一方获胜
In a real war, the side with the greater number wins nine times out of 10.

那我们就是那第十次
Then we must be the 10th.

在战场上 我无法战胜我弟弟
I cannot defeat my brother in the field.

而不把那些他窃取的兵力夺回来 我根本拿不下君临
And I can't take King's Landing without the men he's stolen.

我在火焰中看见了通向胜利之路
I have seen the path to victory in the flames.

但首先 你要把自己献给光之王
But first, you must give yourself to the Lord of Light.

见鬼 那些我都说了
I've said the words,damn you.

你必须献出你的全部
You must give all of yourself.

她病了 很虚弱
She's sickly, weak...

独居在高塔里
Shut away in a tower.

而且她什么也没给你 没有儿子 只有死婴 只有死亡
And she's given you nothing no sons,only stillborns, only death.

而我将给你一个儿子 我的陛下
I will give you a son, my king.

这杂种摸进了他不该去的地方!
Bastard's been meddling where he shouldn't!

我命令你带上全部人马 给我滚
I want you and your men gone.

立即执行
And you will make this right.

总司令大人  出去!
Lord Commander.  Now!

总司令大人  退下
Lord Commander.  Leave us.

他把新生儿抱进树林
He took the baby into the woods, the newborn.

那关你什么事? 
What business is that of yours?

您不明白
No, you don't understand.

他杀掉了所有的男孩
He's killing them, all the boys.

野人侍奉更残暴的神祗
The wildlings serve crueler Gods than you or I.

那些男婴 是卡斯特的祭品
Those boys are Craster's offerings.

他谋杀亲子 简直就是禽兽
He's murdering his own children. He's a monster.

是啊 可是那禽兽曾多次 救我们游骑兵于生死之间
Aye, many a time that monster has been the difference between life and death for our Rangers.

包括你叔叔在内
Your Uncle among them.

我们还有别的仗要打
We have other wars to fight out there.

不管你看不看得惯 我们都需要卡斯特这种人
Like it or not, we need men like Craster.

有什么东西抱走了那婴儿
Something take that child.

我敢说你还会见到它
I daresay you'll see it again.

我 我一直想送你点什么
II wanted to give you something.

这是我母亲的
It belonged to my mother.

我不能收  拜托了
I can't take it.  Please.

我母亲从前用它做针线活
My mother used it for sewing.

每次她都让我坐在身边 念书给她听
She'd let me sit with her in her chamber while she sewed and I'd read to her.

父亲发现后严令禁止了
My father put a stop to it when he found out.

我只有这一件她的东西了
It's the only thing I have of hers.

还是在我离家来长城前 她送给我的
She gave it to me before I left for the Wall.

你 你不该随便送人
You you shouldn't give it away.

我没有随便送人
I'm not giving it away.

是送给你
I'm giving it to you.

叫醒布兰 好吗? 该上课了
Rouse Bran, will you? It's time for his lessons.

每晚都是如此
Every night it's the same.

我在梦中行走 奔跑 但是
I'm walking and running, but...

我穿梭于神木林 嗅闻泥土 捕猎杀戮 口尝鲜血 放声长啸
I'm running through the Godswood, sniffing the dirt, tasting blood in my mouth when I've made a fresh kill, howling.

老奶妈给我讲过故事 故事里有魔力的人 他们能进入鹿 鸟 狼的体内
Old Nan used to tell me stories about magical people who could live inside stags, birds, wolves.

布兰 那些只是 故事罢了  那么老奶妈是骗人了? 
That's exactly what they are, Bran stories.  So she was lying?

他们不存在?   怎么说呢 他们或许曾经存在
They don't exist?  Well, they may have done.

但和很多神奇的事情一样 早已从这个世界消失
But they're gone from the world along with much else.

这些只是梦境 布兰 仅此而已
These are dreams, Bran, nothing more.

不 我的梦是特别的
No, my dreams are different.

我梦见过父亲的死亡
I dreamt of my father dying.

瑞肯也做过同样的梦
And Rickon had the same dream.

不还有些梦没成真吗? 
What about all the dreams you had that didn't come true?

这一环由瓦雷利亚钢铸造
This link is made of Valyrian steel.

只有百分之一的学士有资格佩戴
Only one Maester in 100 wears it on his chain.

它代表我进修过'高级神秘术'
It signifies that I have studied the higher mysteries.

所有学习高级神秘术的人 都忍不住想尝试施法
And all who study these mysteries try their hand at spells.

哪个孩子没幻想过拥有超常的力量 从此便不同凡响? 
And what boy doesn't secretly wish for hidden powers to lift him out of his dull life into a special one?

但最终 和之前的无数孩子一样
But in the end, for all my efforts,

无论我如何努力 也毫无效果
I got no more out of it than 1,000 boys before me.

或许魔法曾是一种伟大的力量
Maybe magic once was a mighty force in the world.

巨龙消失了
The Dragons are gone.

森林之子也已被人遗忘
And the Children of the Forest forgotten.

打得漂亮 请上前
Well fought. Approach.

请起 摘下头盔
Rise. Remove your helm.

你父亲对你并未夸大其词 小姐
You are all your father promised and more, My Lady.

我只见洛拉斯爵士被打落过一两次 而且绝没有如此难堪
I've seen Ser Loras bested once or twice, but never quite in that fashion.

不 不 亲爱的 我哥哥相当勇猛

没错 我的王后

但冠军只能有一个

塔斯的布蕾妮 你可以向我索要任何东西

我愿成为你七卫之一 为您献出我的生命 保护您免遭一切危难

请起 御林铁卫 布蕾妮

陛下 我很荣幸地为您带来凯特琳·史塔克夫人 她是她儿子临冬城主罗柏·史塔克的信使
Your Grace, I have the honor to bring you Lady Catelyn Stark, sent as an envoy by her son Robb, Lord of Winterfell.

临冬城主和北境之王
Lord of Winterfell and King in the North.

凯特琳夫人 欢迎之至
Lady Catelyn. I'm pleased to see you.

请允许我介绍我的妻子 提利尔家族的玛格丽
May I present my wife Margaery of House Tyrell?

非常欢迎您 史塔克夫人
You are very welcome here, Lady Stark.

对您丈夫的遭遇我深感遗憾

我向您起誓 兰尼斯特将为谋害您的丈夫付出代价

一旦我拿下君临
