即刻把乔佛里的人头交给您

听到您愿意伸张正义 我已心满意足了 大人

And you should kneel when you approach the King.

无需如此 史塔克夫人是贵客

您儿子是否已向泰温·兰尼斯特进军? 
Has your son marched against Tywin Lannister yet?

我并未列席我儿子的作战会议
I do not sit on my son's war councils.

就算我出席 也不会将他的部署透露给您
And if I did, I would not share his strategies with you.

如果罗柏·史塔克想谈判 应该亲自前来 而不是躲在母亲身后
If Robb Stark wants a pact with us, he should come himself, not hide behind his mother's skirts.

我儿子正对战强敌 而非比武作乐
My son is fighting a war, not playing at one.

不必多虑 夫人
Don't worry, My Lady.

战争才刚刚开始
Our war is just beginning.

脚怎么样了?   好多了 陛下

这些家伙根本不知轻重

这是风暴地和河湾地的全部战力

全都和您的百花骑士一样年轻气盛?

The wolf pup has gone south with the entirety of the northern army at his back.

他在西境与狮子纠缠时 北境唾手可得
While he's tangling with the lion in the Westerlands, the north is ripe for the taking.

铁种将遵从古道 在北境西海岸展开掠夺
The Ironborn will reave and pillage as it was in the old days all along the northern coast.

之后将势力扩展到整片青绿之地 把颈泽 以及整个北境握在手中
We'll spread our dominion across the green lands, securing the Neck and everything above.

所有城池将一座接一座投降

剩下的地盘都是我们的了 森林 田野和厅堂

亚拉 我的女儿 你将率领三十条长船 攻击深林堡

我早想要座城堡啦
I've always wanted a castle.

那我的任务呢?

你带一条船 袭击磐石海岸 掠夺沿海渔村

你给了她三十条 只给我一条?

海婊子号 我们认为她很适合你

让我和渔民作战?

父亲 我曾和罗柏·史塔克并肩作战 我了解他的部下
Father, I fought with Robb Stark. I know his men.

他不会轻易放弃北境的

在我们夺下北境之前 他们甚至都不会觉察

你懂什么战争 女人? 
What do you know of it, woman?

我是身经百战的勇士

我没袒护任何人

与他们开战 很可能会让我们全军覆没

但如果我们宣誓效忠 他们会把凯岩城给我们

不是臣民 不做奴隶

We do not plow the fields or toil in the mine.

We take what is ours.

你和狼崽子在一起太久 变得懦弱了
Your time with the wolves has made you weak.

说得像是我自愿去当养子
You act as if I volunteered to go.

如果你记性够好 应该记得是你自己送走了我
You gave me away, if you remember.

就在劳勃·拜拉席恩率军将你击溃

你向他屈膝投降的那一天
After he crushed you.

那时你有没有强取啊? 
Did you take what was yours then?

就像是送走一条你不想要的狗
You gave me away like I was some dog you didn't want anymore.

现在我回来了 你反而咒骂我
And now you curse me because I've come home.

你想让父亲向你的另一个小家庭臣服?

我没有另一个家庭
I have no other family.

赶快做决定吧 席恩

有你没你 我们都一样出航

你不让我出这间屋子
You won't let me leave this room.

也不让我  嘘 嘘 小声点

为什么? 你觉得你的父亲能听见吗?

我没想把你困在这儿

也许我可以让你混进城堡的厨房

当然 也只是暂时而已

每一个尝过我厨艺的人都说 我是个货真价实的妓女

不是让你去做厨娘

是让你去做帮厨

帮厨?  帮厨是什么?

洗碗小妹?   是的 不过

我的小狮子想看我这个样子? 
Is that how my lion wants to see me?

你的小狮子想让你活下去

我们来到了一个危险的地方

我的姐姐想害我

她会努力寻找一切弱点下手

她不能知道你的存在

这是个恭维呢 小姐

成为弱点怎么是恭维?

笨笨的异域女孩

很快 亲爱的 等到战争结束

母亲说我会有新裙子 一条参加婚礼 一条参加宴会

但只有你能穿象牙白的裙子 因为你是新娘子

公主在和你说话呢
The Princess just spoke to you.

我相信你的新裙子会很漂亮的 弥赛菈

我会数着日子 期盼战争结束 之后我会在七神面前献上我对国王的爱
I'm counting the days until the fighting is done and I can pledge my love to the King in sight of the Gods.

乔佛里会杀了珊莎的哥哥吗?

不 我不希望

哪怕他这样做 珊莎也会依约成婚

对吧 小白鸽?

我是雪伊 小姐 您的新侍女
I'm Shae, My Lady. Your new handmaiden.

我并不知道我招了一名新侍女
I didn't know I needed a new handmaiden.

你不是本地人  不是

等着您告诉我需要做什么
Waiting for you to tell me what to do.

我不需要告诉你该去做什么
I shouldn't have to tell you to do things.

你直接去做就好了
You should just do them.

换床单 洗衣服 擦地 倒便壶 梳头
Change my linens, wash my clothing, scrub the floor, empty my chamber pot, brush my hair.

不是这样  您说让我梳
No. You said to brush

您的便壶是空的
Your chamber pot is empty.

你以前做过侍女吗?

好笑的是

Ah, you must be this fire priestess we hear so much about.

嗯 老哥 我终于知道是什么让你一把年纪还要拜鬼求神了
Mm, brother, now I understand why you found religion in your old age.

说话小心点 蓝礼
Watch yourself, Renly.

噢 噢 放轻松
No, no, I'm relieved.

真没想到你会如此狂热地迷上宗教
I never really believed you're a fanatic.

没错 你乏味 死板 无趣 但绝没有虔诚
Charmless, rigid, a bore, yes, but not a godly man.

在你的兄长面前你理应下跪 他承真主之命 降生于盐与烟之地
You should kneel before your brother he's the Lord's chosen, born amidst salt and smoke.

降生于盐与烟之地? 
Born amidst salt and smoke?

这是我第二次警告你
That's twice I've warned you.

听听你们说的话
Listen to yourselves.

如果你们是我的儿子 我要把你们两个的头狠狠撞在一起 然后锁进一间卧室 直到你们认清 彼此是兄弟这事实
If you were sons of mine, I would knock your heads together and lock you in a bedchamber until you remembered that you were brothers.

史塔克夫人 我很好奇为何您会站在我弟弟那边
It is strange to find you beside my brother, Lady Stark.

您丈夫是支持我称王的
Your husband was a supporter of my claim.

史塔克大人为维护正统而献身
Lord Eddard's integrity cost him his head.

你却在这个僭王身边责问我
And you sit beside this pretender and chastise me.

我们有共同的敌人
We share a common enemy.

按照律法 铁王座属于我
The Iron Throne is mine by right.

否认这点的都是我的敌人
All those that deny that are my foes.

从多恩到长城 全境都在否认你啊
The whole realm denies it, from Dorne to the Wall.

糟老头子临死时念叨着否认 未出生的婴儿在妈妈肚子里踢闹着否认
Old men deny it with their death rattle and unborn children deny it in their mother's wombs.

没人想让你当他的国王
No one wants you for their King.

老哥 你就是不爱交朋友
You never wanted any friends, brother.

但是没有朋友相助 还争什么权力
But a man without friends is a man without power.

看在我们母亲的份上
For the sake of the mother who bore us,

今晚上我给你时间考虑
I will give you this one night to reconsider.

降下叛旗 在天亮之前投效于我 我就保留你在御前会议中的重臣席位
Strike your banners, come to me before dawn, and I will grant you your old seat in the council.

甚至在我儿子出生之前 我仍旧把你指定为我的继承人
I'll even name you my heir until a son is born to me.

否则你就只有毁灭一途
Otherwise I shall destroy you.

你仔细看看那边的平原 老哥
Look across those fields, brother.

看到那些旗帜了吗? 
Can you see all those banners?

你以为几根裹着毛料的杆子就能让你称王? 
You think a few bolts of cloth will make you King?

可是高举这破布杆子的军队 能让我称王
The men holding those bolts of cloth will make me King.

天明之时 就见分晓
Come the dawn, we shall see.

记住你自己的罪孽 蓝礼大人
Look to your sins, Lord Renly.

长夜黑暗 处处险恶
The night is dark and full of terrors.

这就是我曾敬爱过的人 你相信吗? 
Would you believe I loved him once?

我还以为我们是受欢迎的呢
I thought we were welcome.

如果您听说一个多斯拉克部落正在逼近您的城市 也会这么做的 卡丽熙
If you heard a Dothraki horde was approaching your city, you might do the same, Khaleesi.

丹妮莉丝 '风暴降生' 来自坦格利安家族
Daenerys Stormborn of the House Targaryen.

大人 您早知道我? 
You know me, My Lord?

只是有所耳闻 卡丽熙
Only by reputation, Khaleesi.

而我并非什么大人 只是一介俗商
And I'm no lord, merely a humble merchant.

世人称您为龙之母
They call you the Mother of Dragons.

那我该怎么称呼您? 
And what should I call you?

噢 我的名字很长 发音对于异国人来更是不易
Oh, my name is quite long and quite impossible for foreigners to pronounce.

我只不过是个香料商人
I am simply a trader of spices.

但我们'十三巨子' 肩负职责 必须管理和保卫魁尔斯 古往今来最伟大的城市
But we are the Thirteen, charged with the governance and protection of Qarth, the greatest city that ever was or will be.

夸尔斯的壮美令人动容
The beauty of Quarth is legendary

我们可否目睹一下真龙? 
Might we see the dragons?

我的 朋友 我们旅途颠簸
My friend, we have travelled very far.

水尽粮绝
We have no food, no water.

只要我的子民得以温饱 我将感激不尽 为
Once I see my people fed, I would be honored

恕我直言 龙之母 没人目睹真龙现世
Forgive me, Mother of Dragons, but no man alive has seen a living dragon.

总有些满腹狐疑的朋友 怀疑您的孩子们是否 真的存在
Some of my more skeptical friends refuse to believe your children even exist.

我们只是请求亲眼一见
All we ask is the chance to see for ourselves.

哈 我对此毫不怀疑
Oh, I don't think you are.

但是你我素昧谋面 我的意见可说服不了大家啊
But as I've never met you before, my opinion on the matter is of limited value.

在我的家乡 迎接宾客的是厅堂内的礼遇 而非门外的羞辱
Where I come from, guests are treated with respect, not insulted at the gates.

那么 或许您应该启程回乡才是
Then perhaps you should return to where you come from.

你答应了要接待我们
You promised to receive me.

我们是接待了你们
We have received you.

你我同在此 眼下不正是接待? 
Here we are, and here you are.

如果你不让我们进城 我们全都活不下去
If you do not let us in, all of us will die.

对此我们深表遗憾
Which we shall deeply regret.

但古往今来 最伟大的魁尔斯城 岂能为多斯拉克蛮子敞开大门? 
But Qarth did not become the greatest city that ever was or will be by letting Dothraki savages through its gates.

卡丽熙 请您小心说话
Khaleesi, please be careful.

他日吾龙成器 定将归来取走本应属于我的东西 摧毁那些未曾公正待我之人
When my dragons are grown, we will take back what was stolen from me and destroy those who have wronged me.

燎原御敌 怒火焚城
We will lay waste to armies and burn cities to the ground.

拒我于城外者 将第一个葬身火海
Turn us away and we will burn you first.

真不愧是个坦格利安
You are a true Targaryen.

可惜 正如你刚才所说 如果我们不让你们进城 你们全都活不下去 所以…
Only, as you said a moment ago, if we don't let you into the city, you will all die. And so...

一个小姑娘就让你怕得关门大吉 这作风可配不上 古往今来最伟大的城市
Retreating in fear from a little girl is unbecoming of the greatest city that ever was or will be.

讨论已经结束 札罗・赞旺・达梭斯
The discussion is over, Xaro Xhoan Daxos.

十三巨子已经发完言了
The Thirteen have spoken.

我也是十三巨子之一
I am one of the Thirteen

札罗・赞旺・达梭斯 而我还有话要说
'十三巨子'之一 and I am still speaking.

这个小女孩威胁说要焚我城池 难道你想请她入城品酒不成? 
The girl threatens to burn our city to the ground and you would invite her in for a cup of wine?

她是龙之母
She is the Mother of Dragons.

你认为她眼睁睁地看着子民挨饿 还能无动于衷吗? 
Do you expect her to watch her people starve without breathing fire?

放这区区几十名多斯拉克人进城 就能毁了大家不成? 
I believe we can allow a few Dothraki through our gates without dooming our city.

况且 我也是蛮族出身 从盛夏群岛到了这里 魁尔斯还不是屹立如初? 
After all, here I am, a savage from the Summer Isles, and Qarth still stands.

我们已经决定了
Our decision is final.

我以律法之名 为她 她的子民和她的龙担保
I will vouch for her, her people, and her dragons in accordance with the law.

夫人 欢迎来到魁尔斯
Welcome to Qarth, My Lady.

村里藏有金子吗? 银子呢? 
Is there gold or silver in the village?

我不是村里人 无旗兄弟会在哪? 
I'm not from the village.    Where is the Brotherhood?

我不知道什么兄弟会
I don't know what that is.

你们两个 把泰温大人的东西送到他的住处
You two, take Lord Lannister's things to his quarters.

我们以为您明天才会到 泰温大人
We weren't expecting you till tomorrow, Lord Tywin.

为什么不把犯人关进牢房? 
Why are these prisoners not in their cells?

牢房已经满了 大人
Cells are overflowing,My Lord.

这群人在这里待不了多久
This lot won't be here long.

不需要为他们准备固定的牢房
Don't need no permanent place.

审讯完之后 通常就…
After we interrogate 'em, we usually just...

难道我们人手太多?  多得要将年轻劳力和娴熟工匠弃之不用? 
Are we so wellmanned that we can afford to discard able young bodies and skilled laborers?

你 有什么手艺吗? 
You,do you have a trade?

看什么看! 跪下!
What are you looking at?Kneel!

跪下! 不然把你的心肺挖出来 小子
Kneel or I'll carve your lungs out, boy.

'他'不会照做的
He'll do no such thing.

这个'他'是个女孩 你这白痴 穿着男孩的衣服
This one's a girl,you idiot, dressed as a boy.

为什么?   上路更安全 大人
Why?    Safer to travel, My Lord.

这帮贱种里难得出个机灵鬼
More than I can say for this lot.

给这些人安排活干
Get these prisoners to work.

我需要个新侍酒
I need a new cupbearer.

你可是稀客 堂弟
Your visits are too few, cousin.

摄政太后陛下 命令你即刻释放派席尔大学士
Her Grace,the Queen Regent, commands you to release Grand Maester Pycelle.

这是陛下的授权状 原来如此
Here's your warrant.   So it is.

陪我喝一杯如何? 
Will you take a cup with me?

我发现喝温酒有助于睡眠
I find that mulled wine helps me sleep.

我代表陛下前来宣令 不是来跟你喝酒的 小恶魔
I am here at her Grace's behest, not to drink with you, Imp.

如果我亲爱的姐姐真那么在乎派席尔
If my sister was so concerned for Pycelle,

我觉得她似乎应该亲自来
I would have thought she'd come herself.

但她却派了你
Instead she sends you.

对此 我该作何理解? 
What am I to make of that?

随你怎么理解 只须你马上放人
I don't care what you make of it, so long as you release your prisoner immediately.

你是直接从瑟曦那里得到的命令? 
And you've received these instructions directly from Cersei?

我说了不止一次
As I said several times.

而你却等了这么久才来传达给我? 
And you've waited this long to deliver the information?

摄政太后给我下达命令之后 我毫无延误地将其带给你
When the Queen Regent gives me a command, I carry it out without delay.

瑟曦对你的信任可见一斑 在狼时这么个当口 还允许你进她的闺房
Cersei must have great trust in you, allowing you into her chamber during the hour of the wolf.

摄政太后重任在肩
The Queen Regent has a great many responsibilities.

常常通宵达旦地忙于公事
She often works from dusk till dawn.

有你通宵达旦地帮她 她一定非常欢喜
She must be very glad to have you helping her from dusk till dawn.

打小她就喜欢薰衣草精油
She always loved lavender oil, even as a girl.

难怪 抹了圣油的骑士啊
An anointed Knight, yes.

告诉我 瑟曦封你作骑士 是上床前还是上床后呐? 
Tell me, did Cersei have you knighted before or after she took you into her bed?

怎么? 没话说了? 
What? Nothing to say?

就不会对我来点抗议么 爵士? 
No more warnings for me, Ser?

你必须收回这些下流的指控
You will withdraw these filthy accusations.

拜托 你有没有想过 假如我告诉乔佛里 你睡了他老妈 他会有何看法呢? 
Have you ever given any thought to what King Joffrey will have to say when he finds out you've been bedding his mother?

是她强迫的你? 
Did she take you against your will?

你不会自卫吗 骑士? 
Can you not defend yourself, Knight?

是您父亲 泰温大人 从我当上国王的侍从那天起 他就嘱咐我一切听太后差遣
Your own father, Lord Tywin, when I was named the King's squire, he told me to obey her in everything.

包括嘱咐你和她上床 嗯? 
Did he tell you to fuck her, too?

我的意思是 我只是奉命
I only meant I did as I was bid.

但是却痛恨这一切 你指望我相信这个? 
Hated every moment of it, is that what you'll have me believe?

朝廷的高位 骑士的身份 我姐姐夜里为你张开的双腿
A high place in court, a knighthood, my sister's legs spreading open for you at night.

哦 是啊 这一切对你来说太糟糕了
Oh, yes, it must have been terrible.

等在这里 等国王陛下来亲自裁决
Wait here. His Grace will want to hear this.

发发慈悲吧! 大人 求求您
Mercy! Mercy, My Lord! I beg you.

省省吧 这些话给乔佛里说去 他最喜欢听别人苦苦哀求
Save it for Joffrey. He loves a good grovel.

大人 这些都是令姐 太后陛下的命令
My Lord, it was your sister's bidding the Queen.

我会立刻离开都城 我发誓
I'll leave the city at once, I swear.

我想不必 大人? 
No, I think not.    My Lord?

我父亲不是要你遵从她么
My father told you to obey my sister.

留在她的身边 保持她的信任
Stay close to her side. Keep her trust.

随时满足她的需求
Pleasure her whenever she requires.

之前的事情不会有人知道 只要你忠诚于我
No one ever need know as long as you keep faith with me.

而回报呢 我想知道瑟曦在干什么 去了哪里 见了谁 谈了些什么 所有的一切
I want to know what Cersei is doing, where she goes, who she sees, what they talk ofeverything.

你都必须告诉我
And you will tell me.

行 大人 我会的
Yes, My Lord, I will.

我发誓 照您说的做
I swear it, as you command.

为我们的共识干一杯
Let us drink to our understanding.

哦 你没有杯子 那就算了
Oh, you don't have a cup. Oh, well.

开心点 堂弟 我姐姐是个大美人
Smile, cousin. My sister is a beautiful woman.

而你做的一切都是为了国家
And it's all for the good of the realm.

回去告诉她 我恳求她的原谅 我不希望我们之间有任何矛盾 从今往后
Go back and tell her that I beg her forgiveness, that I want no more conflict between us and that henceforth

未经她同意 我不会轻举妄动
I shall do nothing without her consent.

噢 我会把派席尔还给她
Oh, I'll give her Pycelle.

是吗?  是的 我明天就放人
You will?  Yes, I'll release him in the morning.

如果她愿意 瑟曦可以把他当宠物养 但是绝不能让他留在御前会议
Cersei can keep him as a pet if she wants, but I will not have him on the council.

我可以保证 他毫'发'无伤 不过严格说起来 这不算实话
I could swear that I had not harmed a single hair on his head, but that would not, strictly speaking, be true.

保持船距 保持队形
Stay within one table length.

你的指骨给你带来好运了吗? 
Do your knucklebones bring you luck?

自从您把它们切掉以来 我过的一直不赖 陛下
Well, life's been good since you hacked them off, Your Grace.

而且省了清理四坨指甲的功夫
And it's four less fingernails to clean.

省了清理'四枚'指甲的功夫
Four fewer fingernails to clean.

不明白你为什么要一直带着它们
Never understood why you had to wear them.

它提醒着我曾经的出身 我现在的身份
It reminds me of where I come from and where I am now.

以及您的公正无私
It reminds me of your justice.

您对我的惩罚很公正 而且切肉的刀您也用的很好
It was an honest punishment and you were good with the cleaver.

你既是个英雄也是个走私贩
You were a hero and a smuggler.

善行并不能抵消恶行 恶行也不能掩盖善行
A good act does not wash out the bad, nor a bad the good.

这正是我想让儿子学到的
A lesson I've tried to teach my son.

他听你的吗?  听我的? 
Does he listen?  To me?

但如果是您的红袍女让他从鸦巢上跳下去…
But if your red woman told him to leap from the crow's nest

我相信你还没有忘记走私者的把戏吧
I trust you've not forgotten your smuggler's tricks.

我已奉公守法生活了十七
I've lived within the law for 17

我需要你再做一次走私者
I want you to be a smuggler this time.

随时随地都可以
Any shore, any night.

需要我走私什么? 
What am I bringing ashore?

不许告诉任何人 我们之间也不得再提此事
No one must know what you do and we'll not speak of this again.

我是您忠诚的仆人 陛下 永远都是 但肯定还有别的办法 更讲求荣誉的办法
I am true to Your Grace and always will be, but surely there are other ways, cleaner ways.

讲求荣誉无法赢得战争
Cleaner ways don't win wars.

你害怕吗 洋葱骑士
Are you afraid,onion knight?

有人告诉我 长夜黑暗 处处险恶
Someone once told me the night is dark and full of terrors.

做走私贩的时候你曾运过更讨厌的货物吧
You've carried more unpleasant cargo in your time.

你是个好人吗 戴佛斯・席沃斯爵士? 
Are you a good man,Ser Davos Seaworth?

我只能说说我是个复杂的人 夫人 好坏参半
I'd say my parts are mixed, My Lady good and bad.

如果一个洋葱有一半腐烂发黑 那它就是一个烂洋葱
If half an onion is black with rot, it's a rotten onion.

一个人非善即恶
A man is good or he is evil.

那么你是?  哦 当然是好人
And which are you?   Oh, good.

我也算某种形式的骑士 光明与生命的斗士
I'm a Knight myself of sorts, a champion of light and life.

哦 那对你来说一定感觉不错
Well, that must be very nice for you.

你爱自己的妻子吗?  是的
Do you love your wife?    I do.

但你却结识过其他的女人
Yet you have known other women.

别扯上我的妻子
Don't talk about my wife.

我没有说她 我是说其他女人
I'm not. I'm talking about other women.

你想看这长袍下的身体
You want to see what's beneath this robe.

光之王真是奇怪 竟然让您在暗影中行事
Strange that this Lord of Light asks you to work in the shadows.

黑暗处可是没有影子的 戴佛斯爵士
Shadows cannot live in the dark, Ser Davos.

影子是光明的仆人 烈焰的子孙
They are servants of light, the children of fire.

惟有最耀眼的火光 方能映照出最黑暗的阴影
And the brighter the flame,the darker they are.

这里本来没有栅栏 他们堵住了通道
These weren't here before.They've barred the passage.

这阻挡不了我们
They can't bar our passage.

只有一位真神 戴佛斯爵士 他只保佑侍奉他的人 你发誓?   以圣母之名
There's only one God,Ser Davos, and he only protects those who serve him.  you swear it? by the Mother.

我儿对铁王座毫无兴趣
My son has no interest in the Iron Throne.

那我们之间就没有理由敌对了
Then I see no reason for hostility between us.

您儿子可以继续自封为北境之王 卡林湾以北都将属于史塔克家族
Your son can go on calling himself King in the North, the Starks will have dominion over all lands North of Moat Cailin,

只要他宣誓效忠于我
Provided he swears me an oath of fealty.

宣誓什么? 
And the wording of this oath?

跟十八年前奈德·史塔克对劳勃的宣誓一样
The same Ned Stark swore to Robert 18 years ago.

凯特 他们的友谊曾让王国归于一统
Cat, their friendship held the kingdoms together.

那么 若我儿效忠 将有何回报? 
And in return for my son's loyalty?

明天早晨我将会击溃我哥哥的军队
In the morning i'll destroy my brother's army.

拜拉席恩和史塔克将会并肩作战
Baratheon and Stark will fight

对付共同的敌人
Their common enemy together,

就像以往的许多次一样
As they have done many times before.

我们两家素来亲近
Our two houses have always been close,

因此我恳请您重新考虑一下
Which is why I am begging you to reconsider this battle.

终止战争 与您的哥哥谈判议和吧

他们说他是不死的
They say he can't be killed.

那么你信这些话么?

凡人皆有一死
Anyone can be killed.

A girl keeps her mouth closed.

朋友之间说悄悄话 好不好? 
And friends may talk in secret, yes?

小子变做女孩
A boy becomes a girl.

某人早就知道
And I was always aware.

但女孩有秘密
But the girl keeps secrets.

某人不说破
It is not for a man to spoil them.

你现在跟他们一伙
You're one of them now.

早知道我就让你烧死算了
I should have let you burn.

现在你给他们取水
And you fetch water for one of them now.

我没得选择
I didn't have a choice.

某人要还债
A man pays his debts.

红神是债主 可爱的女孩
The Red God takes what is his, lovely girl.

惟有死亡方能换取生命
And only death may pay for life.

女孩救了某人和另外两人
You saved me and the two I was with.

女孩取走三条本属于红神的命
You stole three deaths from the Red God.

就得拿三条命来偿还

某人去办事
And the man will do the rest.

你有三条命 不多也不少

No more, no less, and we're done.

我不知道他的名字

They call him the Tickler.

他本应找到我们 吹响号角
He'd have seen us, blown the horn.

断掌自会掌握好时间
The Halfhand does things in his own time.

我叔叔跟我讲过他的故事
My uncle told me stories about him.

那些故事大多是真事
Most of them are true.

我听说上次冬天 断掌有一半时间都在长城之外
I heard the Halfhand spent half of last winter beyond the wall.

他被大雪堵在了风声峡以北
He was North of the Skirling Pass when the snows came.

只好等到冰雪消融

这么说独自一人在这里活下去也不是不可能啊

如果是断掌 的确有可能

Gilly would love it here.

没什么比恋爱中的男人更恶心了
There's nothing more sickening than a man in love.

手脚不要停下

至少会暖和点
At least you'll keep warm.

先民拳峰
The fist of the First Men.

那时坦格利安还没征服安达尔人

Thousands and thousands of years ago,

先民们就站在我们现在所站的位置上

度过漫漫长夜
All through the long night.

不过应该差不离

这种物质火焰极热

可以烧融木头 石头 甚至钢铁

是啊 但是他们说你那个赶着马车卖胡椒的祖父 却最终娶到了 一位远比他可爱并且出身高贵的女士

但是当火焰燃尽

好吧 女士 但别用我的船
Yes, My Lady, but not with my ships.

谁教你识字的?

我也教过我儿詹姆认字
I taught my son Jaime to read.

有一天学士来找我 跟我说他没有学
The Maester came to me one day, told me he wasn't learning.

他记不住字母
He couldn't make sense of the letters.

拼写什么的一团糟
He reversed them in his head.

学士说他听过这种怪病 建议我们只能听之任之

在那之后 我让詹姆 每天练字四小时 直到学会为止

他因此而恨过我一段时间

但是他要去通知泰温了 他已经走了

陛下  陛下

尊敬的陛下
My honor, Your Grace.

我不确定我算不算小姐
I'm not sure I'm a lady.

我还不是很熟悉维斯特洛的风俗
Westerosi customs are still a bit foreign to me.

那些庞杂的规则的确难以记忆
It's hard to keep all the rules straight.

不过若我没记错的话 贵族出身的女性通常被称作小姐 除非 她是女王 或者公主
But if I remember my lessons, a woman of noble birth is always called a lady unless she's a queen or a princess.

我可以找到了解这些的人
I could find someone who knows.

你怎么这么肯定我是贵族出身? 
Why are you so sure I'm of noble birth?

这很明显
Because it's obvious.

如果我告诉你我父亲是在桥边卖缎带的小贩 而我和母亲 兄弟一起住在我们的商店上面呢? 
What if I told you my father sold lace on the long bridge and my mother, my brother, and I lived with him above our shop?

一个真正的贵族可不会指责淑女的不实
Not very noble to accuse a lady of dishonesty.

我一直认为我是个骗术高手
I always thought I was a brilliant liar.

恐怕还是您的截肢技术更高明一些
Better at amputations, I'm afraid.

我们会在这里停留很久么? 
Will we be here long?

我不能跟您讨论关于军队行进的问题
I couldn't really discuss troop movements with you.

奸细当然不会承认自己的身份

说得没错 被你发现了

Lowborn girls say 'M'lord,' not 'My Lord.'

那天的事情我仍历历在目 您的头盔 您的战马 就在栅栏旁泥地上的标线 您把巴隆·史文爵士敲下马 太阳正在天空照耀 当您把盾牌交给我时 我还清晰的记得那上面的凹痕
I remember everything about that day your helmet, your horse, the rake line in the dirt along the list, where the sun was in the sky when you knocked Balon Swann from his horse, and the dent in your shield when you handed it back to me.

这些事情我都至死难忘

And I couldn't bear to tell them what it had been like squiring for you when I knew that they could never have the faintest idea what I was talking about.

I couldn't imagine being able to fight like that, not back then.

I don't need to explain how that felt, not to you.

就像步入一个梦境 一个你从记事起就从未停止幻想的梦境 并且发现它甚至 比自己的生命更真实
It's like stepping into a dream you've been dreaming for as long as you can remember and finding out that the dream is more real than your life.

离开那个战场之后 日子天天像坐牢一样难受
Leaving that battlefield was like being dragged off to prison.

I didn't have your gift.

He once told me that being a Lord is like being a father, except you have thousands of children and you worry about all of them.

犁地的农民 待你守护

擦地的女佣 待你守护
The charwomen scrubbing the floors, yours to protect.

他告诉我 每日他于恐惧中醒来 于恐惧中睡去
He told me he woke with fear in the morning and went to bed with fear in the night.

我不相信
I didn't believe him.

真希望我可以见见他

This a man cannot do.

你保证过会帮我的
You promised you'd help me.

某人可没保证帮你 可爱的女孩
Help was not promised, lovely girl.

某人只保证杀人 女孩可以有其他人选
Only death. There must be others.

某人要名字 任谁都可以
Give a name, any name.

然后你就会杀了他们? 
And you'll kill them?

奉新生七神及诸多远古神祗之名
By the seven New Gods and the Old Gods beyond counting,

女孩给的是某人的名字? 
A girl gives a man his own name?

没错, 诸神不可轻慢
That's right. Gods are not mocked.

女孩莫玩笑, 我没开玩笑
This is no joking thing. I'm not joking.

某人自杀吧
A man can go kill himself.

只要你帮我和朋友逃跑
If you help me and my friends escape.

这可不只一条人命
This would require more than one life.

这可跟说好的不一样, 那好 贾昆・赫加尔
This is not part of our bargain. Fine, Jaqen H'ghar.

某人从命 但女孩得遵从指示
If I do this thing, a girl must obey.

女孩和朋友今夜就能逃离
A girl and her friends will walk through the gate at midnight.

我对怪胎总是充满同情
I have a certain sympathy for odd little boys.

这鳗鱼派真棒
Excellent lamprey pie.

难道你在厨房忙活了一整天? 
Were you slaving away in the kitchen all day?

我听说乔佛里在备战
I hear Joffrey plans on fighting.

这可是对部队的激励啊
An inspiration for the troops.

穿着金灿盔甲的年青国王 为了保卫都城抵抗邪恶老叛逆
The young king in his shining armor fighting to defend the capital against the wicked old rebel.

更小的孩子都在为他而战呢
Younger boys are off fighting his war.

詹姆十七岁的时候在干嘛?  总比你强
Remember Jaime at 17? Better than you.

有些人就是有干这事儿的天赋 有些没有
Some men have a gift for this sort of thing, some don't.

他不适合战场
His place is not on the battlefield.

也不适合王位 对我们来说都太不幸喽
It's not on the throne, either, sadly for all of us.

你当我是白痴么? 
Do you think I'm an idiot?

不 我会说你的智力起码高于平均水平
No, I'd say you possess above average intelligence.

你把我唯一的女儿装船送人
You shipped off my only daughter.

现在又要我的长子去战场送死
And now you want to send my eldest son to the battlefield to die.

他有御林铁卫保护
He'll have his Kingsguard protecting him.

他还有最好的盔甲护身
He has the finest armor gold can buy.

他必须得上战场
He needs to be out there.

人们愿意为一个能与他们 风雨同舟的国王奋战 才不会拥护一个躲在母亲裙下的国王
The men will fight more fiercely seeing their king fighting beside them instead of hiding behind his mother's skirts.

你知道瓦里斯为何这么危险? 
Do you know why Varys is so dangerous?

因为他拥有上千眼线? 
Because he has thousands of spies in his employ.

因为他能预知我们的行动? 
Because he knows everything we do before we do it.

因为他没那话儿
Because he doesn't have a cock.

或许我也算个危险人物
Perhaps I'm dangerous, too.

但你呢 跟其他男人一样 大傻瓜一个
You, on the other hand, are as big a fool as every other man.

一半时间是用两腿之间的小软虫 思考
That little worm between your legs does half your thinking.

其实它没那么小
It's not that little.

什么事儿让你这么高兴? 
And why are you happy?

因为我搞到了你的小妓女
Because I have your little whore.

我还以为你只喜欢金头发的呢
I thought you preferred blondes.

你真是个小丑
Such a droll little fellow.

告诉我 你有没有跟这一位结婚啊? 
Tell me, have you married this one yet?

太好了 那父亲可就放心了
Oh, good. Father will be so pleased.

你管我操谁呢? 
Why do you care who I fuck?

兰尼斯特有债必还
Because a Lannister always pays her debts.

你偷走了我仅有的女儿 你密谋加害乔佛里
You stole my only daughter, you plot to have Joffrey killed.

你疯了么 史坦尼斯不日即到
This is madness. Stannis will be here in days.

你需要我, 要你作甚? 
You need me. For what?

你很能打? 
Your skill in battle?

你的婊子挺漂亮
Pretty thing, your whore.

瘀伤会很快愈合
The bruises will heal in time.

你从哪儿找到她的? 
Where did you find her?

瓦里斯可不是唯一一个拥有情报网的人
Varys isn't the only one who hears whispers.

你竟然把我们的狮子项链也给她? 
Really, a Lannister lion necklace?

你可得把你的婊子藏的更仔细才好
You need to hide your secret whores more carefully.

你显然忘了婊子们的特点
You've forgotten the most important thing about whores.

你才是专家
Well, you're the expert.

婊子买不来 操一个换一个
You don't buy them; You only rent them.

宝贝弟弟 你平时说谎可没这么差劲
You're usually a better liar, baby brother.

非常喜欢
You like her very much.

别担心 她会受到优待的 除非 乔佛里受伤
Don't worry, she'll be treated gently enough...  unless Joffrey is hurt.

那么他所遭受的一切都会在她身上重演
And then every wound he suffers she'll suffer, too.

若他死了 那你的小婊子会死得很痛苦 超出任何人的想象
And if he dies, there isn't a man alive who could devise a more painful death for your little cunt.

我怎么知道她是死是活? 
And how do I know you haven't killed her already?

你想见见她? 
Would you like to see her?

曼登爵士 把我弟弟的妓女带来
Ser Mandon, bring in my brother's whore.

我很抱歉他们伤了你
I'm sorry they hurt you.

我一定会来救你
I promise I will free you.

我会为此报仇的
I will hurt you for this.

总有一天 当你自以为平安快活时 喜乐会在嘴里化成灰烬
A day will come when you think you're safe and happy and your joy will turn to ashes in your mouth.

到那时 你将明白债已偿还
And you will know the debt is paid.

我都等了一晚上了
I've been waiting all night.

那你为什么如此悲伤? 
Then why do you look sad?

我们得更加小心才行
We have to be more careful.

别担心 我能照顾好自己
Don't be afraid. I can take care of myself.

有人想要加害于我
There are people who want to hurt me.

我知道 我不会允许的
I know. I won't let them.

我会划破他们的脸 我绝对会
I'll cut off their faces. I will.

我愿意为你杀人 你知道吗? 
I would kill for you. Do you know that?

在这事儿完结之前 也许我还真需要这么做
I expect I'll have to before this is over.

我属于你 而你也属于我
I'm yours, and you are mine.

我们已经派出了一打渡鸦了
We've sent a dozen ravens.

我的私生子不日即能赶到临冬城
My bastard is only a few days from Winterfell.

一旦他攻下城堡, 我弟弟还在席恩手里
Once he captures the castle Theon has my brothers.

如果我们强攻城堡, 他不敢伤害王子们
If we storm the castle He wouldn't dare hurt the boys.

这可是他能活着逃离北境的唯一筹码
They're his only hope of escaping the North with his head.

告诉你儿子
Send word to your son.

只要铁民投降 他们就可以平安归家
Any Ironborn who surrender will be allowed to return safely to their homes.

一点慈悲确实是美德 陛下 但是太多的话就
A touch of mercy is a virtue, Your Grace. Too much

席恩・葛雷乔伊得不到我的慈悲
Any ironborn with the exception of Theon Greyjoy.

他背叛了我们的事业
He betrayed our cause.

无论逃到何处 我们都将找到他
And we will hunt him down no matter where he runs.

我倒是希望他的同胞知道条件后 会立刻背叛他
I expect his countrymen will turn on him the minute they hear the offer.

打扰了 大人 陛下
Your pardon, My Lord. Your Grace.

我的母亲被我关了起来
I've had to arrest my mother.

我的妹妹们在兰尼斯特手里
The Lannisters have my sisters.

我以为最要好的朋友 强占了我的家园 抓住了我弟弟们
The man I considered my closest friend has seized my home and my brothers.

战争还在继续 向南还是向北 进退两难
I'm fighting a war and I don't know if I should march south or north.

真抱歉 我的问题太蠢了
I'm sorry. It was a stupid question.

你出于好意 我不该
You're being kind. I have no right.

你拥有所有权力
You have every right.

我并不想做这样的国王
That's not the kind of king I want to be.

您想做哪样的国王? 
What kind do you want to be?

我不知道 好的那种吧
I don't know. The good kind.

大部分国王都是从王子长成的
Most kings grew up as princes.

他们一生都在为继承王位做准备
They spend their whole lives preparing for the crown.

而我 只是被教导如何成为临冬城公爵
I was raised to be Lord of Winterfell.

我只被教导如何成为一个淑女 一位会演奏竖琴 会跳最新潮的舞蹈 会背诵瓦雷利亚古诗的淑女
I was raised to be a proper little lady, to play the harp and dance the latest steps and recite Valyrian poetry.

我想听你演奏竖琴
I'd like to hear you play the harp.

不 不 你听不下去的
No. No, you would not.

你是怎么从背诵瓦雷利亚古诗 换成给人锯腿么? 
How did you go from reciting Valyrian poetry to sawing off men's feet?

我十二岁时 我父母去参加一个婚礼
When I was 12, my mother and father went to a wedding.

你要知道 在瓦兰提斯 婚礼通常能持续好几天
Weddings in Volantis last for days, you know.

他们把我和弟弟留在家里
And they left me with my little brother.

他们走后的第二天 是三年的长夏里最热的一天
The second afternoon they were gone was the hottest day in the threeyear summer.

我们在屋里热得受不了 就跑去洛恩河消暑
We couldn't bear to be inside, so we ran down to the Rhoyne.

那天 瓦兰提斯所有的孩子都在洛恩河玩耍
Every child in Volantis was in the Rhoyne that day.

富人 穷人 我们都聚集在一起 大家都赤裸着 大笑着 竞相往小岛游去
The rich, the poor, we were all there, naked, screaming, racing to the little islands.

鼓手们在东岸击鼓助威
Drummers were playing for coppers on the east bank.

当时我踩着水 和朋友聊天 突然我发现弟弟不见了
I was treading water, talking to a friend when I realized I hadn't seen my brother.

接着呼唤变为了哭喊
Then I started screaming his name.

终于 我看到他了 面朝下 浮在水面
And then I saw him floating facedown.

我的心跳… 瞬间停止了
My heart just... stopped.

我把他拽上来
I dragged him from the water.

也许我朋友也帮我了吧
My friend helped me, I think.

我都记不清了
I don't even remember.

我们把他拖到河岸上 对着他哭喊 摇他的肩膀 可是他死了
Then we pulled him onto the riverbank...  and I screamed at him and I shook him and he was dead.

他脸上有鱼形的纹身
He had a fish tattoo on his face.

在瓦兰提斯 只有奴隶才有纹身 这样就算不问 你也能清楚他们的身份
In Volantis the slaves have tattoos so you know what they are without having to talk to them.

这个人就是为一艘渔船服务的
And this man worked on a fishing boat.

他一把将我推开
And he pushed me out of the way.

你得明白 若是一个奴隶敢推开贵族女孩 就意味着死亡 可怕的死亡
You have to understand, for a slave to push a highborn girl that's death for the man, a terrible death.

但是他将我推开 然后开始按压弟弟的胸膛 一而再 再而三 直到我弟弟把半条洛恩河 都吐了出来 直到他能哭喊出声
But he pushed me out of the way and he started pressing on my brother's chest again and again and again until my brother spat out half of the Rhoyne and cried out.

那个男人摸着他的头安慰着他
And the man cradled his head and told him to be calm.

那天 我做了两个决定
I decided two things that day.

我不会再把自己的青春 浪费在贵族小姐的假面舞会上
I would not waste my years planning dances and masquerades with the other noble ladies.

等到成年
And when I came of age...

我也必将远离那些奴隶城邦
I would never live in a slave city again.

我很抱歉 陛下
I'm sorry, Your Grace.

您向我诉说您的困境 我却只是沉缅于旧日的回忆之中
You told me of your problems and I've blathered on.

我不想和那个佛雷家的女孩结婚
I don't want to marry the Frey girl.

我也不愿看到你和她结婚
I don't want you to marry her.

但你需要佛雷家的桥
But you needed that bridge.

我希望那是座非常美丽的桥
I hope it's a very beautiful bridge.

捣烂的酸樱桃都准备好了
The sour cherries was all crushed up and ready.

或许已经在馅饼皮里了
Probably in the piecrust by now.

在烤炉里 温暖的烤炉里
In the oven, the nice warm oven.

闭嘴 你带了些什么过来? 
Shut up. What did you bring?

我要是拿奶酪就好了
The cheese could be better.

虽然香肠也不错
I did get some nice sausages.

他想让我们拿那些守卫怎么办? 
What did he want us to do about those guards?

他只是说 '穿过那座大门'
He just said, 'walk through the gates.

那守卫怎么办? 
What about the guards?

他没说守卫怎么办
He didn't say anything about the guards.

什么 他把这事给漏了么? 
What, he left that bit out?

这是挺重要的一部分 不对吗? 
It's a pretty important part, don't you think?

我们必须相信他, 相信他? 
We have to trust him. Trust him?

你相信他能帮我们打 就放他走了 然后他就不见了, 我想回厨房去
You trusted him to fight with us and you set him free and he ran. I want to go back to the kitchens.

闭嘴 如果你害怕了 就留在这里
Shut up. Stay here if you're afraid.

只要风不停 我们明天就能到君临
If the wind holds, we'll reach King's landing in a day.

我不能替风向您保证 陛下
Can't make promises for the wind, Your Grace.

我尊敬你 戴佛斯爵士
I admire you, Ser Davos.

谢谢您 陛下 承蒙您的夸奖
I thank you, Your Grace. Pleased to hear it.

有些贵族傻瓜叫你洋葱骑士 而且以为这是侮辱你
Some highborn fools call you Onion Knight and think they insult you.

你就真的把洋葱作为你的家徽 绣在你的衣服上 画在你的旗子上
So you take the onion for your Sigil, sew it on your coat, fly the onion flag.

我儿子希望我能把它改掉
My son wishes me to change it.

改成三条拿着三叉戟的人鱼 诸如此类
Three mermen with tridents, something like that.

我理解为什么那些古老的家族都看不起我
I understand why the older families look down at me.

我父亲是个捕蟹人, 还有呢? 
My father was a crabber. And?

唔 领主的儿子不愿意和捕蟹人的儿子共餐
Well, sons of Lords don't like to break bread with sons of crabbers.

那么 当风息堡内忧外困的时候 他们在哪里? 
And where were those Lords when Storm's End starved?

有很多在为令兄奋勇征战
Many fought bravely for your brother.

也有不少在为疯王打仗
Many fought for the Mad King.

你为那些背后羞辱过你的人辩护
You defend these men who insult you behind your back.

有些人喜欢当着我的面羞辱我
Some are happy to do it to my face.

劳勃和奈德・史塔克 他们才是英雄 伟大的反叛 一场接一场的战斗 把无数城镇从疯王的压迫中解救出来 而我则率五百人守护风息堡
Robert and Ned Starkthey were the heroes, the glorious rebels marching from battle to battle, liberating towns from the yoke of the Mad King while I held Storm's End with 500 men.

没有人忘记过您 陛下, 没有么? 劳勃忘了
No one has forgotten, Your Grace. No? Robert did.

战后他把风息堡给了蓝礼
He gave Storm's End to Renly after the war.

蓝礼从未打过仗
Renly never fought a day in his life.

那为什么劳勃把风息堡给了他? 
Then why'd he give him Storm's End?

首先是马肉
First we ate the horses.

城堡被围困 马匹已无用武之地
We weren't riding anyway, not with the castle surrounded.

与其让马饿死 还不如宰了吃肉
We couldn't feed them, so fine, the horses.

然后是猫肉 我从来没有喜欢过猫
Then the cats. Never liked cats.

所以轮到猫了 我喜欢狗
So fine. I do like dogs.

不过我们照吃不误 然后是老鼠
But we ate them. Then the rats.

在你摸进来的前一晚
The night before you slipped through,

我妻子已经快不行了
I thought my wife was dying.

她说不了话 非常虚弱
She couldn't speak anymore, she was so frail.

然后你穿过了封锁线
And then you made it through the lines.

黑色小船装满了洋葱
Slipped right through in your little black sailboat with your onions.

应该还有土豆和咸牛肉
And potatoes. Some salted beef, I believe.

那一夜 风息堡的每个人都恨不得亲你一口
Every man in Storm's End wanted to kiss you that night.

幸好他们没有那样做
I was relieved they did not.

劳勃告诉我要守住风息堡 而我做到了
Robert told me to hold Storm's End, so I held it.

然后他说要把它交给蓝礼 我也照办了
Then he told me he was giving it to Renly, so I gave it up.

不管这是侮辱还是别的什么 我照办了 因为劳勃是我的长兄 是国王 我永远都会尽我应尽的责任
Insult or no, I gave it up because Robert was my older brother and he was the king and I've always done my duty.

但现在 依照所有维斯特洛的律法 我才是正统的国王
But now I'm the rightful king by every law of Westeros.

当我坐上铁王座的时候 你会成为我的首相
And when I sit the Iron Throne, you'll be my Hand.

我必将忠心侍奉您
I pray I serve you well.

你将是第一个佩戴这枚徽章的捕蟹人之子
I expect you'll be the first crabber's son to wear the badge.

你是情报总管
You're the master of whisperers.

你理应知道所有的事情
You're supposed to know everything.

没有人能在同一时间出现在所有地方
No man can be in all rooms at all times.

我在北境安插了不少人手 陛下 但是自从席恩・葛雷乔伊控制了临冬城 我就再也没听到他们的消息
I have many little birds in the North, My Lord, but I haven't heard their songs since Theon Greyjoy captured Winterfell.

史塔克家族的精力被分散了
The Stark forces are distracted.

现在是发起进攻的时刻了
Now is the time to strike.

我亲爱的外甥 你不是也看到了 这些人在修的城墙是防守用的
My dear nephew, you do see these men preparing the walls for siege?

你不是知道史坦尼斯・拜拉席恩的舰队马上就到了么? 
You do understand Stannis Baratheon sails this way?

如果我的史坦尼斯叔叔在君临的海岸登陆
If my Uncle Stannis lands on the shores of King's Landing,

我将亲自前去问候他
I'll ride out to greet him.

真是一个勇敢的决定 陛下
A brave choice, Your Grace.

我很确定你的人马会紧紧跟在你的身后的
I'm sure your men will line up behind you.

他们说史坦尼斯从来不笑
They say Stannis never smiles.

我会给他划一个红色的微笑 从左耳根到右耳根
I'll give him a red smile from ear to ear.

想象一下史坦尼斯的恐惧吧
Imagine Stannis's terror.

你是个聪明人
You're an intelligent man.

不谦虚地说 我也是个聪明人
I'd like to think I'm an intelligent man.

哦 大人 此事毋庸置疑 即使是平时轻视你的人也不会怀疑
Oh, no one disputes that, My Lord, not even the multitudes who despise you.

我希望我们两个聪明人能收起谎言 好好谈谈
I wish we could converse as two honest, intelligent men.

乐意之至
I wish we could, too.

要玩游戏的话 得从你开始
If we're going to play, you'll have to start.

我哥哥是史上最年轻的御林铁卫
My brother was the youngest Kingsguard in history.

我姐姐十九岁就成为了王后
My sister became queen at the age of 19.

而当我成年的时候 我的父亲任命我 看护凯岩城的给排水系统
When I reached manhood, my father put me in charge of all the drains and cisterns in Casterly Rock.

一位高贵的水管工
A most highborn plumber.

管道从来没有那么畅通
The water never flowed better.

所有的粪便都顺利排进大海
And all the shit found its way to the sea.

我从来未曾妄想过得到任何实权
I never expected to have any real power.

所以当父亲任命我为代理首相的时候
So when my father named me acting Hand

你很适合当御前首相 你知道么? 
You're quite good at being Hand, you know?

琼恩・艾林和奈德・史塔克都是好人 值得崇敬的人 但是他们鄙视这个游戏 鄙视它的玩家
Jon Arryn and Ned Stark were good men, honorable men, but they disdained the game and those who played.

而你玩得很开心, 没错
You enjoy the game. I do.

这是我最不期望见到的事情
Last thing I expected.

你还是个好玩家
And you play it well.

我希望能继续玩下去
I'd like to keep playing it.

If Stannis breaches the gates, the game is over.

听说他会把敌人活活烧死 以向光之王致敬
They say he burns his enemies alive to honor the Lord of Light.

光之王希望他的敌人被烧死 淹神则希望他们被淹死
The Lord of Light wants his enemies burned, the drowned God wants them drowned.

为什么神灵都是这样邪魔般的存在? 
Why are all the Gods such vicious cunts?

怎么就没有酒和色的神明呢? 
Where is the God of tits and wine?

在盛夏群岛 人们信奉一位有十六个乳头的生育之神
In the Summer Isles, they worship a fertility goddess with 16 teats.

我们应该立即去那里
We should sail there immediately.

今天早上我听到了一首歌儿 从红色荒原那头的魁尔斯一路传来
This morning I heard a song all the way from Qarth beyond the Red Waste.

丹妮莉丝・坦格利安还活着
Daenerys Targaryen lives.

我们没空理会一个远在世界尽头的女孩
A girl at the edge of the world is the least of our problems.

她还有三头龙
She has three dragons.

但即使传说是真的 幼龙成长起来还需经过漫长的岁月
But even if what they say is true, it'll be years before they are fully grown.

但当它长大之后 我们就无处躲藏
And then there will be nowhere to hide.

没法同时下两盘棋 朋友
One game at a time, my friend.

这座城市属于札罗 男巫们有一千双眼睛 在注视着你
Xaro owns this city and the warlocks have 1,000 eyes watching for you.

我找到一条 一条船 还有个好船长
I found one a ship with a good captain.

Astapor? We cannot stay here.

他们夺走了我的龙
They have my dragons.

一个母亲不能丢下自己的孩子独自逃离
A mother does not flee without her children.

它们不是你的孩子
They're not your children.

我知道他们都叫你龙之母 我也知道你爱它们 但它们不是你生的
I know they call you the Mother of Dragons and I know you love them, but you didn't grow them in your womb.

它们也未曾吮吸过你的乳汁 它们是龙 卡丽熙
They didn't suckle at your breast. They are dragons, Khaleesi.

如果留在魁尔斯 我们都会死
And if we stay in Qarth, we'll die.

你去阿斯塔波好了 那里很安全
You should sail to Astapor. I'm sure you'll be safe there.

你知道我会为你而死
You know I would die for you.

那就中了男巫的圈套
That's what the warlock wants.

他也让你去那里
He told you so himself.

他的魔法很强大, 那我的魔法呢? 
His magic is strong. And what of my magic?

You saw me step into the fire.

活活烧死那女巫的火焰 可曾伤到我?

我到死都不会忘记

He's feeding the crops now.

陛下 诸神见证的婚约的确神圣庄严 但您的父亲 受神荣宠的先王 订此婚约之时 史塔克家叛迹未显

你觉得这堵木头门能挡着我? 
I'd let a wooden door stop me?

我不怕你 小弟弟
I'm not afraid of you,little brother.

你来干嘛?  我来看看你的脸
Why are you here? I wanted to see your face.

听说你的鼻子没了 现在看来没那么恐怖
They said you'd lost your nose, but it's not as gruesome as all that.

砍我鼻子的那个人没的可不止鼻子
The man who cut me lost more than his nose.

那些叛徒想要乔佛里的脑袋 却丢了他们自己的
The rebels came for Joffrey's head, they lost their own.

当然, 要杀我的可不是个叛徒
Of course, it wasn't a rebel who tried to kill me.

这国王之手的房间可真够寒酸的
Bit of a comedown from chamber of the Hand.

不过反正太大的房间你也用不着
But then I don't suppose you need much room.

大学士派席尔也这么取笑过我
Grand Maester Pycelle made the same joke.

你肯定特别骄傲 能和蛋都垂到膝盖的老头一样招笑
You must be proud to be as funny as a man whose balls brush his knees.

你今天要跟父亲见面? 
You're meeting Father today?

你怎么知道
How do you know that?

我有很多密探
Because I have hundreds of spies in my employ.

情报总管刚好欠我几个人情
The Master of Whisperers owes me a favor or two.

父亲跟我说了 你到底想要什么? 
Father told me. What do you want from him?

我要什么?  他可是我父亲
What do I want from him? He's my father.

我用得着要什么吗? 
Do I need to want something?

我相信他深爱我 就像任何一个父亲深爱他的 宝贝儿子
I'm sure he loves me dearly, as any father loves his child, his baby boy.

但是自从来到君临 他一次都没来看过我
Yet he hasn't come to visit once since arriving in King's Landing.

我的脸被劈成两半 躺在床上奄奄一息 他都没来看过我
I lay here, my face split in half, but Father never came.

说的我都要哭了
You're going to make me cry.

你为什么想知道我对他的要求? 
Why do you care what I want from him?

因为你曾在父亲面前造谣
Because you've slandered me to Father before.

你跟他说我在凯岩城的时候 曾命令卫兵殴打侍女
You told him I had my guards beat that servant girl at Casterly Rock.

你确实让卫兵打了她
You did have your guards beat her.

一个只有九岁的小女孩
A girl of nine, I believe.

我没记错的话 她为此瞎了一只眼
She lost an eye, if I remember correctly.

我没记错的话 她以后再也不敢偷项链了
If I remember correctly, she never stole a necklace again.

事是真的, 就不算造谣
It's not slander if it's true.

那你今天又想跟父亲说什么真话? 
And what's this truth you plan on telling him today?

为什么我要跟父亲说的话 会让你这么不安? 
Why are you so nervous about what I'm going to say to Father?

因为你是个骗子
Because you're a liar.

你肯定会说我和乔佛里的坏话
I expect you'll tell lies about me, about Joffrey.

比如? 
Any lies in particular?

你是挺聪明 但是比你自己想的可差远了
You're a clever man, but you're not half as clever as you think you are.

那也比你聪明多了
Still makes me more clever than you.

看这俩金光闪闪的勇士哟
Oh, look at these two shining warriors.

特林・马兰爵士还有这个…
Ser Taryn Mant and...

谁他妈关心是什么骑士
Ser Whosit of Whocares.

在下是黑水河的波隆爵士
Ser Bronn of the Blackwater.

你不是骑士 波德
You're no knight. Pod.

黑水河的波隆爵士 可是国王陛下亲自册封的
Ser Bronn of the Blackwater was anointed by the king himself.

你不过是个一夜暴富的恶棍罢了 仅此而已
You're an up jumped cutthroat, nothing more.

你说的没错
That's exactly who I am.

而你就是个穿着华丽盔甲的蛆 比起打仗 我看你更擅长殴打小女孩
And you're a grub in fancy armor who's better at beating little girls than fighting men.

现在嘛, 我跟提利昂大人约好了
Now, I have an appointment with Lord Tyrion.

你敢碰一下门 我就砍了你的手
You put your hand on that door, you lose the hand.

我不仅享受阳光下的散步, 大人
As much as I appreciate a walk in the sunshine, your lordship,

还很想知道你为什么要叫我来
I am wondering why you sent for me.

这城市里想杀我的人不计其数
A number of people in this city want to kill me.

你却在保护我
You're here to protect me.

这活我可干了挺久
I've been doing that for a while now.

这活没让你变得人见人烦么
Do you grow bored protecting me?

这活只让我变穷了
I grow poor protecting you.

你可是在我的照顾下才成为骑士的 你现在都是都城守备队的队长了
Under my patronage you've become a knight, you've served as Commander of the City Watch.

废话少说 你肯定没少中饱私囊
Briefly. I'm sure you filled your pockets.

现在我可是身无分文
And now my pockets are empty.

你是让我尝了点甜头
You've given me a taste for the finer things.

不过你要是还想继续被保护的话 就得出更高价才行
And if you want me to carry on protecting you, you'll need to pay more.

我还以为咱俩是朋友呢 确实是
I thought we were friends. We are.

可我是个佣兵 我的武力是用来出售的
But I'm a sellsword. I sell my sword.

可不是用来帮朋友的
I don't loan it out to friends as a favor.

双倍?  我现在可是骑士了
Double? I'm a knight now.

骑士可值双倍的价儿
Knights are worth double.

我连自己现在正付你多少都不知道
I don't even know how much I'm paying you now.

这正说明你完全付得起
Which means you can afford it.

我曾参与过黑水河之战
I was in the battle at Blackwater.

我是个船长, 也是个骑士
I was a captain and a knight.

爵士, 你效忠哪个国王? 
Aye, ser, and serving which king?

维斯特洛唯一的真王
The one true king of Westeros

我还以为你死了
I thought you were dead.

大家都是这么想的
Everyone thought you were dead.

他可能像你一样游上岸了
He may have swam ashore as you did.

没有, 我眼睁睁看着他死于野火
No, the wildfire took him. I saw it.

我很遗憾, 老友
I'm so sorry, my friend.

我也曾失去一个儿子
I, too, have lost a son.

这是世界上最糟糕的事儿
There is nothing worse in this world.

不过, 戴佛斯, 你是个好父亲
But, Davos, you were a good father.

如果我真的是好父亲, 他就不会死
If I was a good father, he'd still be here.

他在龙石岛舔伤口呢
He licks his wounds at Dragonstone.

你会带我过去吗? 
Will you take me there?

龙石岛对我来说啥都不剩了

战争还没结束
This war is not over.

但是对于萨拉多・桑恩 战争到此为止了
But for Salladhor Saan, the war is over.

我们都曾宣誓效忠于史坦尼斯陛下
We're both sworn to King Stannis.

我不效忠于任何人
I am sworn to no man.

我承诺提供 30 艘船, 你们则承诺给我荣华富贵
I promised you 30 ships and you promised me riches and glory.

我给了船
I delivered the ships.

史坦尼斯从不放弃 从不
Stannis never gives up. Never.

他将从新组织…  他已经输了
Now he will regroup He's a broken man.

他的舰队在黑水湾全军覆没
His fleet lies at the bottom of Blackwater Bay.

据说他谁都不见… 他的将士 甚至他的妻子
They say he sees no one not his generals, not even his wife.

只剩下那个红袍女 在他耳边瞎嘀咕 鬼扯些火焰中的影像 要不就是火烧大活人
Only the Red Woman whispering in his ear, telling him what she sees in the flames and burning men alive.

史坦尼斯归来后点了场大火
They built a great fire when Stannis returned.

所有反对她的人都被称为 暗黑仆人
All those who spoke against her she called servants of darkness.

传说她边吟唱边烧那些人
They say she sang to them as they burned.

暗黑仆人
Servants of darkness.

我倒觉得龙石岛才是我们得避开的地方
I'm thinking Dragonstone is a good place for us to avoid.

带我回去, 求你
Take me back there, please.

你又不能让史坦尼斯反对她
You cannot turn Stannis against her.

也许不能, 但是我可以杀了她
Maybe not, but I could carve her heart out.

要是失败了, 他们会烧了你

要是成功了, 他们还是会烧了你
If you succeed, they'll burn you.

而你才刚捡了条命
And you've only just come back to life.

再活久点儿吧, 老友
Stay alive a little longer, my friend.

你叫我老友, 你我在我婚礼上喝得大醉一场
You call me friend. You drank with me on my wedding day.

你还跟我在我的 4 次婚礼上大醉 4 场呐 可我从没求你帮过忙
And you drank with me on four of my wedding days, but I don't ask you for favors.

求你了, 帮我这个忙
Please, do this for me.

我就把你的骨头装在个小袋子里 好让你那可怜的寡妇挂在脖子上
I will gather your bones in a little sack and let your widow wear them around her neck.

我们得在距离赫伦堡 1000 米的地方设下包围圈
We should set the siege lines 1,000 yards from Harrenhal.

不用包围 魔山守不了一片废墟
There won't be a siege. The Mountain can't defend a ruin.

我想只要泰温・兰尼斯特下令 不管是哪魔山都会抵抗到底
I imagine the Mountain will defend whatever Tywin Lannister tells him to defend.

自从牛津之战后 兰尼斯特就一直在和我们捉迷藏
The Lannisters have been running from us since Oxcross.

我想战斗 男人都想要场光明正大的战斗
I'd love a fight. The men would love a fight.

恐怕咱们是得不到了
I don't think we're going to get one.

200 个北方人被人像羊一样屠宰
200 Northmen slaughtered like sheep.

这命债我们一定要讨回来, 朋友
The debt will be repaid, my friend.

为了他们, 也为了你的儿子
For them and for your sons.

他们在泥巴里腐烂 凶手却逃之夭夭
They rot in the ground while their killer runs free.

弑君者不会自由很久的

我已经派出最好的人去追他了

一个梅利斯特?  杰米爵士

我父亲的人
My father's bannerman.

找间屋子把她关起来

她放跑了詹姆・兰尼斯特
She freed Jaime Lannister.

兰尼斯特夺走了他们的儿子 而她, 则夺走了他们的正义

这伤口需要清洗缝合
This needs to be cleaned and closed.

你叫什么, 朋友? 
What's your name, friend?

你能活下来真幸运
You're lucky to be alive.

你带着这徽章挺合适

差点就比我带着还合适了
Almost as good as it looked on me.

这新职位让你挺享受的?

我当国王之手的时候可开心了
I was very happyas Hand of the King.

我听说了
I heard how happy you were.

你把妓女都带到我床上去了
You brought a whore into my bed.

那会儿还不是你的床呢
It wasn't your bed at the time.

我把你送来是辅佐国王的
I sent you here to advise the king.

我给了你真正的权力和职位
I gave you real power and authority.

而你却选择 同以往一样 和妓女鬼混 和小偷共饮
You chose to spend your days as you always have, bedding harlots and drinking with thieves.

有时我也和妓女共饮
Occasionally I drank with the harlots.

提利昂 你到底想要什么? 
What do you want, Tyrion?

为什么人人都以为我意有所图
Why does everyone assume I want something?

我就不能只是想来看看亲爱的老爸吗? 
Can't I simply visit with my beloved father?

我这个亲爱的老爸 在儿子英勇负伤之后 不知怎么的忘记来看儿子了
My beloved father who somehow forgot to visit his wounded son after he fell on the battlefield.

派席尔大学士保证你的伤势不致命
Maester Pycelle assured me your wounds were not fatal.

当你在赫伦堡的废墟上忙着开会时 是我组建了这座城市的防御
I organized the defense of this city while you held court in the ruins of Harrenhal.

敌人军临城下时 是我领军迎战 而你的外孙 国王陛下 却躲在城墙后面发抖
I led the foray when the enemies were at the gate while your grandson, the king, quivered in fear behind the walls.

我为了家族血染沙场
I bled in the mud for our family.

却是被丢进个小黑牢里
I was trundled off to some dark little cell.

一点该死的感激会是一个不错的开始
A little bloody gratitude would be a start.

戏子和歌手才需要喝彩
Jugglers and singers require applause.

每次我在战场上负伤 你以为只要塞我个玫瑰花环就行了吗
Do you think I demanded a garland of roses every time I suffered a wound on a battlefield?

如今 我有七国要料理 其中三地正公然叛乱
Now, I have seven kingdoms to look after and three of them are in open rebellion.

直说你到底想怎么样吧
So tell me what you want.

我想要我应得的
I want what is mine by right.

詹姆是你的大儿子理应继承你的领土和头衔

但他是御林铁卫不能娶妻也没有继承人
But he is a Kingsguard, forbidden from marriage or inheritance.

詹姆从披上白袍那天起 就自动放弃了对凯岩城的继承权
The day Jaime put on the white cloak, he gave up his claim to Casterly Rock.

而我是你的儿子 是你法定的继承人
I am your son and lawful heir.

你想要凯岩城? 
You want Casterly Rock?

我们会给你找个和你的名头 更相称的封地 当作是在黑水湾一战中 对你战功的褒奖吧
We'll find you accommodations more suited to your name and as a reward for your accomplishments during the battle of Blackwater Bay.

时机成熟之后 再给你安排个 既合适你发挥才智 又维护我们声誉的职务 维护我们的名望

你要是干得好 还能得到一名适合你的妻子

我宁愿被蛆虫吃光 也不会玷污家族名誉 把凯岩城交给你
And I would let myself be consumed by maggots before mocking the family name and making you heir to Casterly Rock.

你 你这个害死母亲而出世的人? 
You, who killed your mother to come into the world?

你这个怪胎 畸形 不听话的主 心中装满妒忌 淫欲缠身 尽耍小聪明
You are an ill made, spiteful little creature full of envy, lust, and low cunning.

世人的律法让你冠我的姓氏 穿我的衣服 因为我无法证明你不是我的种
Men's laws give you the right to bear my name and display my colors since I cannot prove that you are not mine.

诸神为了教导我谦逊之道 迫使我 目睹你佩着雄狮纹章 四处蹒跚招摇 那可是我父亲的纹章 我祖父的纹章!
And to teach me humility,the gods have condemned me to watch you waddle about wearing that proud lion that was my father's sigil and his father's before him.

但无论诸神还是世人 都不能强迫我把凯岩城交给你 让它变成你的妓院
But neither gods nor men will ever compel me to let you turn Casterly Rock into your whorehouse.

再也休提凯岩城的继承权
Speak no more of your rights to Casterly Rock.

下次教我在你床上发现妓女 我就吊死她
The next whore I catch in your bed I'll hang.

多恩 它往多恩去
Dorne.It's going to Dorne.

为什么要去多恩? 它载着丝绸而去 它本该载着酒酿而归
Why Dorne? It's carrying silk and it's supposed to bring back wine in exchange.

可是它将一去不返
But it's not coming back.

船长已在冒险中疲惫 就让君临的老爷和夫人们 喝着更好的美酒直到不省人事
The captain's tired of risking his life so King's Landing lords and ladies can get drunk on better wine than they deserve.

他会留在多恩
He's going to stay in Dorne.

那里没有冬天 美丽又温暖
Wait out the winter where it's beautiful and warm.

我遇到过一些多恩来的人 他们可不这么美丽也不这么温暖
I met some people in Dorne who weren't so beautiful and warm.

我早说了 我不想玩游戏
I told you, I don't want to play.

那个艘船又怎么样? 
What about that one there?

它要去瓦伦提斯
It's going to Volantis.

因为当我坐船去瓦伦提斯的时候 就是这样的船
Because when I got on a ship in Volantis, it looked like that one.

游戏又不是这样玩的
That's not how the game works.

你不应该直接把答案说出来
You're not supposed to just blurt out the right answer.

要编一个故事 要描述这艘船到哪里去 为什么去
You've got to invent a story about where the ship is going and why.

我既然已经知道了真相 为什么还要编故事呢
Why should I make up a story. when I know the truth?

因为真相 要么很可怕 要么很无聊
Because the truth is always either terrible or boring.

可以允许我和珊莎小姐聊聊
Might I speak with Lady Sansa

培提尔・贝里席 单独聊几句?

不久前 我见过你的母亲
I saw your mother not long ago.

她非常想见你
She's very eager to see you.

你说过你会带我回家
You said you'd take me home.

你说过君临就是你的家
You said King's Landing was your home.

你属于国王
You are the property of the crown.

带你走就是叛国之罪
Stealing you would be treason.

要是你走漏了嘴 哪怕只是一个人听到

我不会告诉任何人 我怎么知道你不会
I won't tell anyone. How do I know?

因为我不会撒谎
Because I'm a terrible liar.

你声称自己不会撒谎
You said so yourself.

求你了 贝里席大人 告诉我怎么做吧 告诉我什么时候
Please, Lord Baelish. Tell me what to do. Tell me when.

我正在等候一纸命令 能让我远远地离开这儿

也许可以捎上你

你是她的贴身女仆?

是的 你是他的...?
Yes. And you're his...?

我帮他打理生意
I help manage his affairs.

他可是个大人物 她也一样
He's an important person. So is she.

我长大在她父亲的城堡的阴影下
I grew up in the shadow of her father's castle.

她出生那日 他们从日出一直到日落敲了一天
The day she was born, they rang the bells from sunrise till sunset.

我们混的都不错 你和我
We've both done rather well, you and I.

考虑到我们的出身
Given where we started.

像我们这样的姑娘 想要出人头地可不容易
It's not easy for girls like us to dig our way out.

照顾她要小心点他
Watch out for her with him.

他们长得真快
They're growing fast.

我等不了那么久
I can't wait that long.

天黑之前 我们就会到达阿斯塔波了
We'll be in Astapor by nightfall.

有些人说 无垢者是世上最强的士兵
Some say the Unsullied are the greatest soldiers in the world.

最强的'奴隶'士兵
The greatest slave soldiers in the world.

就这两字决定了性质
The distinction means a good deal to some people.

那些人还有更好的想法 来帮助你登上铁王座吗
Do those people have any better ideas about how to put you on the Iron Throne?

今天天气不错 不和你吵
It's too beautiful a day to argue.

又是一个在海上度过的好天
Another lovely day on the high seas.

他们是第一批乘船渡海的多斯拉克人
They're the first Dothraki who have ever been on a ship.

他们跟随我穿越了毒水
They followed me across the poison water.

如果他们能 别人也能
If they'll do it, others will.

跟随一个真正的卡拉萨…
And with a true khalasar

多斯拉克人只服从力量 卡丽熙
The Dothraki follow strength above all, khaleesi.

只要你证明自己足够强大 你就会有一个真正的卡拉萨
You'll have a true khalasar when you prove yourself strong.

我听说你已经死了
I heard you were dead.

我希望能和您私下谈谈 陛下
I had hoped to speak to you alone, Your Grace.

陛下 您是合法的王
Your Grace, you are the rightful king.

你是个荣誉的人 公正的人
You're an honorable man, a just man.

还有一场战争要打
And there is still a war to fight.

把阶下囚烧死就行了? 
By burning prisoners alive?

那你说要怎么惩罚异教徒呢 戴佛斯大人? 
How would you punish the infidels, Ser Davos?

我不因为人们信什么神去评判他们
I do not judge people for the gods they worship.

如果我是这种人 你踏上龙石岛之前 我就应该把你丢进海里
If I did, I'd have thrown you in the sea before you ever set foot on Dragonstone.

我不是你的敌人 你正是我的敌人
I'm not your enemy. You are my enemy.

黑水湾上 你是在和我作战吗? 
Was it me you fought on Blackwater Bay?

是我点燃了你的船吗? 
Did I set your ships ablaze?

当野火成百上千地杀死我们的人的时候 我不在那儿
I wasn't there when the wildfire killed our men by the thousands.

我本来可以救他们的
I could have saved those men.

你本来可以得到那座城的
You would have taken the city,

史坦尼斯现在本应坐上了那张王座了 你应该站在他身边
Stannis would now sit upon his rightful throne, and you would stand beside him.

可我当时不在那里 就因为你的鼓动 国王选择把我留下
But I wasn't there because you convinced your king to leave me behind.

你听见了那些惨叫吗
Do you hear them screaming?

那些在水中燃烧的人 他们哭爹喊娘 哭天抢地
All those burning men in the water crying for their mothers, for their gods for help?

直到黑水河将他们吞没
Until the moment the Blackwater swallowed them.

用不着绝望 戴佛斯大人
Don't despair, Ser Davos.

我告诉你儿子的是真的
What I told your son is true.

死于火中 是最纯净的死亡
Death by fire is the purest death.

她是恶魔之母
She's the mother of demons.

把他关进地牢
Take him to the dungeon and lock him in a cell.

你选择了黑暗 戴佛斯爵士
You've chosen the darkness, Ser Davos.

她会毁了我们所有人! 我会为你祈祷
She will destroy us all! I will pray for you.

陛下 是玛格丽小姐的命令
It's Lady Margaery, Your Grace.

她要干嘛? 谁允许她这么做?

玛格丽・提利尔
'百花骑士'之妹

留步 小姐 你会弄脏裙子
Stop, my lady. You'll ruin your dress.

你要传话给她吗 陛下? 
Would you like to speak with her, Your Grace?

当战船攻入黑水河湾的时候 他去城墙作战了
He went to fight on the walls when the ships came into Blackwater Bay.

我出生的时候她就死了
She died when she had me.

有坏蛋想要攻进城 想要干坏事 你父亲阻止了他们
Bad men wanted to come into this city and do terrible things, but your father stopped them.

以后每次看到这个骑士
Whenever you look at this knight,

我希望你会想起你父亲
I want you to remember your father.

他只是个战士
He was just a soldier.

骑士们发誓要做什么?

主持正义 保护弱小
Protect the weak and uphold the good.

你父亲做到了 你应该为他感到骄傲
Your father did that. Be proud of him.

你父亲也是战士吗? 
Was your father a soldier, too?

你也应该感到骄傲
You should be proud, too.

在乔佛里国王的领导下 你们的父亲拯救了这座城市
Under King Joffrey's leadership, your fathers saved the city.

从现在开始 我们会照顾你们
From now on, we're going to take care of you.

孩子们需要什么食物 还有衣服或者房子 尽管来找我
Come to me for whatever you need to feed them, clothe them, or house them.

陛下 陛下
Your Grace. Your Grace.

我很抱歉 小姐

御前会议刚刚结束

一件漂亮的礼服 小姐
That's a lovely gown, my lady.

没错 非常适合你
Yes, it suits you perfectly.

我猜你肯定很冷
I imagine you might be rather cold.

陛下 高庭的气候向来很温和

我的小姐 要不要仆人给你拿个披肩来? 
Shall I have them bring you a shawl, my lady?

谢谢您的关心 陛下

所幸我们提利尔的血液总是很热情
Luckily for us Tyrells,our blood runs quite warm.

是不是 洛拉斯?  没错
Doesn't it, Loras? Yes.

洛拉斯 王后的礼服华丽极了 不是吗? 
Loras, isn't the queen's gown magnificent?

那织工 刺绣 还有那金属饰品
The fabric, the embroidery, the metalwork.

我从来没见过像这个一样的衣服
I've never seen anything like it.

当你做了王后 你会发现身着一点护甲总是有用的 说不定很快你就会体会到
You might find a bit of armor quite useful once you become queen.Perhaps before.

乔佛里告诉我今天早上从圣堂返回的时候 你在跳蚤窝下轿了
Joffrey tells me you stopped your carriage at Flea Bottom on your way back from the sept this morning.

是的 我去了一家孤儿院 总主教大人向我提到过的
Yes. I paid a visit to an orphanage the High Septon told me about.

在高庭的时候玛格丽就为穷人们做过很多事
Margaery does a great deal of work with the poor back in Highgarden.

即便是最底层的百姓 只要敞开心扉接触他们 你会发现他们和贵族没有区别
The lowest among us are no different from the highest if you give them a chance and approach them with an open heart.

敞开心扉? 在跳蚤窝如果你不小心的话 只会被'敞开心脏'
An open heart is what you'll get in Flea Bottom if you're not careful, my dear.

不久前那里就曾有暴徒袭击我们
Not long ago, we were attacked by a mob there.

带着充足的护卫也没能阻止他们
We had a full complement of guards that didn't stop them.

国王都差点丧命
The king barely escaped with his life.

我母后向来喜欢夸大其辞
My mother's always had a penchant for drama.

随着她年龄渐长 越来越夸张了
Facts become less and less important to her as she grows older.

暴徒根本没有威胁到我们的安全
Our lives were never truly in danger.

当然 你是对的
You're right, of course.

但你是你父亲的儿子
But you are your father's son.

其他人可没有国王的勇敢
We can't all have a king's bravery.

饥饿会把人变成野兽
Hunger turns men into beasts.

我很高兴提利尔家族能在这方面提供帮助
I'm glad House Tyrell has been able to help in this regard.

他们告诉我有 100 辆从河湾地而来的货车近日就会到达君临
They tell me 100 wagons arrive daily now from the Reach.

小麦 大麦 还有苹果 七神保佑我们今年获得丰收
Wheat, barley, apples.We've had a blessed harvest.

当然在需要的时候 援助都城是我们的责任
And, of course, it's our duty to assist the capital in time of need.

既然如洛拉斯爵士所说
Well, as Ser Loras said,

玛格丽小姐以前就做过这种...  慈善活动
Lady Margaery has done this sort of...  charitable work before.

我想她应该知道自己在做什么
I'm sure she knows what she's doing.

这些无垢者已经在这里站了整整一天一夜 不吃不喝
The Unsullied have stood here for a day and a night with no food or water.

他们还将一动不动站到死亡来临
They will stand until they drop.

我们称之为'顺从'
Such is their obedience.

他们应该符合我的要求
They may suit my needs.

告诉我他们是怎么训练的
Tell me of their training.

他们五岁起接受训练
They begin their training at five.

每天从黎明一直练到天黑 直到熟练掌握短剑 盾牌和三种长矛
Every day they drill from dawn to dusk until they have mastered the shortsword, the shield, and the three spears.

四个男孩里只有一个存活
Only one boy in four survives this rigorous training.

他们绝对服从 绝对忠诚
Their discipline and loyalty are absolute.

最勇敢的人也害怕死亡
Even the bravest men fear death.

我的主人说无垢者不是人
My master says the Unsullied are not men.

死亡对他们而言不算什么
Death means nothing to them.

他请您留心观察 陛下
He begs you attend to this carefully, Your Grace.

告诉善主大人 不必如此
Tell the good master there is no need.

我的主人说男人不需要乳头
My master points out that men don't need nipples.

在赢得尖刺盔之前 无垢者必须拿一枚银币去奴隶市场 找到一个哭叫着的新生儿 并在其母眼前将其杀死
To win his shield, an Unsullied must go to the slave marts with a silver mark, find a newborn and kill it before its mother's eyes.

我的主人说 通过这样的方法 方能确定他心中未留有丝毫软弱之处
This way, my master says,we make certain there is no weakness left in them.

你们从母亲怀中抢走婴儿 在她注视之下将其杀死 然后支付一枚银币以补偿她的痛苦? 
You take a babe from its mother's arms, kill it as she watches, and pay for her pain with a silver coin?

我的主人告诉您 钱乃是付给孩子的主人 不是给母亲
My master would like you to know that the silver is paid to the baby's owner, not the mother.

克拉兹尼主人请您速做决定
Master Kraznys asks that you please hurry.

对无垢者感兴趣的买家很多
Many other buyers are interested.

无垢者是终结一切的工具
The Unsullied are a means to an end.

如果我买了他们 这些人
Once I own them, these men

他们不是人 不再是人了
They're not men. Not anymore.

如果我拥有一支奴隶军队 我成了什么? 
Once I own an army of slaves, what will I be?

您想 这些奴隶属于您或者克拉兹尼和他那样的人 谁会给他们更好的生活呢? 
Do you think these slaves will have better lives serving Kraznys and men like him or serving you?

你对他们更加公正
You'll be fair to them.

你不会为了达到目的让他们残疾
You won't mutilate them to make a point.

也不会命令他们杀死新生儿
You won't order them to murder babies.

你会保证他们有吃有穿
You'll see they're properly fed and sheltered.

他们已经经受了严重的不公正待遇
A great injustice has been done to them.

闭上双眼也不会有任何改变
Closing your eyes will not undo it.

我欠您一条命 先生
I owe you my life, ser.

我深感荣幸 女王陛下
The honor is mine, my queen.

我认识他 他是七国最强大的战士 以及劳勃・拜拉席恩的御前侍卫队长
I know him as one of the greatest fighters the Seven Kingdoms has ever seen and as the Lord Commander of Robert Baratheon's Kingsguard.

我是巴利斯坦・赛尔弥
I am Barristan Selmy,

你父亲的御前侍卫

你们当中有谁在 10 岁时就是神射手的?

毛毛狗

没事的 阿多

不 是三眼乌鸦

我尝试杀死它 但我做不到
I tried to kill it, but I couldn't.

梦里有个男孩 我不想听这些

不是 那他还挺好

我妈妈经常跟我讲 你们维斯特洛人是一帮无情的家伙
My mother always told me you Westerosi were a grim lot.

是冷血的 长胡子的 臭哄哄的 蛮子 你们会渡过狭海 趁我们睡觉时把我们偷偷绑走
Grim, bearded, stinking barbarians that would row across the Narrow Sea and steal us from our beds.

你可曾想过你会嫁给一个这样的人?

我从没想过我会嫁给任何一个人

詹姆・兰尼斯特 要花多少时间吗? 
'弑君者' 御林铁卫队长 to get to King's Landing walking through fields and forests?

那我们怎么打发时间呢?

一步一个脚印地走

那旅程会很无聊的

I'm here to take you to King's Landing and bring back Lady Stark's daughters in exchange.

你知道 无论你如何忠诚 也没人愿意和你这种傻大个为伍

打我出生起 就有人开始侍奉我
People have been serving me since I was born.

你觉得史塔克夫人会想要一个淡黄色头发的傻大个 伴随她终生?

过不了一个星期她就想命令你自裁了

如果史塔克夫人对我有任何不满

我相信她会让我知道的
I'm sure she'll let me know.

她是一个诚实的女人

不关你的事 弑君者

她在临冬城的时候你没跟着她
You weren't with her at Winterfell.

因为我去过临冬城
Because I visited Winterfell.

我难道看到过你那石头脑瓜 顶到拱门?

你是否曾效忠史坦尼斯?  天哪 没有

闭上你的嘴 为啥?

别忘了他从小就和我一起生活在宫廷里

那小小郁金香身着绣花丝衣 在长廊中连跑带跳的场面

实在是无法忘怀
Skipping down the corridors in his embroidered silks.

我对他的了解比你多得多

我对他的了解无人能及
I knew him as well as anyone.

作为他的御林铁卫 他对我无所不谈
As a member of his Kingsguard, he trusted me with everything.

他会是一个好国王

听起来你很爱慕他
Sounds like you quite fancied him.

你有跟他说过吗?

恐怕你不是蓝礼喜欢的类型

他更喜欢洛拉斯・提利尔这样的卷发小女孩
He preferred curlyhaired little girls like Loras Tyrell.

这些关于蓝礼的话都是真的

真可惜王座不是用阳具做的

估计人们是没法将他从上面拉下来的 闭上你的嘴

我也没指责你

爱上谁不是我们自己能做主的

你们是要去哪里?  南方

躲着国王大道是吧?

你们躲不掉 是啊 真的躲不掉

不过看起来你倒挺安全

无意冒犯 女士 不过…

我不想和你们纠缠

七神保佑你们 也保佑你

他不知道 也许你是对的
He doesn't. Maybe you're right.

但如果你错了呢 如果他告密咋办?

他是无辜的

比史塔克夫人的女儿们还无辜?

这里紧一些
Make it tighter here.

让你看起来更强壮

这些不好 拿其他的来

有提利尔家族相助 我们会打败北方人

杀死他们的领主 烧掉他们的要塞 给他们的庄稼撒盐 此后一个世纪都不会有人妄想造反了
Hang their lords, burn their strongholds, sow their fields with salt, and no one will think of rebelling for another century.

这没错 不过你对她本人的看法呢?

她漂亮又聪明

我是说这种与你不同的做法 会危及…
I only meant that to go out of your way to endanger yourself

玛格利・提利尔给肮脏的孤儿们捐献是有原因的
Margaery Tyrell dotes on filthy urchins for a reason.

她穿成荡妇的样子是有原因的
She dresses like a harlot for a reason.

她嫁给蓝礼・拜拉席恩这样的叛徒和众所周知的变态 也是有原因的
She married a traitor and known degenerate like Renly Baratheon for a reason.

她嫁给蓝礼・拜拉席恩因为别人让她这么做
She married Renly Baratheon because she was told to.

这才是聪明的女人… 照别人说的去做
That's what intelligent women do what they're told.

你需要好好问问自己…  我不需要做任何事
You need to ask yourselfI don't need to do anything.

我仍然难以相信
I still don't believe it.

他一无所求
He didn't. He didn't want anything.

他帮我只是因为他爱着我母亲
He just takes an interest because he loved my mother.

男人从一个漂亮女孩那里只想得到一样东西
Men only want one thing from a pretty girl.

小指头不爱我
Littlefinger's not in love with me.

爱情不是他想要的
Love is not the thing he wants.

男人们才不在乎
They never see it that way.

他没有让你为他做什么? 
He didn't ask you to do something for him?

监视谁或者… ? 
Spy on someone or...?

不管他是要求你怎样 还是企图怎样 抑或碰你 我要你告诉我
If he does ask you for anything or try anything or touch you, I want you to tell me.

怎么?  你会做什么? 
Why? What will you do?

我会阻止他
I will make him stop.

洛拉斯・提利尔爵士 小姐
Ser Loras Tyrell, my lady.

我的妹妹玛格丽邀请你 与她和我们祖母 奥莲娜夫人 一起去花园里游玩
My sister Margaery invites you to take the air with her and our grandmother the Lady Olenna in the gardens.

要我护送您过去吗? 
May I escort you to them?

你越长越标致了 珊莎小姐
I believe you grow more beautiful every day, Lady Sansa.

谢谢您 洛拉斯爵士
You are too kind, Ser Loras.

您也许不记得我们第一次见面了
You probably don't remember the first time we met.

洛拉斯・提利尔
'百花骑士' 御林铁卫

在首相的比武大会上 您献花给我
At the Hand's tourney, you gave me your favor.

这才是属于你的颜色
It's more your color.

拿着 谢谢
You take it. Thank you.

谢谢你 洛拉斯爵士
Thank you, Ser Loras.

珊莎小姐 我很荣幸 介绍我的祖母 提利尔家族的奥莲娜夫人
Lady Sansa, it is my honor to present my grandmother...  the Lady Olenna of House Tyrell.

你真好心 肯来和我及我这群蠢母鸡们共进晚餐
It's so good of you to visit me and my foolish flock of hens.

我们都为你逝去的亲人们感到遗憾
We're very sorry for your losses.

玛格丽小姐 当我听说蓝礼大人的死讯时 的确十分悲伤
And I was sorry when I heard of Lord Renly's death, Lady Margaery.

他是多么堂皇的人儿啊 没错 他堂皇
He was very gallant. Gallant, yes.

有魅力 澡也洗得干净
And charming and very clean.

他知道如何打扮 如何微笑 从而得出结论自己该当国王
He knew how to dress and smile and somehow this gave him the notion he was fit to be king.

蓝礼既勇敢又温柔 祖母大人
Renly was brave and gentle, Grandmother.

父亲和洛拉斯都喜欢他
Father liked him and so did Loras.

洛拉斯还小 善于用木棒把别人敲下马来
Loras is young and very good at knocking men off horses with a stick.

但这种运动不能让他变聪明
That does not make him wise.

至于你那痴呆的父亲…
As to your fathead father

祖母大人! 这会让珊莎怎么看我们? 
Grandmother! What will Sansa think of us?

她会以为我们是一群风趣的人
She might think we have some wits about us.

不管怎么说 至少我们中有一员是这样
One of us, at any rate.

那是叛逆 我警告过他们
It was treason. I warned them.

劳勃有两个儿子 蓝礼还有位兄长
Robert has two sons and Renly has an older brother.

他怎么能要求 那张丑陋的铁椅子呢
How could he possibly have any claim to that ugly iron chair?

如果你问我 我得说我们本应和这状该死的愚行保持距离
We should have stayed well out of all this if you ask me.

不过挤下的乳汁 可不能注回乳房去
But once the cow's been milked, there's no squirting the cream back up her udders.

好了这就是我们看到的这事
So here we are to see things through.

你觉得怎么样 珊莎? 
What do you say to that, Sansa?

来吃点柠檬蛋糕如何? 
Shall we have some lemon cakes?

我最喜欢柠檬蛋糕了
Lemon cake's my favorite.

你这是准备去拿食物呢还是想饿死我们? 
Are you going to bring the food or do you mean to starve us to death?

来 珊莎 和我坐一起
Here, Sansa, come sit with me.

我可比其他那些人有意思多了
I'm much less boring than these others.

高庭公爵? 
The Lord of Highgarden?

我还没有这个荣幸
I haven't had the pleasure.

这不是荣幸 相信我
No great pleasure, believe me.

他爸同样是个呆子
His father was an oaf as well.

我指的是我丈夫 前任公爵罗斯
My husband, the late Lord Luthor.

猎鹰时 他竟从悬崖上掉了下去
He managed to ride off a cliff whilst hawking.

他们说 他一直盯着天空 根本没注意马
They say he was looking up at the sky and paying no mind to where his horse was taking him.

而现在呢 我的白痴儿子也在干同样的蠢事 只是他骑的换成了狮子而不是马
And now my son is doing the same, only this time he's riding a lion instead of a horse.

我希望你说实话 关于这个小鬼国王 乔佛里
I want you to tell me the truth about this royal boy, this Joffrey.

有谁比你更了解呢? 
Who else would know better?

我们听说了许多令人困扰的谣言
We've heard some troubling tales.

这些谣言有没有真实的成分? 
Is there any truth to them?

那小子虐待过你吗? 
Has this boy mistreated you?

你的舌头教他拔了吗? 
Has he ripped out your tongue?

小乔乔佛里国王 他陛下他英俊又潇洒 而且像雄狮一样勇敢
JoffKing Joffrey, heHis Grace is very fair and handsome and as brave as a lion.

是啊 兰尼斯特家的人都是狮子
Yes, all Lannisters are lions.

而提利尔放屁都有玫瑰的香味
And when a Tyrell farts, it smells like a rose.

他究竟怎么样? 聪明吗?

有没有颗好心肠? 能不能关心人? 
Has he a good heart, a gentle hand?

我想知道这意味着什么
I only want to know what that means.

给我些奶酪
Bring me some cheese.

蛋糕之后才上干酪 夫人
The cheese will be served after the cakes, my lady.

我想什么时候上就什么时候上
The cheese will be served when I want it served.

立刻把干酪给我端来
And I want it served now.

你在害怕 孩子? 
Are you frightened, child?

在场的都是女人
We're only women here.

只管说实话 没人会伤害你
Tell us the truth. No harm will come to you.

我父亲总是说实话
My father always told the truth.

是的 他有那样的好名声
Yes, he had that reputation.

却被他们当作叛徒 砍了脑袋
And they named him traitor and took his head.

他答应过我会手下留情 可依然砍了父亲的头
He promised he would be merciful and he cut my father's head off.

他说这就是手下留情
And he said that was mercy.

然后带我到城墙上 强迫我看
Then he took me up on the walls and made me look at it.

我我不能说 我从没 我父亲是个叛徒
II can't. I never meant my father was a traitor.

我哥哥也是 我只是个叛徒之女
My brother as well. I have traitor's blood.

求求您们 别再让我说了
Please don't make me say anymore.

她吓坏了 祖母大人
She's terrified, Grandmother.

你看看她 放心说 孩子

我们永远不会背叛你的信任 我发誓
We would never betray your confidence, I swear it.

求求您 千万别阻止婚礼
Please, don't stop the wedding.

别担心 高庭的呆子公爵 下定决心要让玛格丽当上王后
Have no fear. The Lord Oaf of Highgarden is determined that Margaery shall be queen.

不管怎么说 我们感激你的实话
Even so, we thank you for the truth.

啊 奶酪来了
Ah, here comes my cheese.

这次行军毫无意义
This march is a distraction.

我外祖父的葬礼可不会没有意义
My grandfather's funeral is not a distraction.

我们这是要去奔流城打仗?  不是
Are we riding to battle at Riverrun? No.

看 就是毫无意义
Then it's a distraction.

我舅舅艾德慕有军队驻守那里

除非他能变出更多来 否则这没太大的差别

你对我们的目标失去信心了么?

目标如果是复仇 我的信心就还在
If it's revenge, I still got faith in it.

如果你不再相信…
If you no longer believe

我坚信 除非雪下到多恩
I can believe till it snows in Dorne.

但这改变不了我们以一敌二的处境
Don't change the fact that we've got half the men.

你不认为我们能赢?

我可以直说吗 陛下? 
May I speak my mind, Your Grace?

你一直没说实话吗 卡史塔克大人?

你怕她
You're afraid of her.

她知道 我才不怕她
And she knows it. I'm not afraid of her.

可以效劳吗 史塔克夫人? 
May I help you, Lady Stark?

我很抱歉 我不该
I'm sorry, I shouldn't have

你帮不上忙 因为一个母亲 做这个是来保护她的孩子

只有母亲可以做这个
Only a mother can make them.

您以前做过这些? 
You've made them before?

我祈祷我的儿子布兰能在坠落重伤后挺过来
I prayed for my son Bran to survive his fall.

很多年前 一个男孩子得疹子病倒了
Many years before that, one of the boys came down with the pox.

鲁温学士说如果他能挺过那个晚上 他就能活下去
Maester Luwin said if he made it through the night, he'd live.

但那是个很长的夜晚
But it would be a very long night.

于是我在黑暗中守在他身边
So I sat with him all through the darkness.

聆听他不规律的呼吸 他的咳嗽 他的呜咽
Listened to his ragged little breaths, his coughing, his whimpering.

我丈夫把他从战争中带回家的时候
When my husband brought that baby home from the war,

我都没法直视他
I couldn't bear to look at him.

我不愿意看到他那双 棕色的陌生的眼睛盯着我
I didn't want to see those brown stranger's eyes staring up at me.

于是我向七神祈祷 把他带走
So I prayed to the gods, take him away.

于是我才发现我是世界上最糟糕的的女人
And I knew I was the worst woman who ever lived.

我诅咒了这个可怜的 无辜的孩子 咒他去死 只是因为我嫉妒他的母亲
I'd condemned this poor, innocent child to a horrible death all because I was jealous of his mother.

一个他自己都不认识的女人
A woman he didn't even know.

因此我又向七神祈祷 让这个男孩活下去
So I prayed to all seven gods, let the boy live.

让他活下去 我会爱他
Let him live and I'll love him.

我会成为他的母亲
I'll be a mother to him.

我会请求丈夫给他正名 叫他史塔克 让他成为我们的一员
I'll beg my husband to give him a true name, to call him Stark and be done with it, to make him one of us.

但是我没能守誓
And I couldn't keep my promise.

之后发生的这些...  降临在我家族的灾难...  都是因为我没有去爱那个没有母亲的孩子
And everything that's happened since then...  all this horror that's come to my family...  it's all because I couldn't love a motherless child.

杀死半掌科林很难吗? 
Was it hard for you to kill the Halfhand?

我喜欢你 但是如果你敢跟我们耍诈 杀了你可没这么难
I like you, but if you're playing us false, it won't be hard for me to kill you.

我血管里流着野人的血
I've got wildling blood in my veins.

这些是我的人 我明白
These are my people. I understand.

嗯 你怎么会明白?

你想要保护你的人
You want to protect your people.

你知道把 90 个部族联合起来要多大的代价吗?  他们中的一半想要杀死另一半 只是因为一两句口角

我的大军说七种不同的语言

我告诉他们如果我们到不了南方的话 我们都会死

因为这是事实

他怎么了?

对你来说可真公平!

这是怎么回事? 塔利 站起来

任何人 你可以选乔佛里国王

闭嘴 你可以选泰温・兰尼斯特

詹德利
'大牛' 铁匠学徒

爪牙锋利不留情

卡斯特梅的爵爷他这样说

你左边的胖子和他身边的小子

你们是谁?  密尔的索罗斯

安盖

无旗兄弟会

我不想跟他们走 这个兄弟会
I'm not going with them. The Brotherhood?

就是魔山和他的属下正在追寻的

我们正努力拯救它

We'll talk some more over brown bread and stew.

然后你们就可以接着赶你们的路了
And then you can go on your way.

When I'm done talking, that arrow's falling down on your fat head.

所以呢 我建议你赶紧挪个地方 因为我的话已经说完了
So I advise you move, because I'm done talking.

半个国度都在挨饿 而看看这家伙

他连试一试都不愿意

闭嘴 弑君者 在桥上任何人都看得到我们 但是从水里游过去 水流可能会把我们卷走 或者 我会趁机顺着水流逃走

椅子也比小议会厅的好
Better chairs than the old small council chamber.

跟共事的大臣们也真够近 这我喜欢
Conveniently close to your own quarters. I like it.

2 万低贱的北方人 都知道他已经失踪了好几周了
20,000 unwashed Northerners have known about his escape for weeks.

总体来说 我们掌握的密探和信息 比其他所有人都多
Collectively, you control more spies and informants than the rest of the world combined.

你们是想告诉我 你们当中没有一个人 知道他在哪里吗? 
Do you mean to tell me that none of you has any notion of where he is?

我们正在尽力 大人   那就尽全力
We are trying, my lord.  Try harder.

那目前我们知道什么? 
What do we have, then?

罗柏・史塔克还有他大部分军队正在奔流城 给他外祖父霍斯特・徒利举办葬礼
Robb Stark and most of his bannermen are in Riverrun for the funeral of his grandfather Lord Hoster Tully.

史塔克不在的时候 赫伦堡由卢斯・波顿镇守 这样一来 他就是事实上的赫伦堡公爵 只是少个头衔罢了   随便 让他占着吧
In Stark's absence, Roose Bolton holds Harrenhal, which would seem to make him Lord of Harrenhal, in practice if not in name.  Well, let him have it.

赫伦堡公爵的头衔 比起一堆废墟来说 对我们更有用
The name suits our purposes far more than that useless pile of rubble.

赫伦堡公爵将会是艾林家寡妇理想的配偶
The Lord of Harrenhal will make a worthy suitor for the widow Arryn.

对此我对您心怀感激 大人
For which I am extremely grateful to you, my lord.

艾林夫人和我青梅竹马
Lady Arryn and I have known each other since we were children.

她总是… 对我有好感
She has always been...  positively predisposed toward me.

如果求婚成功 贝里席大人将会成为谷地的主人
A successful courtship would make Lord Baelish acting Lord of the Vale.

一职生多职 倒是一点都不错
Titles do seem to breed titles.

你要前往艾林谷 越快越好 把莱莎・艾林管住
You'll leave for the Eyrie as soon as possible and bring Lysa Arryn into the fold.

这样少狼主就要把自己的小阿姨给 列为敌人了
Then the young wolf can add his own aunt to the list of people who have taken up arms against him.

我可无意于阻止真爱重逢啊 不过贝里席大人的离开会带来一定的问题
Far be it from me to hinder true love, but Lord Baelish's absence would present certain problems.

国王的婚礼 这项空前浩大的盛事 会因此夭折
The royal wedding may end up being the most expensive event in living memory.

夏天已经结束了 艰苦的日子还在前头呢
Summer has ended, hard days lie ahead.

现在把王室的财务搁置起来可不合适
Not a good time to leave the crown's finances unattended.

所以我要命你担任新的财务大臣
Which is why I'm naming you new Master of Coin.

这将会是最适合你的位置
It would appear to be a position that best suits your talents.

花钱我倒是很会 虽然我这辈子都腰缠万贯 但没学会怎么理财
I'm quite good at spending money, but a lifetime of outrageous wealth hasn't taught me much about managing it.

我一点都不怀疑你会证明自己能胜任这个挑战
I have no doubt you will prove equal to this challenge.

把她举在空中
He lifted her high in the air

他笑着喊着跟着香味在着弄
He sniffed and roared and smelled her there

遍踢遍喊 少女惊恐
She kicked and wailed, a maid so fair

可他舔蜂蜜的发丛
But he licked the honey from her hair

这头儿 那儿弄
From there to here, from here to there

全身黑棕 罩着毛绒
All black and brown and covered with hair

他跟随夏日里的气涌
He smelled that girl in the summer air

狗熊 狗熊 少女美容
The bear, the bear and the maiden fair...

这下你高兴啦
I hope you're pleased.

詹姆・兰尼斯特
'弑君者' 御林铁卫队长

如果你当初给我武器 他们就不会把我们抓了
If you had armed me, they never would have taken us.

我们被抓的时候你不是带着武器么
You were armed when we were taken.

你不记得我当时被锁起来了么
I was in chains if you recall.

要不是我的手被捆住了 我们的比试早就结束了
Our little match would have ended quite quick if my hands weren't bound.

我从小到大都听到说
All my life I've been hearing, 'Jaime Lannister,

你比我想象中要慢
You were slower than I expected.

而且也没那么难以预测
And more predictable.

那是因为我在满是淤泥的牢笼里 被铁链锁了整整一年
I've been sitting in a muddy pen wrapped in chains for the past year.

我可是个女人 照样把你给打败了
And I'm a woman. I was still beating you.

你可没有打败我
You were not beating me.

或许你是有像人们传说中那么厉害… 曾经是
Maybe you were as good as people said...  once.

或许人们只是喜欢鼓吹有名气的人
Or maybe people just love to overpraise a famous name.

今晚我们扎营的时候 你就会被强奸
When we make camp tonight, you'll be raped.

这些伙计可从没见过贵族女人
None of these fellows have ever been with a noblewoman.

你最好别反抗
You'd be wise not to resist.

是吗?   他们会打断你的牙齿
Would I?  They'll knock your teeth out.

你以为我会在乎自己的牙齿? 
You think I care about my teeth?

不 我不是担心你在乎自己的牙齿
No, I don't think you care about your teeth.

而是如果你反抗 他们会宰了你
If you fight them, they will kill you.

对他们有价值的犯人是我 而不是你
I'm the prisoner of value, not you.

他们要怎样就怎样好了 有什么要紧? 
Let them have what they want. What does it matter?

有什么要紧?   闭上你的眼睛
What does it matter?  Close your eyes.

假装他们是蓝礼
Pretend they're Renly.

如果你是个女人 你就不会反抗? 
If you were a woman, you wouldn't resist?

你就会让他们蹂躏? 
You'd let them do what they wanted?

如果我是个女人 我就让他们杀了我
If I was a woman, I'd make them kill me.

幸亏我不是 感谢诸神
But I'm not, thank the gods.

如果有合适的熔炉 我就可以把它铸得跟新的一样
If I had a proper forge, I could make it good as new.

詹德利
'大牛' 铁匠学徒

没必要弄的多漂亮
Doesn't have to look pretty.

It just has to keep the arrows out of my heart.

Why are you helping him?

比你见过的任何人都要好
Better than anyone you've ever met.

我喜欢近身搏斗
I like to fight up close.

我喜欢在我捅进别人身体的时候看着他的脸

安盖
'射手' 河湾地的弓箭手

跟路上遇到的破烂酒馆都一个样
Looks like every other shit inn on the road.

Now, apologies, but you're one ugly fucker and I'd rather not see you no more.

你干嘛呢?  我们要走了
What are you doing? We're about to leave.

I baked some brown bread for the innkeep and she said she never had better.

她告诉索罗斯要把我留下 作为一直给他提供免费食物的报酬

反正兄弟会又不想要我

我的兄弟可不是国王

I'm not a Stark of Winterhell.

Well, I made you something.

你也… 别烧到手指
You don't...  burn your fingers.

上马吧 小小姐
Up you go, little lady.

某人居然忘记了有仗在打 这可不好原谅啊
A person could almost be forgiven for forgetting we're at war.

对于世界上大部分地方来说 即便处于战争最黑暗的时期 也根本什么都没有发生 这样想常会让我心里安慰许多
It often comforts me to think that even in war's darkest days, in most places in the world absolutely nothing is happening.

我很想念你 叔叔
I've missed you, Uncle.

你离开这么久 父亲也很想念你
Father missed you, too, from the day you left.

或许他从来没有说出来过…
Maybe he never said it in so many words

你父亲是头顽固的老公牛
Your father was a stubborn old ox.

他死的时候我很惊讶
I was surprised when he died.

还以为死神对他没有那个耐性
Didn't think death had the patience.

你当时能陪在他身边实在太好了
I'm glad you were with him.

我多希望诸神让我当时也能在场
I wish to the gods I had been.

你们最终和解了吗? 
Did you make peace in the end?

吵了三十年
After 30 years of fighting,

大概他已经不记得最初是因为什么了
I don't think he remembered what started it.

他叫我别再自称黑鱼
He asked me to stop calling myself Blackfish.

他说那是个老掉牙的笑话 而且从一开始就不好笑
He said it was an old joke and it was never funny to begin with.

我告诉他 人们早已习惯叫我黑鱼 这么长时间之后 我的本名都被忘了
I told him people had been calling me Blackfish for so long, they don't remember my real name.

每次他离开奔流城去君临 或者去参加比武大会
Every time he would leave for the capital or fight in a campaign,

他会说 '等着我回来 小凯特'
'Wait for me, little Cat,' he'd say.

'等着我 我很快就会回来的'
'Wait for me and I'll come back to you.'

每天太阳升起的时候 我就坐在这个窗边等他
And I would sit at this window every day when the sun came up, waiting.

我常常想 布兰和瑞肯有多少次 在眺望临冬城的旷野 等着我回去
I wonder how many times did Bran or Rickon stare across the moors of Winterfell waiting for me to return.

我再也见不到他们了
I will never see them again.

别这么想
You mustn't think it.

我们还不知道确切情况
We don't know the truth.

他们可能藏起来了
They could be in hiding.

罗柏相信他们还活着

他坚信这一点

He's got to remain strong if he's to prevail.

你为了他也要坚强下去
And you must remain strong for him.

你是罗柏・史塔克的妻子

Is it true what they say about him?

I don't know. What do they say about him?

说他晚上会变成一头狼

还有其它的办法 更好的办法

但是还有人的血管里 也流淌着您的血

乔拉・莫尔蒙

这意味着在此之前 您的手上将会沾满鲜血

沾满敌人的血 而不是无辜者的
The blood of my enemies, not the blood of innocents.

你打过几次仗 巴利斯坦爵士? 
How many wars have you fought in, Ser Barristan?

三次  你见过的战争中 哪次没有牺牲成千上万的无辜者? 
Three.  Have you ever seen a war where innocents didn't die by the thousands?

君临陷落的时候我在场 卡丽熙

你猜我看到了什么?  屠杀
You know what I saw? Butchery.

婴儿 孩童 老人全都惨遭毒手
Babies, children, old men.

遭强暴的妇女更是无法尽数
More women raped than you can count.

每个人心中都有一头狂暴的野兽 只要武器交到他手中 那头野兽便会蠢蠢欲动
There's a beast in every man and it stirs when you put a sword in his hand.

但无垢者不是人
But the Unsullied are not men.

除非指挥官明确下令 他们不会劫掠城市
They do not put cities to the sword unless they're ordered to do so.

如果您买下他们 他们会只杀您想杀的人
If you buy them, the only men they'll kill are those you want dead.

你不这样认为吗 巴利斯坦爵士? 
Do you disagree, Ser Barristan?

当您的兄长雷加 率领军队在三叉戟河作战时 人们为他而死 是因为他们信任他 因为他们爱他 而并非因为他们在拍卖会上 被卖给了他
When your brother Rhaegar led his army into battle at the Trident, men died for him because they believed in him, because they loved him, not because they'd been bought at a slaver's auction.

那一天 我曾与最后的真龙并肩作战 陛下
I fought beside the last dragon on that day, Your Grace.
