我干嘛回来? 
Why do I want to return?

就为继续当个残废? 
So I can be a cripple again?

跟长在树里的老家伙闲扯淡? 
So I can talk to an old man in a tree?

你以为我愿意在这里坐上一千年 极目远眺这个世界 任由树根长进我的身体? 
You think I wanted to sit here for 1,000 years watching the world from a distance as the roots grew through me?

因为我在等你
I was waiting for you.

我可不想变成你这样
I don't want to be you.

你不会永远待在这儿
You won't be here forever.

你不会变成树里的老家伙
You won't be an old man in a tree.

但离开之前 你必须学习
But before you leave, you must learn.

丹妮莉丝·坦格利安
弥林的女王

真搞不懂 你们居然还穿得住一身皮甲
I don't know how you stand it in all that leather.

能让我们单独谈谈吗
If we could have the room.

你今天好美 亲爱的 真的
You look lovely today, my dear. You really do.

你怎么做到汗都不流就爬完这些台阶的? 
How you climbed all those steps without breaking a sweat.

你要是想拷问我 叫他们回来动手就行
If you're going to torture me, just call them back and get on with it.

尽管很多时候有些人活该受虐
Though it so often is what people deserve.

拷打的确也能问出答案
And it does provide answers.

不过通常都是错误答案罢了
But they're usually the wrong answers.

我的任务却是找到正确答案
My job is to find the right answers.

知道我会怎么做吗? 
Do you know how I do that?

我会让人开心
I do it by making people happy.

我也想让你开心 瓦拉
I'd like to make you happy, Vala.

这是你的名字 对吧 瓦拉? 
That's your name, isn't it, Vala?

我知道你是谁 知道你做过什么
I know who you are and what you've done.

你为达目的献出了你的身体 这就已经比大部分人做得多了
You've sacrificed your body for a cause, which is more than most people do.

你还帮助鹰身女妖之子 谋杀无垢者和次子团的人
And you've helped the Sons of the Harpy murder the Unsullied and the Second Sons.

无垢者和次子团是外国的战士 由外国的女王带领 毁掉了我们的城市与历史
The Unsullied and the Second Sons are foreign soldiers brought here by a foreign queen to destroy our city and our history.

从你的立场看 你的行为无可指责
Well, that makes perfect sense from your perspective.

当然了 你我立场不同
I have a different perspective, of course.

我觉得 重点是你应该站在我的立场上想想问题 正如我也会试着换位思考
I think it's important that you try to see things from my perspective just as I will try to see them from yours.

因为这是我让你和多姆都开心 的唯一办法
Because that is the only way that I can make you and Dom happy.

是这么发音吧 多姆? 
That is how you pronounce it... Dom?

很抱歉我不太擅长这种语言
I'm afraid I don't really speak the language.

那双棕色的大眼睛 希望不要太招女生喜欢
Those big, brown eyes. Good luck keeping the ladies away.

呵 你还真是个解放者 对吗? 
Yes, you're a true liberator, aren't you?

你不会拷问我 只会用我儿子作要挟
You won't torture me, you'll just threaten my son.

孩子是无辜的
Children are blameless.

我从没伤害过他们
I have never hurt them.

你儿子目前没危险 我向你发誓
Your boy is in no immediate danger, this I swear to you.

至于你呢 亲爱的 你曾密谋杀害女王的士兵
But between us, dear, you did conspire to kill the queen's soldiers.

我们都明白你将面临何种刑罚
We both know the penalty for that crime.

没了母亲 可怜的多姆该怎么活? 
How will poor Dom get on without his mother?

他还有气喘病
And with his breathing problem.

哪怕我招了一个字 他们都会杀了我
If I tell you anything, they'll kill me.

就算你不杀我 他们也会
So either you kill me or they do.

是啊 站在你的立场 这是个问题
Yes, from your perspective, this is a problem.

但你还有第三个选择
There is a third option, though.

明天有艘船去潘托斯
A ship leaving tomorrow for Pentos.

我已经帮一个女人和她儿子订了位置
I've already booked passage for a woman and her young son.

还留下一袋银币帮你们重新开始
I'll even throw in a bag of silver to help you start again.

不过 恐怕我得 喊一个穿皮甲的朋友帮你扛出去
Though I'm afraid we'll have to ask one of our leatherclad friends back in to carry it.

我觉得袋子太沉了
Far too heavy for me.

明天天一亮就开船
The boat sails at dawn.

你必须马上做决定
You need to decide now.

是你和多姆开始新的生活 还是…
A new life for you and Dom or...

就这么干等? 
What should we do while we wait?

不如干点什么打发时间吧? 
To pass the time, what should we do?

不聊点什么? 
What should we talk about?

你会说十九种语言
You speak 19 languages.

偶尔用它们聊聊天总可以吧
You must occasionally use some of them to talk about things.

你们俩 总是待在一起
You two, you spend a great deal of time together.

我不在的话 你们会聊什么? 
What would you be talking about if I weren't here?

聊我带领无垢者一起巡逻的事
When I am going on patrol with the Unsullied.

我们巡逻时看到了什么
What we see on patrol.

巡逻时抓住了谁
Who we captured on patrol.

很好 非常好
That's good. That's very good.

我觉得聊天不止如此
I was thinking more of a conversation.

有位智者说过 真正的世界历史 由豪华房间里发生的伟大聊天组成
A wise man once said the true history of the world is the history of great conversations in elegant rooms.

好吧 不聊天
All right, no conversations.

你俩不玩游戏吗 从没玩过? 
You don't play games, either one of you, ever?

游戏是小孩玩的
Games are for children.

我曾经的主人克拉兹尼有时会让我们玩游戏
My master Kraznys would sometimes make us play games.

看 一个好的开始
There, that's a start.

但只有女孩能玩 不不不
Only the girls. No, no, no.

不是 当然不是那种游戏
Not that. Of course not that.

我是说 纯洁又好玩的游戏
Innocent games. Fun games.

好吧 不喝酒
All right. No drinking.

不喝也能玩
We can play without drinking.

这是个很棒的游戏 我发明的
It's a wonderful game. I invented it.

我猜你们的过去
I make a statement about your past.

如果我猜错了 罚酒
If I'm wrong, I drink.

如果我猜对了… 不喝酒可能就玩不下去了
And if I'm right...  maybe we can't play without drinking.

哦 你真够准时的
Oh, you took your time.

我忙着打听究竟是谁资助鹰身女妖之子
I was busy learning who funds the Sons of the Harpy.

有些事情你急不得 你找到了吗? 
Some things you can't rush. You found out?

阿斯塔波的善主 还有渊凯的贤主
The Good Masters of Astapor and the Wise Masters of Yunkai.

以及他们的瓦兰提斯朋友
With help from their friends in Volantis.

你根本不用担心本地的叛乱
You don't even have to worry about the local rebellion.

我们只需要担心 三个资助他们的富有城邦
We only have to worry about the three rich foreign cities paying for it.

我们曾经征服过阿斯塔波和渊凯
We conquered Astapor and Yunkai once.

我们可再次征服他们 并处决那些奴隶主
We will do it again and execute the Masters.

若无垢者出兵重夺阿斯塔波和渊凯 谁留下保卫弥林的自由民? 
If the Unsullied march off to reconquer Astapor and Yunkai, who will remain to defend the free people of Meereen?

如果不出兵 如何阻止流血
If we do not fight them, how can we stop them?

奴隶主只说一种语言
The Masters speak only one language.

多年来他们一直对我说这种语言
They spoke it to me for many years.

我了解它更胜母语
I know it better than my mother tongue.

想让他们听话 我们必须用这种语言回敬
If we want them to hear us, we must speak it back to them.

让这些话为他们送终
May it be the last thing they ever hear.

所以要打了? 
So we will fight them?

告诉我 你的小小鸟儿能把消息传到 阿斯塔波的善主 渊凯的贤主 以及瓦兰提斯仁慈的奴隶贩子那里去么? 
Tell me, can your little birds get a message to the Good Masters of Astapor, the Wise Masters of Yunkai, and benevolent enslavers of Volantis?

当然 人无常善变 但小小鸟们永远值得信任
Of course. Men can be fickle, but birds I always trust.

亚瑟 你的眼睛看起来好多了
Your eye looks much better, Arthur.

你母亲的下巴怎么样了? 
How's your mother's jaw?

这结果相当不错
That worked out rather nicely.

瓦里斯大人会回来吗? 
Will Lord Varys ever come back?

他管我们叫小小鸟儿
He called us his little birds.

说起这个可就有意思了
It's funny you should mention that.

猜猜我今天碰巧找到了什么
Guess what I happened to find today.

多恩的梅子蜜饯
Candied plums from Dorne.

记住 如果你们的伙伴 喜欢吃糖果 或者需要帮助 尽管来找我
Now remember, if any of your friends like sweets or need help, they can always come to me.

只需跟我说说悄悄话
All I need in return are whispers.

不用害怕
No need to be afraid.

我的朋友就是他的朋友
He's friends with all my friends.

瓦里斯的小小鸟吗? 
Varys's little birds?

现在是您的小小鸟 陛下
Your little birds now, Your Grace.

你到底对他做了什么? 
What did you do to him exactly?

我一直没能弄清楚
I haven't been able to get a clear answer.

哦 我做了很多事情
Oh, a number of things.

他能明白我们在说什么吗? 
Does he understand what we're saying?

我是说 可以像以前那样 理解完整句子吗? 
I mean, to the extent that he ever understood complete sentences in the first place.

完全可以
He understands well enough.

那就告诉他杀去圣堂 把大麻雀的脑袋瓜捏碎
So tell him to march into the sept and crush the High Sparrow's head like a melon.

大麻雀有数百人的教团武装保护他
The High Sparrow has hundreds of Faith Militant surrounding him.

格雷果爵士没办法对付他们所有人
Ser Gregor can't face them all.

他也不需要
And he won't have to.

他只需要对付一个
He'll only have to face one.

教会提出正式的指控了吗? 
Has the Faith leveled official charges yet?

我真期待见证这场比武审判
That is one trial by combat I look forward to watching.

别局限于君临
Don't stop at the city.

我要小小鸟去多恩 去高庭 去北境
I want little birds in Dorne, in Highgarden, in the North.

如果有人想看我们的笑话 坐收渔利
If someone is planning on making our losses their gains,

如果有人敢嘲笑他们的太后 说她赤身游街 满身污垢
If someone is laughing at the queen who walked naked through the streets covered in shit,

我要知道他们是谁
I want to know who they are.

他们人在何处
I want to know where they are.

和瓦里斯大人一样坏 科本还要更坏
As bad as Lord Varys was, Qyburn is worse.

我跟他们都说了 我说了
I told them all. I told them.

他傲慢 危险
He's arrogant, dangerous.

他不会无缘无故地就被赶出学城
You don't get thrown out of the Citadel without good reason.

但没有人听我的话
And no one listened to my advice.

他在格雷果·克里冈身上做的事是邪恶的
And what he's done to Gregor Clegane is an abomination.

我们从未同意这个实验
We never sanctioned this experiment.

我个人认为我们最好 把这个野兽杀…
I for one think it will be in our best interest to have the beast dest...

有什么可以效劳的吗?  你怎么在这? 
Can I help you? Why are you here?

我的母亲…  亲爱的 我被邀请来 帮助解决一些棘手的问题 譬如王后被监禁
My mother... I was invited, my dear, to help deal with several troublesome issues, such as the queen's imprisonment.

亏你还提起这个
Thank you for bringing it up.

我们早就该讨论如何应对我所受的侮辱了
It's well past time we addressed the abuses I endured.

玛格丽才是王后
Margaery is the queen.

你不是 因为你没有嫁给国王
You are not the queen because you're not married to the king.

我能明白你们家族里 这些事情搞得有点混乱
I do appreciate these things can get a bit confusing in your family.

这里是御前会议
This is a small council meeting.

你无权出席御前会议
You have no position on the small council.

我是御林铁卫队长
I'm the Lord Commander of the Kingsguard.

御林铁卫队长 有权出席御前会议
The Lord Commander of the Kingsguard does have a position on the small council.

派席尔大学士 你认可吗? 
Grand Maester Pycelle, would you sanction that statement?

杰洛·海塔尔爵士 曾在疯王的御前会议有一席之地
I would say Ser Gerold Hightower had a seat on the Mad King's council.

但当然了 那是疯王
Of course, that was the Mad King.

劳勃国王认为不可
King Robert saw things differently.

弥赛菈的死怎么说 叔叔? 
What about Myrcella's death, Uncle?

您认为血亲被谋杀 是一个棘手的问题么? 
Do you consider the murder of your own blood a troublesome issue?

谋杀弥赛菈的那个女人 推翻了马泰尔家族 控制了多恩
The same women who murdered Myrcella have overthrown House Martell and taken control of Dorne.

我们需要讨论的问题太多了
We've got a lot to discuss.

既然你们无法让我们离开 就继续吧
And seeing as you cannot make us leave, we best get on with it.

的确 我们无法让你们离开
No, we cannot make you leave.

而你们也无法强迫我们留在这
And you cannot make us stay.

除非你让那东西把我们都杀了
Not unless you're gonna have that thing murder us all.

我母亲想来看望她女儿最后的安息之地
My mother would like to see her daughter's final resting place.

抱歉 陛下
I'm sorry, Your Grace.

这不可以 现在还不行
That's not possible. Not yet.

那何时可以? 
When will it be possible?

直到她赎清罪孽
When she's fully atoned for her sins.

你已斩下她的头发 令她在众目睽睽之下赤裸游行
You cut off her hair and marched her naked through the streets in front of the whole city.

这还不够赎罪吗? 
That wasn't the full atonement?!

她必须在七位修士面前接受审判 让我们了解她的全部罪行
She must stand trial before seven septons so we can learn the true extent of her sins.

我要你打开大门 让她来看望弥赛菈的安息之地
I want you to let her see Myrcella's resting place.

那么这对你意味着什么? 
And what does that mean to you?

这对我意义非凡
It means a great deal to me.

王权与信仰 乃是世界的两大支柱
The Crown and the Faith are the twin pillars of the world.

您知道这话是谁告诉我的? 
Do you know who told me that?

我那个'不洁'的母亲? 
My mother who is unclean?

我那个经受你种种折磨 却仍需赎罪的母亲? 
My mother who still needs to atone after all you've put her through?

您认为圣母首度降临是何情形? 
How do you think the Mother Above first came to us?

世上的男男女女 如何首度感受到圣母的存在? 
How did men and women first come to feel the Mother's presence?

是通过自己的母亲
It was through their own mothers.

瑟曦非常虚伪 这点您心知肚明
There's a great deal of falsehood in Cersei. You know that.

但当她谈及您时 母爱胜过了一切
But when she speaks of you, the Mother's love outshines it all.

她对您的爱 比世上任何东西都要真实 因为这种爱并非来自这个世界
Her love for you is more real than anything else in this world because it doesn't come from this world.

她对您说话的时候 您看见了圣母的影子
You've seen her when she talks to you.

又一项我应当忏悔的罪孽
One more thing for me to atone for.

哦陛下 您… 我可以坐下吗? 
Your Grace, do you... may I?

您的母亲踏上赎罪之行 是为了回到您身边
When your mother made her walk of atonement, she did it to get back to you.

我还是不明白你为什么不依不饶 还要让她承受更多折磨
I still don't understand why you want to put her through any more than she's already endured.

并不是我要这样做 是诸神
It's not what I want. It's what the gods want.

诸神向我们传达旨意 是否遵从则取决于我们
They make their will known to us and it's up to us to either accept or reject it.

如果我们一心向善 追求公正 那所有人都得遵从诸神的旨意 包括国王在内
If we're to be just and good, then we accept it, all of us, even kings.

真正的领袖会让最睿智者来辅佐他
A true leader avails himself of the wisest counsel he can.

而没有谁比诸神更睿智
And no one is wiser than the gods.

我祖父跟我说过类似的话
My grandfather once said something similar.

但他并没提到诸神的部分
Except for the part about the gods.

诸神透过他的嘴教诲你 无论他自己有没有意识到
The gods worked through him whether he knew it or not.

正如诸神也透过您的母亲
As they work through your mother.

每个人的内心都充满善意
There's so much good in all of us.

而我们能做的是引导他人向善
The best we can do is to help each other bring it out.

你在来这里之前是谁? 
Who were you before you came here?

跟我讲讲艾莉亚·史塔克的家庭
Tell me about Arya Stark's family.

她的父亲是艾德·史塔克
Her father was Eddard Stark.

她的母亲是凯特琳·史塔克
Her mother was Catelyn Stark.

她有一个姐姐 珊莎 还有四个兄弟
She had one sister, Sansa, and four brothers.

以及同父异母的哥哥琼恩
And a halfbrother Jon.

他们现在何处? 
And where are they now?

就女孩所知 他们可能已经死了
They may be dead for all a girl knows.

跟我讲讲猎狗的事
Tell me about the Hound.

艾莉亚·史塔克丢下他等死 他在她的名单上
Arya Stark left him to die. He was on her list.

他不在她的名单上
He was not on her list anymore.

她把他从里面去掉了
She had taken him off it.

为什么? 她不想让他死了吗? 
Why? Didn't she want him dead any longer?

她既想又不想
She did and she did not.

还有谁在艾莉亚·史塔克可笑的小名单上? 
Who else was on Arya Stark's funny little list?

你想杀的人肯定不止这些
That can't be everyone you want to kill.

你确定自己没有忘记谁吗? 
Are you sure you're not forgetting someone?

你想让女孩说出哪个名字? 
Which name would you like a girl to speak?

如果女孩告诉某人她的名字
If a girl tells me her name,

某人会把眼睛还给她
I will give her eyes back.

如果女孩真的是无名之辈 那她应当无所畏惧
If a girl is truly no one, she has nothing to fear.

安柏家族可是以忠诚著称
The Umbers are a famously loyal house.

以忠诚于史塔克著称
Famously loyal to the Starks.

而你 卡史塔克大人
And you, Lord Karstark.

你的家族与史塔克有共同的血脉 不是吗? 
Your people share blood with the Starks, don't they?

我们却都来到这里 世易时移
But here we are. Times change.

当我父亲成为北境守护的时候 你的家族拒绝向他效忠
When my father became Warden of the North, your house refused to pledge their banners.

你父亲是个混蛋
Your father was a cunt.

我亲爱的父亲 北境守护…
My beloved father, the Warden...

你父亲是个混蛋 所以你杀了他
Your father was a cunt and that's why you killed him.

想来我大概也会这么对付我父亲 如果他没有行行好自己死掉的话
I might have done the same to my father if he hadn't have done me the favor of dying on his own.

我父亲是被我们的敌人毒害的
My father was poisoned by our enemies.

你来临冬城做什么 安柏大人? 
Why have you come to Winterfell, Lord Umber?

那个野种琼恩·雪诺率领一支野人军队过了长城
The bastard Jon Snow led an army of wildlings past the Wall.

我们的领地比你们这帮混球更靠北
We're farther north than any of you fuckers.

每当野人南下 我们总是首先拿起武器
Wildlings come down, we always have to fight them first.

我喜欢打野人 我一辈子都在干这事
I like fighting wildlings. Been doing it all my life.

但他们人太多了 我们没法单干
But there are too many of them for us to beat back alone.

所以你现在是来求助? 
So now you've come seeking help?

我们得互相帮助
We need to help each other.

天气越冷 那些操山羊的蛮子就会越往南迁徙
The colder it gets, the farther south those goat fuckers will roam.

过不了多久就会到这儿
Won't take them long to get here.

你觉得一群野人能攻占临冬城? 
You think a horde of wildlings can take Winterfell?

如果有琼恩·雪诺作他们的头儿 那可说不准
If they get Jon Snow leading them, maybe.

他远比我们中的任何人更了解这里
He knows this place better than we ever will.

向波顿家族宣誓效忠
Pledge your banners to House Bolton.

承认我为北境守护 我就与你并肩作战 除掉那个野种 外加他所有的野人朋友
Swear loyalty to me as Warden of the North and we will fight together to destroy the bastard and all his wildling friends.

我不会吻你的脏手
I'm not kissing your fucking hand.

按传统 封臣应向封君下跪
Traditionally a bannerman kneels before his lord.

我也不会这么做
I'm not doing that either.

我凭什么要相信一个不尊重传统的人? 
Why would I trust a man who won't honor tradition?

你父亲尊重传统
Your father honored tradition.

他向罗柏·史塔克下跪
Knelt for Robb Stark.

拥戴其为北境之王
Called him King of the North.

罗柏·史塔克应当相信你父亲吗? 
Was Robb Stark right to trust your father?

看来 我们陷入了一个小小的僵局
Then it appears we're at a bit of an impasse.

去他妈的下跪 去他妈的宣誓
Fuck kneeling and fuck oaths.

我有个礼物给你
I've got a gift for you.

希望是个姑娘 我喜欢红发的
A girl, I hope. I prefer redheads.

还有个男孩 年轻又健康
And the boy, nice and young.

卡史塔克大人肯定喜欢
The way Karstark likes them.

你怎么证明这是瑞肯·史塔克? 
How do I know that's Rickon Stark?

欢迎回家 史塔克大人
Welcome home, Lord Stark.

有什么遗言 现在说吧
If you have any last words, now is the time.

你不该活着
You shouldn't be alive.

你们也不该谋杀我
Neither was killing me.

我母亲还住在白港
My mother's still living at White Harbor.

告诉她我死在与野人的战斗中
Tell her I died fighting the wildlings.

我有过选择 总司令大人
I had a choice, Lord Commander.

背叛你或背叛守夜人
Betray you or betray the Night's Watch.

你将一支野人军队带到了我们的土地上
You brought an army of wildlings into our lands.

一支杀人犯和掠袭者组成的军队
An army of murderers and raiders.

如果让我知道结局 再重来一次
If I had to do it all over knowing where I'd end up,

我祈祷自己能再次做出正确的选择
I pray I'd make the right choice again.

我确信你会的 艾里沙爵士
I'm sure you would, Ser Alliser.

可是你 雪诺大人 你将永世不得翻身
But you, Lord Snow, you'll be fighting their battles forever.

我们应该烧掉这些尸体
We should burn the bodies.

你要我做什么? 
What do you want me to do with this?

你拥有黑城堡了
You have Castle Black.

去干什么? 
What are you gonna do?

我和你在艰难屯的时候
I was with you at Hardhome.

我们看到了外面有什么
We saw what's out there.

我们都知道他们往这来了
We know it's coming here.

你怎能在这时抛下我们? 
How can you leave us now?

我能做的我都做了 你知道的
I did everything I could. You know that.

你发过誓 是的 我把我的生命献给了守夜人
You swore a vow. Aye, I pledged my life to the Night's Watch.

我付出了我的生命 '夜夜皆然'
I gave my life. For all nights to come.

他们杀了我 艾迪! 我的兄弟们
They killed me, Edd! My own brothers.

你还想让我留在这里? 
You want me to stay here after that?

你还记得老奶妈以前常做的腰花馅饼吗? 
Do you remember those kidney pies Old Nan used to make?

加了豌豆和洋葱的? 
With the peas and onions?

我们一开始就不该离开临冬城
We never should have left Winterfell.

你不希望回到我们离开的那天吗? 
Don't you wish we could go back to the day we left?

我真想对着我自己大喊'别去啊 白痴'
I want to scream at myself, 'Don't go, you idiot.'

我花了很多时间回想当初我对你有多么混蛋
I spent a lot of time thinking about what an ass I was to you.

我真希望我能改变一切
I wish I could change everything.

就承认吧 我很讨人厌
I was awful, just admit it.

你偶尔有些讨厌
You were occasionally awful.

但我肯定我是很无趣的
I'm sure I can't have been great fun.

总是在你们一起玩的时候缩在墙角闷闷不乐
Always sulking in the corner while the rest of you played.

你能原谅我吗?  没什么好原谅的
Can you forgive me? There's nothing to forgive.

原谅我 好吧
Forgive me. All right.

好吧 我原谅你
All right, I forgive you.

你觉得都几千年了 守夜人总该学会怎么酿出好酒吧
You'd think after thousands of years, the Night's Watch would have learned how to make a good ale.

要是我不照看着你 父亲的在天之灵不会放过我的
If I don't watch over you, Father's ghost will come back and murder me.

我不能待在这了 在发生了这些事以后
I can't stay here, not after what happened.

我们只有一个地方可以去
There's only one place we can go.

我们是该叫波顿打铺盖卷走人吗? 
Should we tell the Boltons to pack up and leave?

我们会从他们手里夺回来的
We'll take it back from them.

我没有军队
I don't have an army.

你救了多少野人? 
How many wildlings did you save?

他们不是来这为我效命的
They didn't come here to serve me.

他们的命是你给的
They owe you their lives.

你觉得有卢斯・波顿继续做北境守护他们会安全吗? 
You think they'll be safe here if Roose Bolton remains Warden of the North?

珊莎 临冬城是我们的家
Sansa. Winterfell is our home.

是我们的 也是艾莉亚 布兰和瑞肯的
It's ours and Arya's and Bran's and Rickon's.

不管他们在哪 它都属于我们家族
Wherever they are, it belongs to our family.

我们必须为它而战
We have to fight for it.

我已经厌倦战斗了
I'm tired of fighting.

自从离家我就一直在战斗
It's all I've done since I left home.

我杀过守夜人的兄弟
I've killed brothers of the Night's Watch.

我杀过野人 我杀过我敬仰的人
I've killed wildlings. I've killed men that I admire.

我绞死了一个比布兰还小的男孩
I hanged a boy younger than Bran.

如果我们不夺回北境 我们永远不会安全
If we don't take back the North, we'll never be safe.

我需要你帮助我
I want you to help me.

但如果有必要 我会亲自动手
But I'll do it myself if I have to.

梅丽珊卓
红袍祭司

你会留在黑城堡吗? 
Will you stay here at Castle Black?

我会谨遵琼恩・雪诺的命令
I will do as Jon Snow commands.

你现在效命琼恩・雪诺了? 
You serve Jon Snow now?

他是预言中的王子
He's the prince that was promised.

原谅我 女士 我还以为那是史坦尼斯

你们那边发生了什么?

打了场仗 史坦尼斯被打败了

公主怎么样了?

我看到史坦尼斯的大军被击溃

女士 我是戴佛斯・席渥斯爵士
My lady, I'm Ser Davos Seaworth.

我那时是蓝礼・拜拉席恩的御林铁卫
I was Kingsguard to Renly Baratheon.

直到蓝礼被血魔法暗杀而死
Before Renly was assassinated with bloodmagic.

那已经过去了
That's in the past now.

是的 是过去了
Yes, it's in the past.

并不意味着我忘掉了

他承认了 你知道的
He admitted it, you know.

就在我处决他之前
Just before I executed him.

谷地守护者!
The Defender of the Vale!

我错过了你的命名日 来吧
I missed your name day. Go on.

最名贵最稀有的鸟
The greatest and rarest of birds.

贝里席 上次我见到你的时候 你告诉我你要带着珊莎・史塔克回到五指半岛
Last time I saw you, Baelish, you told me you were taking Sansa Stark home with you to the Fingers.

但是不久前我们收到报告 说她嫁给了临冬城的拉姆斯・波顿
And yet not long ago, we received reports that she has been married to Ramsay Bolton in Winterfell.

去五指半岛的路上 我们遭到了一大批波顿军队的袭击
On our way to the Fingers, we were set upon by a large force of Bolton men.

他们似乎明确地知道我们何时出行 也明确地知道我们护送的是谁
Seemed to know exactly when we were traveling and exactly whom we were transporting.

你把我当白痴吗? 
Do you take me for a fool?

告诉我 罗伊斯大人 有多少人知道我与珊莎・史塔克的出行计划? 
Tell me, Lord Royce, how many people knew of my travel plans with Sansa Stark?

我只把我的打算告诉过你 别无二人
I shared my intentions with you and no one else.

在别人家里诽谤别人 接下来便是兵戎相见
Slander a man in his own home, you might find yourself crossing swords with him.

你的家属于谷地 而谷地主人就站在我们面前
Your home is the Vale. The Lord of the Vale stands before us.

主人说了算
And only his judgment concerns me.

我们应该把他扔下月门吗? 
Shall we throw him through the Moon Door?

大人 我一直对艾林家族尽诚竭节

无论是对令尊 令堂 还是现在的您
To your father, to your mother, and now to you.

你相信他吗 培提尔叔叔? 
Do you believe him, Uncle Petyr?

罗伊斯大人竭力效忠谷地
Lord Royce has served the Vale well.

戎马多年 战绩彪炳
He's enjoyed a distinguished military career.

如果他的忠诚值得信任 那么在即将到来的征战中他仍是总司令的绝佳人选
If we could trust his absolute loyalty, he would make a capable commander in the wars to come.

您大可相信我的绝对忠诚 大人
You can trust my absolute loyalty, my lord.

我认为他值得一次机会 您觉得呢? 
I think he deserves one more chance. What do you say?

我在北境的朋友告诉我珊莎・史塔克逃出了临冬城
My friends in the North tell me Sansa has escaped Winterfell.

我估计她已经去往黑城堡了 她的哥哥在那里做总司令

但她在那不安全 波顿正在追捕她
But she won't be safe there, not with the Boltons after her.

我的第一反应也是这个

集合谷地的骑士

加入战争的时候到了
The time has come to join the fray.

你把敌人请进了我们的城市?

一位智者曾经告诉我

I don't make peace with the queen's enemies.

我会杀死他们
I kill the queen's enemies.

对 那是军事手段

在弥林发挥了什么作用?

我表达的是外交手段
I represent the diplomatic approach.

女王试过与伟主们言和 他们却想要杀她

我们谈判时留点神
We enter these negotiations with open eyes.

相信我 我近期的奴隶经历 已经告诉我这项制度有多可怕了

您做了几天的奴隶呢? 
How many days were you a slave?

没有长到够你了解
Not long enough to understand.

我用一个辉币买了这个侏儒

不知何故你竟飞黄腾达 都住到弥林的大金字塔顶来了
And somehow you've risen to the top of the Great Pyramid of Meereen.

真让人称奇不已
It's most impressive.

现在你还代替阿斯塔波的善主发言呢
And now you speak for the Good Masters of Astapor.

敬时来运转
Here's to reversals of fortune.

我们是来这觐见女王的 结果 迎接我们的是侏儒和太监
We came here to meet the queen and instead we're greeted by a dwarf and a eunuch.

让我们摊开了说吧 好吗? 说说你们想要什么
Let's make this simple, shall we? Tell me what you want.

我们想要你们离开奴隶湾
We want you to leave Slaver's Bay.

带上你们的龙和雇佣兵 走人
Take your dragons and your mercenaries and go.

丹妮莉丝女王不会永远待在弥林的
Queen Daenerys won't stay in Meereen forever.

她的目标在西方
Her path takes her westward.

我们上次见面的时候 我提出给她船只 这样她就可以回到属于她的维斯特洛 但她拒绝了
When we last met, I offered her ships so she could return to Westeros where she belongs. She refused them.

她拒绝了 是因为成千上万的 男人女人和孩子还活在链铐之下
She refused them because hundreds of thousands of men, women, and children still lived in chains.

他们自古以来就是如此
As they have since the dawn of time.

不再是了 你觉得你现在就是自由人了吗? 
Not anymore. You think you're a free man now?

你还是在遵令行事
You still follow orders.

你的主人有银发和奶子 并不意味着她就不是奴隶主
Just because your master has silver hair and tits doesn't mean she's not a master.

朋友 朋友 朋友 拜托
Friends, friends, friends, please.

世上总是有有钱有势的人和一无所有的人
There have always been those with wealth and power and those with nothing.

世界的规则就是这样 我不是来改变世界规则的
That is the way of the world. I'm not here to change the way of the world.

奴隶制就是我们世界的规则
Slavery is the way of our world.

你们不是非得用奴隶来赚钱
You don't need slaves to make money.

维斯特洛几百年来都没有奴隶 我却比你们中任何一个都富有
There haven't been slaves in Westeros for hundreds of years and I grew up richer than any of you.

不过 我们的女王却发现她错在 只是废除奴隶制 却没有提供一个新的体系来取代它
But our queen recognizes that she erred by abolishing slavery without providing a new system to replace it.

所以这里是女王的提议
So here is the queen's proposal.

奴隶制永不回到弥林 但她会给奴隶湾的其他城市 一些时间来调整到新的秩序
Slavery will never return to Meereen, but she will give the other cities of Slaver's Bay time to adjust to the new order.

废除奴隶制不必一夜完成 可以宽限到七年
Instead of abolishing slavery overnight, we will give you seven years to end the practice.

奴隶主将获得补偿 价格公道
Slaveholders will be compensated for their losses, of course, at fair prices.

作为交换 你们要停止 对鹰身女妖之子的支持
In exchange, you will cut off your support for the Sons of the Harpy.

鹰身女妖之子和我们无关
We do not support the Sons of the Harpy.

好吧 随意了 总之你们会停止支持
Fine, fine, but you will cut it off all the same.

我希望你们接受 朋友们
I do hope you accept, my friends.

你们不会得到更好的条件了
You will not receive a better offer.

让我们扬帆于自由之潮 而不是被它吞没
Let us sail on the tide of freedom instead of being drowned by it.

我还给尊贵的客人们准备了点离别的礼物…
And as a parting gift to our honored guests...

给自由一个机会吧
Give freedom a chance.

它仍与从前一样甜美
See if it doesn't taste every bit as good as what came before.

要不我来替你作翻译吧
Perhaps I should translate for you.

我们会说通用语
We speak the Common Tongue.

真棒 今天你和奴隶贩子们见了面
Excellent. You met with the slavers today.

我们的兄弟姐妹们在和这些渣滓抗争的路上前仆后继
Our brothers and sisters died fighting this scum.

而你现在却邀请他们登堂入室 共饮美酒
Now you invite them to our city and drink wine with them.

我想建筑这个大厅的目的 是让统治者威慑被统治者
I imagine this room was built so the rulers could intimidate the ruled.

但我不是你们的统治者
But I am not your ruler.

不是解放者
I'm not the Breaker of Chains.

更不是龙之母
And I am certainly not the Mother of Dragons.

你在这里只是一个陌生人
You are a stranger here.

凭什么代表弥林和我们的敌人进行谈判?

因为我们的女王选择我作为她的顾问
Because our queen chose me as her advisor.

直到陛下旅途归来
Until she returns from her travels...

她什么时候才能回来? 
When does she return?

很快 我向你们保证
Soon. You have my word.

我们不认识你 更不信任你 我们熟知的是灰虫子
We don't know you. We don't trust you. We know Torgo Nudho.

我们随他抗击伟主 我们信任他
We fight with him against the Masters. We trust him.

这正是灰虫子参与谈判的原因
And that is exactly why Grey Worm took part in these negotiations.

作为无垢者军团的指挥官 他知道如何打败奴隶贩子 但他同样知道什么时候应该缔造和平
As commander of the Unsullied, he knows how to defeat the slavers and he knows when it is time to make peace.

你和那群奴隶贩子握手言和? 
You have made peace with the slavers?

不要搬我出来圆你的谎话 那些人尊重你
Do not use me for your lies. Those men respect you.

他们尊重我是因为他们对我知根知底
They respect me because they know who I am.

他们深知我的忠诚 我也一样
They know I am loyal. As do I.

我对女王陛下忠诚 而不是对你
I am loyal to my queen, not you.

如果你胆敢背叛她的事业 你就将是我之敌
If you betray her work, you are my enemy.

我没有背叛她的事业 我正试图挽救她的城市
I am not betraying her work. I am trying to save her city.

你向奴隶主承诺他们可以保留奴隶制
You promised the slavers they could keep slavery.

七年对奴隶来说可不是什么短期
Seven years is not a short time for a slave.

奴隶制可怖 应当即刻根除
Slavery is a horror that should be ended at once.

战争可怖 应当马上停止
War is a horror that should be ended at once.

但我没法两头兼顾
I can't do both today.

你不该信任那些人
You are wrong to trust these men.

我信任的不是奴隶主 而是他们为自己打算的心思
I don't trust the Masters. I trust their selfinterest.

如果他们确信与我合作对他们自己有利 那他们就可以被相信
They're trustworthy if they're convinced that working with me is in their selfinterest.

你不知道他们 你不了解他们
You don't know them. You don't understand them.

我们在他们眼里根本不是人
We are not human in their eyes.

当他们看向我 看到的是一把武器
They look at me and see a weapon.

当他们看向她 看到的是一个娼妓
They look at her and see a whore.

当他们看向我 看到的是一个畸形的小怪兽
They look at me and they see a misshapen little beast.

他们的蔑视造就他们的弱点
Their contempt is their weakness.

他们会低估我们 而我们会利用这一点
They'll underestimate us every time and we will use that to our advantage.

他们不可能为你所用
You will not use them.

他们会利用你 这是他们的天性
They will use you. That is what they do.

何不坐下来喘口气呢? 
Why don't you sit and catch your breath?

我觉得你骑不了龙
I don't think you could ride the dragon.

别看她很娇小 你懂的 其实她很狂野
She's wild, you know. Don't let her size fool you.

我这么年轻都难以招架
It's hard enough for me and I'm a young man.

你呢 我担心你的心脏受不了
You, I don't think your heart could take it.

女王陛下选择了我一定让你非常不爽
Must make you angry that our queen chose me.

我很难过 过不了太久你就会辜负她
Makes me sad. You'll disappoint her before long.

她会忘了你 我们都好景不长
She'll move on. We'll all disappoint her before long.

现在我们需要彼此 当我们不再需要彼此的时候…
We need each other right now. After we're done needing each other...

喔 我可不想和你打 安达尔人乔拉
Oh, I don't want to fight you, Jorah the Andal.

我能有什么好处? 
What do I have to gain?

如果我赢了 我就成了干翻一个老家伙的草包
If I win, I'm the shit who killed an old man.

万一我输了 我就成了被一个老家伙干翻的草包
If I lose, I'm the shit who was killed by an old man.

你小时候没受过多少管束 是吧? 
You didn't get much discipline as a child, did you?

这条路直穿马门 他们叫它众神大道
The road running through the Horse Gate, they call that the godsway.

东市 西市
Eastern Market, Western Market.

卓戈卡奥死后 她本该来到这里 加入那些遗孀 成为多希卡林的一员
When Khal Drogo died, she was supposed to come here and join the Dosh Khaleen the widows of the dead khals.

那就是他们要带她去的地方 多希卡林神庙
That's where they would have taken her the Temple of the Dosh Khaleen.

这座马族圣城禁止携带武器出入
It's forbidden to carry weapons in the sacred city.

难道潜入城中偷走他们的卡丽熙就不禁止吗? 
Isn't it forbidden to sneak into their city and steal their khaleesi?

如果他们发现了我们 而我们手无寸铁 我们就说我们是要去西市的商人
If they spot us and we're unarmed, we'll say we're traders heading for the Western Market.

但如果他们看到武器…
But if they see weapons...

你这是在要求一条狗交出它的牙
You're asking a dog to hand over his teeth.

下面有十万人
There's 100,000 of them down there.

我们不能硬闯
We can't fight our way out.

我们等到天黑 然后找到她
We wait till dark, and then we'll find her.

这把刀和我有很深的羁绊
I'm very attached to this knife.

别担心 不会碰到你
Don't worry. It didn't touch you.

你知道这意味着什么? 
You know what happens?

我应该投胎成一个多斯拉克人的
I should have been born a Dothraki.

告诉过你这把刀和我的羁绊很深的
Told you, I'm very attached to this knife.

如果他们发现一具被捅死的尸体 全城的人都会出动搜查我们
If they find a body with a stab wound, the whole city will be looking for us.

住手 不要伤害她 她会出卖我们
No, don't hurt her. She'll give us away.

我们不可能从维斯・多斯拉克活着出去
We will never get out of Vaes Dothrak alive.

我们所能做的就是奋力一搏
All we can do is try.

我们所能做的比那多得多
We can do more than that.

而你们要助我一臂之力
And you're going to help me.

如果我现在让你离开 你会去哪里? 
If I were to let you leave right now, where would you go?

你会去找寻什么? 
What would you seek out?

我会去见我的哥哥 我的丈夫 我的家人
I'd go to my brother, my husband, my family.

那是自然 但对你而言 这就意味着找寻金钱
Of course, but for you, that means seeking out money,

大麻雀 华服 权柄
总主教 finery, power.

找寻家人即是找寻罪恶
Seeking out your family means seeking out sin.

我并不是诋毁你
I'm not maligning you.

我也曾追寻那些东西
I sought those things out, too.

重视他们超过一切
To the exclusion of all else.

我父亲是鞋匠
My father was a cobbler.

他在我年轻时去世  我继承了他的店
He died when I was young and I took over his shop.

他是个简单的人  做的鞋也很简便
He was a simple man and he made simple shoes.

可是我后来发现  我在制鞋上的功夫用的越多 卖的也就越好
But I found that the more work I put into my shoes, the more people wanted them.

上好的皮革 装饰 细节设计以及花费的时间
Fine leather, ornamentation, detailing, and time.

花去几十个钟头来制作一双鞋
Dozens of hours spent on a single pair.

我估计你一直都穿着某人花去一整年时间 所制成的鞋
I imagine you've worn a year of someone's life on your back.

贵族喜欢用我的生命去呵护他们的脚 而且他们对此也给予丰厚的报酬
The highborn liked to cover their feet with my time and they paid well for the privilege.

我用他们给的钱 去为自己购买机会 享受他们那种生活
I used their money to buy a taste of their lives for myself.

每当我沉溺于此
Each time I indulged,

我都能感觉自己变得更好了
I felt myself ascending to something better.

后有某日汝穿过墓园 顿悟世事皆为浮云 乃下决心追逐正义
And one day you walked through a graveyard and realized it was all for nothing and set out on the path to righteousness.

陌客之书, 第 25 节
Book of the Stranger, verse 25.

你知道《七星圣经》? 
You know 'The SevenPointed Star.'

乌尼亚修女给我读过   她无时不刻不在读
Septa Unella reads it to me. At me.

是的  是的  她确实喜欢对人宣讲
Yes, yes, she does enjoy reading at people.

不过那不是墓园
But it wasn't a graveyard.

我买了好酒陈酿 还有很多年轻漂亮的女孩 邀请朋友们前来 一起分享
I bought old fine wine and young pretty girls and invited my friends to come and share it all.

我们分享美酒  分享女人 陷入了恍惚状态
We passed around the wine, passed around the women, and soon we fell into a stupor.

几乎不能站直身
I could barely stand.

其他所有人都在长椅或者地上睡着 乱七八糟地睡在他们昂贵的衣服旁边
Everyone else was asleep on the couches or on the floor, lying in heaps next to their fine clothes.

他们的身体一览无余
The truth of their bodies laid bare.

我可以闻到他们 透过熏香和香水 还有美味佳肴已经开始变质的味道
I could smell them beneath the incense and the perfume and the fine food that had already started to turn.

我非常清晰地看到了这一切
And I saw it with perfect clarity.

我看到了我的罪
I saw what my sins were.

我拥有的金子  我喝过的酒  我上过的女人 我为保住地位而做出的不懈努力
The gold I had, the wine I drank, the women I used, my ceaseless struggle to maintain my position.

这都成了故事的一部分
It was all part of a story.

一个我用来告诫自己'我是谁? '的故事
A story I was telling myself about who I was.

一个在光明之下无所遁形的 谎言的集合
A collection of lies that would disappear in the light.

那些我曾避之唯恐不及的人 街上的乞丐 穷苦人 他们比曾经的我更加接近真实
The people I was trying to climb away from, the beggars in the street, the poor, they were closer to the truth than I ever was.

我离开过去的生活 前去找寻他们
I left to go and find them.

我甚至连鞋都没穿
I didn't even put on my shoes.

我走出了门就再也没回去
I walked out the door and never went back.

来吧  我们去看看他
Come, let's go and see him.

你必须保持坚强
You need to stay strong.

你是我们家族的未来 我们血脉的未来
You are the future of our house, the future of our family.

我才不在乎那个
I don't care about that.

你难道... 你难道告诉他们那个了? 
Have you... have you told them that?

我只想一切停下来
I just want it to stop.

他们想让我帮你
They want me to help you.

他们想让我帮忙  把你逼疯
They want me to help tear you down.

这就是为什么他让我来看你  我知道会是这样
That's why he's letting me see you. I know it is.

如果我们之中谁屈从于他们  他们就赢了
And if either of us give in to what they want, then they win.

在当前的窘境下 如何避免灾难的降临
And now, how to avert disaster with our current predicament.

陛下  我应付过各种各样的狂信徒
I have dealt with fanatics of every description, Your Grace.

不要激怒他们  这是最重要的事情
Not setting them off, that's the most important thing.

你已经深陷内部和外部的敌人包围了
You are beset with enemies both within and without.

你在这里做什么? 
What are you doing here?

我就当前的窘境来给国王提供谏言
I am advising the king on our current predicament.

出去  我可是御前重臣
Leave. I am a member of the small council.

这是御前会议吗? 
Is this a small council meeting?

我来这是奉献我的智慧和支持
I'm here to lend my wisdom and my support.

感谢你的谏言  国师
Thank you for your counsel, Grand Maester.

今天就到此为止吧
That will be all for now.

鉴于我错过了之前多次御前会议
Since I've missed the past several small council meetings,

我想与你讨论几件事
I wanted to speak to you about a few things.

我一直在思考大麻雀
I've been thinking about the High Sparrow.

彼此彼此 真不幸
As have we all, unfortunately.

我们和这样一个人打交道时必须小心
We need to be careful in dealing with such a man.

避免事态进一步升级
To prevent things from escalating any further.

避免与其敌对
We have to be careful not to antagonize him.

他手上押着玛格丽  我们不能拿她冒险
He has Margaery. We can't put her at risk.

他很危险  看着我
He's dangerous. Look at me.

他们对我做了什么? 
What did they do to me?

对国王的亲生母亲? 
To the king's own mother?

已经过去了  成了过去时
It's done. It's in the past.

玛格丽的安全是第一位的
Margaery's safety is paramount.

你不喜欢玛格丽  对吧? 
You don't like Margaery, do you?

我喜不喜欢她根本无关紧要
Whether I like her or not is completely unimportant.

玛格丽是王后
Margaery is the queen.

王后要有尊严  国王更须如此
Queens must command respect. Kings even more so.

这不仅仅是为了他们  更是为了所有人
Not just for their own sake, but for everyone's.

大麻雀对国王和王后没有尊重
The High Sparrow has no respect for kings or queens.

对世上任何事情都没有尊重
No respect for anything in this world.

他根本不在乎世上的一切存在
He has no use for the things of this world.

他想将一切扳倒  然后用什么来取而代之? 
He wants to knock them down and replace them with what?

用街上的乞丐
With beggars in the street.

母亲… 有些事我想告诉您
Mother...  there's something I want to tell you.

大麻雀告诉我的事
Something the High Sparrow told me.

你和他谈过了? 
You've spoken with him?

我答应过他不会告诉任何人  如果他发现我…
I promised him I wouldn't tell anyone. If he found out I told...

那就是他不会轻易饶恕的泄密行为了 瞧瞧他天天宣讲做人的真实
It would be a breach of confidence which he would not take lightly given his constant prattling about the truth.

你永远可以信任我
You can always trust me.

根据国王陛下的命令 御前会议推迟举行
The small council meeting has been postponed on the king's orders.

我还以为我们第一次会面时已经说得很清楚了
I would have thought we were perfectly clear the first time.

你在这里不受欢迎  你说过你尊重我们的父亲 是因为他懂得和对手一起共事的重要性
You're not welcome. You once spoke of your respect for our father because he understood the necessity of working with one's rivals.

亲爱的  你已经毫无尊严和权威可言 公开羞辱 然后软禁在红堡
My dear, you have been stripped of your dignity and authority, publically shamed, and confined to the Red Keep.

还有什么共事的资本? 
What's left to work with?

瑟曦是国王的母亲
Cersei is the mother of the king.

国王肯听她的意见 也信任她
She has the king's ear and his trust.

并且国王最近经常和大麻雀一起讨论 玛格丽王后和洛拉斯爵士
And the king has been speaking regularly with the High Sparrow about Queen Margaery and Ser Loras.

大麻雀能够攫取权力 正因为看透了我们只会在内部争吵而不是将其夺回
The High Sparrow seized power knowing full well we'd bicker amongst ourselves instead of seizing it back.

下场如此  我们真不赖
Here we are. Well done to us.

现在七国的未来 全操于他肮脏的农民之手
Now the future of the Seven Kingdoms rests in his dirty peasant hands.

几天后  他将对我进行审判
In a few days, he'll have a trial for me.

不过在此之前  玛格丽王后要先进行赎罪之旅
But before that, Queen Margaery will make her walk of atonement.

是的  玛格丽将要当着全城的善男信女的面 忏悔罪行
Yes, Margaery will repent her sins before the good people of the city.

不会发生
That will not happen.

你有维斯特洛大陆第二多的军队
You've got the second largest army in Westeros.

你将带他们进城 在玛格丽王后被羞辱之前阻止它发生 并将她带回王宫监护
You'll bring them into the city, stop Queen Margaery's humiliation before it starts, and take her back into Crown custody.

为了王后的安全 国王已命我不要采取任何针对大麻雀 或教团武装的行动
The king has ordered me to take no action against the High Sparrow or the Faith Militant out of fear for the queen's safety.

你无需行动
You will take no action at all.

当提利尔军队来的时候  你让开就是
When the Tyrell armies come, you will stand down.

国王的命令严格要求您不能让开吗? 
Are you expressly forbidden from standing down?

是的  不过如果国王…
No, but if the king should call...

整个事件将在任何人要求你做任何事情之前结束
The whole thing will be over before anyone can call on you to do anything.

那时大麻雀已被监禁 最好是死了 玛格丽已回到托曼身边 你觉得国王会对结果生气吗? 
When the High Sparrow is in custody or dead, preferably, and Margaery's back at Tommen's side, do you think the king will be angry at the outcome?

你和我们一样讨厌这些狂信徒
You hate these fanatics as much as we do.

你恨他们对你儿子的所作所为
You hate what they've done to your son.

你想要蓝塞尔回来吗? 
Do you want Lancel back?

还是说你已经彻底放弃他了? 
Or have you given him up for good?

我当然想要他回来
Of course I want him back.

那就让开吧 让那些将他从你身边夺走的人付出代价
Then stand aside and let the people that took him from you be destroyed.

如果一切没有按计划进行 麻雀们在城里有很多盟友
If it doesn't go as planned, the sparrows have many friends in this city.

内战将会爆发   很多人会死
We'll have civil war. Many will die.

无论我们做什么都会有很多人死去
Many will die no matter what we do.

他们说你回来了 我不信
They told me you were home and I didn't believe it.

我说 '席恩・葛雷乔伊吗? '
'Theon Greyjoy?' I said.

好多人为了救你而死
Men died trying to rescue you.

你是个被宠坏了的混蛋 但你是我弟弟 我为你赌上了一切 你却背叛了我
You were a spoiled little cunt, but you were my brother and I risked everything for you and you betrayed me.

我知道 我知道 我对不起你
I know. I know and I'm sorry.

他让我崩溃成了无数碎片
He broke me into 1,000 pieces.

我知道 你不知道
I know. You don't know.

他送了一片给我们
He sent us one of those pieces.

所以我才去救你
That's why I came for you.

你为什么回来
Why did you come here?

我还有什么地方可去? 
Where else could I go?

你听到父亲死了 就想回来争夺王位吗? 
You heard Father was dead and you thought you'd claim the crown?

不 不是的  入港之后我才知道他去世了
No, no. I only heard he died after we docked.

恰好在选王会之前回到派克岛? 
You happen to show up on Pyke right before the kingsmoot?

你觉得你搞了那些事情出来后 还会有铁民想要拥戴你? 
You think any ironborn wants you to be king after what you've done?

我不想当国王
I don't want to be king.

我应该听你的话 你是唯一一个…
I should have listened to you. You're the only one...

无所谓了 别哭了
That doesn't matter anymore. Stop crying.

告诉我你到底想要什么
Tell me what you want.

你应该统治铁群岛
You should rule the Iron Islands.

他们把你收拾得挺干净
They've cleaned you up nicely.

你见过我的家徽吗? 
You've seen my banners?

你害怕吗? 
Does that worry you at all?

我可是见过人吃人
Then I've seen worse.

你服侍过史塔克家? 
You served the Starks?

是的 他们用链子锁着我 拿剑抵在我的喉咙上 所以我服侍他们
Aye. They put me in chains and put a sword at my throat, so I served them.

史塔克家族覆灭已久 但你一直保护着瑞肯
The Starks have been gone for a long time, but you kept protecting Rickon.

找得到合适的买家 他能卖个好价钱
He'd fetch a good price to the right buyer.

我服侍他家族那么久
I served his family a long time.

依我看 这是他们欠我的
Way I see it, I'm owed.

瑞肯再也不是你可以卖的了
Rickon's not yours to sell anymore.

所以你现在还有什么用呢? 
So what use could I possibly have for you?

我可以给你你想要的
I can give you what you want.

你真的知道我想要什么吗? 
And you're sure you know what that is?

男人都想要一个东西
Same thing men always want.

男人想要的时候 就会先给她洗个澡
And when they really want it, they give it a bath first.

你真会说话
You're a good talker.

你比席恩・葛雷乔伊会说多了
You're a much better talker than Theon Greyjoy.

让他开口说话真费劲
I had to work hard to get him talking.

他什么都说了
He told me everything.

史塔克家男孩们的一切 谁帮他们逃跑 她是怎么帮的
All about the Stark boys, who helped them escape, and how she did it.

吃的不好 抱歉
Sorry about the food.

我们可不以美食闻名
It's not what we're known for.

没关系 你们有更重要的事
That's all right. There are more important things.

你的信 总司令大人
A letter for you, Lord Commander.

我已经不是总司令了
I'm not Lord Commander anymore.

叛徒及野种琼恩・雪诺
'To the traitor and bastard Jon Snow.

你让数以千计的野人越过了绝境长城
You allowed thousands of wildlings past the Wall.

你背叛了自己人
You have betrayed your own kind.

你背叛了北境
You have betrayed the North.

临冬城是我的 野种 来看看吧
Winterfell is mine, bastard. Come and see.

你弟弟瑞肯在我的地牢里
Your brother Rickon is in my dungeon.

他的冰原狼的皮铺在我的地板上
His direwolf's skin is on my floor.

来看看吧 我要我的新娘
Come and see. I want my bride back.

交出她 野种 我便不找你或你的野人朋友们的麻烦
Send her to me, bastard, and I will not trouble you or your wildling lovers.

如若不肯 我会向北进军 大肆屠戮 所有在你庇护之下的野人 不管是男人 女人或小孩
Keep her from me and I will ride north and slaughter every wildling man, woman, and babe living under your protection.

我会当着你的面活剥他们 我会…
You will watch as I skin them living. You... '

都是类似的话
It's just more of the same.

让你眼睁睁地看着我的士兵轮奸你的妹妹
'You will watch as my soldiers take turns raping your sister.

我会让你眼睁睁的看着我的狗 吃了你狂野的幼弟
You will watch as my dogs devour your wild little brother.

然后我会挖出你的眼睛 剩下的留给我的狗
Then I will spoon your eyes from their sockets and let my dogs do the rest.

来看看吧 拉姆斯・波顿 临冬城公爵和 北境守护
Come and see. Ramsay Bolton, Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North.'

临冬城公爵和北境守护
Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North.

现在他手里还有瑞肯 我们不能确定
And now he has Rickon. We don't know that.

他有多少兵? 
How many men does he have in his army?

他说起史坦尼斯的进攻时 提到有五千人
I heard him say 5,000 once when he was talking about Stannis's attack.

你有多少人? 
How many do you have?

能行军打仗的? 
That can march and fight?

剩下的是小孩和老人
The rest are children and old people.

你是真正的北境守护之子
You're the son of the last true Warden of the North.

北境家族都很忠诚 只要你要求 他们会和你并肩战斗
Northern families are loyal. They'll fight for you if you ask.

那个魔鬼抢走了我们的家 我们的弟弟
A monster has taken our home and our brother.

我们必须回到临冬城 把他们都抢回来
We have to go back to Winterfell and save them both.

鼹鼠村离这多远? 
How far is Mole's Town?

听说您逃出临冬城 我万分惊惧
When I heard you had escaped Winterfell, I feared the worst.

见您毫发无损 我欣喜至极
You have no idea how happy I am to see you unharmed.

你来这做什么? 
What are you doing here?

我率谷地的骑士北上 前来救援
I rode north with the Knights of the Vale to come to your aid.

此刻他们正在卡林湾扎营
They're encamped at Moat Cailin as we speak.

你了解拉姆斯么? 
Did you know about Ramsay?

如果你不了解 你就是个白痴
If you didn't know, you're an idiot.

如果你了解 你就是我的敌人
If you did know, you're my enemy.

想听听我们新婚之夜的故事么? 
Would you like to hear about our wedding night?

他没有打我的脸
He never hurt my face.

他需要我这张脸 奈德・史塔克之女的这张脸
He needed my face, the face of Ned Stark's daughter.

但对我身体的其余部分 他肆意妄为 只要我还能为他生出继承人
But the rest of me, he did what he liked with the rest of me as long as I could still give him an heir.

你觉得他做了什么? 
What do you think he did?

我无法想象…
I can't begin to contemplate...

你觉得他对我做了什么?

Her dragons are fire made flesh, a gift from the Lord of Light.

但这些你都听过 不是吗? 
But you heard all of this before, haven't you?

在瓦兰提斯的长桥上
On the Long Bridge of Volantis.

巨龙会净化成千上万的异端 把他们的罪恶和肉体焚烧殆尽
The dragons will purify nonbelievers by the thousands, burning their sins and flesh away.

理想情况下 我们不想净化过多的异端
Ideally we'd avoid purifying too many nonbelievers.

龙之母有很多不同信仰的追随者
The Mother of Dragons has followers of many different faiths.

你想要你的女王被崇拜和服从
You want your queen to be worshipped and obeyed.

在她缺席期间 你还想要她的顾问们 被崇拜和服从
And while she's gone, you want her advisors to be worshipped and obeyed.

服从就够了
I'd settle for obeyed.

我会召来我最有说服力的祭司们
I will summon my most eloquent priests.

他们会把我的话散播出去
They will spread the word.

丹妮莉丝被派来带领人民对抗黑暗 不仅是这场战争 还有未来的大战
Daenerys has been sent to lead the people against the darkness in this war and in the great war still to come.

听起来很棒
That sounds most excellent.

你们的一个红袍女祭司曾宣称 被选中的是一个叫史坦尼斯・拜拉席恩的人
A man named Stannis Baratheon was anointed as the chosen one by one of your priestesses.

他同样怀有伟大使命
He, too, had a glorious destiny.

结果他进军君临 被打得落花流水 打败他的人就是我身边这位
He attacked King's Landing and was soundly defeated by the man standing beside me.

上次我听说 他又被打败了 这次是在临冬城 他彻底歇菜了
Last I had heard, he had been defeated again, this time at Winterfell and this time for good.

我们对您能提供给女王的任何支持都表示感谢
We'd be most grateful for any support you could provide the queen.

我想身为狂热者的人 应该很难承认错误
I suppose it's hard for a fanatic to admit a mistake.

这不正是狂信徒的意义所在吗? 
Isn't that the whole point of being a fanatic?

一切都是真主的旨意
Everything is the Lord's will.

一切都是真主的旨意
Everything is the Lord's will.

但是凡人都可能会犯错误

我的朋友对信仰怀有一些合理的疑惑 然而我们都是女王陛下忠诚的支持者
My friend has a healthy skepticism of religion, but we are all loyal supporters of the queen.

每个人变成什么样子 身处何地 都是有原因的
Everyone is what they are and where they are for a reason.

可怕的事情发生也有原因
Terrible things happen for a reason.

比如幼年时期发生在你身上的事 瓦里斯大人
Take what happened to you, Lord Varys, when you were a child.

如果你没有在一个二流术士手上被阉割 你怎会在这里帮助真主的选民将光明带给世界? 
If not for your mutilation at the hand of a secondrate sorcerer, you wouldn't be here helping the Lord's Chosen bring his light into the world.

知识让你变得强大
Knowledge has made you powerful.

但是你不知道的事情还太多太多
But there's still so much you don't know.

你还记得那天晚上听到了什么 当术士将你那话儿扔进火中的时候?

你听到了火焰中的声音 还记得吗?

要我告诉你那声音说了什么吗?

我不知道 他离我很近 但是…

几乎不了解 夫人
Precious little, my lady.

我父亲总说 北境人与众不同
My father always said Northerners are different.

更忠实 对外人更猜忌

我可能不了解北境 但我了解人性
I may not know the North, but I know men.

无论在世界的哪个角落 他们基本是一样的 哪怕最勇敢的人也不想看着 自己的妻儿因战败被剥皮
They're more or less the same in any corner of the world and even the bravest of them don't want to see their wives and children skinned for a lost cause.

琼恩要想说服他们并肩作战 就要让他们知道我们有赢的把握

二十多个 加在一起足以和其他人抗衡

我们可以积少成多

他们不会遗忘史塔克这个姓氏

你说得对 他不是

这已经花了我好一阵子
It's taken me a while.

你在说什么?

你是个好人 你一直都是好人
You're a good person. You've always been a good person.

你是我所知道的最好的人

我只是告诉他你对穷人的帮助
I was just telling him about your devotion to the poor.

Ah, yes, I visited their hovels and I fed them soup and I made sure I was seen doing it.

但是 我从来都没有给过他们真正需要的东西
I never gave them what they really needed, though.

我想了很久 想到我给自己装扮上多么好看的伪装
I've had lots of time to think about how good I was at seeming good.

我给自己讲的那些故事 关于我是谁 我为什么要做这些事

那些故事里面有太多的谎言
There were so many lies in those stories.

没事 真没什么

永远都爱

他的灵魂纯洁而完美

穿着这个不好走路
It's hard to walk in this.

这鹿肉 很好吃
This venison, it's very tasty.

是今天猎到的吗? 
Is it from today's hunt?

今天的我们还没处理好
We haven't been able to cure that one yet.

哦 当然 很抱歉
Oh, of course. Sorry.

我们从七十码外的地方
Brought it down from 70 yards.

哦 那… 那可真是够远的
Oh, that's... that's a fair distance.

你在长城的时候经常打猎吗? 
So do you do much hunting up at the Wall?

在长城以北的地方 你不打猎就没得吃
North of the Wall, you don't hunt, you don't eat.

猎物大多是鹿吧? 也是麋鹿? 
Mostly deer or is it elk as well?

我说的'我们'主要是指我和我朋友琼恩
I say 'we,' it's my friend Jon mostly.

她… 她也是个相当棒的猎手
She's... she's quite a good hunter as well.

我觉得在你的家乡这应该挺常见的
I imagine it's common where you're from.

我们遇到过最后壁炉城的安柏大人 对吧 蓝道 他说他教自己所有的女儿打猎
We once met a man, Lord Umber from Last Hearth, wasn't it, Randyll, who said he taught all his daughters how to hunt.

你父亲教你打猎的? 
Your father taught you to hunt?

我们的父亲可永远都不会这么做
Our father would never teach us.

我猜没准他能从你父亲身上学点东西
I think our father could learn a thing or two from your father.

到此为止
That's enough of that.

山姆威尔 你还想再来点面包吗? 
Samwell, would you care for more bread?

哦 是的 要的 谢谢
Oh, yes. Yes, please.

你还嫌自己不够胖吗? 
Not fat enough already?

我是奉总司令大人的命令来到南方的
I travelled south under orders from the Lord Commander.

他想让我…   我读了你的信
He wants me to...  I read your letter.

你想要当学士
You're to be a maester.

一旦我拥有了自己的颈链
And once I have my chain,

便会回到黑城堡
I'll return to Castle Black.

我以为守夜人会把你变成一个真男人
I thought the Night's Watch might make a man of you.

至少也该有点男人的模样
Something resembling a man at least.

结果你却依旧如此软弱 胖得不行
You managed to stay soft and fat.

就知道一头扎进书堆
Your nose buried in books.

一辈子都在阅读更优秀的人所取得的成就
Spending your life reading about the achievements of better men.

我敢打赌你还是骑不上马 挥不动剑
I'll wager you still can't sit a horse or wield a sword.

蓝道 成为守夜人的学士是很高的荣誉
Randyll, to be maester of the Night's Watch is a great honor.

他能挥剑
He can wield a sword.

还杀死过一个异鬼
He killed a white walker.

根本没有异鬼这种东西
There's no such thing.

在南下黑城堡的路上 我亲眼所见
I saw it with my own eyes on our way down to Castle Black.

他把一柄匕首捅进了异鬼的心脏
He drove a dagger into the walker's heart.

他不止一次冒着生命危险救我
He risked his own life to save mine more than once.

他是一名战士 取得的成就是你们一辈子都得不到的
He's a greater warrior than either of you will ever be.

你南下黑城堡的路上? 
Your way down to Castle Black?

他在哪儿杀死异鬼的? 
Where did he kill a white walker?

你是怎么遇到我儿子的? 
How'd you come to meet my son?

守夜人去了我们的堡垒
The Night's Watch came to our keep.

长城以北  长城以北? 
North of the Wall.  North of the Wall?

近几个世纪以来 七大王国都在抵抗这些野蛮人的入侵 而我却在家里盛情款待他们中的一个 真是多亏了我的好儿子
The Seven Kingdoms have waged war against these savages for centuries and here I sit hosting one in my hall thanks to my son.

它叫'碎心'
It's called Heartsbane.

已经在我们家族流传了五百多年
It's been in our family for 500 years.

全世界也没有几把留存了
Only a handful of them left in the world.

在我死后 它理应由我的长子继承
It's supposed to go to my firstborn son after I die.

但他永远也别想得到这把剑
He will never wield that sword.

如果他成为了角陵的塔利伯爵 那将会是这个家族的末日
If he were to become Lord Tarly of Horn Hill, it would be the end of this house.

我见到你的时候以为你是个鼹鼠村的妓女 然后我接受了这个事实
I took you for a Mole's Town whore when I saw you and I made my peace with that.

有什么人会爱上他? 
Who else would have him?

但我真是高估了他
But I overestimated him.

一个野人婊子诱惑了我儿子
It was a wildling whore that seduced my son.

你这是在报复我吗 小子? 
This you getting back at me, boy?

把那东西带到我的餐桌上 让它和我共进晚餐? 
Bringing that to my table and making me dine with it?

你得到了自己一直想要的 对吗? 
And you got what you were after, didn't you?

一个私生子 一个血统不正的私生子
A bastard. A half breed bastard.

作为你回家的邀请函
Your invitation into our home.

来吧 亲爱的 塔拉
Come, my dear. Talla.

我吃不下去了
I've lost my appetite.

你丢了你自己的脸
You dishonor yourself.

你母亲心地善良 你不配做她的儿子
Your mother's a fine woman. You're not worthy of her.

为了让她开心 我会留下那野人 她可以在厨房打杂
To please her, I'll take the wildling in. She can work in the kitchens.

你的私生子也可以由我们抚养
The bastard will be raised here.

但今晚会是你这辈子在角陵的最后一个晚上
But this will be the last night you ever spend at Horn Hill.

我很抱歉让他这样对待你
I'm sorry I let him treat you that way.

我害怕他会赶走你和小山姆
I was afraid he'd turn you and Little Sam away.

我并不生你的气
I'm not angry at you.

让我生气的是那些可怕的人 他们那样对待好人却不受到任何惩罚
I'm angry that horrible people can treat good people that way and get away with it.

你什么时候离开? 
When do you have to go?

替我向他道别
Say good bye to him for me.

你不是他所说的那样 山姆
You're not what he thinks you are, Sam.

他并不了解你是什么样的人
He doesn't know what you are.

什么?   收拾好东西
What?  Get your things.

我什么东西也没有
I don't have any things.

你在干什么啊?   我们应该在一起
What are you doing?  We belong together.

你母亲和妹妹怎么办? 
What about your mother and sister?

哦 她们会理解的
Oh, they'll understand.

反正你穿着更好看
Looks better on you anyway.

那是你父亲的剑
That's your father's sword.

这是我家族的剑
It's my family's sword.

他不会来找剑吗? 
Won't he come for it?

那就让他来啊
He can bloody well try.

狮子与玫瑰已合而为一
The lion and the rose are one.

为此我感谢天上的神碉
I thank the gods above.

而你 我美丽动人的新娘
And to you, my beauteous bride,

我宣誓我的爱至死不渝
I pledge undying love.

乔佛里国王万岁 玛格丽王后万岁
Hail King Joffrey. Hail Queen Margaery.

我将向我的新后祝酒致敬 没有什么比这更加合情
I'll drink a toast to my new queen, for there is no one fairer.

亲爱的舅舅 你愿分享我的喜悦 做我的御用斟酒人吗? 
Dear Uncle, will you share my joy and be my royal cupbearer?

大口喝吧 我尊贵的国王 尽情享受这杯香甜佳酿
Drink long and deep, my noble king, from this cup of sweet wine.

这将是他人生的最后一口
The last drink he shall ever take.

而我则会迎来美妙的复仇
And vengeance shall be mine.

我的小金狮 被无礼 粗暴地害死
My golden lion foully, falsely slain.

我祈祷你能享有永久的宁静 永不再陷入斗争与痛病
I pray you found a lasting peace free from strife and pain.

残酷的诸神啊 听我诉说
Hear my prayer, O cruel gods.

请带走我来换取他的重生
Take my life instead.

若我心爱的孩子已经死去 哪怕一天我也难以支撑
For I cannot face another day when my sweet boy is dead.

最黑暗的日子啊 我的内心充满了悲伤
Oh, darkest day, my heart is full of sorrow.

仿佛明日将不会降临这个世上
And there is no tomorrow.

什么声音? 什么味道? 
What is that I hear and smell?

我就要送那人踏上地狱之道
Someone I'll soon send to hell.

他们说泰温・兰尼斯特拉出的都是黄金 是时候来看看他们是不是在骗人
It's time to see if truth they told who said Tywin Lannister shits gold.

你这畜牲 你这畜牲
You beast. You beast.

你杀了我妻 现在又将你父亲置于死地
You killed my wife and now you've taken your father's life.

不曾有比你更恶毒的子女玷污过这片土地
No worse child ever stained this land.

我诅咒我命名你的那日
Curse the day I named you.

这是我罪恶之极 现在我必须逃离
My greatest crime. Now I must flee.

到狭海彼岸之地 将更多背叛送抵
Then sail across the Narrow Sea to do unto you more treachery.

论可怕 寒冬怎与我相比!
Don't fear winter. Fear me!

女士们先生们 向您介绍比安卡
Ladies and gentlemen, I give you Bianca,

最后隆重介绍 甜美的克连恩夫人
And last but not least, sweet Lady Crane.

好好拍拍这衣服 把那些跳蚤甩下去 乖
Give this a good beating. Shake those fleas out. That's a dear.

你回来做什么? 
What are you doing back here?

那天观众里也有你
I saw you the other day in the audience.

这愚蠢的戏你都看过几遍了? 
How many times have you seen this stupid play?

我记得演员去我们村庄时
I remember when the players came to my village.

我没有钱 于是我偷偷溜了进去
I didn't have any money, so I snuck in.

我看到上了妆的脸 戏服 听了歌 在年轻的恋人相拥而死时痛哭
Saw the painted faces, the costumes, listened to the songs, cried when the young lovers died in each other's arms.

第二天 我离家加入了他们 从此再未回头
I ran off and joined them the next day, never looked back.

我最后那段独白像屎一样
My final speech is shit.

但就像我经常说的 也是摸着良心说的 剧本写得不好
But to be fair to myself, which I always like to be, the writing's no good.

没有你的话 他们不过就是在放屁打嗝 打打闹闹
It would all just be farting, belching, and slapping without you.

你想怎么改? 
How would you change it?

王太后爱她的孩子 胜过一切
The queen loves her son more than anything.

他被夺走生命 她却不及告别
And he was taken from her before she could say good bye.

她不会只是哭泣
She wouldn't just cry.

她要杀死谋杀她儿子的人
She would want to kill the person who did this to her.

你有双会说话的眼睛 茉慈
You have very expressive eyes, Mercy.

你喜欢扮成其他人吗? 
Do you like pretending to be other people?

我得走了 我父亲在等我
I have to go. My father's waiting for me.

克连恩夫人 他们爱您
Lady Crane, they loved you.

他们真可爱 要不就是喝醉了
They were sweet. Or drunk.

奈德死的时候没人笑
No laugh for Ned's death.

这些人真是比动物还蠢
These people are worse than animals.

但他们爱她 他们全都爱她
But they loved her. They all love her.

是啊 你人兽通吃啊
Yes, you are adored by people and animals alike.

我只是善用天赋 尽己所能
I do what I can with what I'm given.

用你的天赋? 
With what you're given?

额 我在想…
Well, I was thinking...

哦 现在我们都是思想家了 是么? 
Oh, we're all thinkers now, are we?

奶头里都是想法
Full to the tits with ideas.

我不是说… 你有个想法 我有个想法 他也有个想法
I didn't mean...  You have ideas, I have ideas, he has ideas.

为什么我的想法比你们的更有价值?  就因为我一辈子都在干这个
Why should my ideas have any more value than yours simply because I've been doing this my whole life?

谁想来评判我的工作? 
Who is anyone to judge my work?

这是我的专业 我知道我在做什么
This is my profession. I know what I'm doing.

你没有权利拥有想法
You have no right to an opinion.

女孩很有天赋
A girl had many gifts.

别让她太受罪
Don't let her suffer.

朋友们 是时候了
My friends, the hour has come.

疯狂已经占领了这座城市 置我的孩子于它的魔爪之下
Madness has overtaken this city and grasped in its claws my children.

但现在我们必须将它赶走 让它从哪来就回哪去
But now we must drive it back under the rocks whence it came.

疯狂已到尽头!
Madness has had its day!

富贵抑或贫穷 高尚抑或平庸 一旦有罪 皆需赎罪
Rich or poor, noble or common, if we sin, we must atone.

提利尔家族的玛格丽 以罪人之身至此
Margaery of House Tyrell came to us a sinner.

她在圣堂中面对诸神 撒了谎
She stood before the gods in the holy sept and lied.

她对其弟犯下的罪行视若无睹
She turned a blind eye to her brother's sins.

她令她的家族蒙羞 令国王蒙羞 令自己蒙羞
She disgraced her house, her king, and herself.

我们为玛格丽王后和洛拉斯・提利尔爵士而来
We're here for Queen Margaery and Ser Loras Tyrell.

把他们交出来 否则我们不客气
Give them to us and we'll be on our way.

我无权把他们交给你们
I don't have the authority to give them to you.

而你们也无权把他们带走
And you don't have the authority to take them.

我代表拜拉席恩家族的托曼一世国王
I speak for King Tommen of House Baratheon, First of His Name.

诸神并不认为他有权处理此事
The gods don't recognize his authority in this matter.

你已经侮辱了一个大家族
You've already insulted one great house.

不会再有第二个
It won't happen twice.

玛格丽・提利尔若走下这条街道 我就把所有麻雀都杀光
Every last sparrow will die before Margaery Tyrell walks down that street.

因侍奉诸神而死 我们每个人都会倍感欣慰
To die in the service of the gods would please each and every one of us.

但我们今天不必如此
But there is no call for it today.

今天不会有赎罪游街
There will be no walk of atonement.

玛格丽王后已经赎罪 她已将另一人 带入七神的光芒之下
Queen Margaery has already atoned for her sins by bringing another into the true light of the Seven.

我们一同宣布 迎来一个崭新的和谐时代
Together we announce a new age of harmony.

迎来王权和神权的 神圣同盟
A holy alliance between the Crown and the Faith.

托曼国王万岁 愿诸神保佑你 玛格丽王后
Long live King Tommen and bless you, Queen Margaery!

王权和神权 是这个世界的两大支柱
The Crown and the Faith are the twin pillars upon which the world rests.

我们将一同恢复七国的荣耀
Together we will restore the Seven Kingdoms to glory.

就是这么回事
That's what's happening.

你跟教会作对 就是跟国王作对
When you attack the Faith, you attack the Crown.

任何跟国王作对的人 都不适合担任御林铁卫
Anyone who attacks the Crown is unfit to serve as Lord Commander of the Kingsguard.

从你出生之前我一直是御林铁卫
I've been a member of the Kingsguard since before you were born.

你不必如此 你不必做任何事
You don't have to do this. You don't have to do anything.

我必须给诸神交代
I have to answer to the gods.

坐在上王位的人不用给教会任何交代
Not when you're sitting in that chair.

此事的决定没有回旋余地
The Crown's decision on this matter is final.

那你要我脱光了游街吗? 
Will I be walking naked in the streets?

还是说我会在圣堂地牢里待上几个月 教教我什么叫诸神的仁慈? 
Or will I spend a few months in the sept dungeons first to teach me about the gods' mercy?

你已经忠诚地侍奉你的家族和国王很多年了
You have served your house and your king faithfully for many years.

你将继续如此
And you will continue to do so.

但不是在君临
But not in this city.

那是座城堡 不是他妈的绵羊
It's a castle, not a bloody sheep.

你还知道它在哪儿吧
Presumably you still know where it is.

你不是弄丢了奔流城
You didn't lose Riverrun.

而是让黑鱼抢去了
You let the Blackfish take it from you.

他突袭我们 他比任何人都熟悉那座城堡
He surprised us. He knows the castle better than anyone.

红色婚礼之后 你的确把黑鱼弄丢了
You did lose the Blackfish after the Red Wedding.

他就在这个大厅里 你却让他给跑了
You had him right here in this hall and you let him leave.

我让你去抓住他 杀掉他 你却连人影都没找到
Then when I told you to hunt him down and kill him, you couldn't find him.

这才叫弄丢了
That's what it means to lose something.

如今他回来了 还抢去了奔流城
Now he's come back and taken Riverrun.

我不觉得应该怪我们
I don't think it's fair to blame us...

三百年来 我们一直在亲徒利家的靴子 向他们和他们那臭烘烘的鳟鱼旗子誓忠
For 300 years we kissed Tully boots, swore oaths to them and their stinking fish banners.

再也不能这样了 奔流城是我们的
Not again. Riverrun is ours.

我们人手不够
We don't have the men.

我们的人手是那条死鱼的十倍
We've got 10 times as many men as the damn Blackfish.

梅利斯特家族叛变了 布莱伍德家族也是
The Mallisters have risen against us. And the Blackwoods.

无旗兄弟会在召集平民造反 袭击我们的补给车队和营地
The Brotherhood Without Banners is rallying the commoners against us, raiding our supply trains and camps.

奔流城经得住一年的围攻
Riverrun can withstand a siege for a year.

如果你们只提得出借口 不如让她来管事
If I want excuses, I'll put her in charge.

他们在嘲笑我们
They're laughing at us.

整个河间地 直到君临 都在嘲笑我们
All across the Riverlands right down to King's Landing, they're laughing at us.

我睡觉的时候都听得见!
I hear it in my sleep!

你们真是不走运 我还没死呢
I'm not dead yet, unfortunately for you.

在他们把自己的嘲笑吞回去噎死之前  我绝不咽气
And I'll not leave this world until they all choke on that laughter.

把城堡夺回来
Take that castle back.

他不会投降的 父亲
He'll never yield, Father.

你把你那把刀拿给他看 那把刀杀了罗柏・史塔克的婊子肚子里的孩子 你也把你的刀拿出来 那把割了他侄女喉咙的刀
You'll show him the knife you used to kill Robb Stark's child in his whore mother's belly, and you'll show him the knife you used to open his niece's throat.

然后你们给他提提醒 红色婚礼是为谁办的婚礼
And you'll remind him who it was that got married at the Red Wedding in the first place.

开心点 艾德慕大人
Cheer up, Lord Edmure.

我被派去对付黑鱼
I'm being sent to deal with the Blackfish.

瓦德・佛雷显然没法自己应付 因为他都四百岁了
Apparently Walder Frey can't manage it on his own because he's 400 years old.

给我一支军队去河间地 围城估计得持续几个月
Sent me with an army to the Riverlands and a siege that could last months.

去外地带兵 总比被抓进圣堂的地牢好
Better you're elsewhere at the head of an army than in the sept dungeons.

我不会去河间地的
I'm not going to the Riverlands.

我要给波隆备下世人不敢想象的巨额酬金 让他召集最好的杀手
I'm going to give Bronn the largest bag of gold anyone's ever seen and have him gather the best killers he knows.

然后我带他们去大圣堂 砍掉大麻雀的头 砍掉所有麻雀的头
I'll take them to the sept and I'll remove the High Sparrow's head and every other sparrow head I can find.

你不能这么做  他抢走了我们的儿子! 他偷走了我们的儿子!
You can't.  He has our son! He stole our son!

他在分裂我们的家族
He's torn our family apart.

我们该如何处置那些分裂我们的人? 
How should we treat people who tear us apart?

绝不放过他们 不给他们任何慈悲
We should treat them without mercy and we will.

但如果你杀了大麻雀 你不会活着离开圣堂的
But if you kill the High Sparrow, you won't leave the sept alive.

而没有你 一切都毫无意义
And without you, this is all for nothing.

立于军队之首 那是属于你的位置 也是父亲想要你在的位置
Stand at the head of our army where you belong, where Father wanted you.

让我们的人看清楚 他们应该向谁效忠
Show our men where their loyalties belong.

让他们看看兰尼斯特家族的样子 和我们处置敌人的手段
Show them what Lannisters are, what we do to our enemies.

把那个愚蠢的小城堡夺回来 因为它是我们的 因为你做得到
And take that stupid little castle back because it's ours and because you can.

你马上要接受审判了 我得守着你
You'll stand trial soon. I need to be here for you.

那会是一场比武审判
It will be a trial by combat.

他们这些人 只能让我们更强大
They've made us both stronger, all of them.

他们不知道我们有多强大
They have no idea how strong we are.

不知道等待他们的是什么下场
No idea what we're going to do to them.

我们一直在一起
We've always been together.

也会永远在一起
We'll always be together.

全世界只有我俩
We're the only two people in the world.

三眼乌鸦派我来的
The Three Eyed Raven sent for me.

三眼乌鸦死了
The Three Eyed Raven's dead.

我上次见到你的时候 你还是个孩子
When I last saw you, you were a boy.

最喜欢爬城墙 把他的母亲吓得不轻
Loved to climb the castle walls, frighten his mother.

琼恩最后一次来信说 你在长城之外失踪了
The last letter Jon wrote me said you had been lost beyond the Wall.

我带领一队游骑兵深入北方 寻找白鬼的踪迹
I led a ranging party deep into the North to find white walkers.

一个白鬼用冰剑捅了我的肚子
A white walker stabbed me in the gut with a sword of ice.

留下我等死
Left me there to die.

森林之子发现了我
The Children found me.

阻止了异鬼的魔法
Stopped the walker's magic from taking hold.

和他们当初造出异鬼的方法一样
The same way they made the walkers in the first place.

一片龙晶刺入心脏
A shard of dragonglass plunged into your heart.

现在你成为了三眼乌鸦
You are the Three Eyed Raven now.

我没时间去学 我什么都控制不了
I didn't have time to learn. I can't control anything.

在夜王到来之前 你必须学会控制
You must learn to control it before the Night King comes.

他总会找到办法 攻入人类世界
One way or another, he will find his way to the world of men.

当他到来时 你会在等候着他
When he does, you will be there waiting for him.

你要做好准备
And you will be ready.

丹妮莉丝・坦格利安
'风暴降生' 弥林的女王

一切还好吗? 
Everything all right?

到弥林还要骑多少天? 
How many days' ride to Meereen?

把我的卡拉萨带回维斯特洛需要多少艘船? 
How many ships will I need to bring my khalasar to Westeros?

多斯拉克人以及他们的马 无垢者 次子团… 至少需要一千艘船
Dothraki and all their horses, the Unsullied, the Second Sons...  a 1,000 ships easily.

或许更多  谁有那么多艘船? 
Probably more.  And who has that many?

所以我们骑马回弥林 然后启航去维斯特洛
So we ride for Meereen and after that we sail for Westeros.

你不适合坐在宫殿里的王位上
You weren't made to sit on a chair in a palace.

你是个征服者 风暴降生的丹妮莉丝
You're a conqueror, Daenerys Stormborn.

来吧 再加把劲儿
Hey, come on. Put your back into it, huh?

哦 先生们 这边请 往右走
Oh, gentlemen, please. To my right.

还有你们 加油 不要停下来
And you lot, come on. Come on, get it moving.

我活了这么多年 还从没见过一个人能像你这样挥动斧头
In all my days I've never seen a man swing an ax like that.

得多少人才能把你撂倒? 
How many men did it take to cut you down?

他一定是个怪物
He must have been some kind of monster.

我想有些人有点怕你
I think some of the men are a bit afraid of you.

当我发现你时 以为你已经死了好几天
When I found you, I thought you'd been dead for days.

身体发臭 上面都是虫子 骨头也露出来了
The way you were stinking already and you had bugs all over you and bone was coming through right there.

我还想着要给你个体面的葬礼呢 你却突然开始咳嗽
I was gonna give you a proper burial and then you coughed.

差点给我吓出屎来
Oh, nearly shit myself.

把你放到马车上时 我以为你会死 可你没有
I reckoned you were gonna die by the time I loaded you on the wagon, but you didn't.

在接下来的几天里 我觉得你一定会死个十几回 可你没有 是什么让你活了下来? 
Now, I reckoned you'd die a dozen more times over the next few days, but you didn't. What kept you going?

不 你还待在这儿是有原因的
No, there's a reason you're still here.

是啊 是有原因的 我是个大浑蛋 很难被杀死
Aye, there's a reason. I'm a big fucker and I'm tough to kill.

诸神还不准备收了你
Gods aren't done with you yet.

我以前听说过这话
I've heard that before.

不过那人谈的是别的神
Man was talking about a different god, though.

也许他是对的
Well, maybe he was right.

我不太了解神
I don't know much about the gods.

你入错行了
You're in the wrong line of work.

哦 有很多虔诚的王八蛋 他们以为自己了解上帝或神的话
Oh, there's plenty of pious sons of bitches who think they know the word of god or gods.

我不了解 我甚至不知道惦们真正的名字
I don't. I don't even know their real names.

也许是七神 也许是旧神
Maybe it is the Seven. Or maybe it's the old gods.

也许是光之王
Or maybe it's the Lord of Light.

也许他们都他妈是一种东西
Or maybe they're all the same fucking thing.

我认为 最重要的 是有些事物比我们自身伟大得多
What matters, I believe, is that there's something greater than us.

不管是什么 惦对桑铎・克里冈有自己的打算
And whatever it is, it's got plans for Sandor Clegane.

你不了解过去的我
You didn't know me back in my time.

你不了解我做过的事
You don't know the things I've done.

如果诸神真的存在 惦们为什么没有惩罚我? 
If the gods are real...  why haven't they punished me?

今天我们读什么? 
What are we reading today?

圣母之书 总主教大人
The Book of the Mother, Your Holiness.

第三章 第 12 节
Chapter three, verse 12.

'可以磨平石头 一个女人的爱同样可以 抚平一个男人的残暴天性
'Smoothing what was jagged, so does a woman's love calm a man's brute nature.

妻子抚平丈夫的伤痛 慈母的歌声让儿子睡着'
A wife salves her husband's wounds, a mother sings her son to sleep.'

有些人知道神圣文本里的每一节内容 但他们的血液里没有圣母的一丝怜悯 而根本不会阅读的野蛮人 却理解圣父的智慧
There are some who know every verse of the sacred text, but don't have a drop of the Mother's mercy in their blood and savages who can't read at all who understand the Father's wisdom.

多年来 我假装 爱穷人 爱那些受折磨的人
For years I pretended to love the poor, the afflicted.

我同情他们 但我从未爱过他们
I had pity for them, but I never loved them.

很难去爱他们
They are hard to love.

穷人使我们厌恶 因为他们就是我们 只是被剥夺了我们拥有的幻想
The poor disgust us because they are us, shorn of our illusions.

他们展示了我们褪去漂亮衣服的样子
They show us what we'd look like without our fine clothes.

我们没用香水时的味道
How'd we smell without perfume.

我可以问您一个私人问题吗? 
Can I ask you about a personal matter?

国王提到自从你们重聚 您还没有睡上他的婚床
The king mentioned that since your reunion, you haven't joined him in the marriage bed.

殿下 您有职责
You have a duty, Your Grace.

无论是对您的丈夫 您的国王 您的国家 还是对您信仰的神
To your husband, your king, your country, to the gods themselves.

只是… 曾经的欲望一去不返
It's just...  the desires that once drove me no longer do.

国会不需要女人有欲望 只要求女人有耐心
Congress does not require desire on the woman's part, only patience.

国王必须有继承人 如果我们还想继续我们的事业
The king must have an heir if we are to continue our good work.

有时很难找到真正的道路
Sometimes the true path is hard to find.

很难找到 更难走
Hard to find and harder still to walk upon.

但你已经取得了很大的进步
But you've made great progress.

我只祈祷你祖母能紧随你的脚步
I only pray your grandmother follows your lead.

荆棘女王是个了不起的女人 一个坚强的女人 也是一个不思悔改的罪人
The Queen of Thorns is a remarkable woman, a strong woman, and an unrepentant sinner.

你必须教她新的方式 就像她曾教你老的方式
You must teach her the new way as she taught you the old.

否则我会担心她的安全 身心安全
Or I fear for her safety, body and soul.

它会动 会说话吗? 
Does it move or talk?

我想和你单独谈话
I want to speak with you alone.

乌尼亚修女一直是我真正的朋友和顾问
Septa Unella has been my true friend and counselor.

你现在不是在你的圣所 亲爱的
You're not in your sanctuary now, my dear.

我只需要吹个口哨 我的人就会到这儿来 给你一顿海扁…
All I have to do is whistle and my men will stroll in here and bash you about...

祖母 直到我叫停为止
Grandmother. Until I tell them to stop.

如果我让他们停下的话
If I tell them to stop.

真该打你一顿 奶奶 求您了

他们对你做了什么? 
What have they done to you?

你们向大麻雀进军 反对教团 我们是为了你才出兵的

诸神原本会惩罚您和父亲 但他们没有
The gods could have punished you and Father, but they didn't.

They showed mercy. And what about your brother?

他们给了他什么样的仁慈?

他是高庭的继承人  提利尔家族的未来
He is the heir to Highgarden, the future of House Tyrell.

作为一个盲目的狂热分子
As a mindless fanatic.

你今天就回高庭
You will leave for Highgarden today.

没有法律规定你必须待在这儿
There is no law that says you must stay here.

我有责任侍奉我的丈夫 他是国王

Your place is at home.

I will never leave you. Never.

在祈祷和善行中找到安慰

圣母照看着所有人
The Mother watches over us all.

希望能尽早再见 亲爱的
I'll see you soon, my dear.

七神保佑您 奶奶

我们说过会和你并肩战斗 乌鸦王 只等时机成熟 我们是认真的 但这和我们说好的不一样
We said we'd fight with you, King Crow, when the time comes and we meant it, but this isn't what we agreed to.

这些不是白鬼
These aren't white walkers.

这不是死亡军团
This isn't an army of the dead.

这不是我们要打的仗
This isn't our fight.

如果没有他 我们不会站在这里
If it weren't for him, none of us would be here.

你们都会成为夜王军队里的臭肉

我将是一堆烧焦的骨头 就像曼斯

还记得曼斯的营地吗?

它一直延伸到地平线
It stretched all the way to the horizon.

数十部族 数百代人
Dozens of tribes, hundreds of generations.

就像从未出现过一样

We'll be the last of the free folk.

如果我们输了 这将是你们的下场

知道其中有一多半是妇孺

这不是你们的战斗
This isn't your fight.

I shouldn't be asking you.

乌鸦们杀了他 就因为他替自由民说话 其他南方人不会这样

如果我们不为他做同样的事 那和懦夫有什么区别
If we are not willing to do the same for him, we're cowards.

如果我们就是懦夫 那自由民活该终于我们之手
And if that's what we are, we deserve to be the last of the free folk.

你能确定他们会来么? 
Are you sure they'll come?

我们不像你们南方人那么油滑
We're not clever like you southerners.

我们说什么 就是什么
When we say we'll do something, we do it.

我听说您要离开君临了
I heard you were leaving King's Landing.

这可跟你没什么关系

您的孙子还是个阶下囚

洛拉斯烂在监牢里都是因为你
Loras rots in a cell because of you.

大麻雀统治着这个城市 是因为你
The High Sparrow rules this city because of you.

Our two ancient houses face collapse because of you and your stupidity.

我犯了一个严重的错误
I made a terrible mistake.

每天我都在提醒自己
I carry it with me every single day.

我给自己家门口送来一批狂热分子
I delivered an army of fanatics onto our doorstep.

现在我们必须同仇敌忾
And now we must fight them together.

我在想你是不是我见过的最差劲的人
I wonder if you're the worst person I've ever met.

已经这把年纪 我也想不起来了
At a certain age, it's hard to recall.

不过这么多年来你确实作恶多端
But the truly vile do stand out through the years.

你还记得我的孙子和孙女被拽到监牢里的时候 你是怎么冲着我幸灾乐祸的么?

我记得 我永远不会忘
I do. I'll never forget it.

您爱您的孙女
You love your granddaughter.

这是我唯一确定的事
It's the only truth I know.

我可得赶紧离开这个可悲的城市 省得被那些光脚的狂热分子扔进他们的监狱

如果你有你自己想的一半那么聪明的话 你也会离开这里的

我绝不会离开我的儿子
I'll never leave my son.

那你能怎么办? 
What'll you do, then?

不像以前了 你没有支援了
You have no support. Not anymore.

你弟弟已经走了 这一点大麻雀已经料理好了

你家族的其他人都已经抛弃了你
The rest of your family have abandoned you.

人民鄙视你
The people despise you.

你被成千上万的敌人包围
You're surrounded by enemies, thousands of them.

你想凭自己杀光他们么? 
You're going to kill them all by yourself?

这是我在这一切的苦难中能找到的唯一乐趣了
It's the only joy I can find in all this misery.

看吧 这样的围城毫无意义
Now, that is a sorry attempt at a siege.

得有人教教这帮可悲的娘们怎么挖战壕
Someone needs to teach those sad twats how to dig trenches.

是得有人教啊
Someone certainly does.

我只是个瞎蹦垩的雇佣剑士
I'm just an upjumped sellsword.

是啊 当骑士可没有报酬
Aye, knights don't get paid.

你的军事才能胜过兰尼斯特军队的任何军官
You have better instincts than any officer in the Lannister army.

这就跟说我的那话儿比无垢者军队里任何人都大差不多
That's like saying I have a bigger cock than anyone in the Unsullied army.

我希望不久之后可以统领所有的兰尼斯特军队
I expect to command all the Lannister forces before long.

你可以成为我失去的右手
You can be the right hand I lost.

你答应给我一个爵位 一座城堡 还能娶一位出身高贵的美女

这三样你都得到了 兰尼斯特有债…
And you'll get all three. A Lannister always...

别说了 别他娘的说了
Don't say it. Don't fucking say it.

出来跟我们打啊 黑鱼
Come out and fight us, Blackfish.

把城交出来 不然我们绞死他
Yield the castle or we'll hang him.

这是最后通牒
This is your last warning.

你以为我不敢吗 老头? 
You think I won't do it, old man?

是我一刀抹了你侄女的喉咙 划个半张脸大的口子
I sliced your niece's throat from ear to ear.

可你却跑哪去了? 跟他妈胆小鬼似的躲来躲去
And where were you? Running and hiding like a fucking coward.

交出城来 不然我连他的喉咙也切了
Yield the castle or I cut his throat.

请便 想切就切吧
Go on, then. Cut his throat.

我们不知道你要来
We didn't know you were coming.

那是因为你没有做好封锁
'Cause you didn't set a proper perimeter.

八千个人未经任何阻挠就来到了你这
You just allowed 8,000 men to approach unchallenged.

幸好我们是朋友 否则你们的屁眼现在已经被爆了
Good thing we're friends or we'd be fucking you in the ass right now.

带艾德慕大人沐浴进餐
Have Lord Edmure bathed and fed.

艾德慕是佛雷家的囚犯
Edmure is a prisoner of House Frey.

只有傻瓜才拿自己做不到的事威胁别人
Only a fool makes threats he's not prepared to carry out.

现在 我威胁要打你 除非你闭上嘴 但你还是说个不停
Now let's say I threatened to hit you unless you shut your mouth, but you kept talking.

你觉得我会怎么办?   我才不管你…
What do you think I'd do? I don't give a rat's...

我依国王之命来此收回这座城堡
I'm here by the king's command to take back this castle.

Have him bathed and fed.

除非你想取代他的位置
Unless you'd like to take his place.

我很抱歉 詹姆爵士
Apologies, Ser Jaime.

现在由我指挥围攻
The siege is now under my command.

下一次黑鱼再从城墙往外看的时候 他将看到的是兵临城下的军队 而不是你们这堆破玩意
The next time the Blackfish looks out from those ramparts, he'll see an army at his gates, not whatever this is.

让你的人开始挖外围的战壕
Have your lads start digging perimeter trenches.

每一百码设哨兵
Set pickets every hundred yards.

把这些攻城塔和投石机捣毁重做
