这些是我们的攻城塔…
Those are our siege towers...

我说了 现在听我指挥
As I said, the siege is under my command.

如果你不乐意 给我走人
If that's not to your liking, go home.

给黑鱼带个话
Get word to the Blackfish.

我赌老家伙赢
My money's on the old boy.

欢迎来到熊岛
Welcome to Bear Island.

你出生的时候我还记得 小姐
I remember when you were born, my lady.

你以我的姑妈莱安娜的名字命名
You were named for my Aunt Lyanna.

据说她是个大美人 想来你也会是
It was said she was a great beauty. I'm sure you will be, too.

那不一定 我妈妈不是大美人 什么美人也不是
I doubt it. My mother wasn't a great beauty or any other kind of beauty.

但她是一位伟大的战士
She was a great warrior, though.

她为你哥哥罗柏战死
She died fighting for your brother Robb.

莱安娜小姐 我在黑城堡是你伯父的手下
I served under your uncle at Castle Black, Lady Lyanna.

他也是一位伟大的战士 德高望重
He was also a great warrior and an honorable man.

我是他的事务官 事实上…
I was his steward. In fact...

家长里短我们聊得够多了 说正事吧
I think we've had enough small talk. Why are you here?

史坦尼斯 ・ 拜拉席恩驻守黑城堡 他进军临冬城 然后被杀
Stannis Baratheon garrisoned at Castle Black before he marched on Winterfell and was killed.

他给我看过那封你回应他求援的信
He showed me the letter you wrote to him when he petitioned for men.

上面写道…   我记得上边写了什么
It said... I remember what it said.

熊岛不认国王 只认北境之王 名为史塔克
Bear Island knows no king but the King in the North whose name is Stark.

罗柏死了 但史塔克家族没有
Robb is gone, but House Stark is not.

它比任何时候都需要你们的支持
And it needs your support now more than ever.

我和我妹妹来此 希望得到莫尔蒙家族的效忠
I've come with my sister to ask for House Mormont's allegiance.

据我所知 你是私生子 而珊莎夫人嫁到了波顿家
As far as I understand, you're a Snow and Lady Sansa is a Bolton.

还是兰尼斯特家? 
Or is she a Lannister?

消息太多 说什么的都有
I've heard conflicting reports.

小姐 我竭尽所能 只为生存
I did what I had to do to survive, my lady.

但我姓史塔克 永远都姓史塔克
But I am a Stark. I will always be a Stark.

随你 不过话说回来 你想要的不止我的忠诚 还有我的战士们
If you say so. In any case, you don't just want my allegiance. You want my fighting men.

决不能让拉姆斯・波顿霸占临冬城 小姐
Ramsay Bolton cannot be allowed to keep Winterfell, my lady.

我们有责任阻止他
It is our duty to stop him.

此外 他还囚禁了我们的幼弟瑞肯・史塔克
Even more so because he holds our brother Rickon Stark as prisoner.

小姐 你必须明白…
What you have to understand, my lady, is that...

我明白我的责任在于熊岛 在于岛上的每一个人
I understand that I'm responsible for Bear Island and all who live here.

为什么我要为了一场别人的战争再去牺牲哪怕一个族人的性命呢? 
So why should I sacrifice one more Mormont life for someone else's war?

小姐 请让我说两句
If it please, my lady,

我理解您的感受
I understand how you feel.

我不认识这位爵士 你是? 
I don't know you, Ser...?

我是席渥斯家族的戴佛斯 小姐
Davos, my lady, of House Seaworth.

您不必向学士询问我的家族
You needn't ask your maester about my house.

好吧 席渥斯家族的戴佛斯爵士
All right, Ser Davos of House Seaworth.

你是如何理解我的感受的呢? 
How is it you understand how I feel?

您从未想过有一天自己会身居如此高位
You never thought you'd find yourself in your position.

年纪轻轻 就要对这么多的人民负责
Being responsible for so many lives at such a young age.

我也没想过会到达今天的位置
I never thought I'd be in my position.

我是一个捕蟹人的儿子 做过走私犯
I was a crabber's son, then I was a smuggler.

在当今的战争年代 我的演说对象 却是一个伟大家族的小姐
And now I find myself addressing the lady of a great house in time of war.

我在这里 是因为这不是别人的战争
But I'm here because this isn't someone else's war.

您的伯父 莫尔蒙总司令 让这个人做了他的事务官
Your uncle, Lord Commander Mormont, made that man his steward.

他选择琼恩做他的继任者 因为他深知 他有坚持正义的勇气 甚至不惜抛头颅洒热血
He chose Jon to be his successor because he knew he had the courage to do what was right, even if it meant giving his life.

因为杰奥・莫尔蒙和琼恩・雪诺都清楚 真正的战争不是几个家族间的吵吵闹闹
Because Jeor Mormont and Jon Snow both understood that the real war isn't between a few squabbling houses.

而是生者与亡者的对决
It's between the living and the dead.

不要铸成大错 小姐 亡者就要来了
And make no mistake, my lady, the dead are coming.

你的伯父在先民拳峰与它们对战
Your uncle fought them at the Fist of the First Men.

我在艰难屯与它们交锋
I fought them at Hardhome.

波顿占据临冬城一日 北境就一日不得统一
As long as the Boltons hold Winterfell, the North is divided.

四分五裂的北境在夜王面前没有半点胜算
And a divided North won't stand a chance against the Night King.

你想要保护你的人民 小姐 我理解这一点
You want to protect your people, my lady. I understand.

但面对亡者大军他们无处可逃
But there's no hiding from this.

人类必须团结一心 共同抗敌
We have to fight and we need to do it together.

千年以来 莫尔蒙家族对史塔克忠心耿耿
House Mormont has kept faith with House Stark for 1,000 years.

今日我们仍将坚守忠诚信念
We will not break faith today.

我们能获得多少人手? 
How many fighting men can we expect?

六十二个?  我们不是大家族 但我们是骄傲的家族
62? We are not a large house, but we're a proud one.

每一个熊岛人 都能打十个内陆佬
And every man from Bear Island fights with the strength of 10 mainlanders.

只要他们有小姐的一半勇猛 波顿的末日就指日可待了
If they're half as ferocious as their lady, the Boltons are doomed.

我猜你此次前来 是要履行对我侄女的诺言
I assume you're here to fulfill the vow you gave my niece.

可我没看到珊莎和艾莉亚
I don't see Sansa and Arya.

我没找到她们 真遗憾
I don't have them. Pity.

那你是回来继续做俘虏的喽? 
Do you wish to resume your captivity?

那你为什么来? 
Then why are you here?

你知道我为什么来
You know why I'm here.

这座城堡属于佛雷家族
This castle belongs to House Frey.

以托曼国王之名 我命你即刻投降 否则…
In the name of King Tommen, I order you to surrender or...

否则你就杀了艾德慕? 
Or you'll kill Edmure?

无论我怎么做 我侄子都难逃一死
My nephew's marked for death no matter what.

就请你快快吊死他吧
Hang him and be done with it.

不止艾德慕
It won't stop with Edmure.

你这是逼着我强攻城堡
You'll force me to storm the castle.

我死几百人 你死几千人
Hundreds of mine. Thousands of yours.

前提还是你能突破城墙
If you can breach the walls.

我们定能攻破城墙 还将杀光城中老小
We'll breach them and kill every last one of you.

但只要你投降
But if you surrender,

我会饶了所有人的性命
I'll spare the lives of your men.

与破誓者讨价还价就如同在流沙上面盖房子
Bargaining with oathbreakers is like building on quicksand.

战争已经结束了 爵士
The war is over, ser.

为什么还要为了已经失败的事业白白牺牲人命呢? 
Why sacrifice living men to a lost cause?

只要我还没倒下 战争就不算结束
As long as I'm standing, the war is not over.

我出生在这里 也准备好了死在这里
I was born in this castle and I'm ready to die in it.

你要么打过来 要么试着把我们饿垮
So you can either attack or try to starve us out.

我们的给养能撑两年
We have enough provisions for two years.

你们撑得过两年吗 弑君者? 
Do you have two years, Kingslayer?

你显然无意拯救你的人民的生命
You clearly have no intention of saving your men's lives.

那你还来谈判作甚? 
Why did you come treat with me?

我是来见一见你本人 再好好掂量一下你
And I wanted to see you in person, get the measure of you.

葛洛佛伯爵 请你听我们说完 我听够了
Lord Glover, if you could just hear us out. I've heard enough.

我们刚从铁民手里夺回这座城堡
We've only just taken back this castle from the ironborn.

波顿帮了我们一把
The Boltons helped us do it.

现在你想让我反水去打他们? 
Now you want me to fight against them?

光是和你们谈话我就有可能被剥皮
I could be skinned for even talking to you.

波顿是叛徒 卢斯・波顿…
The Boltons are traitors. Roose Bolton...

有其他北境家族愿意为你们而战吗? 
Have other northern houses pledged to fight for you?

我们向曼德勒家族放出了渡鸦…
We sent ravens to Houses Manderly...

我不关心什么渡鸦
I don't care about ravens.

你要我加入你的军队
You're asking me to join your army.

这支军队里都有谁? 
Who is fighting in this army?

主要是野人
The bulk of the force is made up of wildlings.

那么流言是真的了
Then the rumors are true.

我之前都不敢相信
I didn't dare believe them.

出于对你们父亲的敬意 我接见了你们
I received you out of respect for your father.

现在我要求你们离开
Now I would like you to leave.

葛洛佛家族不会辱没先祖 去和野人并肩而战
House Glover will not abandon its ancestral home to fight alongside wildlings.

葛洛佛伯爵 没什么好说的了
Lord Glover. There's nothing else to say.

我要提醒你 葛洛佛家族向史塔克家族效忠
I would remind you that House Glover is pledged to House Stark.

宣誓响应史塔克家族的号召
Sworn to answer when called upon.

是的 几百年以来我的家族一直侍奉史塔克家族
Yes, my family served House Stark for centuries.

收到令尊死讯的时候我们纷纷流下眼泪
We wept when we heard of your father's death.

我的兄长做这座城堡的领主时 响应了罗柏的号召 推举他为北境之王
When my brother was lord of this castle, he answered Robb's call and hailed him King in the North.

但是当铁民攻入这座城堡 把我的妻儿投入狱中
And where was King Robb when the ironborn attacked this castle?

残杀我们的家臣的时候 罗柏国王又在哪里呢? 
When they threw my wife and children in prison and brutalized and killed our subjects?

和一个外国婊子鬼混
Taking up with a foreign whore.

害得自己和追随者们中计身死
Getting himself and those who followed him killed.

我曾经侍奉过史塔克家族 但史塔克家族已经灭亡了
I served House Stark once, but House Stark is dead.

我们为什么要来这里? 
Why did we have to come here?

我们中还是有人喜欢这里的
Some of us still like it.

多少喝一杯吧
Have a drink at least.

我很快就去找你
I'll find you in a bit.

在铁群岛上可没有这等翘臀
Nothing on the Iron Islands has an ass like that.

你当真一点性趣也没有了吗? 
Doesn't interest you anymore?

抱歉 我不开那方面的玩笑了
I'm sorry. I won't joke about it.

我永远不会伤害你的 小弟弟
I'll never hurt you, little brother.

你觉得攸伦叔叔正在搜捕我们? 
You think Uncle Euron's hunting for us?

那是当然 只要我们活着 对他就是个威胁
Of course he is. As long as we're alive, we're a threat.

世界很大 我们有快船
It's a great big world and we have fast ships.

我不管你想不想 喝
I don't care what you want. Drink.

你是个铁种 席恩 我知道你这几年很难熬
You're ironborn, Theon. I know you've had some bad years.

但我已经受够了看着你像条落水狗一样畏畏缩缩
But I'm tired of watching you cower like a beat dog.

把他妈的麦酒喝了
Drink the goddamn ale.

我需要真正的席恩・葛雷乔伊 不是这个老鼠屎一样的冒牌货
The real Theon Greyjoy, not this rat shit pretender.

你能帮我找到他吗? 
Can you find him for me?

你逃出来了 听到了吗? 
You escaped. You hear me?

你逃出来了 永远不会再回去了
You got away and you're never going back.

我们会为你讨回公道
We'll get justice for you.

按照公道 我应该被烧死然后吊在临冬城门前
If I got justice, my burnt body would hang over the gates of Winterfell.

那就去他妈的公道 我们要复仇 喝
Fuck justice, then. We'll get revenge. Drink.

如果你这样萎靡 那就再也没有机会了 你还不如拿把刀割了手腕
If you're so broken that there's no coming back, take a knife and cut your wrists.

但如果你留下 席恩 我需要你
But if you're staying, Theon, I need you.

我们要驶去弥林
We're gonna sail to Meereen.

我们要去和那个龙女王达成协议
We're gonna make a pact with this Dragon Queen.

我们要把铁群岛给夺回来
And we're gonna take back the Iron Islands.

你真的站在我这边吗? 
Are you really with me?

那么 既然过了今晚咱们就一时半会上不了岸
Now, since it's my last night ashore for a long while,

我要好好跟她来上一发
I'm gonna go fuck the tits off this one.

史坦尼斯在去临冬城的路上在这里扎过营
Stannis camped here on his way to Winterfell.

好事? 
And that's a good thing?

他曾是维斯特洛最有经验的指挥官
He was the most experienced commander in Westeros.

他选择这里一定是有原因的
He chose this place for a reason.

有山作天然屏障
Those mountains are a natural fortification.

有河可以饮马
There's a stream down there for the horses.

我们不会在这儿呆太久
We're not staying here long.

随时可能有另一场风暴袭来
Another storm could hit any day.

是啊 暴风雪击败了史坦尼斯 战功跟波顿家族相当
Aye, the snows defeated Stannis as much as the Boltons did.

我们必须趁现在向临冬城进军
We have to march on Winterfell now while we still can.

霍伍德家的两百人 梅辛家的一百四十三人…
200 Hornwoods, 143 Mazins...

比我们预计的要少得多
It's not what we'd hoped for.

但是如果我们足够谨慎和精明的话 还是有机会的
But we still have a chance if we're careful and smart.

他现在成了你最信任的顾问了? 
So he's your most trusted advisor now?

就因为他从一个十岁小孩那里弄来了六十二个人? 
Because he secured 62 men from a 10yearold?

多亏了戴佛斯爵士 我现在才能站在这儿和你说话 而且他效忠史坦尼斯已经很多年了
Ser Davos is the reason I'm standing here talking to you and he served Stannis for years.

输掉了黑水河之战的史坦尼斯 杀了自己弟弟的史坦尼斯 断头的史坦尼斯? 
Stannis who lost the Blackwater, who murdered his own brother, who doesn't have a head?

这还远远不够 我们需要更多的人手
It's not enough. We need more men.

如果我们去赛文城的话 我认识那里的领主…
If we went down to Castle Cerwyn, I know that Lord...

我们只能靠现有的军队去战斗
We fight with the army we have.

朋友们 不值得为这点事打起来
Friends, this is not worth fighting over!

好吧 这事儿没必要打架…
Right, now we don't need to be fighting...

你他妈的是谁?  等等
Who the fuck are you? Hold on.

对啊 你他妈的是谁啊? 
Yeah, who the fuck are you?

我曾经是个士兵
I was a soldier once.

我的上级全都以为我非常勇敢
All my superiors thought I was brave.

实际上我并不勇敢 没错 我从来没临阵脱逃过
I wasn't. I mean, I never ran from a fight.

那只是因为我害怕战友们会看出来我在害怕
Only because I was afraid my friends would see I was afraid.

我只不过是个懦夫
That's all I was, a coward.

我们服从命令 无论那命令是什么
We followed orders no matter the orders.

好吧 我就来当这个纵火犯
Fine, I'm your arsonist.

去偷那个农民的庄稼 行 我现在成了个贼
Steal that farmer's crops. Good, I'm your thief.

杀了那些小伙子 这样他们就不会反抗我们
Kill those young lads so they won't take up arms against us.

我记得有一次 一个女人向我们尖叫 我们把她儿子从小屋里拖出来的时候 她叫我们禽兽
I remember once a woman screaming at us, calling us animals as we dragged her son from their hut.

但我们不是禽兽
But we weren't animals.

禽兽从来都是顺应自己的天性 而我们却违反了天性
Animals are true to their nature and we had betrayed ours.

我亲自割了那个男孩的喉咙 他的母亲一直在尖叫 我的战友们拉着她
I cut that young boy's throat myself as his mother screamed and my friends held her back.

这种羞耻感是如此的沉重
Shame was so heavy on me,

我甚至吃不下饭 睡不着觉
I couldn't eat, I couldn't sleep.

我能做的就只有盯着那片昏暗的天空 脑海中回响着那位母亲喊她儿子的声音
All I could do was stare into that dark sky and listen to that mother screaming her son's name.

我这辈子都没法忘记那声音
I'll hear her screaming the rest of my life.

现在 我明白我永远不能让那个孩子死而复生
Now, I know I can never bring that lad back.

在我的余生里我能做到的 就只有给这个世界带来一点善意了
All I can do with time I've got left is bring a little goodness into the world.

我们每个人都能做到这点 不是吗? 
That's all any of us can do, isn't it?

不再打劫 不再杀人 这永远都不会太迟
Never too late to stop robbing people, to stop killing people.

开始帮助别人
Start helping people.

转恶向善永远都不会太迟
It's never too late to come back.

我们并不期望着诸神回应我们的祈祷
And it's not about waiting for the gods to answer your prayers.

这甚至和诸神无关 只和我们自己有关
It's not even about the gods. It's about you.

得明白 我们的祈祷要靠自己去回应
Learning you have to answer your prayers yourself.

七神祝福你们 朋友们
Seven save you, friends.

你们在这儿干什么? 
What are you doing here?

嗯 我们在谈论人生
Well, we're talking about life.

我们在保护人民
Protecting the people.

好吧 我们感谢你们的保护
Well, we thank you for your protection.

可你们是在保护我们免受什么人的伤害呢? 
Who are you protecting us from?

你们有马么? 
Do you have any horses?

吃的总该有吧 保护人民可是很容易饿的
Food, then. Protecting the people is hungry work.

欢迎留下来一起吃晚餐 但是我们也有很多吃不饱的人
You're welcome to stay for supper, but we have hungry mouths here.

长夜漫漫 处处险恶
The night is dark and full of terrors.

我他妈的是个修士 我还能说什么? 
I'm a fucking septon. What was I supposed to say?

他们不信你的七神
They don't believe in your Seven.

他们是兄弟会的人 信的是红神
They're from the Brotherhood. They follow the Red God.

哎呀 好吧 这里欢迎所有人
Aye, well, all are welcome here.

无论如何 我们没什么可给他们的
Anyway, we got nothing for them.

你当然有 你有吃的 你还有武器 就算你告诉他们没有
Sure, you do. You've got food, you've got steel even if you say you don't.

你这里还有女人
And you've got women.

你打算怎么办? 跟他们打? 
What do you want to do? Fight them?

只能靠你一个对付他们所有人
It'd be you against all of them.

我是说 其他人可不会战斗
I mean, these people don't know how to fight.

我再也不打仗了
I'm done with fighting.

自卫呢? 
Even if it's to protect yourself?

暴力是一种疾病
Violence is a disease.

你不可能通过传染更多的人来治愈疾病
You don't cure a disease by spreading it to more people.

你死了的话也没法治病了
You don't cure it by dying, either.

你今天干的活够多了
You've done enough work for one day.

来吃点晚饭吧
Come on up for some supper.

今天晚上会很冷
It's gonna be a cold night.

我会给你留一碗炖肉的
I'll save you a bowl of stew.

没准还能藏一点麦酒带给你
Might even have some ale hidden away.

他是个实在人
He's not a lying man.

他说铁舰队已经到了奴隶湾
He says the Iron Fleet's in Slaver's Bay.

我信了他
I'm inclined to believe him.

我可要离那些疯子远点
I'm not going anywhere near those mad fuckers.

我想要坐船回家
I want to book passage home.

就你? 你付不起路费的
You? Can't afford it.

你从哪儿偷来的这些? 
Where'd you steal this from?

我们两天后离开
We leave in two days.

你可以住在三等舱的吊床上
You can have a hammock in steerage.

而且我们一早就走
And we'll leave at dawn.

倾听神的召唤 他们为你歌唱
Listen to the gods, for you they sing.

无需再战 乖孩子
Fight no more, sweet child.

恶狼深埋地底 伪鹿命数已尽
The wolves are buried and the false stag done.

阖上你的碧眼 吾爱
Shut your blue eyes, my love.

天父召唤你前往他的殿堂
The Father above beckons you to his hall.

马泰尔挑出了苍蝇 一口喝干了酒
The Martell plucks the fly out and swallows it whole.

史塔克把手伸进杯子 把苍蝇抓了出来 大吼
The Stark reaches into his cup, pulls out the fly and shouts,

'把酒吐出来 混球
'Spit it out, you wee shit.

这笑话在维斯特洛讲起来更有趣
It's funnier in Westeros.

我以为史塔克和兰尼斯特是敌人
The Starks and the Lannisters, I thought these were enemies.

讲笑话就像讲故事 灰虫子
A joke is like a story, Torgo Nudho.

不一定非要是真事
Not a true story, necessarily.

只要是逗你发笑的事就行
A story that's supposed to make you laugh ideally.

可能需要理解一下
Not at the moment, perhaps.

弥桑黛 你喜欢酒吗? 
Missandei, do you like the wine?

船快沉了 船上有两个翻译
Two translators are on a sinking ship.

第二个说 '不会 但是我会用十九种语言喊救命'
The second says, 'No, but I can shout for help in 19 languages.'

这是我听过最烂的笑话
That is the worst joke I ever heard.

你连笑话是什么都不知道
You don't even know what a joke is.

我生来就是个士兵 你觉得我会没听过笑话? 
I am soldier all my life. You think I never hear joke?

我曾经走进一家妓院 手上拿着一个蜂窝 牵着一头公驴
I once walked into a brothel with a honeycomb and a jackass.

奴隶主们来索要他们的财产了
The Masters have come for their property.

佛雷这么待你 我替他们道歉
I apologize for the way the Freys treated you.

你这样的出身 理应受到更好的待遇
A man of your birth deserves better.

我向你保证 从今往后 你都会吃好穿好
You have my word you'll be properly fed and clothed from now on.

不错 那… 那挺好的
Good, that's that's a fine thing.

我的叔叔永远不可能投降献出城堡 爵士
My uncle will never surrender the castle, ser.

无论你玩什么把戏
Whatever game you're playing.

黑鱼已经老了
The Blackfish is an old man.

他只求痛快一死
A good death is all he can hope for.

但是你 我听说你现在有孩子了
But you, you have a child now, I've heard.

新婚之夜种下的孩子
A son you sired on your wedding night.

我从未见过我的儿子 还有我的妻子 孩子的母亲 新婚夜之后我们就没见过面
A son I've never met born of a wife that I haven't seen since our first night together.

你应该与他们团聚
You should be with them both.

我可以安排 你想过吗? 
I can arrange that, you realize?

在凯岩城为你备好上房
Comfortable rooms for you at Casterly Rock.

你儿子会有老师教导 有骑士训练他骑马打仗
A tutor for your boy, knights to train him to fight and to ride.

等他成年 还会有一座城堡
And when he comes of age, he'll have a keep of his own.

你还觉得自己是个体面人? 
Do you imagine yourself a decent person?

你屠杀了我的家人
After you've massacred my family.

关了我好几年
Kept me in a cell for years.

我提醒你 我们的家族在打仗
I'll remind you that our houses are at war.

如果战乱给你带来不便 我深表歉意 但向国王举反旗是有代价的
I'm sorry if this conflict has inconvenienced you, but rebelling against the Crown does have consequences.

说这话的人从背后一剑捅死了他的国王
Says the man who shoved his sword through his king's back.

我是不是让你感觉这是一场谈判? 
Did I give you the impression that this was a negotiation?

起码你自己清楚 你是个恶人
You understand. On some level you understand that you're an evil man.

呵呵 说得倒轻巧
Well, that is convenient for you.

方下巴 金铠甲
Your square jaw, your golden armor.

告诉我 我想要知道

你在夜里睡觉的时候

How do you tell yourself that you're decent after everything that you've done?

我做过你姐姐的阶下囚
I was your sister's prisoner once.

没记错的话 她用石头砸过我的脑袋

她应该直接杀了你

也许吧 但她没有

凯特琳·史塔克对我的恨意不逊于你

但我不恨她
But I didn't hate her.

远胜她的丈夫和儿子

不 但我还是要说 反正你是我的犯人

你没得选
You don't have a choice.

让我产生了一丝敬畏

她们为了保护自己的孩子会不择手段

Burn cities to ash. Free their worst enemies.

想想我们为爱都做了什么

艾德慕·徒利 霍斯特·徒利之子 合法的奔流城公爵
Edmure Tully, son of Hoster Tully and the rightful Lord of Riverrun.

他是奔流城公爵

因为这是个圈套 你个蠢货

你不必来的

也会赦免这些背叛我家族的领主们

按我说的做 杂种 你没有人手 没有马匹 你也没有临冬城

为什么要让这些可怜虫白白送死呢?

I lie about fucking my brother...  because it feels good to keep our son safe from hateful hypocrites.

艾莉亚·史塔克

The last thing you're ever going to see is a Stark smiling down at you as you die.

Forgive me, my lady...  if you're at prayer.

我已经不再祈祷了
I'm done with all that.

在我还是个小女孩时 每天都来这里
I came here every day when I was a girl.

I prayed to be somewhere else.

Back then I only thought about what I wanted, never about what I had.

我以为你知道
I thought you knew what I wanted.

每次需要做决定前
Every time I'm faced with a decision,

我都会闭上眼睛 看到同一个画面
I close my eyes and see the same picture.

每当我要采取行动时 我都会问自己 这会帮我把画面的内容变成现实吗? 
Whenever I consider an action, I ask myself will this action help to make this picture a reality?

把它拽出脑海 放到现实中? 
Pull it out of my mind and into the world?

只有在答案肯定时 我才会行动
And I only act if the answer is yes.

一副我自己… 坐在铁王座上… 而你坐我在身边的画面
A picture of me...  on the Iron Throne...  and you by my side.

很美的画面
It's a pretty picture.

News of this battle will spread quickly through the Seven Kingdoms.

所有人都会知道 我为史塔克家族而战
I've declared for House Stark for all to hear.

而现在他们正渡过狭海而来 企图夺回她父亲的王座
Right now, they're sailing across the Narrow Sea, hoping to take back her father's throne.

我们的弟弟 你深爱的那个弟弟 被你放走的弟弟 杀害了我们的父亲和长子的弟弟 如今他和我们的敌人并肩作战 还为他们出谋划策
Our little brother, the one you love so much, the one you set free, the one who murdered our father and our firstborn son, now he stands beside our enemies and gives them counsel.

在船上逍遥快活
He's out there somewhere at the head of an armada.

他们准备在哪里登陆? 
Where will they land?

那里有深水港口 能停放大型舰队
They have deepwater ports for the ships.

史坦尼斯留下了一座空城 而且那里还是她出生的地方
Stannis left the castle unoccupied, and that's where she was born.

而南面之敌…
Enemies to the south...

是艾拉莉亚·沙德还有她养的那群婊子们
Ellaria Sand and her brood of bitches.

西面之敌…
Enemies to the west...

是奥莲娜这个老婊子
Olenna, the old cunt.

北面之敌
Enemies to the north.

奈德·史塔克的私生子已经被拥作北境之王 杀了我儿子的那个臭婊子珊莎也与他为伍
Ned Stark's bastard has been named King in the North and that murdering whore Sansa stands beside him.

四面都是敌人 我们被背叛者们团团包围着
Enemies everywhere. We're surrounded by traitors.

如今你是兰尼斯特军队的统领
You're in command of the Lannister army now.

你准备如何开始? 可是凛冬已至
How do we proceed? Winter is here.

粮草不济的情况下 我们不可能打赢
We can't win a war if we can't feed our men and our horses.

提利尔家族有粮食 有牲畜
The Tyrells have the grain, the Tyrells have the livestock.

那么提利尔家族 会跟多斯拉克部落和无垢者为伍吗? 
Will the Tyrell bannermen stand alongside a Dothraki horde and Unsullied slave soldiers?

如果他们笃定丹妮莉丝会赢的话
If they think Daenerys will win.

没人想为败者拼命
No one wants to fight on the losing side.

现在看来 我们没什么胜算
Right now, we look like the losing side.

我可是统领七大王国的女王
I'm the Queen of the Seven Kingdoms.

顶多三个了
Three kingdoms, at best.

我想 你可能并不了解我们现在的处境有多危险
I'm not sure you understand how much danger we're in.

我知道我们打的是生存之战
I understand we're in a war for survival.

我知道 败者没有活路
I understand whoever loses dies.

我知道胜者就能建立一个王朝 并且会永存于世
I understand whoever wins could launch a dynasty that lasts a thousand years.

我们的孩子都已经死了
Our children are dead.

我们是兰尼斯特家族最后的成员
We're the last of us.

那就是属于我们的王朝
A dynasty for us, then.

我们还没谈谈托曼
We never talked about Tommen.

没什么好说的
There's nothing to say.

我们的宝贝儿子自我了断了
Our baby boy killed himself.

难道我们要浪费时间为去世的
Should we spend our days mourning the dead...

母亲 父亲 还有我们的孩子们默哀吗? 
Mother, father, and all our children?

瑟曦… 我是爱他们的 真的
Cersei... I loved them. I did.

但现在他们已化为灰烬 而我们还活生生地站在这里
But they're ashes now and we're still flesh and blood.

我们是兰尼斯特家族最后的成员 最后能算得上的了
We're the last Lannisters, the last ones who count.

就算是兰尼斯特家族 没有盟军也是活不下去的
Even Lannisters can't survive without allies.

我们的盟军在哪? 
Where are our allies now?

你瞧瞧瓦德·佛雷和他家族发生的一切
You saw what happened to Walder Frey and his family.

但我们怎能相信那种人? 我们不能
How could we ever trust a man like that? We couldn't.

他就是个没用的懦夫 但佛雷家族拥护我们
He was a useless, old coward, but the Freys supported us.

他们现在全死光了
Now they're all dead.

杀他们的人不会是我们的朋友
Whoever killed them is no friend of ours.

更强的 更厉害的盟友
Stronger, better allies.

我们不可能独胜
We can't win this war alone.

你以为我听命于父亲四十年就没有学到点什么吗? 
You think I listened to father for 40 years and learned nothing?

你邀请葛雷乔伊家族来君临? 
You invited the Greyjoys to King's Landing?

没有邀请所有 好吧 看起来就像是全部
Not all of them. Well, it looks like all of them.

我邀请的是攸伦·葛雷乔伊 新的铁群岛之王
I invited Euron Greyjoy, the new King of the Iron Islands.

你自己说过我们需要更强更厉害的盟友
You said yourself we needed stronger, better allies.

他们不就是么 他们怎么能算得上是更好的盟友? 
There you are. How are they better allies?

他们和佛雷家族有何不同? 
How are they different from the Freys?

他们都违背了自己的誓言 为了自己的利益背刺了之前的盟友
They both broke their promises and murdered their former friends as soon as it suited them.

时机恰当的话 每个人都会这么做的
So does everyone when it suits them.

和佛雷家族不同的是 他们还有船
Unlike the Freys, they have ships.

而且他们擅长杀敌 他们什么都不擅长
And they're good at killing. They're not good at anything.

我知道铁种 都是些个尖酸刻薄的小人
I know the ironborn. They're bitter, angry little people.

自己不建东西不种东西 只知道去偷东西
All they know how to do is steal things they can't build or grow themselves.

攸伦·葛雷乔伊又不是来偷东西的
Euron Greyjoy didn't come here for that.

是嘛 那他为何而来? 
Oh, what did he come here for, then?

从我被选为铁群岛首领的那一刻起 他们就背叛了我
The moment I was chosen Lord of the Iron Islands, they turned on me.

他们偷了我最精良的舰队 逃跑了
They stole my best ships and ran.

攸伦·葛雷乔伊
'鸦眼' 铁群岛之王

开着船横穿整个世界 再把舰队献给龙女王 这样她就能渡海 来攻打你
Sailed them right across the world and gave them to the Dragon Queen so she could bring her armies here to attack you.

不过 和你所遭遇的背叛相比起来 这不算什么 据我所知是被家族至亲背叛了
It's nothing compared to the treason you suffered at the hands of a family member, from what I hear.

但 这始终困扰着我
But still, it bothers me.

杀了他们会让我好受些
Murdering them would make me feel a lot better.

而且自从背叛我的家族成员站成一派 来对抗我
And since it appears that all our treasonous family members are fighting for the same side,

我就认为我们这些合法统治者 应该把他们都杀了
I thought we rightful monarchs could murder them together.

不过 你并不是合法的统治者 不是吗? 
You're not a rightful monarch, though, are you?

为了能自己当上统治者 你们曾经反抗过 不过我记得 你们被彻底击败了
The Greyjoys rebelled against the throne for the right to be monarchs, but as I recall, you were soundly defeated.

说到这里 你不就是那个掀起叛乱的人吗?  你的舰队跑来凯岩城 把兰尼斯特舰队给烧了
Come to mention it, weren't you the one who started that rebellion by sailing to Casterly Rock and burning the Lannister fleet?

你引起了我们的注意
You certainly caught us there.

从你们的角度来讲 这个计划非常聪明
Very smart move on your part.

当然了 反正我们都去了铁群岛
Of course, we all made it to the Iron Islands anyway.

所以我记忆犹新
I remember very well.

你的传说可多了
I heard so much talk.

盖世无敌 所向披靡
The best in the world. No one can stop him.

说实话 我原先一个字都不信
I didn't believe it, to be honest.

可我不得不承认 当你破浪而来 手起刀落 真是精彩
But I must say when you rushed through the breach and started cutting people down...  it was glorious.

我杀的可是你的骨肉至亲
The people I was cutting down were your own kin.

铁群岛太挤了
The place was getting crowded.

这对我来说喜闻乐见
I enjoyed watching it. I truly did.

斩杀葛雷乔伊族人也让我感到乐在其中
And I enjoyed killing Greyjoys.

如果不是你把我们击败 我就不会被流放海外
If you hadn't crushed us, I wouldn't have gone into exile.

如果我不曾被流放
If I hadn't done that,

我就不会成为十四大洋最有名的舰长
I wouldn't be the greatest captain on the 14 seas.

难道不是最卑微的? 
If not the most humble.

您是女王 统御四方
You're the queen of a great nation.

铁群岛于您 何足挂齿
You don't care about the Iron Islands.

不过是怪石兀立 遍地鸟粪之地
They're nothing but rocks and bird shit and...

全是刁民恶棍
And a lot of very unattractive people.

而铁舰队于您 则有另一重意义
The Iron Fleet, on the other hand, that's something else entirely.

那可是维斯特洛最庞大的舰队
It's the greatest armada Westeros has ever seen.

有了它 便有了大海
With the Iron Fleet, you own the seas.

您可攻破东面的来犯之敌 亦可粉碎北境南疆的僭越之徒
You can defeat the invaders of the east and the pretenders of the north and south.

那么 你想要什么? 
What do you want in return?

自我年幼时起
Ever since I was a little boy,

便想长大迎娶 世上最美貌的女子
I wanted to grow up and marry the most beautiful woman in the world.

所以 我来了 携带千艘长船 还有两只好手
So here I am, with a thousand ships and two good hands.

我拒绝你的求婚
I decline your proposal.

你不值得信任
You're not trustworthy.

你背弃过盟友 时机一到便将他们斩尽杀绝
You've broken promises to allies before and murdered them at the nearest opportunity.

你谋害兄长
You murdered your own brother.

您不妨一试 那感觉妙不可言
You should try it. Feels wonderful.

我不指望您与我推心置腹
I don't expect you to trust me outright.

您只需要确信我的一片赤诚之心
You need proof of my honest intentions.

以我的经验 要赢得佳人芳心 送礼最为稳妥
In my experience, the surest way to a woman's heart is with a gift.

我重返君临城之时 必会为您带来这份无价之礼
I won't return to King's Landing until I have that for you.

酒鬼的肝 真是屡见不鲜
A drinker's liver if ever I saw one.

片刻欢愉就能征服人性
The triumph of transitory pleasures.

博士 我想问…
Archmaester, I was wondering...

我想问 您是否考虑过我的请求
I was wondering if you had considered my proposition.

我不记得你提过请求
I don't remember your proposition.

我曾问您 鉴于我在北境所见 我是否可以获准进入图书馆禁区
I asked you if, in light of what I've seen in the North, if I could have access to the restricted area of the library.

禁区是学士专属
That area is reserved for maesters.

你是学士吗? 不是
Are you a maester? No.

这么看来你的请求不太合理啊
Not a very strong proposition, is it?

博士 请您恕我直言
Archmaester, with respect,

尸鬼大军
The Army of the Dead.

我来到这里 就是为了学会击败他们的方法 然而学城的每一个人 那些愿意听我说的人 他们总是怀疑异鬼是否真实存在
I was sent here to learn how to defeat them, but everyone in the Citadel, those who will even talk to me, they all doubt the walkers ever existed in the first place.

学城的每一个人都会质疑万物
Everyone in the Citadel doubts everything.

然而长夜传说并非无中生有
But the tales of the Long Night can't be pure fabrication.

许多不相关的文献都有过相似记载
Too many similarities from unconnected sources.

禁区的文献? 
Sources in the restricted area?

最简单的解释就是 对于你念念不忘的异鬼 你说的都是事实 你说你看到了 而你确实真的看到了
And the simplest explanation for your grating obsession with the white walkers is that you're telling the truth and that you saw what you say you saw.

你到底有没有称完那颗心脏? 
You'll finish weighing that heart?

您是孪河城以南唯一相信我的人
That makes you the only person south of the Twins who does.

我们可不像孪河城以南的普罗大众
We're not like the people south of the Twins.

也不像孪河城以北的人们
And we're not like the people north of the Twins.

学城的人们为着各自的使命过着不同的生活
In the Citadel, we lead different lives for different reasons.

我们记录这个世界的记忆 山姆威尔·塔利
We are this world's memory, Samwell Tarly.

没有我们 人们与家犬何异
Without us, men would be little better than dogs.

脑子里只记得上一顿吃的东西 眼里只看得见身边的事物
Don't remember any meal but the last, can't see forward to any but the next.

而我们一旦外出 紧闭房门 他们就哀嚎不已 以为我们再也不回来了
And every time you leave the house and shut the door, they howl like you're gone forever.

当劳勃的叛乱爆发时 人们以为末日来临
When Robert's Rebellion was raging, people thought the end was near.

坦格利安王朝的末日来了 '我们该如何存活? '
The end of the Targaryen dynasty. 'How will we survive?'

当伊耿·坦格利安向西虎视眈眈 策龙踏平黑水河
When Aegon Targaryen turned his eye westward and flew his dragons to Blackwater Rush...

而在数千年以前 长夜降临之时 他们认为那时便是末日 也是一个道理
And thousands of years before that, during the Long Night, we can forgive them for thinking it truly was the end.

然而一切未曾终结 那些时刻都不曾是末日
But it wasn't. None of it was.

绝境长城 岿然不动
The Wall has stood through it all.

而每个冬天 都会过去
And every winter that ever came has ended.

好孩子 把这收拾干净了
Be a good lad. Clean this up.

我听说她单挑打赢了猎狗
I've heard she beat the Hound in single combat.

培提尔·贝里席
'小指头' 峡谷守护者

这女人真是让人印象深刻
She's a very impressive woman.

你想要什么 贝里席大人
What do you want, Lord Baelish?

我想要你开心
I want you to be happy.

我想要你安全
I want you to be safe.

我在家 和朋友们在一起

布蕾妮保护我不受任何人伤害
I have Brienne to protect me from anyone who would harm me.

你为什么不开心
Why aren't you happy?

你想要什么你现在没有的东西?

现在 我只想要静一静
At the moment, peace and quiet.

不用再说了贝里席大人
No need to seize the last word, Lord Baelish.

我就假装你要说的这句话很聪明
I'll assume it was something clever.

为什么他还在这儿
Why is he still here?

没有谷地 拉姆斯·波顿还会占据着临冬城

小指头救了我们
Littlefinger saved us.

我很清楚他想要什么
I know exactly what he wants.

这歌很好听
That's a pretty song.

我以前从没听过
I've never heard it before.

饿吗? 我们有兔肉
Are you hungry? We've got some rabbit.

我不想偷你们的食物
I don't want to steal your food.

你不是偷 我们主动给你
You're not stealing, we're offering.

来吧 今晚会很冷的
Come on, it's gonna be a cold night.

看你口味了 我觉得
Depends on your taste, I guess.

如果你喜欢街上到处是屎和猪血 那你就去对地方了
If you like your streets covered in shit and pig's blood, it's the town for you.

我这辈子一直都想看红堡 贝勒大教堂 龙穴
All my life, I wanted to see the Red Keep, the Sept of Baelor, the Dragonpit.

当我终于到了 他们却把我拦在红堡一里之外 贝勒大教堂已经被炸毁了 龙穴则成了废墟
Then when I finally make it, they wouldn't let me within a mile of the Red Keep, the Sept of Baelor's blown to hell, and the Dragonpit is a damn ruin.

住那儿的人 他们会活剥了你 说不定还能卖两个铜板
The people who live there, they'd skin you alive if they could make two coppers off your hide.

全世界最烂的地方
Worst place in the world.

你们在河间地干什么? 
What are you doing in the Riverlands?

孪河城的佛雷家遇到了些麻烦 我们是过来维护治安的
There's been some trouble with the Freys up at the Twins, so we're part of the army that's been sent to keep the peace.

你来吧 客人优先
Here you go. Guests first.

不 我不能吃 否则你们就不够吃了
Oh, no, I couldn't. You don't have enough.

我妈总告诉我对陌生人要友好
My mother always told me to be kind to strangers.

陌生人也会对你友好
Strangers will be kind to you.

你们离家这么远
You're a long way from home.

我猜你们的经历肯定都很刺激
I'm sure you've had some adventures, though.

是 多到数不过来
Yeah, endless adventures.

他们会在歌谣里传唱我们一千年
They'll be singing about us for a thousand years.

事实上我们离家时 迫不及待远走高飞
The truth is when we left home, we couldn't wait to get away.

但现在我们离开了一段时间 又渴望回家
But now we've been gone a while, we can't wait to get home.

我就想起我爸一个人乘船出去
I just think about my dad out there on his boat all alone.

我就应该和他在一起
I ought to be out there with him.

我妻子刚生下我们第一个孩子
My wife just had our first baby.

男孩还是女孩? 啊 谁知道啊
Boy or girl?Oh, who knows?

你以为士兵能收到家里的渡鸦来信吗?

我希望是女孩为什么? 
I hope it's a girl.Why?

爹要是老了 女孩可以照顾爹

男孩只能上战场 为别人作战
Boys just go off to fight in someone else's wars.

你这岁数 能喝酒吗? 
Are you old enough to drink?

这是黑莓酒
It's blackberry wine.

所以 为什么这么个漂亮姑娘要自己去君临? 
So, why is a nice girl on her own heading to King's Landing?

我要去杀女王
I'm going to kill the queen.

今晚不该出门啊
Bad night to be outdoors.

能察觉到这点你的法力还真是强大
You've got real powerful magic to figure that out.

光之王和你说悄悄话了吗? 
Did the Lord of Light whisper that in your ear?

'外面下雪了 索罗斯 起风了
'It's snowing, Thoros. It's windy.

今晚会很冷'
It's gonna be a cold night.'

你真是头坏脾气的熊啊 是不是 克里冈? 
You're a grouchy old bear, aren't you, Clegane?

不爱喝那垃圾玩意儿 太甜
Don't like that shit. It's too sweet.

你怎么总这么阴沉? 
Why are you always in such a foul mood?

这儿看起来像是个过夜的好去处
This seems like a good place to spend the night.

那里的人不想让我们待在这里
These people don't want us here.

我看这里已经废弃了 没有牲畜
Seems deserted to me. No livestock.

烟囱里不冒烟
No smoke coming from the chimney.

我不喜欢这里的样子
I don't like the look of it.

你块头这么大 胆子倒是挺小
For a big, hard man, you scare easy.

我来告诉你什么吓不住我
I'll tell you what doesn't scare me...

你这种秃头混蛋
Bald cocksuckers like you.

你以为你头上梳个髻就能唬住别人了吗?

也许他们藏了些麦酒
Maybe they've got some ale hidden away.

看看有没有储藏室
See if there's a larder.

他们总会留点什么
They always leave something behind.

你觉得他们遭遇了什么? 
How do you think it ended for them?

女儿死在了父亲的怀里
Girl died in her father's arms.

他们浑身是血 脚下还有一把刀
Both of them covered in blood and a knife at their feet.

我觉着眼见着快要饿死
I'd say they were starving.

父亲不愿让女儿受苦 便了结了两人的生命
And rather than let his little girl suffer, he ended it for both of them.

是啊 无所谓了
No, doesn't matter now.

我认识你很久了 唐德利恩
I've known you a long time, Dondarrion.

我记得第一次遇见你是在那次比武大会…
I think the first time we met was at that tournament...

我一直以为你是个榆木脑袋
And I always thought you were dull as dirt.

我不喜欢你 不过你也不赖
Don't like you,but you're not bad.

这些话很暖心
That warms the heart.

但是你没什么特别之处
But there's nothing special about you.

这话倒不假
You're right about that.

那为什么光之王一直让你复活? 
So why does the Lord of Light keep bringing you back?

我见过比你更好的人 他们被吊死在横梁上 或者被斩首 或者就是暴尸荒野
I've met better men than you, and they've been hanged from crossbeams, or beheaded, or just shat themselves to death in a field somewhere.

他们中没一个还能复活
None of them came back.

你觉得我不会扪心自问吗? 
You think I don't ask myself that?

每时每刻? 
Every hour of every day?

我应该做什么? 
What am I supposed to do?

主看中了我的什么? 
What does the Lord see in me?

我不理解我们的主
I don't understand our Lord.

我不知道他想从我这里得到什么
I don't know what he wants from me.

我只知道他想让我活下去
I only know that he wants me alive.

如果他这么全能 为什么他不直接告诉你他想要什么? 
If he's so allpowerful, why doesn't he just tell you what the fuck he wants?

别担心 火又不会咬人
Don't worry.The fire won't bite.

我想给你看些东西
I want to show you something.

我跟一群拜火者搭伙真是他妈的走运
It's my fucking luck I end up with a band of fire worshippers.

几乎可以说是天降正义
Almost seems like divine justice.

哪里有什么天降正义 你个蠢蛋
There's no divine justice,you dumb cunt.

有的话 你早死了… 而那个女孩会活下来
If there was, you'd be dead...  and that girl would be alive.

你想干什么?  瞧这火焰
What do you want? Look into the flames.

我不想看这傻逼火焰
I don't want to look in the damn flames.

你曾把他砍到 之后亲眼见到我把他起死回生
You saw me bring him back from the dead after you cut him down.

你不想知道我的法力是怎么来的吗? 
Don't you want to know what gave me the power?

我一直在问 可没人愿意告诉我
I keep asking and no one wants to tell me.

只有火焰能告诉你
Only the fire can tell you.

绝境长城与海交汇的地方
It's where the Wall meets the sea.

有一座城堡
There's a castle there.

看起来像个箭头
Looks like an arrowhead.

死人大军正在行军通过
The dead are marching past.

克里冈 你现在相信我了吗? 
Do you believe me now, Clegane?

你相信我们不是随随便便就跑到这里来了吧? 
Do you believe we're here for a reason?

克里冈 你这是干什么呢? 
What the hell are you doing, Clegane?

认识? 
You knew these people.

我们祈求天父仁慈的审判
We ask the Father to judge us with mercy.

我们祈求圣母…
We ask the Mother to...

操 后面我忘了
Fuck it, I don't remember the rest.

我很遗憾你们死了
I'm sorry you're dead.

山姆 你真的该睡觉了
You should really sleep, Sam.

坦格利安家族用龙晶来装饰他们的武器 却不知道先民用它来干什么
The Targaryens used dragonglass to decorate their weapons without even knowing what the First Men used it for.

这是龙石岛的地图
It's a map of Dragonstone.

The Targaryens built their first stronghold there when they invaded Westeros.

史坦尼斯告诉过我 可我没想到…

This is important.Jon needs to know.

还没听到消息
Haven't heard anything.

丹妮莉丝·坦格利安
'风暴降生' 龙之母

在这样的夜晚您降临于世
On a night like this, you came into the world.

我记得那场风暴
I remember that storm.

君临城所有的狗 都叫了一整夜
All the dogs in King's Landing howled through the night.

我要是也能记得就好了
I wish I could remember it.

我之前总是认为这会是回家
I always thought this would be a homecoming.

但这里没有家的感觉
Doesn't feel like home.

丹妮莉丝·坦格利安

提利昂·兰尼斯特

'八爪蜘蛛'

Now... They cry out for their true queen?

People used to tell my brother that sort of thing, and he was stupid enough to believe them.

如果韦赛里斯有三头巨龙 一支大军 他早就入侵君临了
If Viserys had three dragons and an army at his back, he'd have invaded King's Landing already.

Conquering Westeros would be easy for you.

But you're not here to be queen of the ashes.

拿下七大王国 不非得涂炭生灵
We can take the Seven Kingdoms without turning it into a slaughterhouse.

如果各大家族拥护您来共同讨伐瑟曦 这场游戏必赢
If the great houses support your claim against Cersei, the game is won.

提利尔与多恩大军站到了我们这边 我们在南境拥有最强大盟友
With the Tyrell army and the Dornish on our side, we have powerful allies in the south.

我还没有向你正式道谢
I never properly thanked you for that.

陛下 他们之所以加入了我们一方 是因为他们完全信赖您
They joined our side, my queen, because they believe in you.

瓦里斯大人 你侍奉过我的父亲 对吗? 
You served my father, didn't you, Lord Varys?

之后你侍奉了那个推翻了他的人
And then you served the man who overthrew him.

I had a choice, Your Grace serve Robert Baratheon or face the headman's axe.

但你侍奉了他没多长时间
But you didn't serve him long.

又转而反抗他
You turned against him.

不可否认 劳勃比您父亲更为开明
Robert was an improvement on your father, to be sure.

历史上罕有像疯王这样 残暴的统治者
There have been few rulers in history as cruel as the Mad King.

劳勃既不疯狂也不残暴
Robert was neither mad nor cruel.

他只是对当国王没什么兴趣
He simply had no interest in being king.

所以你自告奋勇去找一个更好的
So you took it upon yourself to find a better one.

陛下 当我打算沉溺饮酒终了此生的时候
Your Grace, when I was ready to drink myself into a small coffin,

瓦里斯大人告诉我东方有一位女王…
Lord Varys told me about a queen in the east who

在我掌权之前 你还支持过我的哥哥

依你所见 这些是成为一名好国王的品质吗?

陛下 直到您和卓戈卡奥联姻之前

我对您一无所知 我不知道您的存在 还有您传说中的美貌

所以你和你的朋友们就像卖牲口一样把我卖给了多斯拉克人

这也成了您日后的制胜筹码
Which you turned to your advantage.

Lord Varys has proven himself a loyal servant.

证明了忠诚? 恰恰相反

如果他厌恶了一位君主 他就会密谋拥护下一位

这算什么仆人?

国家需要的那种仆人
The kind the realm needs.

无能的君主不值得盲目追随

只要我还能分辨得出 我就会继续寻找明君
As long as I have my eyes, I'll use them.

我没有生在权贵家族
I wasn't born into a great house.

我被当作奴隶来贩卖 男根被切下来作为祭品
I was sold as a slave and carved up as an offering.

我还是个孩子的时候 我在小巷 贫民窟和废屋里苟且求生
When I was a child, I lived in alleys, gutters, abandoned houses.

您想知道我的忠诚在哪里? 
You wish to know where my true loyalties lie?

我的忠诚不属于任何国王或者女王 我的忠诚属于人民
Not with any king or queen, but with the people.

那些在暴政酷压或是清政繁荣下挣扎的人民
The people who suffer under despots and prosper under just rule.

那些衷心祈愿您获胜的人民
The people whose hearts you aim to win.

如果您只要盲目的忠诚
If you demand blind allegiance,

我尊重您的意愿
I respect your wishes.

灰虫子可以将我斩首 您的巨龙可以将我生吞

但您若放我一命 我将鞠躬尽瘁
But if you let me live, I will serve you well.

因为我知道除您以外人民别无选择
Because I know the people have no better chance than you.

向我宣誓效忠 瓦里斯
Swear this to me, Varys.

如果你认为我辜负了人民 你不会密谋造反

而是像今天这样直视我 告诉我是如何辜负了人民的

作为北境之王 他把野人和北境的各大家族联合起来 这样他们能够一起面对共同的敌人

听起来很了不起嘛
He sounds like quite a man.

让他站在您的面前 让他告诉您发生在他身上的一切 他亲眼所见的种种事情

而多斯拉克蛮族会把你们的村庄夷为平地 强暴奴役你们的女人 毫不犹豫地屠杀你们的孩子

包括奥莲娜·提利尔

这个名字是有份量的

我们既不是破誓者 也不是阴谋家
We're not oathbreakers. We're not schemers.

我们不会在对手背后捅刀子 更不会在婚礼上将人割喉
We don't stab our rivals in the back or cut their throats at weddings.

I swore an oath to House Tyrell.

你也对王室宣过誓 塔利大人

我很小就认识奥莲娜了

她曾是个卓越的女人

她只是迫切想要复仇 甚至把多斯拉克人带上了岸
She wants revenge so badly, she brought the Dothraki to our shores.

这可是维斯特洛史上第一次出现多斯拉克人啊
The Dothraki in Westeros for the first time in history.

我知道你不喜欢我姐姐 但是你必须做出选择
I know you don't like my sister, but you have to make a choice.

是跟我们并肩作战 还是跟外邦蛮族和阉人并肩作战? 
Do you fight with us or with foreign savages and eunuchs?

战争胜利之后 女王会需要一个新的南境守护
When the war is won, the queen will need a new Warden of the South.

我想不起任何比蓝道·塔利 更适合的人选
I can think of no better man than Randyll Tarly.

山姆威尔·塔利
学城学徒

感染扩散的面积太大了
The infection has spread too far.

你应该在被碰到的那一刻就砍断自己的胳膊

It'll be years before it kills you.

还有多久会…

六个月 可能更快
Six months, maybe fewer.

我在黑城堡见过史坦尼斯·拜拉席恩的女儿
I met Stannis Baratheon's daughter at Castle Black.

她在婴儿时期患上了灰麟病且被治愈了
She had the greyscale as a baby and was cured.

不 是不是有什么办法
No. Isn't there some way

你看他像个婴儿吗? 
Does this look like a baby to you?

不像 那你研究过 灰鳞病的恶化速率 在孩童和成人身上的差异吗?

克礼森学士及时发现了

席琳·拜拉席恩的病

而他已病入膏肓

恕我们无能为力 爵士

但你是个受封的骑士 我会多宽限你一天
As an anointed knight, I'll allow you one more day.

如何度过这点时间取决于你
How you choose to spend that time is up to you.

对他们来说我都死了好多年了
I've been dead to them for years.

陛下 您下来过这里吗?

没有 该是没来过
No, I can't say I have.

很奇怪劳勃国王竟没有销毁它们

他不能摆在自己周围

Sometimes he would come down here and look at them.

伊耿骑着这只野兽飞过大海

十分强大… 但却不是坚不可摧
Powerful...  but not invincible.

实际上 丹妮莉丝的一头龙 在弥林的竞技场上被长矛刺伤了
Apparently, one of Daenerys's dragons was wounded by spears in the fighting pits of Meereen.

如果他们能被刺伤 他们也能被杀掉
And if they can be wounded, they can be killed.

这是君临城里最好的制弩师傅和铁匠 夜以继日赶工出来的 女王陛下
The finest artillators and blacksmiths in King's Landing have been laboring day and night, Your Grace.

您可以试着拉下那个操纵杆
If you'll kindly pull that lever.

怎么? 你不喜欢这个书名?

你想知道他怎么死的吗

莱安娜·莫尔蒙

You're abandoning your home.

我会把他们交给值得信赖的人
I'm leaving both in good hands.

你是临冬城唯一的史塔克
You're the only Stark in Winterfell.

Until I return, the North is yours.

我亲自把他的遗骨送回来
I delivered his bones myself.

呈给凯瑟琳夫人 替提利昂·兰尼斯特示好
Presented them to Lady Catelyn as a gesture of goodwill from Tyrion Lannister.

真是恍如隔世
Seems like a lifetime ago.

等见到提利昂大人的时候 请一定代我向他问好
Do give Lord Tyrion my best when you see him.

他死时我很难过
I was sorry when he died.

你父亲和我有矛盾 但是他很爱凯特

她不喜欢你 对吧

唉 看起来她真是大大低估了你
Well, it appears she vastly underestimated you.

是暴雨袭来时的最大希望

你不属于这里
You don't belong down here.

我们从来没有好好地说过话

我跟你无话可说

连一句'谢谢'也不说吗

我爱珊莎 正如我爱她母亲一样

妈妈会想要瑟曦

魔山杀了父亲

他一只手就能碾碎你

你能别一口一个妈妈了吗?

说不定我在到君临城之前就把你俩都杀了

这样我就不用和人分享了
And then I won't have to share.

这马尿也能喝?

等到了阳戟城

I'll treat you to a Dornish red.

你去过多恩吗

能给我们再来点酒吗?

我以为你不喜欢喝

我开始尝出味儿来了
I'm developing a taste for it.

他不是你的仆人 没关系

珊莎现在可好? 我听说她平安无恙

她很好 她是否对我寤寐思服?

那可是个漫长又血腥的故事
A long and bloody tale.

说实话 多半时候我都在醉生梦死

如果我是你的御前首相 我也会谏言反对
If I was your Hand, I would have advised against it.

都是经验之谈

Stark men don't fare well when they travel south.

没错 但我并不姓史塔克

您面前的是 坦格利安家族的'风暴降生'丹妮莉丝 铁王座合法继承人 安达尔人和先民的合法女王
You stand in the presence of Daenerys Stormborn of House Targaryen, rightful heir to the Iron Throne, rightful Queen of the Andals and the First Men,

七大王国守护 龙之母 大草海上的卡丽熙 不焚者 镣铐破除者

他是北境之王
He's King in the North.

风浪不大 劳陛下挂念

恕我无知 戴佛斯爵士

我从未接受过正统教育 但我得说 据我了解 托伦·史塔克是末代北境之王 他曾臣服于我的先祖伊耿·坦格利安

跪求我的先祖赦免他和他北境子民的性命

您可以明天就突袭君临 攻占整座城市
You could storm King's Landing tomorrow and the city would fall.

妈的 我们当初没有龙都差点打下来了

差点 但您现在还没有突袭君临

我认为 唯一的原因在于 您不想杀害成千上万无辜的百姓

杀人是赢得战争最快的方法 但您不会这样做 这就说明 至少在这一点上 您比瑟曦要好些

但这也说明不了我为什么需要你的帮助

你跟我说过你喜欢这个人 我确实说过

从他见我开始的这段时间里 他拒绝称我为女王 拒绝向我臣服 现在他又说我是个孩子

我认为他说的是我们都是孩子 这是一种比喻而已
I believe he's calling all of us children. Figure of speech.

那也是一种比喻吗?

亡者大军? 
The Army of the Dead?

陛下 您也许并不十分了解我 但您觉得我像是骗子或者疯子吗?

不 我觉得您两者都不是

亡者大军是真实存在的
The Army of the Dead is real.

异鬼是真实存在的
The white walkers are real.

夜王也是真实存在的 我都亲眼见过

我出生在龙石岛

但我并不记得这里
Not that I can remember it.

因为在劳勃派来的刺客找上门之前 我们就已经逃走了

劳勃是你父亲最好的朋友 对吧?

我在想 不知你父亲是否知道 他的挚友会派人 去杀害一个摇篮里的女婴

当然 这些现在都不要紧
Not that it matters now, of course.

我在异国他乡长大

试图杀死我的人不计其数
So many men have tried to kill me,

我都记不清他们的名字了
I don't remember all their names.

我曾经像匹母马一样被人卖掉

被人套上镣铐 又遭到背叛 被强暴 被侮辱
I've been chained and betrayed, raped and defiled.

你知道在我流亡的这些年里 是什么让我坚持住没有倒下吗? 
Do you know what kept me standing through all those years in exile?

不是对神的信仰 也不是对神话和传说的迷信
Not in any gods, not in myths and legends.

对丹妮莉丝·坦格利安的信念
In Daenerys Targaryen.

世人已经几百年没有见到过龙了 直到我的孩子们诞生
The world hadn't seen a dragon in centuries until my children were born.

多斯拉克人过去从未渡过海 任何海
The Dothraki hadn't crossed the sea, any sea.

我生来就是要统治七大王国的 我也定会统治
I was born to rule the Seven Kingdoms, and I will.

如果我们不打败夜王 您将统治的便是一片坟场
You'll be ruling over a graveyard if we don't defeat the Night King.

讨伐我姐姐的战争已经开始了
The war against my sister has already begun.

您不能指望我们一边御敌 一边和您一起对付 您在绝境长城外所看到的那些东西
You can't expect us to halt hostilities and join you in fighting whatever you saw beyond the Wall.

您不相信他
You don't believe him.

这我理解 他的话听起来确实像胡扯
I understand that. It sounds like nonsense.

但如果命运让丹妮莉丝·坦格利安回到了维斯特洛 命运也同样使琼恩·雪诺成为了北境之王
But if destiny has brought Daenerys Targaryen back to our shores, it has also made Jon Snow King in the North.

您是第一个把多斯拉克人带到维斯特洛来的人? 
You were the first to bring Dothraki to Westeros?

他可是第一个使野人和北方家族结盟的人
He is the first to make allies of wildlings and Northmen.

他被任命为守夜人的总司令
He was named Lord Commander of the Night's Watch.

他被尊为北境之王
He was named King in the North.

不是因为他的出身
Not because of his birthright.

他根本就没什么出身 他就是个私生子
He has no birthright. He's a damn bastard.

那些难伺候的龟孙们选择他当领袖 是因为他们相信他
All those hard sons of bitches chose him as their leader because they believe in him.

那些您难以相信的事物 他都亲自面对过
All those things you don't believe in, he faced those things.

为了他的人民 他与之奋战
He fought those things for the good of his people.

为了他的人民 他铤而走险
He risked his life for his people.

为了他的人民 他被刺穿心脏
He took a knife in the heart for his people.

如果我们不能放下彼此之间的敌意团结起来 我们都会死
If we don't put aside our enmities and band together, we will die.

到那时 谁的骷髅架子坐在铁王座上都不重要了
And then it doesn't matter whose skeleton sits on the Iron Throne.

如果真的不重要 那你不妨现在就跪下
If it doesn't matter, then you might as well kneel.

向丹妮莉丝女王宣誓效忠 帮助她打败我姐姐 之后 我们的军队会联合起来保护北境
Swear your allegiance to Queen Daenerys, help her to defeat my sister, and together, our armies will protect the North.

没时间耗下去了
There's no time for that.

没时间浪费在这些破事上了!
There's no time for any of this!

当我们还傻站在这争论的时候…
While we stand here, debating...

下跪花不了多少时间
It takes no time to bend the knee.

用你的剑向她起誓
Pledge your sword to her cause.

我为什么要那么做呢? 
And why would I do that?

陛下 我无意冒犯 但我并不了解您
I mean no offense, Your Grace, but I don't know you.

就我目前看来 您对王位的宣称完全依赖于您父亲之名 而我父亲正是为了推翻疯王而发动战争
As far as I can tell, your claim to the throne rests entirely on your father's name, and my own father fought to overthrow the Mad King.

北境诸侯 信任我能够领导他们 我将尽我所能继续履行我的职责
The lords of the North placed their trust in me to lead them, and I will continue to do so as well as I can.

同样我也要指明 我是七国合法的女王
It's also fair to point out that I'm the rightful Queen of the Seven Kingdoms.

你宣称自己是北境的国王 你就是公开造反
By declaring yourself king of the northernmost kingdom, you are in open rebellion.

陛下 请让您的客人先退下
Your Grace, please dismiss your guests.

请原谅我的失礼
You must forgive my manners.

远道而来 两位想必都累了
You'll both be tired after your long journey.

我们会为你们准备洗澡水 并把晚餐送到你们的房间
We'll have baths drawn for you and supper sent to your rooms.

我们的铁民和多恩盟友 在前往多恩的途中遭到袭击
Our ironborn and Dornish allies were attacked en route to Dorne.

然后呢?  仅有两三艘船逃脱 其它的 被击沉或被俘虏
And? Two or three ships escaped, the rest, sunk or captured.

艾拉莉亚和沙蛇们 有的死了 有的被俘虏
Ellaria and the Sand Snakes, dead or captured.

葛雷乔伊姐弟也一样下落不明
The Greyjoys, dead or captured.

你看见他抓住她了? 
You saw him take her?

但是你逃掉了?  我救不了她
But you got away? I couldn't save her.

你要是尽力了就不会出现在这里
You wouldn't be here if you tried.

看看他们 为一位葛雷乔伊家族的人欢呼
Look at them, cheering for a Greyjoy.

实话实说 我都硬了
I have to be honest, this is making me hard.

你有看到小席恩 跳海之前的表情吗? 
Did you see Little Theon's face right before he jumped overboard?

婊子! 婊子! 婊子! 杀人犯!
Whore! Whore! Whore! Murderers!

女王陛下 请接受我的礼物 谨以此代表铁群岛所有忠诚的子民
My queen, please accept this gift on behalf of all of your loyal subjects in the Iron Islands.

我为您奉上的礼物无人能敌… 那就是正义
I give you what no other man could give...  justice.

为您被害的女儿伸张正义
Justice for your murdered daughter.

你已经证明了自己是十四大洋上最好的船长 是王室真正的盟友
You've proven yourself the greatest captain on the fourteen seas and a true friend to the crown.

您值得的不止一个真正的盟友
You deserve more than a true friend.

你的英勇事迹值得奖赏
And you deserve a proper reward for your heroism.

我想要的奖赏只有一个
There's only one reward I want.

你会得偿所愿的… 等赢了战争后再说
You shall have what your heart desires...  when the war is won.

由攸伦·葛雷乔伊指挥我们的海军 詹姆·兰尼斯特带领我们的陆军 维斯特洛的儿女们 将保卫我们的国家
With Euron Greyjoy commanding our naval forces and Jaime Lannister leading our armies, the sons and daughters of Westeros shall defend our country.

这真是无与伦比 对吧? 
There's nothing quite like it, is there?

人民的爱戴
The love of the people.

不过我猜你应该并不了解
Though I suppose you wouldn't know.

还不是不久前向我姐姐吐口水的同一群暴民
This same mob spat at my sister not long ago.

如果你背叛我们 他们就会看着你插在长枪上的脑袋欢呼
And if you turn on us, they'll cheer to see your head mounted on a spike.

他们确实就喜欢断掉的头
They just like severed heads, really.

听着 如果你有任何建议
Listen, if you have any advice at all,

我都很乐意听
I would love to hear it.

当我们闲下来可以像兄弟一样聊聊
When we have an hour or two to speak as brothers.

她是喜欢温柔还是粗暴? 
Does she like it gentle or rough?

嘘 嘘 嘘 嘘 别急 我们等会儿再聊
Shh, shh, shh, shh, not now. We'll talk later.

我希望你明白我是理解你的
I want you to know I understand.

即使你我之间是敌人
Even though we're enemies, you and I,

我也懂得驱使着你的那种愤怒
I understand the fury that drives you.

那天我也在场 格雷果爵士捏碎了你情人的头
I was there that day when Ser Gregor crushed your lover's head.

都能听见奥柏伦头骨碎裂的声音
I can hear the sound of Oberyn's skull breaking.

和你的尖叫声
The sound of your scream.

我从未听过那样的声音
I never heard a sound like that.

我想 '这就是真爱吧'
I thought, 'That's true love.'

奥柏伦那天看上去英俊无比 真的
Oberyn looked beautiful that day. He really did.

身法灵活无人能比
No one moved like him.

用长矛的技巧无可匹敌
No one had such skill with a spear.

就算格雷果爵士也拿他没辙
Even Ser Gregor couldn't stop him.

要是他没有接着嘲讽
If only he hadn't taunted him.

他大可以一走了之留下可怜的格雷果爵士等死
He could've walked away and left poor Ser Gregor to die.

但这就不是你情人的作风了 对吧? 
But that wasn't your lover's way, was it?

现在他已在六尺之下
Now he's buried somewhere.

而格雷果爵士还在这里 且比任何时候都要强大
And here's Ser Gregor, stronger than ever.

对你来说很难接受吧
That must be difficult for you.

当我的女儿从我身边被带走 我唯一的女儿… 算了 你不经历丧子之痛 怎么能想象得到这种感觉
When my daughter was taken from me, my only daughter...  well, you can't imagine how that feels unless you've lost a child.

我用自己的乳汁喂养她 尽管他们说可以让奶妈来做
I fed her at my own breast even though they told me to give her to the wet nurse.

我接受不了她被别的女人抱在怀里
I couldn't bear to see her in another woman's arms.

我从未拥有过母亲 但弥赛菈拥有过
I never got to have a mother, but Myrcella did.

她是我的 你却从我身边夺走了她
She was mine, and you took her from me.

你的女儿也是个美人
Your daughter's a beauty, too.

多么完美的多恩美人
Perfect Dornish beauty.

她一定是你的最爱
I imagine she's your favorite.

我懂 我懂 我们不该选最爱的那个 但又怎样 我们不过是凡夫俗子
I know, I know, we're not supposed to have favorites, but still, we're only human.

我们该爱谁就爱谁
We love whom we love.

抱歉 我听不清你在说什么
I'm sorry, I can't understand you.

堵着嘴我可没办法听清你说的话
That gag makes it impossible to understand what you're saying.

一定很崩溃吧
It must be frustrating.

我们都做出了自己的选择
We all make our choices.

你选择杀害我的女儿
You chose to murder my daughter.

你做出那个选择后一定感觉充满力量吧
You must have felt powerful after you made that choice.

现在还觉得有力量吗? 
Do you feel powerful now?

我睡不好
I don't sleep very well.

我躺在床上盯着华盖 想象着各种杀死自己敌人的方式
I lie in bed and I stare at the canopy and imagine ways of killing my enemies.

如何摧毁艾拉莉亚·沙德 那个捏碎我掌上明珠的女人
How to destroy Ellaria Sand, the woman who murdered my only daughter.

我想过让格雷果爵士 像捏碎奥柏伦的头骨一样捏碎你的头骨
I thought about having Ser Gregor crush your skull the way he did Oberyn's.

我想这会很有诗意 但是过程很快 太快了
It would be poetic, I suppose, but fast, too fast.

我想过让他捏碎你女儿的头骨
I thought about having him crush your daughter's skull.

这张可爱的小脸 像鸭蛋一样被打碎裂开 不 这样不对
The thought of this lovely face cracking open like a duck egg, no, it's just not right.

科本是我认识的最聪明的人
Qyburn here is the cleverest man I know.

聪明到知道你是用什么毒死了弥赛菈
Clever enough to learn what poison you used to murder Myrcella.

漫长的再见 是这个的吧? 
The Long Goodbye, was that it?

漫长的道别 就是这个
The Long Farewell. That's the one.

毒药多久发作? 
How long does the poison take?

很难说…  可能几小时 可能几天
Difficult to say... hours, days.

取决于个人体质
It depends on the subject's constitution.

但必死无疑吧? 噢 是的 陛下 当然了
But death is certain? Oh, yes, Your Grace, quite certain.

你的女儿将会死在这牢房里 而你将在这眼睁睁地看她死去
Your daughter will die here in this cell, and you will be here watching when she does.

你将在这儿度过余生
You'll be here the rest of your days.

如果你绝食 我们就把食物硬塞进你喉咙里
If you refuse to eat, we'll force food down your throat.

你会活活看着你女儿腐烂
You will live to watch your daughter rot.

看着那张美丽的脸蛋塌陷下来…
To watch that beautiful face collapse...

从头到尾好好想想你做出的那些选择
All the while contemplating the choices you've made.

确保侍卫每隔几小时就换一次火把
Make sure the guards change the torches every few hours.

我一点点都不想让她错过
I don't want her to miss a thing.

你在干嘛? 不能让任何人看到我们
What are you doing? No one can see us like this.

我是七王国的女王 我乐意怎样就怎样
I am the Queen of the Seven Kingdoms. I'll do as I please.

原谅我 陛下
Forgive me, Your Grace.

布拉佛斯来的使者已经到了
The visitor from Braavos has arrived.

很好 我们需要换新床单
Good. And we'll need fresh sheets for the bed.

请节哀顺变 陛下 对于您儿子的死我深感遗憾
My condolences, Your Grace, on the death of your son.

大家都说 他是个不错的年轻人
From all reports, he was a fine young man.

铁金库不是派你来此吊唁的
The Iron Bank didn't send you here to offer condolences.

吊唁还有祝贺
Condolences and congratulations.

祝贺您成为第一位统治七国的女王 这是一个了不起的成就
To become the first ruling Queen of the Seven Kingdoms, that's quite an accomplishment.

铁金库欣赏您摆脱封建迷信束缚 为王室排除 企图颠覆法律之徒的方式
The Iron Bank appreciates how you cast off the yoke of superstition, freeing the crown from elements who sought to subvert the rule of law.

贝勒大圣堂的爆炸是一场悲剧的意外
The destruction of the Sept of Baelor was a tragic accident.

确实如此 但有时候悲剧是必要的 为了恢复秩序和理性的统治
Indeed, but sometimes tragedies are necessary to restore order and rational leadership.

铁金库想要回自己的黄金
The Iron Bank wants its gold back.

您父亲从未食言
Your father never minced words either.

但 没错 您的债务相当巨大
But, yes, your debts are considerable.

您现在四面受敌
And you're now engaged in a conflict on several fronts.

我们都知道战争有多耗费钱财
We both know how expensive war can be.

我们也都知道黄金能赢战争
And we both know gold wins wars.

您的财库已经空了
Your vaults are empty.

您已故丈夫的挥霍无度导致如此结果
Your late husband's profligacy saw to that.

您最富有的盟军 提利尔家族 现在是你们的敌人
Your wealthiest allies, the Tyrells, are now your enemies.

您被王座的觊觎者从各个方向包围
You are surrounded on all sides by rivals for the throne.

而铁金库想赌一把谁是赢家
And the Iron Bank wants to bet on a winner.

我们只投资在可能成功的一方
We invest in endeavors we deem likely to be successful.

不过是婉约说法的'赌'
A fancy way of saying 'bet.'

战争已经开始 我已获得首胜
The war's already begun. I've drawn first blood.

我除掉了多恩的毒蛇
I decapitated the Dornish snake.

我的舰队掌控着狭海
My armada owns the Narrow Sea.

是攸伦·葛雷乔伊的舰队掌控着狭海
Euron Greyjoy's armada owns the Narrow Sea.

攸伦·葛雷乔伊对我忠心耿耿
Euron Greyjoy is loyal to me.

丹妮莉丝·坦格利安有三条成年巨龙
Daenerys Targaryen has three fullgrown dragons.

您的木船和喷火的巨龙相比能有怎样的优势呢? 
How well do wooden ships fare against firebreathing dragons?

她的龙或许没有某些人想的那样坚不可摧
Her dragons might not be as invulnerable as some think.

不过倒是可以来说说这个坦格利安家的女孩
But let's talk about the Targaryen girl.

你想要在她身上投资? 
You want to invest in her?

我猜铁金库在奴隶贸易上投资了相当可观的金子吧
I'm guessing the Iron Bank invested considerable gold in the slave trade.

考虑到丹妮莉丝已经解放了所有的奴隶 你的收益怎样? 
How are your profits now that Daenerys has freed all the slaves?

奴隶贸易已经进入了一个低迷期 这的确是事实
The slave trade has entered a downturn, it's true.

据我所知 她把她自己看作 一个革命者而不单单是一个统治者
From what I gather, she considers herself more of a revolutionary than a monarch.

就你的经验而谈 银行家与革命者的交易通常做得怎么样呢? 
In your experience, how do bankers usually fare with revolutionaries?

兰尼斯特家族欠了铁金库一大笔钱 但是兰尼斯特有债必还
The Lannisters owe the Iron Bank quite a lot of money, but Lannisters always pay their debts.

被解放的奴隶 多斯拉克人 还有巨龙 会这样吗? 
Do former slaves or Dothraki or dragons?

有其父必有其女 果真如此
Your father's daughter, indeed.

请作为贵宾留在君临
Stay in King's Landing as my honored guest.

当你返回布拉佛斯时
And when you return to Braavos,

我发誓 我的债务将悉数还清
I swear to you, my debt will be paid in full.

我到这里反省 没能预判到葛雷乔伊的袭击
I came down here to brood over my failure to predict the Greyjoy attack.

你这样是在为难我啊
You're making it difficult.

你看上去比我反省得深刻多了
You look a lot better brooding than I do.

你让我感到好像我没在反省自己的错误
You make me feel like I'm failing at brooding over failing.

在这个岛上 我是个囚犯
I'm a prisoner on this island.

我可不这么认为
I wouldn't say you're a prisoner on this island.

你可以自由出入城堡 走到沙滩 去你想去的地方
You're free to walk the castle, the beaches, to go wherever you want.

我可不这么认为
I wouldn't say we took your ship.

我没心思和你玩文字游戏
I'm not playing word games with you.

亡者大军正冲着我们所有人而来
The dead are coming for us all.

你为何不想想你能做些什么 来弥补我那些损失的船只和被杀的盟友 而我会想想我能做些什么帮你解决那些会走的死人
Why don't you figure out what to do about my missing fleet and murdered allies, and I'll figure out what to do about your walking dead men.

我很难彻底明白 真的很难
It's hard for me to fathom. It really is.

要是有人和我说起异鬼和夜王…
If someone told me about the white walkers and the Night King...

你可能也不相信我
You probably don't believe me.

你叫它们'古怪精灵'
'Grumkins and snarks,' you called them.

你说过那一切都是胡扯
You said it was all nonsense.

那就是胡扯 每个人都知道
It was nonsense. Everybody knew it.

不过紧接着莫尔蒙看到了他们 你也看到了他们
But then Mormont saw them and you saw them.

而我相信诚实之人所见之事 胜过相信普遍的认知
And I trust the eyes of an honest man more than I trust what everybody knows.

我如何才能说服不认识我的人 那些他们认为不存在的敌人会杀光他们? 
How do I convince people who don't know me that an enemy they don't believe in is coming to kill them all?

是个好问题 我知道这是个好问题
Good question. I know it's a good question.

我正在寻求答案
I'm looking for an answer.

人们的思维不是为这么复杂的问题准备的
People's minds aren't made for problems that large.

比起异鬼 夜王
White walkers, the Night King,

亡者大军… 面对我姐姐 这样一个更让人自在 熟悉的怪物 几乎就是解脱了
Army of the Dead...  it's almost a relief to confront a comfortable, familiar monster like my sister.

我需要帮助我的人民准备应对即将来临的事情
I need to help prepare my people for what's coming.

呆在这里可不行
I can't help them from here.

如果你这么轻易地放弃 我看你不太可能成为北境之王
It seems unlikely that you became King in the North by giving up that easily.

每个人都告诉我要从我父亲的错误中吸取教训
Everyone told me to learn from my father's mistakes.

不要回应疯王的女儿的召唤 她是外来的侵略者
Don't answer a summons from the Mad King's daughter, a foreign invader.

可我还是来了 一个来自北方的傻瓜
And here I am, a Northern fool.

子辈并不是他们的父辈 幸好我们都是这样
Children are not their fathers, luckily for all of us.

有时对于外来侵略者 和北方的傻瓜来说要做的不仅仅是会面
And sometimes there's more to foreign invaders and Northern fools than meets the eye.

丹妮莉丝本可以很久以前就向维斯特洛启航 但她没有
Daenerys could have sailed for Westeros long ago, but she didn't.

她反而留在了她所在之处 拯救许多人于水火之中 他们当中有些人正和我们一起在这岛上
Instead, she stayed where she was and saved many people from horrible fates, some of whom are on this island with us right now.

当你在这里做客时 你或许可以考虑询问他们 对于疯王的女儿他们怎么想
While you're our guest here, you might consider asking them what they think of the Mad King's daughter.

她保护人民不受怪物的危害 就像你一样
She protects people from monsters, just as you do.

这就是她来到这里的原因
It's why she came here.

她不打算北上 去抵抗她从未见过的敌人 仅凭一个她不认识的人所说的话
And she's not about to head north to fight an enemy she's never seen on the word of a man she doesn't know.

和一次简单的会面 这并不是一个合理的要求
After a single meeting, it's not a reasonable thing to ask.

那么 你有没有合理一些的要求? 
So, do you have anything reasonable to ask?

或许你真是一个来自北方的傻瓜
Maybe you are a Northern fool.

我在问有没有我能够帮到你的事情
I'm asking if there's something I can do to help you.

也叫火山玻璃 黑曜石
Volcanic glass, obsidian.

他说您这里有着巨大储量的龙晶
He says you have a tremendous amount of it here.

怎么就说到玻璃了? 
Why are we talking about glass?

我们刚刚失去两个盟友
We just lost two of our allies.

所以我刚才在和琼恩·雪诺交谈 他是潜在的盟友
Which is why I was speaking to Jon Snow, a potential ally.

那北境之王想要龙晶来做什么? 
And what does the King in the North want with dragonglass?

看起来 它可以制成武器 来杀死异鬼和他们的走卒
Apparently, it can be turned into weapons that kill white walkers and their foot soldiers.

我也不确定该用哪个词
Unsure about the nomenclature.

那关于这亡者大军 异鬼和夜王 你怎么看? 
And what do you think about this Army of the Dead and white walkers and Night Kings?

我很想相信琼恩·雪诺是错的
I'd very much like to believe that Jon Snow is wrong.

但是一个贤者曾说过 你绝不应相信一件事 只是因为你的一厢情愿
But a wise man once said that you should never believe a thing simply because you want to believe it.

哪位贤者说的这句话? 
Which wise man said this?

你是想把你自己的观点假托先贤之智来阐述吗? 
Are you trying to present your own statements as ancient wisdom?

我绝不会
I would never do that.

我相信琼恩·雪诺是因为 他来到了这里
The reason I believe Jon Snow is because he's here.

他所有的谋臣都告诉他不要来
All of his advisors would have told him not to come.

我也会告诉他不要来
I would have told him not to come.

可他还是来了
And he's here anyway.

您不必相信他
You don't have to believe him.

让他开采龙晶去吧
Let him mine the dragonglass.

如果他错了 那龙晶也是分文不值
If he's wrong, it's worthless.

您甚至都不知道它在这里
You didn't even know it was here.

给他些他认为有用的东西
Give him something by giving him nothing.

试着去和一个潜在的盟友 建立一个更有成效的关系
Take a step toward a more productive relationship with a possible ally.

让他有事可做 而我们专注于手中的任务
Keep him occupied while we focus on the task at hand...

戴佛斯爵士怎么说的来着 为了他的人民 他被刺穿心脏? 
What was that Ser Davos said about taking a knife in the heart for his people?

您得原谅他们的异想天开
You must allow them their flights of fancy.

北方是很乏味的
It's dreary in the North.

多么神奇的生物
Amazing thing to see.

我用我的兄长命名他们 韦赛里斯和雷加
I named them for my brothers, Viserys and Rhaegar.

如今他们都去世了
They're both gone now.

你也失去过两个兄弟
You lost two brothers as well.

人们认为龙永远消失了 可现在它们活生生的
People thought dragons were gone forever, but here they are.

或许我们都该审视一下我们的认知
Perhaps we should all be examining what we think we know.

你和提利昂聊过了
You've been talking to Tyrion.

他很喜欢说话 我们都喜欢做我们擅长的事情
He enjoys talking. We all enjoy what we're good at.

你知道我不会让瑟曦一直坐在铁王座上
You know I'm not going to let Cersei stay on the Iron Throne.

当然
I never expected that you would.

我也没有改变 哪些王国属于铁王座的想法
And I haven't changed my mind about which kingdoms belong to that throne.

我会允许你开采龙晶 用它锻造武器
I will allow you to mine the dragonglass and forge weapons from it.

你需要的任何资源和人力 我都提供
Any resources or men you need, I will provide for you.

所以 你是相信我关于夜王和亡者大军的那些话了? 
So you believe me, then, about the Night King and the Army of the Dead?

你应该开工了 琼恩·雪诺
You'd better get to work, Jon Snow.

整整一千蒲式耳 小姐
A full thousand bushels, my lady.

对于临冬城现有居民来说
For the current occupants of the castle,

约恩·罗伊斯 这些食物够吃一年 也许一年多
'青铜' 符石城伯爵 it's enough food for a year, perhaps more.

过去一百年间最长的冬天有多长? 
And what's the longest winter in the past hundred years?

呃 我不太确定
Uh, I'm not entirely certain.

我 我会查查鲁温学士的记录
II'll check Maester Luwin's records.

他把每封渡鸦来信都做了存档
He kept a copy of every raven scroll.

你的意思是 我们粮食不够了 如果北境军队回来守卫临冬城 就更不够了吧
You're telling me we don't have enough food, especially not if the armies of the North come back to defend Winterfell?

是的 小姐 应该不能够
No, my lady, most likely not.

那我们必须为未来的不测做准备了
Then we must prepare for that eventuality.

不管威胁从何而来 这里都是最好的容身之处
Whatever direction the threat comes from, this is the best place to be.

我们要开始建造粮仓 北境每个城堡都要定期运来粮食
We need to start building up our grain stores with regular shipments from every keep in the North.

如果冬天过去了 粮食仍有剩余 我们就将其归还
If we don't use it by winter's end, we'll give it back to them.

但是如果北境人都逃来临冬城 那就不用把时间浪费在运送粮食上了
But if the entire North has to flee to Winterfell, they won't have enough time to bring wagonloads of grain with them.

沃尔肯学士 务必办好此事
Maester Wolkan, you'll see to it?

他们在用皮革覆盖胸甲吗? 
Are they covering those breastplates in leather?

不这么做的话 凛冬真正至此的时候怎么办? 
Well, shouldn't they be? Once the real cold comes?

我问你 为什么这上面没覆皮革? 
You there, why isn't there leather on these?

北境人都面向北方 担忧着长城外的威胁
The Northerners are all facing north, worried about the threat from beyond the Wall.

我是这里最了解瑟曦的人
I know Cersei better than anyone here.

如果你忽视她…
If you turn your back on her...

你不是这里最了解她的人 我只想说…
You don't know Cersei better than anyone here. I only meant to say...

那个杀害了我父母兄长的人非常危险是吗? 
That the woman who murdered my mother, father, and brother is dangerous?

感谢您睿智的忠告
Thank you for your wise counsel.

只有两种可能的结果 一种是死人打败活人 这样的话 我们所有的问题都结束了 另一种是活人胜出
One of two things will happen...  either the dead will defeat the living, in which case...  all our troubles come to an end, or life will win out.

不要单纯地在北境或南方作战
Don't fight in the North or the South.

永远在脑海中设想每一场战斗
Fight every battle, everywhere, always, in your mind.

每个人都是你的敌人 也都是你的朋友 所有可能的事件都同时发生
Everyone is your enemy, everyone is your friend...  every possible series of events is happening all at once.

这样就不会有出乎你意料之事
Live that way and nothing will surprise you.

发生的每件事都会是 你曾经设想过的
Everything that happens will be something that you've seen before.

珊莎小姐 请到城门来
Lady Sansa, at the gate.

我希望琼恩也在
I wish Jon were here.

我也是 我有话要对他说
Yes, I need to speak to him.

你是父亲唯一在世的嫡子
You're Father's last living trueborn son.

你现在是临冬城公爵了
You're Lord of Winterfell now.

我永远不会是临冬城公爵
I can never be Lord of Winterfell.

我永远不能封爵封侯
I can never be lord of anything.

我是三眼乌鸦
I'm the ThreeEyed Raven.

我不知道这是什么意思
I don't know what that means.

很难解释
It's difficult to explain.

这意味着我有能力洞察一切
It means I can see everything.

任何人发生过的任何事
Everything that's ever happened to everyone.

任何当下发生的事
Everything that's happening right now.

现在对我来说都是时间的片段
It's all pieces now, fragments.

我需要学会更好地洞察一切
I need to learn to see better.

当长夜再次降临
When the Long Night comes again,

你怎么知道这些的? 
How do you know all this?

三眼乌鸦教给我的
The ThreeEyed Raven taught me.

你不是说你就是三眼乌鸦么
I thought you were the ThreeEyed Raven.

我告诉你了这很难解释
I told you it's difficult to explain.

我为你经历的那些事感到伤心
I'm sorry for all that's happened to you.

我很伤心 那些事发生在这个家里
I'm sorry it had to happen here in our home.

那个夜晚真美
It was so beautiful that night.

雪花飘落 就像现在
Snow falling, just like now.

而你那么美 穿着白色的结婚礼服
And you were so beautiful...  in your white wedding dress.

我必须回去了 布兰
I have to go back inside, Bran.

我要再待一会儿
I'll stay a bit longer.

有点疼 比原来要轻
A bit. Less than before.

看起来感染消退了
The infection no longer appears to be active.

就算有人说是表层患病皮肤被剥掉了 似乎都说得过去 此外 皮下的部分还给上了药膏
One could almost be forgiven for thinking that the entire upper layer of diseased skin was debrided and the underlying region treated with some sort of unguent.

不知道你说的是什么
Don't know anything about that.

我就是觉得有所好转了
I just started feeling better.

我猜是休息起作用了
I assumed it was the rest that did it.

您可以离开了 爵士
You're free to go, ser.

这间屋子是给传染病病人的 而你不再是了
This chamber is needed for the infectious, which you are no longer.

塔利 今晚我想在我的书房和你谈谈
Tarly, I'd like to speak with you in my study this evening.

到了晚上我就知道了
Suppose I'll find out this evening.

我从看到自己染病的那刻起 就向它投降了
I surrendered to this sickness the moment I first saw it.

我知道自己会病死 或者在那之前自杀
I knew it would kill me or I'd kill myself before it could.

风暴降生丹妮莉丝让我相信还有希望
Daenerys Stormborn convinced me otherwise.

我的归宿就是回到她身边
The only place for me is back with her.

你父亲不止一次救过我
Your father saved me more than once.

我无以为报
It's the least I could do.

也许我们会再次相遇
Perhaps our paths will cross again.

你给他提供治疗了? 是的
You treated him? Yes.

谁叫你治他的? 
Who told you to treat him?

谁曾禁止你 禁止任何人试图治疗他? 
Who forbade you, or anyone, to attempt to treat him?

我记得是你
I seem to remember you.

即便如此你还是治疗了他? 是的
But you treated him anyway? I did, yes.

我禁止你 是因为这样做危险 成功率低 尤其是他那个年纪的患者
I forbade it because it is dangerous and rarely successful, especially on someone of that age.

你可能让自己和他人都被传染
You could have infected yourself and others.

你可能毁了整个学城
You could have devastated the entire Citadel.

这个手术需要绝对谨慎 非常难以实施
It's a meticulous, difficult procedure.

很多链条上有医术之环的学士 其尝试都以失败告终
Many maesters whose chains are heavy with healing links have attempted it and failed.

我研读了书本 遵循上面的指导
I read the books and followed the instructions.

那个人因你而生
That man is alive because of you.

谢谢你 博士
Thank you, Archmaester.

这些手稿和卷轴都要霉烂了
All these manuscripts and scrolls are rotting away.

我需要你把他们另外抄写一份
I need you to make copies of them.

你在想奖赏
You were expecting a reward.

你的奖赏就是不被学城即刻驱逐
Your reward is not being immediately expelled from the Citadel.

你最好开始干活
You'd better get started.

小心纸里的蛀虫
And careful of the paper mites.

它们也喜欢人肉
They like flesh as well.

我们得找到攸伦·葛雷乔伊的舰队 并将其击沉

陛下 他已经摧毁了我们的大部分
Your Grace, he's already destroyed a good portion of our fleet.

如果派剩余的船追击…
To send our remaining ships after him...

我说的不是派船去追
I'm not talking about sending our ships after him.

您有必要亲自去吗? 
Would you have to go yourself?

攸伦的舰队可能在任何地方 也可能分散各地
Euron's ships could be anywhere or in more than one place.

真不知道 您要在开阔的海面上 独自飞多久啊

我有卓耿 韦塞里昂和雷哥
I would have Drogon, Viserion, and Rhaegal.

凡人能拿它们怎样?

可敌人能染指于您
They can still do something to you.

哪怕一支利箭呢
It only takes one arrow.

这么做风险太大 您可是重中之重

凯岩城那边情况如何?

无垢者将很快抵达凯岩城

他们会面临什么情况?

一场血战
A difficult situation.

他们知道我们会来
They know we're coming.

没错 瑟曦认定我毕生的目标 就是摧毁兰尼斯特家族
Yes. Cersei believes my sole purpose in life is to destroy House Lannister.

从未有人能攻下凯岩城 弓箭手!
No one has ever taken the Rock. Archers!

兰尼斯特大军仍是那支由我父亲亲手打造的军队
The Lannister Army is still the army my father built.

准备战斗! 他们训练有素 补给充足

他们知道我们会来

凯岩城大门固若金汤

高墙难以逾越

局面对我们不利

正如我父亲当年所言
Just as my father said they would.

关于我父亲 有些事很有意思 他重振整个家族于危难之际
Interesting thing about my father...  he built our house up from near ruin.

训练出一支强有力的部队 还建起了凯岩城 可他却没铺设下水道
He built our army, he built Casterly Rock as we know it, but he didn't build the sewers.

区区小事 何足劳动父亲大人 他把这活儿交给身边最不值一提之人 也就是我
That was beneath him, so he gave the job to the lowest person he could find...  me.

没错 我身份低贱
He was right, I was low.

我身边的人 同样卑微
The company I kept, low.

在凯岩城 她们并不受欢迎
They weren't welcome at the Rock.

父亲也不认可我和她们厮混在一起
Father disapproved of that sort of behavior.

我没法带着她们从大门堂堂正正而入
Couldn't walk them through the front gates,

也不能把她们带到内廷 那么在修建水道的过程中
I couldn't have them in my chambers, so in the process of building the sewers,

我为自己动了点小手脚
I threw in something for myself.

这是一条通道 起点在海边一个不起眼的小湾 止于主哨塔的底部
It was a passage that began in an out of the way cove by the sea and ended beneath one of the main guard towers.

没有哪儿比地底更适合追求低级趣味了
No better place for low pursuits than beneath the ground.

凯岩城宛如铜墙铁壁 这话儿没错
Casterly Rock is an impregnable fortress.

但我某个朋友也曾说过
But as a good friend of mine once said,

无垢者直面兰尼斯特军队
They will face the bulk of the Lannister forces.

他们以少迎多
They will be outnumbered.

且装备不足
They will have less armor and fewer weapons.

可兰尼斯特军队是出于恐惧而效忠我的姐姐
But my sister's armies fight for her out of fear.

无垢者则为了更宏伟之愿
The Unsullied will be fighting for something greater.

那就是自由 以及解放他们的人
They will be fighting for freedom and the person who gave it to them.

他们为您而战
They will be fighting for you.

正是如此 我们胜券在握
And that is why they will triumph.

兰尼斯特其他士兵哪去了? 
Where are the rest of the Lannisters?

如今 雨水在我们厅中哭泣
And now the rains weep o'er our halls.

呃 跟预想中的差不多吧
Uh, as well as could be expected.

战斗从不是我们的强项
It was never our forte.

毕竟是金玫瑰
Golden roses, indeed.

你的弟弟和他的女王 认为你眼下应在镇守凯岩城
Your brother and his new queen thought you would be defending Casterly Rock.

事实却是凯岩城的价值已大不如从前
The truth is Casterly Rock isn't worth much anymore.

怎么说呢 凯岩城对我非常珍贵 但我的童真岁月 可不能帮瑟曦坐稳王位
Well, it is to me, but my fond childhood memories won't keep Cersei on the throne.

那你就这么拱手让人了? 
So you just let them take it?

那只是暂时的 他们没法长期守住城
For now. They won't be able to hold it.

攸伦·葛雷乔伊率军烧了他们的船只 在离开之前 我们清空了粮仓
Euron Greyjoy's navy burned their ships, we emptied the larders before we left.

最终他们不得不放弃这个据点 横穿维斯特洛大陆
Eventually, they'll be forced to abandon their position and march all the way across Westeros.

而你带着你的军队 你的绝对主力 去了他们不本该去的地方
And you took your army, your real army, and went where they weren't.

罗柏·史塔克在呓语森林就是这样摆了我一道
As Robb Stark did to me at Whispering Wood.

人总得从失败中吸取教训
There are always lessons in failures.

的确 现在的你一定是个智者了
Yes. You must be very wise by now.

父亲总说我学东西慢
My father always said I was a slow learner.

如果他当真聪明 为什么他不在金矿枯竭时 就拿下高庭呢? 
If he was so clever, why didn't he take Highgarden the moment your gold mines ran dry?

我想 很快我就能当面问问他了
I suppose I'll be able to ask him myself soon enough.

从我的错误就没什么教训可学了 对吧? 
No more learning from my mistakes, eh?

那曾是乔佛里的剑吧? 
That was Joffrey's sword, wasn't it?

可他没机会用
Not that he ever used it.

他真是个混蛋啊
He really was a cunt, wasn't he?

为了保护家庭 我做了难以启齿的事
I did unspeakable things to protect my family.

或看着这些事按我的命令被人执行
Or watched them being done on my orders.

我从不会因此难以入睡
I never lost a night's sleep over them.

为了提利尔家的安全 我做了能想到的一切
And whatever I imagined necessary for the safety of House Tyrell, I did.

但你的姐姐所做的…
But your sister has done things...

我压根无法想象
I was incapable of imagining.

这是我的错误 理应受罚 错在缺乏想象力
That was my prize mistake...  a failure of imagination.

她是个怪物 你明白的吧? 
She's a monster, you do know that?

可是 我们获胜之后 反对的人将烟消云散 而人们平静地生活在瑟曦一手建立的国度 你真认为他们会计较她达成的方式吗? 
But after we've won and there's no one left to oppose us, when people are living peacefully in the world she built, do you really think they'll wring their hands over the way she built it?

你的确爱着她
You really do love her.

你会折在她的手里
She'll be the end of you.

就算这样 和你讨这些也不会有什么益处 不是吗? 
Not much to be gained from discussing it with you, though, is there?

那你有更好的讨论对象吗? 
What better person to discuss it with?

谁还能像我一样保证 你说的话一定不会传出这间屋子? 
What better guarantee could you have that the things you say will never leave this room?

或许 你是对的
But perhaps you're right.

如果她能把你带偏这么远 那一定有什么是你根本控制不了的
If she's driven you this far, it's gone beyond your control.

我后悔自己曾为虎作伥
I regret my role in spreading it.

就这样吧
I think we're done here.

瑟曦有好几个想法
Cersei had several ideas.

让你游街 在红堡前斩首
Whipping you through the streets and beheading you in front of the Red Keep.

活剥你 把你吊在君临城外墙上
Flaying you alive and hanging you from the walls of King's Landing.

我说服了她
I talked her out of those.

不会 我保证
No. I made sure of that.

我讨厌你儿子那种死法
I'd hate to die like your son.

手掐着脖子 口吐白沫 双眼充血 皮肤泛紫
Clawing at my neck, foam and bile spilling from my mouth, eyes bloodred, skin purple.

作为御林铁卫 作为父亲 你一定吓坏了吧
Must have been horrible for you, as a Kingsguard, as a father.

我也觉得挺可怕的
It was horrible enough for me.

根本不是我想象中那样
Not at all what I intended.

毕竟我之前没见过毒药发作
You see, I had never seen the poison work before.

凶手是我 我想让她知道这点
I want her to know it was me.

恢复对这片土地 和人民的统治 是我当前的唯一赌注
My only venture at this moment is reestablishing control over this continent and every person on it.

我的全部盟友都失败了
All my allies are gone.

您还有铁金库 只要金子运到
You can count on the Iron Bank. As soon as the gold arrives.

就足够开展计划了
Enough with the clever plans.

你刚刚赢得了世界上最丰厚的战利品
You've just won the biggest prize in the world.

还忧郁个啥? 
What could you possibly have to be upset about?

没事儿 你尽管告诉我
Come on, you can tell me.

荆棘女王在临死之前 最后还刺了你的蛋蛋吗? 
Queen of Thorns give you one last prick in the balls before saying goodbye?

我还是去找总主教倾诉衷肠吧
I'll save my confessions for the High Septon.

已经没有什么总主教了
There is no more High Septon.

对 没有了 不是吗? 
No, there isn't, is there?

但是我的那份奖赏可不能没有
There is still the question of my prize.

我刚给你的钱可够多了
That's a lot of money I just gave you.

那边那座怎么样? 它刚好缺个主人呢
How about that one? It's available.

你不会想要高庭的
You don't want Highgarden.

我可不敢苟同 现在是战争时期
I beg to differ. We're at war.

你搬进城堡不到两天 丹妮莉丝・坦格利安就可能会把它夺回去
Daenerys Targaryen could come and take it back the day after you move in.

另外 考虑下维护费
Besides, think of the upkeep.

你拥有的越多 要承担的也就越重
The more you owe, the more it weighs you down.

哦 这就是你他妈这么丧气的原因? 
Oh, is that why you're so fucking glum, eh?

新抢来的金子成了你的无法承受之重? 
All your new riches weighing you down?

出发! 那些金子不是我的
Move out! They're not mine.

它们都归铁金库所有
This all belongs to the Iron Bank.

看到了没? 我们有债必还
See? We pay our debts.

好吧 就是没还我的
Right, just not to me.

黑水河的波隆爵士 出身于… 管你出身于哪个不知名的臭屎堆 带着满满一挎包的金子 还在抱怨自己没得到足够的回报
Ser Bronn of the Blackwater, formerly of...  whatever nameless shit heap you're from with a saddlebag full of gold, complaining about not getting paid.

等我们赢了这场战争 再也没有人能从你手中抢走东西 七大王国的所有城堡 任你挑选
When we win this war, all the castles in the Seven Kingdoms will be yours to choose from, with no one left to take them away from you.

We don't have to bring the whole army.

其实说什么都是白忙一场 如果我们弄不到一个这样的死人的话

你曾命令我找到治疗的方法 再回到你身边服侍

And I came here knowing that you could have your men behead me or your dragons burn me alive.

这在南方是件平常事吗还是… ?

These maesters...  they set me to the task of preserving that man's window counting and annulments and bowel movements for all eternity, while the secret to defeating the Night King's probably sitting on some dusty shelf somewhere, completely ignored.

反正又无所谓 是吧?

是台阶的数量

说服他放弃这种傻逼念头 这难道不是你的任务吗? 
Isn't it your job to talk him out of stupid fucking ideas like this?

我最近这项任务做失败了
I've been failing at that job of late.

现在有多少女王? 
How many queens are there now?

那你是要去说服有龙的那位 还是跟她弟乱伦的那位?

How many men did you bring?

We were hoping some of your men could help.

嗯 我会留下来的
Hmm. I'll be staying behind.

我是个有责任感的人 你懂的
I'm a liability out there, as you well know.

你真的想去那里? 再去一次? 
You really want to go out there? Again?

你不是一个人
You're not the only ones.

My scouts found them a mile south of the Wall.

说他们正往这儿来
Said they were on their way here.

They want to go beyond the Wall, too.

Our Lord told us that the Great War is coming

Don't trust any of them.

他们是兄弟会的
They're the Brotherhood.

他们的神让他们做的最后一件事 就是把我卖给红女巫杀掉
And the last thing their lord told them to do was sell me to a red witch to be murdered.

我差点认不出你了
I hardly recognized you.

在这里他们什么都不给喝
They won't give me anything to drink down here.

我都觉得不是自己了
I haven't been feeling like myself.

你就是那个该死的莫尔蒙?

上一任守夜人总司令?

他像狩猎一样猎杀我们
He hunted us like animals.

你还了我人情 我记得
You returned the favor, as I recall.

现在我们都在这儿了 在世界边缘 同一时刻 为了同一个目标往同一个方向迈进
Here we all are at the edge of the world at the same moment, heading in the same direction for the same reason.

我们的目标不是你们的
Our reasons aren't your reasons.

我们的目标是什么又无关紧要
It doesn't matter what we think our reasons are.

还有个更伟大的目标
There's a greater purpose at work.

我们要一起完成 不管我们是否意识到这点
And we serve it together, whether we know it or not.

我们或许会采取步骤 但光之王…
We may take the steps, but the Lord of Light

看在他妈的份上 你能夹上屁眼吗? 
For fuck's sake, will you shut your hole?

你们到底要不要带上我们一起? 
Are we coming with you or not?

你不先问问我们打算做什么吗? 
Don't you want to know what we're doing?

难道这比在冰冷的囚牢里坐吃等死还惨吗?

We're all on the same side.

The first enemy and the last.

詹德利
'大牛' 劳勃的私生子

从没来过北方?

从没见过雪
Never seen snow before.

你根本没去过南方
You've never been down south.

I've been to Winterfell. That's the North.

How do you keep your balls from freezing off?

The KingbeyondtheWall never bent the knee.

你们知道她对我做了什么吗?

然后把水蛭放我身上… 她也裸着呢?

对, 谢谢   这我知道

这家伙被杀死了六次
This one's been killed six times.

也没听到他抱怨一句屁话
You don't hear him bitching about it.

I was a prisoner of the wildlings.

I want you to know that.

He was good all the way through.

也丝毫没有减轻当时我对他的恨意

我很高兴他没有抓到你 我也是
I'm glad he didn't catch you. Me, too.

你的父亲给了我这把剑
Your father gave me this sword.

把剑柄头从熊改成了狼… 但它依旧是长爪
Changed the pommel from a bear to a wolf...  but it's still Longclaw.

莫尔蒙总司令 以为你再也不会回到维斯特洛

但你回来了 而这把剑在你的家族传承了数百年

我还拿着它就不合适了

我使我的家族蒙羞

希望它能为你… 以及你的子孙所用
May it serve you well...  and your children after you.

父亲过去经常从这上面看着我们
Father used to watch us from up here.

他不怎么说话
He wouldn't say much.

你可能不记得了
You probably don't remember.

你总是在屋里做针线活
You were inside knitting all the time.

有次男孩们在和罗德利克爵士射箭
One time, the boys were shooting arrows with Ser Rodrik.

他们走后我来了这儿 正好布兰把弓给落下了 扔在地上
I came out here after, and Bran had left his bow behind, just lying on the ground.

要是罗德利克爵士看到了一定会打他
Ser Rodrik would have cuffed him if he saw.

还有一支箭在靶子上
There was one arrow in the target.

周围一个人都没有 就像现在
There was no one around, just like now.

于是我开始射箭
So I started shooting.

每射一箭我都要上去 把我唯一的箭取下来 然后走回去继续射
And every shot, I had to go up there and get my one arrow and walk back and shoot it again.

终于, 我射中了靶心
Finally, I hit the bull'seye.

也许是第 20 箭, 或者第 50 箭
Could have been the 20th shot or the 50th.

但我射中了靶心, 接着我就听到了这个
But I hit the bull'seye, and I heard this.

我抬起头 他就站在这里 对着我微笑
I looked up, and he's standing right here, smiling down at me.

我知道我的所作所为不合规矩

但他却在微笑 所以我知道我没做错

错的是规矩

他很明白我所做的正是我注定要做的
I was doing what I was meant to be doing, and he knew it.

做了兰尼斯特的刀下鬼 其中还有你的推波助澜

'罗柏 我怀着沉重的心情给你写信

You don't look much like him.
